40001001	This is the family history of Jesus Christ . He came from the family of David , and David came from the family of Abraham .
40001002	Abraham was the father of Isaac . Isaac was the father of Jacob . Jacob was the father of Judah and his brothers .
40001003	Judah was the father of Perez and Zerah . ( Their mother was Tamar . ) Perez was the father of Hezron . Hezron was the father of Ram .
40001004	Ram was the father of Amminadab . Amminadab was the father of Nahshon . Nahshon was the father of Salmon .
40001005	Salmon was the father of Boaz . ( Boaz’s mother was Rahab . ) Boaz was the father of Obed . ( Obed’s mother was Ruth . ) Obed was the father of Jesse .
40001006	Jesse was the father of King David . David was the father of Solomon . ( Solomon’s mother had been Uriah’s wife . )
40001007	Solomon was the father of Rehoboam . Rehoboam was the father of Abijah . Abijah was the father of Asa .
40001008	Asa was the father of Jehoshaphat . Jehoshaphat was the father of Jehoram . Jehoram was the ancestor of Uzziah .
40001009	Uzziah was the father of Jotham . Jotham was the father of Ahaz . Ahaz was the father of Hezekiah .
40001010	Hezekiah was the father of Manasseh . Manasseh was the father of Amon . Amon was the father of Josiah .
40001011	Josiah was the grandfather of Jehoiachin and his brothers . ( This was at the time that the people were taken to Babylon . )
40001012	After they were taken to Babylon : Jehoiachin was the father of Shealtiel . Shealtiel was the grandfather of Zerubbabel .
40001013	Zerubbabel was the father of Abiud . Abiud was the father of Eliakim . Eliakim was the father of Azor .
40001014	Azor was the father of Zadok . Zadok was the father of Akim . Akim was the father of Eliud .
40001015	Eliud was the father of Eleazar . Eleazar was the father of Matthan . Matthan was the father of Jacob .
40001016	Jacob was the father of Joseph . Joseph was the husband of Mary , and Mary was the mother of Jesus . Jesus is called the Christ .
40001017	So there were fourteen generations from Abraham to David . And there were fourteen generations from David until the people were taken to Babylon . And there were fourteen generations from the time when the people were taken to Babylon until Christ was born .
40001018	This is how the birth of Jesus Christ came about . His mother Mary was engaged to marry Joseph , but before they married , she learned she was pregnant by the power of the Holy Spirit .
40001019	Because Mary’s husband , Joseph , was a good man , he did not want to disgrace her in public , so he planned to divorce her secretly .
40001020	While Joseph thought about these things , an angel of the Lord came to him in a dream . The angel said , “ Joseph , descendant of David , don’t be afraid to take Mary as your wife , because the baby in her is from the Holy Spirit .
40001021	She will give birth to a son , and you will name him Jesus , because he will save his people from their sins . ”
40001022	All this happened to bring about what the Lord had said through the prophet :
40001023	“ The virgin will be pregnant . She will have a son , and they will name him Immanuel , ” which means “ God is with us . ”
40001024	When Joseph woke up , he did what the Lord’s angel had told him to do . Joseph took Mary as his wife ,
40001025	but he did not have sexual relations with her until she gave birth to the son . And Joseph named him Jesus .
40002001	Jesus was born in the town of Bethlehem in Judea during the time when Herod was king . When Jesus was born , some wise men from the east came to Jerusalem .
40002002	They asked , “ Where is the baby who was born to be the king of the Jews ? We saw his star in the east and have come to worship him . ”
40002003	When King Herod heard this , he was troubled , as were all the people in Jerusalem .
40002004	Herod called a meeting of all the leading priests and teachers of the law and asked them where the Christ would be born .
40002005	They answered , “ In the town of Bethlehem in Judea . The prophet wrote about this in the Scriptures :
40002006	‘ But you , Bethlehem , in the land of Judah , are not just an insignificant village in Judah . A ruler will come from you who will be like a shepherd for my people Israel . ’ ”
40002007	Then Herod had a secret meeting with the wise men and learned from them the exact time they first saw the star .
40002008	He sent the wise men to Bethlehem , saying , “ Look carefully for the child . When you find him , come tell me so I can worship him too . ”
40002009	After the wise men heard the king , they left . The star that they had seen in the east went before them until it stopped above the place where the child was .
40002010	When the wise men saw the star , they were filled with joy .
40002011	They came to the house where the child was and saw him with his mother , Mary , and they bowed down and worshiped him . They opened their gifts and gave him treasures of gold , frankincense , and myrrh .
40002012	But God warned the wise men in a dream not to go back to Herod , so they returned to their own country by a different way .
40002013	After they left , an angel of the Lord came to Joseph in a dream and said , “ Get up ! Take the child and his mother and escape to Egypt , because Herod is starting to look for the child so he can kill him . Stay in Egypt until I tell you to return . ”
40002014	So Joseph got up and left for Egypt during the night with the child and his mother .
40002015	And Joseph stayed in Egypt until Herod died . This happened to bring about what the Lord had said through the prophet : “ I called my son out of Egypt . ”
40002016	When Herod saw that the wise men had tricked him , he was furious . So he gave an order to kill all the baby boys in Bethlehem and in the surrounding area who were two years old or younger . This was in keeping with the time he learned from the wise men .
40002017	So what God had said through the prophet Jeremiah came true :
40002018	“ A voice was heard in Ramah of painful crying and deep sadness : Rachel crying for her children . She refused to be comforted , because her children are dead . ”
40002019	After Herod died , an angel of the Lord spoke to Joseph in a dream while he was in Egypt .
40002020	The angel said , “ Get up ! Take the child and his mother and go to the land of Israel , because the people who were trying to kill the child are now dead . ”
40002021	So Joseph took the child and his mother and went to Israel .
40002022	But he heard that Archelaus was now king in Judea since his father Herod had died . So Joseph was afraid to go there . After being warned in a dream , he went to the area of Galilee ,
40002023	to a town called Nazareth , and lived there . And so what God had said through the prophets came true : “ He will be called a Nazarene . ”
40003001	About that time John the Baptist began preaching in the desert area of Judea .
40003002	John said , “ Change your hearts and lives because the kingdom of heaven is near . ”
40003003	John the Baptist is the one Isaiah the prophet was talking about when he said : “ This is a voice of one who calls out in the desert : ‘ Prepare the way for the Lord . Make the road straight for him . ’ ”
40003004	John’s clothes were made from camel’s hair , and he wore a leather belt around his waist . For food , he ate locusts and wild honey .
40003005	Many people came from Jerusalem and Judea and all the area around the Jordan River to hear John .
40003006	They confessed their sins , and he baptized them in the Jordan River .
40003007	Many of the Pharisees and Sadducees came to the place where John was baptizing people . When John saw them , he said , “ You are snakes ! Who warned you to run away from God’s coming punishment ?
40003008	Do the things that show you really have changed your hearts and lives .
40003009	And don’t think you can say to yourselves , ‘ Abraham is our father . ’ I tell you that God could make children for Abraham from these rocks .
40003010	The ax is now ready to cut down the trees , and every tree that does not produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into the fire .
40003011	“ I baptize you with water to show that your hearts and lives have changed . But there is one coming after me who is greater than I am , whose sandals I am not good enough to carry . He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and fire .
40003012	He will come ready to clean the grain , separating the good grain from the chaff . He will put the good part of the grain into his barn , but he will burn the chaff with a fire that cannot be put out . ”
40003013	At that time Jesus came from Galilee to the Jordan River and wanted John to baptize him .
40003014	But John tried to stop him , saying , “ Why do you come to me to be baptized ? I need to be baptized by you ! ”
40003015	Jesus answered , “ Let it be this way for now . We should do all things that are God’s will . ” So John agreed to baptize Jesus .
40003016	As soon as Jesus was baptized , he came up out of the water . Then heaven opened , and he saw God’s Spirit coming down on him like a dove .
40003017	And a voice from heaven said , “ This is my Son , whom I love , and I am very pleased with him . ”
40004001	Then the Spirit led Jesus into the desert to be tempted by the devil .
40004002	Jesus fasted for forty days and nights . After this , he was very hungry .
40004003	The devil came to Jesus to tempt him , saying , “ If you are the Son of God , tell these rocks to become bread . ”
40004004	Jesus answered , “ It is written in the Scriptures , ‘ A person lives not on bread alone , but by everything God says . ’ ”
40004005	Then the devil led Jesus to the holy city of Jerusalem and put him on a high place of the Temple .
40004006	The devil said , “ If you are the Son of God , jump down , because it is written in the Scriptures : ‘ He has put his angels in charge of you . They will catch you in their hands so that you will not hit your foot on a rock . ’ ”
40004007	Jesus answered him , “ It also says in the Scriptures , ‘ Do not test the Lord your God . ’ ”
40004008	Then the devil led Jesus to the top of a very high mountain and showed him all the kingdoms of the world and all their splendor .
40004009	The devil said , “ If you will bow down and worship me , I will give you all these things . ”
40004010	Jesus said to the devil , “ Go away from me , Satan ! It is written in the Scriptures , ‘ You must worship the Lord your God and serve only him . ’ ”
40004011	So the devil left Jesus , and angels came and took care of him .
40004012	When Jesus heard that John had been put in prison , he went back to Galilee .
40004013	He left Nazareth and went to live in Capernaum , a town near Lake Galilee , in the area near Zebulun and Naphtali .
40004014	Jesus did this to bring about what the prophet Isaiah had said :
40004015	“ Land of Zebulun and land of Naphtali along the sea , beyond the Jordan River . This is Galilee where the non-Jewish people live .
40004016	These people who live in darkness will see a great light . They live in a place covered with the shadows of death , but a light will shine on them . ”
40004017	From that time Jesus began to preach , saying , “ Change your hearts and lives , because the kingdom of heaven is near . ”
40004018	As Jesus was walking by Lake Galilee , he saw two brothers , Simon ( called Peter ) and his brother Andrew . They were throwing a net into the lake because they were fishermen .
40004019	Jesus said , “ Come follow me , and I will make you fish for people . ”
40004020	So Simon and Andrew immediately left their nets and followed him .
40004021	As Jesus continued walking by Lake Galilee , he saw two other brothers , James and John , the sons of Zebedee . They were in a boat with their father Zebedee , mending their nets . Jesus told them to come with him .
40004022	Immediately they left the boat and their father , and they followed Jesus .
40004023	Jesus went everywhere in Galilee , teaching in the synagogues , preaching the Good News about the kingdom of heaven , and healing all the people’s diseases and sicknesses .
40004024	The news about Jesus spread all over Syria , and people brought all the sick to him . They were suffering from different kinds of diseases . Some were in great pain , some had demons , some were epileptics , and some were paralyzed . Jesus healed all of them .
40004025	Many people from Galilee , the Ten Towns , Jerusalem , Judea , and the land across the Jordan River followed him .
40005001	When Jesus saw the crowds , he went up on a hill and sat down . His followers came to him ,
40005002	and he began to teach them , saying :
40005003	“ They are blessed who realize their spiritual poverty , for the kingdom of heaven belongs to them .
40005004	They are blessed who grieve , for God will comfort them .
40005005	They are blessed who are humble , for the whole earth will be theirs .
40005006	They are blessed who hunger and thirst after justice , for they will be satisfied .
40005007	They are blessed who show mercy to others , for God will show mercy to them .
40005008	They are blessed whose thoughts are pure , for they will see God .
40005009	They are blessed who work for peace , for they will be called God’s children .
40005010	They are blessed who are persecuted for doing good , for the kingdom of heaven belongs to them .
40005011	“ People will insult you and hurt you . They will lie and say all kinds of evil things about you because you follow me . But when they do , you will be blessed .
40005012	Rejoice and be glad , because you have a great reward waiting for you in heaven . People did the same evil things to the prophets who lived before you .
40005013	“ You are the salt of the earth . But if the salt loses its salty taste , it cannot be made salty again . It is good for nothing , except to be thrown out and walked on .
40005014	“ You are the light that gives light to the world . A city that is built on a hill cannot be hidden .
40005015	And people don’t hide a light under a bowl . They put it on a lampstand so the light shines for all the people in the house .
40005016	In the same way , you should be a light for other people . Live so that they will see the good things you do and will praise your Father in heaven .
40005017	“ Don’t think that I have come to destroy the law of Moses or the teaching of the prophets . I have not come to destroy them but to bring about what they said .
40005018	I tell you the truth , nothing will disappear from the law until heaven and earth are gone . Not even the smallest letter or the smallest part of a letter will be lost until everything has happened .
40005019	Whoever refuses to obey any command and teaches other people not to obey that command will be the least important in the kingdom of heaven . But whoever obeys the commands and teaches other people to obey them will be great in the kingdom of heaven .
40005020	I tell you that if you are no more obedient than the teachers of the law and the Pharisees , you will never enter the kingdom of heaven .
40005021	“ You have heard that it was said to our people long ago , ‘ You must not murder anyone . Anyone who murders another will be judged . ’
40005022	But I tell you , if you are angry with a brother or sister , you will be judged . If you say bad things to a brother or sister , you will be judged by the council . And if you call someone a fool , you will be in danger of the fire of hell .
40005023	“ So when you offer your gift to God at the altar , and you remember that your brother or sister has something against you ,
40005024	leave your gift there at the altar . Go and make peace with that person , and then come and offer your gift .
40005025	“ If your enemy is taking you to court , become friends quickly , before you go to court . Otherwise , your enemy might turn you over to the judge , and the judge might give you to a guard to put you in jail .
40005026	I tell you the truth , you will not leave there until you have paid everything you owe .
40005027	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ You must not be guilty of adultery . ’
40005028	But I tell you that if anyone looks at a woman and wants to sin sexually with her , in his mind he has already done that sin with the woman .
40005029	If your right eye causes you to sin , take it out and throw it away . It is better to lose one part of your body than to have your whole body thrown into hell .
40005030	If your right hand causes you to sin , cut it off and throw it away . It is better to lose one part of your body than for your whole body to go into hell .
40005031	“ It was also said , ‘ Anyone who divorces his wife must give her a written divorce paper . ’
40005032	But I tell you that anyone who divorces his wife forces her to be guilty of adultery . The only reason for a man to divorce his wife is if she has sexual relations with another man . And anyone who marries that divorced woman is guilty of adultery .
40005033	“ You have heard that it was said to our people long ago , ‘ Don’t break your promises , but keep the promises you make to the Lord . ’
40005034	But I tell you , never swear an oath . Don’t swear an oath using the name of heaven , because heaven is God’s throne .
40005035	Don’t swear an oath using the name of the earth , because the earth belongs to God . Don’t swear an oath using the name of Jerusalem , because that is the city of the great King .
40005036	Don’t even swear by your own head , because you cannot make one hair on your head become white or black .
40005037	Say only yes if you mean yes , and no if you mean no . If you say more than yes or no , it is from the Evil One .
40005038	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth . ’
40005039	But I tell you , don’t stand up against an evil person . If someone slaps you on the right cheek , turn to him the other cheek also .
40005040	If someone wants to sue you in court and take your shirt , let him have your coat also .
40005041	If someone forces you to go with him one mile , go with him two miles .
40005042	If a person asks you for something , give it to him . Don’t refuse to give to someone who wants to borrow from you .
40005043	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ Love your neighbor and hate your enemies . ’
40005044	But I say to you , love your enemies . Pray for those who hurt you .
40005045	If you do this , you will be true children of your Father in heaven . He causes the sun to rise on good people and on evil people , and he sends rain to those who do right and to those who do wrong .
40005046	If you love only the people who love you , you will get no reward . Even the tax collectors do that .
40005047	And if you are nice only to your friends , you are no better than other people . Even those who don’t know God are nice to their friends .
40005048	So you must be perfect , just as your Father in heaven is perfect .
40006001	“ Be careful ! When you do good things , don’t do them in front of people to be seen by them . If you do that , you will have no reward from your Father in heaven .
40006002	“ When you give to the poor , don’t be like the hypocrites . They blow trumpets in the synagogues and on the streets so that people will see them and honor them . I tell you the truth , those hypocrites already have their full reward .
40006003	So when you give to the poor , don’t let anyone know what you are doing .
40006004	Your giving should be done in secret . Your Father can see what is done in secret , and he will reward you .
40006005	“ When you pray , don’t be like the hypocrites . They love to stand in the synagogues and on the street corners and pray so people will see them . I tell you the truth , they already have their full reward .
40006006	When you pray , you should go into your room and close the door and pray to your Father who cannot be seen . Your Father can see what is done in secret , and he will reward you .
40006007	“ And when you pray , don’t be like those people who don’t know God . They continue saying things that mean nothing , thinking that God will hear them because of their many words .
40006008	Don’t be like them , because your Father knows the things you need before you ask him .
40006009	So when you pray , you should pray like this : ‘ Our Father in heaven , may your name always be kept holy .
40006010	May your kingdom come and what you want be done , here on earth as it is in heaven .
40006011	Give us the food we need for each day .
40006012	Forgive us for our sins , just as we have forgiven those who sinned against us .
40006013	And do not cause us to be tempted , but save us from the Evil One . ’ [ The kingdom , the power , and the glory are yours forever . Amen . ]
40006014	Yes , if you forgive others for their sins , your Father in heaven will also forgive you for your sins .
40006015	But if you don’t forgive others , your Father in heaven will not forgive your sins .
40006016	“ When you fast , don’t put on a sad face like the hypocrites . They make their faces look sad to show people they are fasting . I tell you the truth , those hypocrites already have their full reward .
40006017	So when you fast , comb your hair and wash your face .
40006018	Then people will not know that you are fasting , but your Father , whom you cannot see , will see you . Your Father sees what is done in secret , and he will reward you .
40006019	“ Don’t store treasures for yourselves here on earth where moths and rust will destroy them and thieves can break in and steal them .
40006020	But store your treasures in heaven where they cannot be destroyed by moths or rust and where thieves cannot break in and steal them .
40006021	Your heart will be where your treasure is .
40006022	“ The eye is a light for the body . If your eyes are good , your whole body will be full of light .
40006023	But if your eyes are evil , your whole body will be full of darkness . And if the only light you have is really darkness , then you have the worst darkness .
40006024	“ No one can serve two masters . The person will hate one master and love the other , or will follow one master and refuse to follow the other . You cannot serve both God and worldly riches .
40006025	“ So I tell you , don’t worry about the food or drink you need to live , or about the clothes you need for your body . Life is more than food , and the body is more than clothes .
40006026	Look at the birds in the air . They don’t plant or harvest or store food in barns , but your heavenly Father feeds them . And you know that you are worth much more than the birds .
40006027	You cannot add any time to your life by worrying about it .
40006028	“ And why do you worry about clothes ? Look at how the lilies in the field grow . They don’t work or make clothes for themselves .
40006029	But I tell you that even Solomon with his riches was not dressed as beautifully as one of these flowers .
40006030	God clothes the grass in the field , which is alive today but tomorrow is thrown into the fire . So you can be even more sure that God will clothe you . Don’t have so little faith !
40006031	Don’t worry and say , ‘ What will we eat ? ’ or ‘ What will we drink ? ’ or ‘ What will we wear ? ’
40006032	The people who don’t know God keep trying to get these things , and your Father in heaven knows you need them .
40006033	Seek first God’s kingdom and what God wants . Then all your other needs will be met as well .
40006034	So don’t worry about tomorrow , because tomorrow will have its own worries . Each day has enough trouble of its own .
40007001	“ Don’t judge others , or you will be judged .
40007002	You will be judged in the same way that you judge others , and the amount you give to others will be given to you .
40007003	“ Why do you notice the little piece of dust in your friend’s eye , but you don’t notice the big piece of wood in your own eye ?
40007004	How can you say to your friend , ‘ Let me take that little piece of dust out of your eye ’ ? Look at yourself ! You still have that big piece of wood in your own eye .
40007005	You hypocrite ! First , take the wood out of your own eye . Then you will see clearly to take the dust out of your friend’s eye .
40007006	“ Don’t give holy things to dogs , and don’t throw your pearls before pigs . Pigs will only trample on them , and dogs will turn to attack you .
40007007	“ Ask , and God will give to you . Search , and you will find . Knock , and the door will open for you .
40007008	Yes , everyone who asks will receive . Everyone who searches will find . And everyone who knocks will have the door opened .
40007009	“ If your children ask for bread , which of you would give them a stone ?
40007010	Or if your children ask for a fish , would you give them a snake ?
40007011	Even though you are bad , you know how to give good gifts to your children . How much more your heavenly Father will give good things to those who ask him !
40007012	“ Do to others what you want them to do to you . This is the meaning of the law of Moses and the teaching of the prophets .
40007013	“ Enter through the narrow gate . The gate is wide and the road is wide that leads to hell , and many people enter through that gate .
40007014	But the gate is small and the road is narrow that leads to true life . Only a few people find that road .
40007015	“ Be careful of false prophets . They come to you looking gentle like sheep , but they are really dangerous like wolves .
40007016	You will know these people by what they do . Grapes don’t come from thornbushes , and figs don’t come from thorny weeds .
40007017	In the same way , every good tree produces good fruit , but a bad tree produces bad fruit .
40007018	A good tree cannot produce bad fruit , and a bad tree cannot produce good fruit .
40007019	Every tree that does not produce good fruit is cut down and thrown into the fire .
40007020	In the same way , you will know these false prophets by what they do .
40007021	“ Not all those who say ‘ You are our Lord ’ will enter the kingdom of heaven . The only people who will enter the kingdom of heaven are those who do what my Father in heaven wants .
40007022	On the last day many people will say to me , ‘ Lord , Lord , we spoke for you , and through you we forced out demons and did many miracles . ’
40007023	Then I will tell them clearly , ‘ Get away from me , you who do evil . I never knew you . ’
40007024	“ Everyone who hears my words and obeys them is like a wise man who built his house on rock .
40007025	It rained hard , the floods came , and the winds blew and hit that house . But it did not fall , because it was built on rock .
40007026	Everyone who hears my words and does not obey them is like a foolish man who built his house on sand .
40007027	It rained hard , the floods came , and the winds blew and hit that house , and it fell with a big crash . ”
40007028	When Jesus finished saying these things , the people were amazed at his teaching ,
40007029	because he did not teach like their teachers of the law . He taught like a person who had authority .
40008001	When Jesus came down from the hill , great crowds followed him .
40008002	Then a man with a skin disease came to Jesus . The man bowed down before him and said , “ Lord , you can heal me if you will . ”
40008003	Jesus reached out his hand and touched the man and said , “ I will . Be healed ! ” And immediately the man was healed from his disease .
40008004	Then Jesus said to him , “ Don’t tell anyone about this . But go and show yourself to the priest and offer the gift Moses commanded for people who are made well . This will show the people what I have done . ”
40008005	When Jesus entered the city of Capernaum , an army officer came to him , begging for help .
40008006	The officer said , “ Lord , my servant is at home in bed . He can’t move his body and is in much pain . ”
40008007	Jesus said to the officer , “ I will go and heal him . ”
40008008	The officer answered , “ Lord , I am not worthy for you to come into my house . You only need to command it , and my servant will be healed .
40008009	I , too , am a man under the authority of others , and I have soldiers under my command . I tell one soldier , ‘ Go , ’ and he goes . I tell another soldier , ‘ Come , ’ and he comes . I say to my servant , ‘ Do this , ’ and my servant does it .
40008010	When Jesus heard this , he was amazed . He said to those who were following him , “ I tell you the truth , this is the greatest faith I have found , even in Israel .
40008011	Many people will come from the east and from the west and will sit and eat with Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob in the kingdom of heaven .
40008012	But those people who should be in the kingdom will be thrown outside into the darkness , where people will cry and grind their teeth with pain . ”
40008013	Then Jesus said to the officer , “ Go home . Your servant will be healed just as you believed he would . ” And his servant was healed that same hour .
40008014	When Jesus went to Peter’s house , he saw that Peter’s mother-in-law was sick in bed with a fever .
40008015	Jesus touched her hand , and the fever left her . Then she stood up and began to serve Jesus .
40008016	That evening people brought to Jesus many who had demons . Jesus spoke and the demons left them , and he healed all the sick .
40008017	He did these things to bring about what Isaiah the prophet had said : “ He took our suffering on him and carried our diseases . ”
40008018	When Jesus saw the crowd around him , he told his followers to go to the other side of the lake .
40008019	Then a teacher of the law came to Jesus and said , “ Teacher , I will follow you any place you go . ”
40008020	Jesus said to him , “ The foxes have holes to live in , and the birds have nests , but the Son of Man has no place to rest his head . ”
40008021	Another man , one of Jesus’ followers , said to him , “ Lord , first let me go and bury my father . ”
40008022	But Jesus told him , “ Follow me , and let the people who are dead bury their own dead . ”
40008023	Jesus got into a boat , and his followers went with him .
40008024	A great storm arose on the lake so that waves covered the boat , but Jesus was sleeping .
40008025	His followers went to him and woke him , saying , “ Lord , save us ! We will drown ! ”
40008026	Jesus answered , “ Why are you afraid ? You don’t have enough faith . ” Then Jesus got up and gave a command to the wind and the waves , and it became completely calm .
40008027	The men were amazed and said , “ What kind of man is this ? Even the wind and the waves obey him ! ”
40008028	When Jesus arrived at the other side of the lake in the area of the Gadarene people , two men who had demons in them met him . These men lived in the burial caves and were so dangerous that people could not use the road by those caves .
40008029	They shouted , “ What do you want with us , Son of God ? Did you come here to torture us before the right time ? ”
40008030	Near that place there was a large herd of pigs feeding .
40008031	The demons begged Jesus , “ If you make us leave these men , please send us into that herd of pigs . ”
40008032	Jesus said to them , “ Go ! ” So the demons left the men and went into the pigs . Then the whole herd rushed down the hill into the lake and were drowned .
40008033	The herdsmen ran away and went into town , where they told about all of this and what had happened to the men who had demons .
40008034	Then the whole town went out to see Jesus . When they saw him , they begged him to leave their area .
40009001	Jesus got into a boat and went back across the lake to his own town .
40009002	Some people brought to Jesus a man who was paralyzed and lying on a mat . When Jesus saw the faith of these people , he said to the paralyzed man , “ Be encouraged , young man . Your sins are forgiven . ”
40009003	Some of the teachers of the law said to themselves , “ This man speaks as if he were God . That is blasphemy ! ”
40009004	Knowing their thoughts , Jesus said , “ Why are you thinking evil thoughts ?
40009005	Which is easier : to say , ‘ Your sins are forgiven , ’ or to tell him , ‘ Stand up and walk ’ ?
40009006	But I will prove to you that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins . ” Then Jesus said to the paralyzed man , “ Stand up , take your mat , and go home . ”
40009007	And the man stood up and went home .
40009008	When the people saw this , they were amazed and praised God for giving power like this to human beings .
40009009	When Jesus was leaving , he saw a man named Matthew sitting in the tax collector’s booth . Jesus said to him , “ Follow me , ” and he stood up and followed Jesus .
40009010	As Jesus was having dinner at Matthew’s house , many tax collectors and “ sinners ” came and ate with Jesus and his followers .
40009011	When the Pharisees saw this , they asked Jesus’ followers , “ Why does your teacher eat with tax collectors and sinners ? ”
40009012	When Jesus heard them , he said , “ It is not the healthy people who need a doctor , but the sick .
40009013	Go and learn what this means : ‘ I want kindness more than I want animal sacrifices . ’ I did not come to invite good people but to invite sinners . ”
40009014	Then the followers of John came to Jesus and said , “ Why do we and the Pharisees often fast for a certain time , but your followers don’t ? ”
40009015	Jesus answered , “ The friends of the bridegroom are not sad while he is with them . But the time will come when the bridegroom will be taken from them , and then they will fast .
40009016	“ No one sews a patch of unshrunk cloth over a hole in an old coat . If he does , the patch will shrink and pull away from the coat , making the hole worse .
40009017	Also , people never pour new wine into old leather bags . Otherwise , the bags will break , the wine will spill , and the wine bags will be ruined . But people always pour new wine into new wine bags . Then both will continue to be good . ”
40009018	While Jesus was saying these things , a leader of the synagogue came to him . He bowed down before Jesus and said , “ My daughter has just died . But if you come and lay your hand on her , she will live again . ”
40009019	So Jesus and his followers stood up and went with the leader .
40009020	Then a woman who had been bleeding for twelve years came behind Jesus and touched the edge of his coat .
40009021	She was thinking , “ If I can just touch his clothes , I will be healed . ”
40009022	Jesus turned and saw the woman and said , “ Be encouraged , dear woman . You are made well because you believed . ” And the woman was healed from that moment on .
40009023	Jesus continued along with the leader and went into his house . There he saw the funeral musicians and many people crying .
40009024	Jesus said , “ Go away . The girl is not dead , only asleep . ” But the people laughed at him .
40009025	After the crowd had been thrown out of the house , Jesus went into the girl’s room and took hold of her hand , and she stood up .
40009026	The news about this spread all around the area .
40009027	When Jesus was leaving there , two blind men followed him . They cried out , “ Have mercy on us , Son of David ! ”
40009028	After Jesus went inside , the blind men went with him . He asked the men , “ Do you believe that I can make you see again ? ” They answered , “ Yes , Lord . ”
40009029	Then Jesus touched their eyes and said , “ Because you believe I can make you see again , it will happen . ”
40009030	Then the men were able to see . But Jesus warned them strongly , saying , “ Don’t tell anyone about this . ”
40009031	But the blind men left and spread the news about Jesus all around that area .
40009032	When the two men were leaving , some people brought another man to Jesus . This man could not talk because he had a demon in him .
40009033	After Jesus forced the demon to leave the man , he was able to speak . The crowd was amazed and said , “ We have never seen anything like this in Israel . ”
40009034	But the Pharisees said , “ The prince of demons is the one that gives him power to force demons out . ”
40009035	Jesus traveled through all the towns and villages , teaching in their synagogues , preaching the Good News about the kingdom , and healing all kinds of diseases and sicknesses .
40009036	When he saw the crowds , he felt sorry for them because they were hurting and helpless , like sheep without a shepherd .
40009037	Jesus said to his followers , “ There are many people to harvest but only a few workers to help harvest them .
40009038	Pray to the Lord , who owns the harvest , that he will send more workers to gather his harvest . ”
40010001	Jesus called his twelve followers together and gave them authority to drive out evil spirits and to heal every kind of disease and sickness .
40010002	These are the names of the twelve apostles : Simon ( also called Peter ) and his brother Andrew ; James son of Zebedee , and his brother John ;
40010003	Philip and Bartholomew ; Thomas and Matthew , the tax collector ; James son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus ;
40010004	Simon the Zealot and Judas Iscariot , who turned against Jesus .
40010005	Jesus sent out these twelve men with the following order : “ Don’t go to the non-Jewish people or to any town where the Samaritans live .
40010006	But go to the people of Israel , who are like lost sheep .
40010007	When you go , preach this : ‘ The kingdom of heaven is near . ’
40010008	Heal the sick , raise the dead to life again , heal those who have skin diseases , and force demons out of people . I give you these powers freely , so help other people freely .
40010009	Don’t carry any money with you — gold or silver or copper .
40010010	Don’t carry a bag or extra clothes or sandals or a walking stick . Workers should be given what they need .
40010011	“ When you enter a city or town , find some worthy person there and stay in that home until you leave .
40010012	When you enter that home , say , ‘ Peace be with you . ’
40010013	If the people there welcome you , let your peace stay there . But if they don’t welcome you , take back the peace you wished for them .
40010014	And if a home or town refuses to welcome you or listen to you , leave that place and shake its dust off your feet .
40010015	I tell you the truth , on the Judgment Day it will be better for the towns of Sodom and Gomorrah than for the people of that town .
40010016	“ Listen , I am sending you out like sheep among wolves . So be as clever as snakes and as innocent as doves .
40010017	Be careful of people , because they will arrest you and take you to court and whip you in their synagogues .
40010018	Because of me you will be taken to stand before governors and kings , and you will tell them and the non-Jewish people about me .
40010019	When you are arrested , don’t worry about what to say or how to say it . At that time you will be given the things to say .
40010020	It will not really be you speaking but the Spirit of your Father speaking through you .
40010021	“ Brothers will give their own brothers to be killed , and fathers will give their own children to be killed . Children will fight against their own parents and have them put to death .
40010022	All people will hate you because you follow me , but those people who keep their faith until the end will be saved .
40010023	When you are treated badly in one city , run to another city . I tell you the truth , you will not finish going through all the cities of Israel before the Son of Man comes .
40010024	“ A student is not better than his teacher , and a servant is not better than his master .
40010025	A student should be satisfied to become like his teacher ; a servant should be satisfied to become like his master . If the head of the family is called Beelzebul , then the other members of the family will be called worse names !
40010026	“ So don’t be afraid of those people , because everything that is hidden will be shown . Everything that is secret will be made known .
40010027	I tell you these things in the dark , but I want you to tell them in the light . What you hear whispered in your ear you should shout from the housetops .
40010028	Don’t be afraid of people , who can kill the body but cannot kill the soul . The only one you should fear is the one who can destroy the soul and the body in hell .
40010029	Two sparrows cost only a penny , but not even one of them can die without your Father’s knowing it .
40010030	God even knows how many hairs are on your head .
40010031	So don’t be afraid . You are worth much more than many sparrows .
40010032	“ All those who stand before others and say they believe in me , I will say before my Father in heaven that they belong to me .
40010033	But all who stand before others and say they do not believe in me , I will say before my Father in heaven that they do not belong to me .
40010034	“ Don’t think that I came to bring peace to the earth . I did not come to bring peace , but a sword .
40010035	I have come so that ‘ a son will be against his father , a daughter will be against her mother , a daughter-in-law will be against her mother-in-law .
40010036	A person’s enemies will be members of his own family . ’
40010037	“ Those who love their father or mother more than they love me are not worthy to be my followers . Those who love their son or daughter more than they love me are not worthy to be my followers .
40010038	Whoever is not willing to carry the cross and follow me is not worthy of me .
40010039	Those who try to hold on to their lives will give up true life . Those who give up their lives for me will hold on to true life .
40010040	Whoever accepts you also accepts me , and whoever accepts me also accepts the One who sent me .
40010041	Whoever meets a prophet and accepts him will receive the reward of a prophet . And whoever accepts a good person because that person is good will receive the reward of a good person .
40010042	Those who give one of these little ones a cup of cold water because they are my followers will truly get their reward . ”
40011001	After Jesus finished telling these things to his twelve followers , he left there and went to the towns in Galilee to teach and preach .
40011002	John the Baptist was in prison , but he heard about what the Christ was doing . So John sent some of his followers to Jesus .
40011003	They asked him , “ Are you the One who is to come , or should we wait for someone else ? ”
40011004	Jesus answered them , “ Go tell John what you hear and see :
40011005	The blind can see , the crippled can walk , and people with skin diseases are healed . The deaf can hear , the dead are raised to life , and the Good News is preached to the poor .
40011006	Those who do not stumble in their faith because of me are blessed . ”
40011007	As John’s followers were leaving , Jesus began talking to the people about John . Jesus said , “ What did you go out into the desert to see ? A reed blown by the wind ?
40011008	What did you go out to see ? A man dressed in fine clothes ? No , those who wear fine clothes live in kings’ palaces .
40011009	So why did you go out ? To see a prophet ? Yes , and I tell you , John is more than a prophet .
40011010	This was written about him : ‘ I will send my messenger ahead of you , who will prepare the way for you . ’
40011011	I tell you the truth , John the Baptist is greater than any other person ever born , but even the least important person in the kingdom of heaven is greater than John .
40011012	Since the time John the Baptist came until now , the kingdom of heaven has been going forward in strength , and people have been trying to take it by force .
40011013	All the prophets and the law of Moses told about what would happen until the time John came .
40011014	And if you will believe what they said , you will believe that John is Elijah , whom they said would come .
40011015	Let those with ears use them and listen !
40011016	“ What can I say about the people of this time ? What are they like ? They are like children sitting in the marketplace , who call out to each other ,
40011017	‘ We played music for you , but you did not dance ; we sang a sad song , but you did not cry . ’
40011018	John came and did not eat or drink like other people . So people say , ‘ He has a demon . ’
40011019	The Son of Man came , eating and drinking , and people say , ‘ Look at him ! He eats too much and drinks too much wine , and he is a friend of tax collectors and sinners . ’ But wisdom is proved to be right by what she does . ”
40011020	Then Jesus criticized the cities where he did most of his miracles , because the people did not change their lives and stop sinning .
40011021	He said , “ How terrible for you , Korazin ! How terrible for you , Bethsaida ! If the same miracles I did in you had happened in Tyre and Sidon , those people would have changed their lives a long time ago . They would have worn rough cloth and put ashes on themselves to show they had changed .
40011022	But I tell you , on the Judgment Day it will be better for Tyre and Sidon than for you .
40011023	And you , Capernaum , will you be lifted up to heaven ? No , you will be thrown down to the depths . If the miracles I did in you had happened in Sodom , its people would have stopped sinning , and it would still be a city today .
40011024	But I tell you , on the Judgment Day it will be better for Sodom than for you . ”
40011025	At that time Jesus said , “ I praise you , Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because you have hidden these things from the people who are wise and smart . But you have shown them to those who are like little children .
40011026	Yes , Father , this is what you really wanted .
40011027	“ My Father has given me all things . No one knows the Son , except the Father . And no one knows the Father , except the Son and those whom the Son chooses to tell .
40011028	“ Come to me , all of you who are tired and have heavy loads , and I will give you rest .
40011029	Accept my teachings and learn from me , because I am gentle and humble in spirit , and you will find rest for your lives .
40011030	The burden that I ask you to accept is easy ; the load I give you to carry is light . ”
40012001	At that time Jesus was walking through some fields of grain on a Sabbath day . His followers were hungry , so they began to pick the grain and eat it .
40012002	When the Pharisees saw this , they said to Jesus , “ Look ! Your followers are doing what is unlawful to do on the Sabbath day . ”
40012003	Jesus answered , “ Have you not read what David did when he and the people with him were hungry ?
40012004	He went into God’s house , and he and those with him ate the holy bread , which was lawful only for priests to eat .
40012005	And have you not read in the law of Moses that on every Sabbath day the priests in the Temple break this law about the Sabbath day ? But the priests are not wrong for doing that .
40012006	I tell you that there is something here that is greater than the Temple .
40012007	The Scripture says , ‘ I want kindness more than I want animal sacrifices . ’ You don’t really know what those words mean . If you understood them , you would not judge those who have done nothing wrong .
40012008	“ So the Son of Man is Lord of the Sabbath day . ”
40012009	Jesus left there and went into their synagogue ,
40012010	where there was a man with a crippled hand . They were looking for a reason to accuse Jesus , so they asked him , “ Is it right to heal on the Sabbath day ? ”
40012011	Jesus answered , “ If any of you has a sheep , and it falls into a ditch on the Sabbath day , you will help it out of the ditch .
40012012	Surely a human being is more important than a sheep . So it is lawful to do good things on the Sabbath day . ”
40012013	Then Jesus said to the man with the crippled hand , “ Hold out your hand . ” The man held out his hand , and it became well again , like the other hand .
40012014	But the Pharisees left and made plans to kill Jesus .
40012015	Jesus knew what the Pharisees were doing , so he left that place . Many people followed him , and he healed all who were sick .
40012016	But Jesus warned the people not to tell who he was .
40012017	He did these things to bring about what Isaiah the prophet had said :
40012018	“ Here is my servant whom I have chosen . I love him , and I am pleased with him . I will put my Spirit upon him , and he will tell of my justice to all people .
40012019	He will not argue or cry out ; no one will hear his voice in the streets .
40012020	He will not break a crushed blade of grass or put out even a weak flame until he makes justice win the victory .
40012021	In him will the non-Jewish people find hope . ”
40012022	Then some people brought to Jesus a man who was blind and could not talk , because he had a demon . Jesus healed the man so that he could talk and see .
40012023	All the people were amazed and said , “ Perhaps this man is the Son of David ! ”
40012024	When the Pharisees heard this , they said , “ Jesus uses the power of Beelzebul , the ruler of demons , to force demons out of people . ”
40012025	Jesus knew what the Pharisees were thinking , so he said to them , “ Every kingdom that is divided against itself will be destroyed . And any city or family that is divided against itself will not continue .
40012026	And if Satan forces out himself , then Satan is divided against himself , and his kingdom will not continue .
40012027	You say that I use the power of Beelzebul to force out demons . If that is true , then what power do your people use to force out demons ? So they will be your judges .
40012028	But if I use the power of God’s Spirit to force out demons , then the kingdom of God has come to you .
40012029	“ If anyone wants to enter a strong person’s house and steal his things , he must first tie up the strong person . Then he can steal the things from the house .
40012030	“ Whoever is not with me is against me . Whoever does not work with me is working against me .
40012031	So I tell you , people can be forgiven for every sin and everything they say against God . But whoever speaks against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven .
40012032	Anyone who speaks against the Son of Man can be forgiven , but anyone who speaks against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven , now or in the future .
40012033	“ If you want good fruit , you must make the tree good . If your tree is not good , it will have bad fruit . A tree is known by the kind of fruit it produces .
40012034	You snakes ! You are evil people , so how can you say anything good ? The mouth speaks the things that are in the heart .
40012035	Good people have good things in their hearts , and so they say good things . But evil people have evil in their hearts , so they say evil things .
40012036	And I tell you that on the Judgment Day people will be responsible for every careless thing they have said .
40012037	The words you have said will be used to judge you . Some of your words will prove you right , but some of your words will prove you guilty . ”
40012038	Then some of the Pharisees and teachers of the law answered Jesus , saying , “ Teacher , we want to see you work a miracle as a sign . ”
40012039	Jesus answered , “ Evil and sinful people are the ones who want to see a miracle for a sign . But no sign will be given to them , except the sign of the prophet Jonah .
40012040	Jonah was in the stomach of the big fish for three days and three nights . In the same way , the Son of Man will be in the grave three days and three nights .
40012041	On the Judgment Day the people from Nineveh will stand up with you people who live now , and they will show that you are guilty . When Jonah preached to them , they were sorry and changed their lives . And I tell you that someone greater than Jonah is here .
40012042	On the Judgment Day , the Queen of the South will stand up with you people who live today . She will show that you are guilty , because she came from far away to listen to Solomon’s wise teaching . And I tell you that someone greater than Solomon is here .
40012043	“ When an evil spirit comes out of a person , it travels through dry places , looking for a place to rest , but it doesn’t find it .
40012044	So the spirit says , ‘ I will go back to the house I left . ’ When the spirit comes back , it finds the house still empty , swept clean , and made neat .
40012045	Then the evil spirit goes out and brings seven other spirits even more evil than it is , and they go in and live there . So the person has even more trouble than before . It is the same way with the evil people who live today . ”
40012046	While Jesus was talking to the people , his mother and brothers stood outside , trying to find a way to talk to him .
40012047	Someone told Jesus , “ Your mother and brothers are standing outside , and they want to talk to you . ”
40012048	He answered , “ Who is my mother ? Who are my brothers ? ”
40012049	Then he pointed to his followers and said , “ Here are my mother and my brothers .
40012050	My true brother and sister and mother are those who do what my Father in heaven wants . ”
40013001	That same day Jesus went out of the house and sat by the lake .
40013002	Large crowds gathered around him , so he got into a boat and sat down , while the people stood on the shore .
40013003	Then Jesus used stories to teach them many things . He said : “ A farmer went out to plant his seed .
40013004	While he was planting , some seed fell by the road , and the birds came and ate it all up .
40013005	Some seed fell on rocky ground , where there wasn’t much dirt . That seed grew very fast , because the ground was not deep .
40013006	But when the sun rose , the plants dried up , because they did not have deep roots .
40013007	Some other seed fell among thorny weeds , which grew and choked the good plants .
40013008	Some other seed fell on good ground where it grew and produced a crop . Some plants made a hundred times more , some made sixty times more , and some made thirty times more .
40013009	Let those with ears use them and listen . ”
40013010	The followers came to Jesus and asked , “ Why do you use stories to teach the people ? ”
40013011	Jesus answered , “ You have been chosen to know the secrets about the kingdom of heaven , but others cannot know these secrets .
40013012	Those who have understanding will be given more , and they will have all they need . But those who do not have understanding , even what they have will be taken away from them .
40013013	This is why I use stories to teach the people : They see , but they don’t really see . They hear , but they don’t really hear or understand .
40013014	So they show that the things Isaiah said about them are true : ‘ You will listen and listen , but you will not understand . You will look and look , but you will not learn .
40013015	For the minds of these people have become stubborn . They do not hear with their ears , and they have closed their eyes . Otherwise they might really understand what they see with their eyes and hear with their ears . They might really understand in their minds and come back to me and be healed . ’
40013016	But you are blessed , because you see with your eyes and hear with your ears .
40013017	I tell you the truth , many prophets and good people wanted to see the things that you now see , but they did not see them . And they wanted to hear the things that you now hear , but they did not hear them .
40013018	“ So listen to the meaning of that story about the farmer .
40013019	What is the seed that fell by the road ? That seed is like the person who hears the message about the kingdom but does not understand it . The Evil One comes and takes away what was planted in that person’s heart .
40013020	And what is the seed that fell on rocky ground ? That seed is like the person who hears the teaching and quickly accepts it with joy .
40013021	But he does not let the teaching go deep into his life , so he keeps it only a short time . When trouble or persecution comes because of the teaching he accepted , he quickly gives up .
40013022	And what is the seed that fell among the thorny weeds ? That seed is like the person who hears the teaching but lets worries about this life and the temptation of wealth stop that teaching from growing . So the teaching does not produce fruit in that person’s life .
40013023	But what is the seed that fell on the good ground ? That seed is like the person who hears the teaching and understands it . That person grows and produces fruit , sometimes a hundred times more , sometimes sixty times more , and sometimes thirty times more . ”
40013024	Then Jesus told them another story : “ The kingdom of heaven is like a man who planted good seed in his field .
40013025	That night , when everyone was asleep , his enemy came and planted weeds among the wheat and then left .
40013026	Later , the wheat sprouted and the heads of grain grew , but the weeds also grew .
40013027	Then the man’s servants came to him and said , ‘ You planted good seed in your field . Where did the weeds come from ? ’
40013028	The man answered , ‘ An enemy planted weeds . ’ The servants asked , ‘ Do you want us to pull up the weeds ? ’
40013029	The man answered , ‘ No , because when you pull up the weeds , you might also pull up the wheat .
40013030	Let the weeds and the wheat grow together until the harvest time . At harvest time I will tell the workers , “ First gather the weeds and tie them together to be burned . Then gather the wheat and bring it to my barn . ” ’ ”
40013031	Then Jesus told another story : “ The kingdom of heaven is like a mustard seed that a man planted in his field .
40013032	That seed is the smallest of all seeds , but when it grows , it is one of the largest garden plants . It becomes big enough for the wild birds to come and build nests in its branches . ”
40013033	Then Jesus told another story : “ The kingdom of heaven is like yeast that a woman took and hid in a large tub of flour until it made all the dough rise . ”
40013034	Jesus used stories to tell all these things to the people ; he always used stories to teach them .
40013035	This is as the prophet said : “ I will speak using stories ; I will tell things that have been secret since the world was made . ”
40013036	Then Jesus left the crowd and went into the house . His followers came to him and said , “ Explain to us the meaning of the story about the weeds in the field . ”
40013037	Jesus answered , “ The man who planted the good seed in the field is the Son of Man .
40013038	The field is the world , and the good seed are all of God’s children who belong to the kingdom . The weeds are those people who belong to the Evil One .
40013039	And the enemy who planted the bad seed is the devil . The harvest time is the end of the age , and the workers who gather are God’s angels .
40013040	“ Just as the weeds are pulled up and burned in the fire , so it will be at the end of the age .
40013041	The Son of Man will send out his angels , and they will gather out of his kingdom all who cause sin and all who do evil .
40013042	The angels will throw them into the blazing furnace , where the people will cry and grind their teeth with pain .
40013043	Then the good people will shine like the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Let those with ears use them and listen .
40013044	“ The kingdom of heaven is like a treasure hidden in a field . One day a man found the treasure , and then he hid it in the field again . He was so happy that he went and sold everything he owned to buy that field .
40013045	“ Also , the kingdom of heaven is like a man looking for fine pearls .
40013046	When he found a very valuable pearl , he went and sold everything he had and bought it .
40013047	“ Also , the kingdom of heaven is like a net that was put into the lake and caught many different kinds of fish .
40013048	When it was full , the fishermen pulled the net to the shore . They sat down and put all the good fish in baskets and threw away the bad fish .
40013049	It will be this way at the end of the age . The angels will come and separate the evil people from the good people .
40013050	The angels will throw the evil people into the blazing furnace , where people will cry and grind their teeth with pain . ”
40013051	Jesus asked his followers , “ Do you understand all these things ? ” They answered , “ Yes , we understand . ”
40013052	Then Jesus said to them , “ So every teacher of the law who has been taught about the kingdom of heaven is like the owner of a house . He brings out both new things and old things he has saved . ”
40013053	When Jesus finished teaching with these stories , he left there .
40013054	He went to his hometown and taught the people in the synagogue , and they were amazed . They said , “ Where did this man get this wisdom and this power to do miracles ?
40013055	He is just the son of a carpenter . His mother is Mary , and his brothers are James , Joseph , Simon , and Judas .
40013056	And all his sisters are here with us . Where then does this man get all these things ? ”
40013057	So the people were upset with Jesus . But Jesus said to them , “ A prophet is honored everywhere except in his hometown and in his own home . ”
40013058	So he did not do many miracles there because they had no faith .
40014001	At that time Herod , the ruler of Galilee , heard the reports about Jesus .
40014002	So he said to his servants , “ Jesus is John the Baptist , who has risen from the dead . That is why he can work these miracles . ”
40014003	Sometime before this , Herod had arrested John , tied him up , and put him into prison . Herod did this because of Herodias , who had been the wife of Philip , Herod’s brother .
40014004	John had been telling Herod , “ It is not lawful for you to be married to Herodias . ”
40014005	Herod wanted to kill John , but he was afraid of the people , because they believed John was a prophet .
40014006	On Herod’s birthday , the daughter of Herodias danced for Herod and his guests , and she pleased him .
40014007	So he promised with an oath to give her anything she wanted .
40014008	Herodias told her daughter what to ask for , so she said to Herod , “ Give me the head of John the Baptist here on a platter . ”
40014009	Although King Herod was very sad , he had made a promise , and his dinner guests had heard him . So Herod ordered that what she asked for be done .
40014010	He sent soldiers to the prison to cut off John’s head .
40014011	And they brought it on a platter and gave it to the girl , and she took it to her mother .
40014012	John’s followers came and got his body and buried it . Then they went and told Jesus .
40014013	When Jesus heard what had happened to John , he left in a boat and went to a lonely place by himself . But the crowds heard about it and followed him on foot from the towns .
40014014	When he arrived , he saw a great crowd waiting . He felt sorry for them and healed those who were sick .
40014015	When it was evening , his followers came to him and said , “ No one lives in this place , and it is already late . Send the people away so they can go to the towns and buy food for themselves . ”
40014016	But Jesus answered , “ They don’t need to go away . You give them something to eat . ”
40014017	They said to him , “ But we have only five loaves of bread and two fish . ”
40014018	Jesus said , “ Bring the bread and the fish to me . ”
40014019	Then he told the people to sit down on the grass . He took the five loaves and the two fish and , looking to heaven , he thanked God for the food . Jesus divided the bread and gave it to his followers , who gave it to the people .
40014020	All the people ate and were satisfied . Then the followers filled twelve baskets with the leftover pieces of food .
40014021	There were about five thousand men there who ate , not counting women and children .
40014022	Immediately Jesus told his followers to get into the boat and go ahead of him across the lake . He stayed there to send the people home .
40014023	After he had sent them away , he went by himself up into the hills to pray . It was late , and Jesus was there alone .
40014024	By this time , the boat was already far away from land . It was being hit by waves , because the wind was blowing against it .
40014025	Between three and six o’clock in the morning , Jesus came to them , walking on the water .
40014026	When his followers saw him walking on the water , they were afraid . They said , “ It’s a ghost ! ” and cried out in fear .
40014027	But Jesus quickly spoke to them , “ Have courage ! It is I . Do not be afraid . ”
40014028	Peter said , “ Lord , if it is really you , then command me to come to you on the water . ”
40014029	Jesus said , “ Come . ” And Peter left the boat and walked on the water to Jesus .
40014030	But when Peter saw the wind and the waves , he became afraid and began to sink . He shouted , “ Lord , save me ! ”
40014031	Immediately Jesus reached out his hand and caught Peter . Jesus said , “ Your faith is small . Why did you doubt ? ”
40014032	After they got into the boat , the wind became calm .
40014033	Then those who were in the boat worshiped Jesus and said , “ Truly you are the Son of God ! ”
40014034	When they had crossed the lake , they came to shore at Gennesaret .
40014035	When the people there recognized Jesus , they told people all around there that Jesus had come , and they brought all their sick to him .
40014036	They begged Jesus to let them touch just the edge of his coat , and all who touched it were healed .
40015001	Then some Pharisees and teachers of the law came to Jesus from Jerusalem . They asked him ,
40015002	“ Why don’t your followers obey the unwritten laws which have been handed down to us ? They don’t wash their hands before they eat . ”
40015003	Jesus answered , “ And why do you refuse to obey God’s command so that you can follow your own teachings ?
40015004	God said , ‘ Honor your father and your mother , ’ and ‘ Anyone who says cruel things to his father or mother must be put to death . ’
40015005	But you say a person can tell his father or mother , ‘ I have something I could use to help you , but I have given it to God already . ’
40015006	You teach that person not to honor his father or his mother . You rejected what God said for the sake of your own rules .
40015007	You are hypocrites ! Isaiah was right when he said about you :
40015008	‘ These people show honor to me with words , but their hearts are far from me .
40015009	Their worship of me is worthless . The things they teach are nothing but human rules . ’ ”
40015010	After Jesus called the crowd to him , he said , “ Listen and understand what I am saying .
40015011	It is not what people put into their mouths that makes them unclean . It is what comes out of their mouths that makes them unclean . ”
40015012	Then his followers came to him and asked , “ Do you know that the Pharisees are angry because of what you said ? ”
40015013	Jesus answered , “ Every plant that my Father in heaven has not planted himself will be pulled up by the roots .
40015014	Stay away from the Pharisees ; they are blind leaders . And if a blind person leads a blind person , both will fall into a ditch . ”
40015015	Peter said , “ Explain the example to us . ”
40015016	Jesus said , “ Do you still not understand ?
40015017	Surely you know that all the food that enters the mouth goes into the stomach and then goes out of the body .
40015018	But what people say with their mouths comes from the way they think ; these are the things that make people unclean .
40015019	Out of the mind come evil thoughts , murder , adultery , sexual sins , stealing , lying , and speaking evil of others .
40015020	These things make people unclean ; eating with unwashed hands does not make them unclean . ”

40015022	A Canaanite woman from that area came to Jesus and cried out , “ Lord , Son of David , have mercy on me ! My daughter has a demon , and she is suffering very much . ”
40015023	But Jesus did not answer the woman . So his followers came to Jesus and begged him , “ Tell the woman to go away . She is following us and shouting . ”
40015024	Jesus answered , “ God sent me only to the lost sheep , the people of Israel . ”

40015031	The crowd was amazed when they saw that people who could not speak before were now able to speak . The crippled were made strong . The lame could walk , and the blind could see . And they praised the God of Israel for this .
40015032	Jesus called his followers to him and said , “ I feel sorry for these people , because they have already been with me three days , and they have nothing to eat . I don’t want to send them away hungry . They might faint while going home . ”
40015033	His followers asked him , “ How can we get enough bread to feed all these people ? We are far away from any town . ”

40015036	He took the seven loaves of bread and the fish and gave thanks to God . Then he divided the food and gave it to his followers , and they gave it to the people .

40015039	After sending the people home , Jesus got into the boat and went to the area of Magadan .
40016001	The Pharisees and Sadducees came to Jesus , wanting to trick him . So they asked him to show them a miracle from God .
40016002	Jesus answered , “ At sunset you say we will have good weather , because the sky is red .
40016003	And in the morning you say that it will be a rainy day , because the sky is dark and red . You see these signs in the sky and know what they mean . In the same way , you see the things that I am doing now , but you don’t know their meaning .
40016004	Evil and sinful people ask for a miracle as a sign , but they will not be given any sign , except the sign of Jonah . ” Then Jesus left them and went away .
40016005	Jesus’ followers went across the lake , but they had forgotten to bring bread .

40016013	When Jesus came to the area of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his followers , “ Who do people say the Son of Man is ? ”

40016020	Then Jesus warned his followers not to tell anyone he was the Christ .

40017001	Six days later , Jesus took Peter , James , and John , the brother of James , up on a high mountain by themselves .

40017024	When Jesus and his followers came to Capernaum , the men who collected the Temple tax came to Peter . They asked , “ Does your teacher pay the Temple tax ? ”
40017025	Peter answered , “ Yes , Jesus pays the tax . ” Peter went into the house , but before he could speak , Jesus said to him , “ What do you think ? The kings of the earth collect different kinds of taxes . But who pays the taxes — the king’s children or others ? ”
40017026	Peter answered , “ Other people pay the taxes . ” Jesus said to Peter , “ Then the children of the king don’t have to pay taxes .
40017027	But we don’t want to upset these tax collectors . So go to the lake and fish . After you catch the first fish , open its mouth and you will find a coin . Take that coin and give it to the tax collectors for you and me . ”
40018001	At that time the followers came to Jesus and asked , “ Who is greatest in the kingdom of heaven ? ”
40018002	Jesus called a little child to him and stood the child before his followers .
40018003	Then he said , “ I tell you the truth , you must change and become like little children . Otherwise , you will never enter the kingdom of heaven .
40018004	The greatest person in the kingdom of heaven is the one who makes himself humble like this child .
40018005	“ Whoever accepts a child in my name accepts me .
40018006	If one of these little children believes in me , and someone causes that child to sin , it would be better for that person to have a large stone tied around the neck and be drowned in the sea .
40018007	How terrible for the people of the world because of the things that cause them to sin . Such things will happen , but how terrible for the one who causes them to happen !
40018008	If your hand or your foot causes you to sin , cut it off and throw it away . It is better for you to lose part of your body and live forever than to have two hands and two feet and be thrown into the fire that burns forever .
40018009	If your eye causes you to sin , take it out and throw it away . It is better for you to have only one eye and live forever than to have two eyes and be thrown into the fire of hell .
40018010	“ Be careful . Don’t think these little children are worth nothing . I tell you that they have angels in heaven who are always with my Father in heaven . [
40018011	The Son of Man came to save lost people . ]
40018012	“ If a man has a hundred sheep but one of the sheep gets lost , he will leave the other ninety-nine on the hill and go to look for the lost sheep .
40018013	I tell you the truth , if he finds it he is happier about that one sheep than about the ninety-nine that were never lost .
40018014	In the same way , your Father in heaven does not want any of these little children to be lost .
40018015	“ If your fellow believer sins against you , go and tell him in private what he did wrong . If he listens to you , you have helped that person to be your brother or sister again .
40018016	But if he refuses to listen , go to him again and take one or two other people with you . ‘ Every case may be proved by two or three witnesses . ’
40018017	If he refuses to listen to them , tell the church . If he refuses to listen to the church , then treat him like a person who does not believe in God or like a tax collector .
40018018	“ I tell you the truth , the things you don’t allow on earth will be the things God does not allow . And the things you allow on earth will be the things that God allows .
40018019	“ Also , I tell you that if two of you on earth agree about something and pray for it , it will be done for you by my Father in heaven .
40018020	This is true because if two or three people come together in my name , I am there with them . ”
40018021	Then Peter came to Jesus and asked , “ Lord , when my fellow believer sins against me , how many times must I forgive him ? Should I forgive him as many as seven times ? ”
40018022	Jesus answered , “ I tell you , you must forgive him more than seven times . You must forgive him even if he wrongs you seventy times seven .
40018023	“ The kingdom of heaven is like a king who decided to collect the money his servants owed him .
40018024	When the king began to collect his money , a servant who owed him several million dollars was brought to him .
40018025	But the servant did not have enough money to pay his master , the king . So the master ordered that everything the servant owned should be sold , even the servant’s wife and children . Then the money would be used to pay the king what the servant owed .
40018026	“ But the servant fell on his knees and begged , ‘ Be patient with me , and I will pay you everything I owe . ’
40018027	The master felt sorry for his servant and told him he did not have to pay it back . Then he let the servant go free .
40018028	“ Later , that same servant found another servant who owed him a few dollars . The servant grabbed him around the neck and said , ‘ Pay me the money you owe me ! ’
40018029	“ The other servant fell on his knees and begged him , ‘ Be patient with me , and I will pay you everything I owe . ’
40018030	“ But the first servant refused to be patient . He threw the other servant into prison until he could pay everything he owed .
40018031	When the other servants saw what had happened , they were very sorry . So they went and told their master all that had happened .
40018032	“ Then the master called his servant in and said , ‘ You evil servant ! Because you begged me to forget what you owed , I told you that you did not have to pay anything .
40018033	You should have showed mercy to that other servant , just as I showed mercy to you . ’
40018034	The master was very angry and put the servant in prison to be punished until he could pay everything he owed .
40018035	“ This king did what my heavenly Father will do to you if you do not forgive your brother or sister from your heart . ”
40019001	After Jesus said all these things , he left Galilee and went into the area of Judea on the other side of the Jordan River .
40019002	Large crowds followed him , and he healed them there .
40019003	Some Pharisees came to Jesus and tried to trick him . They asked , “ Is it right for a man to divorce his wife for any reason he chooses ? ”
40019004	Jesus answered , “ Surely you have read in the Scriptures : When God made the world , ‘ he made them male and female . ’
40019005	And God said , ‘ So a man will leave his father and mother and be united with his wife , and the two will become one body . ’
40019006	So there are not two , but one . God has joined the two together , so no one should separate them . ”
40019007	The Pharisees asked , “ Why then did Moses give a command for a man to divorce his wife by giving her divorce papers ? ”
40019008	Jesus answered , “ Moses allowed you to divorce your wives because you refused to accept God’s teaching , but divorce was not allowed in the beginning .
40019009	I tell you that anyone who divorces his wife and marries another woman is guilty of adultery . The only reason for a man to divorce his wife is if his wife has sexual relations with another man . ”
40019010	The followers said to him , “ If that is the only reason a man can divorce his wife , it is better not to marry . ”
40019011	Jesus answered , “ Not everyone can accept this teaching , but God has made some able to accept it .
40019012	There are different reasons why some men cannot marry . Some men were born without the ability to become fathers . Others were made that way later in life by other people . And some men have given up marriage because of the kingdom of heaven . But the person who can marry should accept this teaching about marriage . ”
40019013	Then the people brought their little children to Jesus so he could put his hands on them and pray for them . His followers told them to stop ,
40019014	but Jesus said , “ Let the little children come to me . Don’t stop them , because the kingdom of heaven belongs to people who are like these children . ”
40019015	After Jesus put his hands on the children , he left there .
40019016	A man came to Jesus and asked , “ Teacher , what good thing must I do to have life forever ? ”

40019019	honor your father and mother ; and love your neighbor as you love yourself . ’ ”
