40019030	Many who are first now will be last in the future . And many who are last now will be first in the future .
40020001	“ The kingdom of heaven is like a person who owned some land . One morning , he went out very early to hire some people to work in his vineyard .
40020002	The man agreed to pay the workers one coin for working that day . Then he sent them into the vineyard to work .
40020003	About nine o’clock the man went to the marketplace and saw some other people standing there , doing nothing .
40020004	So he said to them , ‘ If you go and work in my vineyard , I will pay you what your work is worth . ’
40020005	So they went to work in the vineyard . The man went out again about twelve o’clock and three o’clock and did the same thing .
40020006	About five o’clock the man went to the marketplace again and saw others standing there . He asked them , ‘ Why did you stand here all day doing nothing ? ’
40020007	They answered , ‘ No one gave us a job . ’ The man said to them , ‘ Then you can go and work in my vineyard . ’
40020008	“ At the end of the day , the owner of the vineyard said to the boss of all the workers , ‘ Call the workers and pay them . Start with the last people I hired and end with those I hired first . ’
40020009	“ When the workers who were hired at five o’clock came to get their pay , each received one coin .
40020010	When the workers who were hired first came to get their pay , they thought they would be paid more than the others . But each one of them also received one coin .
40020011	When they got their coin , they complained to the man who owned the land .
40020012	They said , ‘ Those people were hired last and worked only one hour . But you paid them the same as you paid us who worked hard all day in the hot sun . ’
40020013	But the man who owned the vineyard said to one of those workers , ‘ Friend , I am being fair to you . You agreed to work for one coin .
40020014	So take your pay and go . I want to give the man who was hired last the same pay that I gave you .
40020015	I can do what I want with my own money . Are you jealous because I am good to those people ? ’
40020016	“ So those who are last now will someday be first , and those who are first now will someday be last . ”

40021013	Jesus said to all the people there , “ It is written in the Scriptures , ‘ My Temple will be called a house for prayer . ’ But you are changing it into a ‘ hideout for robbers . ’ ”
40021014	The blind and crippled people came to Jesus in the Temple , and he healed them .
40021015	The leading priests and the teachers of the law saw that Jesus was doing wonderful things and that the children were praising him in the Temple , saying , “ Praise to the Son of David . ” All these things made the priests and the teachers of the law very angry .
40021016	They asked Jesus , “ Do you hear the things these children are saying ? ” Jesus answered , “ Yes . Haven’t you read in the Scriptures , ‘ You have taught children and babies to sing praises’ ? ”
40021017	Then Jesus left and went out of the city to Bethany , where he spent the night .
40021018	Early the next morning , as Jesus was going back to the city , he became hungry .
40021019	Seeing a fig tree beside the road , Jesus went to it , but there were no figs on the tree , only leaves . So Jesus said to the tree , “ You will never again have fruit . ” The tree immediately dried up .
40021020	When his followers saw this , they were amazed . They asked , “ How did the fig tree dry up so quickly ? ”
40021021	Jesus answered , “ I tell you the truth , if you have faith and do not doubt , you will be able to do what I did to this tree and even more . You will be able to say to this mountain , ‘ Go , fall into the sea . ’ And if you have faith , it will happen .
40021022	If you believe , you will get anything you ask for in prayer . ”
40021023	Jesus went to the Temple , and while he was teaching there , the leading priests and the elders of the people came to him . They said , “ What authority do you have to do these things ? Who gave you this authority ? ”
40021024	Jesus answered , “ I also will ask you a question . If you answer me , then I will tell you what authority I have to do these things .
40021025	Tell me : When John baptized people , did that come from God or just from other people ? ” They argued about Jesus’ question , saying , “ If we answer , ‘ John’s baptism was from God , ’ Jesus will say , ‘ Then why didn’t you believe him ? ’
40021026	But if we say , ‘ It was from people , ’ we are afraid of what the crowd will do because they all believe that John was a prophet . ”
40021027	So they answered Jesus , “ We don’t know . ” Jesus said to them , “ Then I won’t tell you what authority I have to do these things .
40021028	“ Tell me what you think about this : A man had two sons . He went to the first son and said , ‘ Son , go and work today in my vineyard . ’
40021029	The son answered , ‘ I will not go . ’ But later the son changed his mind and went .
40021030	Then the father went to the other son and said , ‘ Son , go and work today in my vineyard . ’ The son answered , ‘ Yes , sir , I will go and work , ’ but he did not go .
40021031	Which of the two sons obeyed his father ? ” The priests and leaders answered , “ The first son . ” Jesus said to them , “ I tell you the truth , the tax collectors and the prostitutes will enter the kingdom of God before you do .
40021032	John came to show you the right way to live . You did not believe him , but the tax collectors and prostitutes believed him . Even after seeing this , you still refused to change your ways and believe him .
40021033	“ Listen to this story : There was a man who owned a vineyard . He put a wall around it and dug a hole for a winepress and built a tower . Then he leased the land to some farmers and left for a trip .
40021034	When it was time for the grapes to be picked , he sent his servants to the farmers to get his share of the grapes .
40021035	But the farmers grabbed the servants , beat one , killed another , and then killed a third servant with stones .
40021036	So the man sent some other servants to the farmers , even more than he sent the first time . But the farmers did the same thing to the servants that they had done before .
40021037	So the man decided to send his son to the farmers . He said , ‘ They will respect my son . ’
40021038	But when the farmers saw the son , they said to each other , ‘ This son will inherit the vineyard . If we kill him , it will be ours ! ’
40021039	Then the farmers grabbed the son , threw him out of the vineyard , and killed him .
40021040	So what will the owner of the vineyard do to these farmers when he comes ? ”
40021041	The priests and leaders said , “ He will surely kill those evil men . Then he will lease the vineyard to some other farmers who will give him his share of the crop at harvest time . ”
40021042	Jesus said to them , “ Surely you have read this in the Scriptures : ‘ The stone that the builders rejected became the cornerstone . The Lord did this , and it is wonderful to us . ’
40021043	“ So I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to people who do the things God wants in his kingdom .
40021044	The person who falls on this stone will be broken , and on whomever that stone falls , that person will be crushed . ”
40021045	When the leading priests and the Pharisees heard these stories , they knew Jesus was talking about them .
40021046	They wanted to arrest him , but they were afraid of the people , because the people believed that Jesus was a prophet .
40022001	Jesus again used stories to teach them . He said ,
40022002	“ The kingdom of heaven is like a king who prepared a wedding feast for his son .
40022003	The king invited some people to the feast . When the feast was ready , the king sent his servants to tell the people , but they refused to come .
40022004	“ Then the king sent other servants , saying , ‘ Tell those who have been invited that my feast is ready . I have killed my best bulls and calves for the dinner , and everything is ready . Come to the wedding feast . ’
40022005	“ But the people refused to listen to the servants and left to do other things . One went to work in his field , and another went to his business .
40022006	Some of the other people grabbed the servants , beat them , and killed them .
40022007	The king was furious and sent his army to kill the murderers and burn their city .
40022008	“ After that , the king said to his servants , ‘ The wedding feast is ready . I invited those people , but they were not worthy to come .
40022009	So go to the street corners and invite everyone you find to come to my feast . ’
40022010	So the servants went into the streets and gathered all the people they could find , both good and bad . And the wedding hall was filled with guests .
40022011	“ When the king came in to see the guests , he saw a man who was not dressed for a wedding .
40022012	The king said , ‘ Friend , how were you allowed to come in here ? You are not dressed for a wedding . ’ But the man said nothing .
40022013	So the king told some servants , ‘ Tie this man’s hands and feet . Throw him out into the darkness , where people will cry and grind their teeth with pain . ’
40022014	“ Yes , many are invited , but only a few are chosen . ”
40022015	Then the Pharisees left that place and made plans to trap Jesus in saying something wrong .
40022016	They sent some of their own followers and some people from the group called Herodians . They said , “ Teacher , we know that you are an honest man and that you teach the truth about God’s way . You are not afraid of what other people think about you , because you pay no attention to who they are .
40022017	So tell us what you think . Is it right to pay taxes to Caesar or not ? ”
40022018	But knowing that these leaders were trying to trick him , Jesus said , “ You hypocrites ! Why are you trying to trap me ?
40022019	Show me a coin used for paying the tax . ” So the men showed him a coin .
40022020	Then Jesus asked , “ Whose image and name are on the coin ? ”
40022021	The men answered , “ Caesar’s . ” Then Jesus said to them , “ Give to Caesar the things that are Caesar’s , and give to God the things that are God’s . ”
40022022	When the men heard what Jesus said , they were amazed and left him and went away .
40022023	That same day some Sadducees came to Jesus and asked him a question . ( Sadducees believed that people would not rise from the dead . )
40022024	They said , “ Teacher , Moses said if a married man dies without having children , his brother must marry the widow and have children for him .
40022025	Once there were seven brothers among us . The first one married and died . Since he had no children , his brother married the widow .
40022026	Then the second brother also died . The same thing happened to the third brother and all the other brothers .
40022027	Finally , the woman died .
40022028	Since all seven men had married her , when people rise from the dead , whose wife will she be ? ”
40022029	Jesus answered , “ You don’t understand , because you don’t know what the Scriptures say , and you don’t know about the power of God .
40022030	When people rise from the dead , they will not marry , nor will they be given to someone to marry . They will be like the angels in heaven .
40022031	Surely you have read what God said to you about rising from the dead .
40022032	God said , ‘ I am the God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . ’ God is the God of the living , not the dead . ”
40022033	When the people heard this , they were amazed at Jesus’ teaching .
40022034	When the Pharisees learned that the Sadducees could not argue with Jesus’ answers to them , the Pharisees met together .
40022035	One Pharisee , who was an expert on the law of Moses , asked Jesus this question to test him :
40022036	“ Teacher , which command in the law is the most important ? ”
40022037	Jesus answered , “ ‘ Love the Lord your God with all your heart , all your soul , and all your mind . ’
40022038	This is the first and most important command .
40022039	And the second command is like the first : ‘ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ’
40022040	All the law and the writings of the prophets depend on these two commands . ”
40022041	While the Pharisees were together , Jesus asked them ,
40022042	“ What do you think about the Christ ? Whose son is he ? ” They answered , “ The Christ is the Son of David . ”
40022043	Then Jesus said to them , “ Then why did David call him ‘ Lord ’ ? David , speaking by the power of the Holy Spirit , said ,
40022044	‘ The Lord said to my Lord , “ Sit by me at my right side , until I put your enemies under your control . ” ’
40022045	David calls the Christ ‘ Lord , ’ so how can the Christ be his son ? ”
40022046	None of the Pharisees could answer Jesus’ question , and after that day no one was brave enough to ask him any more questions .
40023001	Then Jesus said to the crowds and to his followers ,
40023002	“ The teachers of the law and the Pharisees have the authority to tell you what the law of Moses says .
40023003	So you should obey and follow whatever they tell you , but their lives are not good examples for you to follow . They tell you to do things , but they themselves don’t do them .
40023004	They make strict rules and try to force people to obey them , but they are unwilling to help those who struggle under the weight of their rules .
40023005	“ They do good things so that other people will see them . They enlarge the little boxes holding Scriptures that they wear , and they make their special prayer clothes very long .
40023006	Those Pharisees and teachers of the law love to have the most important seats at feasts and in the synagogues .
40023007	They love people to greet them with respect in the marketplaces , and they love to have people call them ‘ Teacher . ’
40023008	“ But you must not be called ‘ Teacher , ’ because you have only one Teacher , and you are all brothers and sisters together .
40023009	And don’t call any person on earth ‘ Father , ’ because you have one Father , who is in heaven .
40023010	And you should not be called ‘ Master , ’ because you have only one Master , the Christ .
40023011	Whoever is your servant is the greatest among you .
40023012	Whoever makes himself great will be made humble . Whoever makes himself humble will be made great .
40023013	“ How terrible for you , teachers of the law and Pharisees ! You are hypocrites ! You close the door for people to enter the kingdom of heaven . You yourselves don’t enter , and you stop others who are trying to enter . [
40023014	How terrible for you , teachers of the law and Pharisees . You are hypocrites . You take away widows’ houses , and you say long prayers so that people will notice you . So you will have a worse punishment . ]
40023015	“ How terrible for you , teachers of the law and Pharisees ! You are hypocrites ! You travel across land and sea to find one person who will change to your ways . When you find that person , you make him more fit for hell than you are .
40023016	“ How terrible for you ! You guide the people , but you are blind . You say , ‘ If people swear by the Temple when they make a promise , that means nothing . But if they swear by the gold that is in the Temple , they must keep that promise . ’
40023017	You are blind fools ! Which is greater : the gold or the Temple that makes that gold holy ?
40023018	And you say , ‘ If people swear by the altar when they make a promise , that means nothing . But if they swear by the gift on the altar , they must keep that promise . ’
40023019	You are blind ! Which is greater : the gift or the altar that makes the gift holy ?
40023020	The person who swears by the altar is really using the altar and also everything on the altar .
40023021	And the person who swears by the Temple is really using the Temple and also everything in the Temple .
40023022	The person who swears by heaven is also using God’s throne and the One who sits on that throne .
40023023	“ How terrible for you , teachers of the law and Pharisees ! You are hypocrites ! You give to God one-tenth of everything you earn — even your mint , dill , and cumin . But you don’t obey the really important teachings of the law — justice , mercy , and being loyal . These are the things you should do , as well as those other things .
40023024	You guide the people , but you are blind ! You are like a person who picks a fly out of a drink and then swallows a camel !
40023025	“ How terrible for you , teachers of the law and Pharisees ! You are hypocrites ! You wash the outside of your cups and dishes , but inside they are full of things you got by cheating others and by pleasing only yourselves .
40023026	Pharisees , you are blind ! First make the inside of the cup clean , and then the outside of the cup can be truly clean .
40023027	“ How terrible for you , teachers of the law and Pharisees ! You are hypocrites ! You are like tombs that are painted white . Outside , those tombs look fine , but inside , they are full of the bones of dead people and all kinds of unclean things .
40023028	It is the same with you . People look at you and think you are good , but on the inside you are full of hypocrisy and evil .
40023029	“ How terrible for you , teachers of the law and Pharisees ! You are hypocrites ! You build tombs for the prophets , and you show honor to the graves of those who lived good lives .
40023030	You say , ‘ If we had lived during the time of our ancestors , we would not have helped them kill the prophets . ’
40023031	But you give proof that you are descendants of those who murdered the prophets .
40023032	And you will complete the sin that your ancestors started .
40023033	“ You are snakes ! A family of poisonous snakes ! How are you going to escape God’s judgment ?
40023034	So I tell you this : I am sending to you prophets and wise men and teachers . Some of them you will kill and crucify . Some of them you will beat in your synagogues and chase from town to town .
40023035	So you will be guilty for the death of all the good people who have been killed on earth — from the murder of that good man Abel to the murder of Zechariah son of Berakiah , whom you murdered between the Temple and the altar .
40023036	I tell you the truth , all of these things will happen to you people who are living now .
40023037	“ Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! You kill the prophets and stone to death those who are sent to you . Many times I wanted to gather your people as a hen gathers her chicks under her wings , but you did not let me .
40023038	Now your house will be left completely empty .
40023039	I tell you , you will not see me again until that time when you will say , ‘ God bless the One who comes in the name of the Lord . ’ ”
40024001	As Jesus left the Temple and was walking away , his followers came up to show him the Temple’s buildings .
40024002	Jesus asked , “ Do you see all these buildings ? I tell you the truth , not one stone will be left on another . Every stone will be thrown down to the ground . ”
40024003	Later , as Jesus was sitting on the Mount of Olives , his followers came to be alone with him . They said , “ Tell us , when will these things happen ? And what will be the sign that it is time for you to come again and for this age to end ? ”
40024004	Jesus answered , “ Be careful that no one fools you .
40024005	Many will come in my name , saying , ‘ I am the Christ , ’ and they will fool many people .
40024006	You will hear about wars and stories of wars that are coming , but don’t be afraid . These things must happen before the end comes .
40024007	Nations will fight against other nations ; kingdoms will fight against other kingdoms . There will be times when there is no food for people to eat , and there will be earthquakes in different places .
40024008	These things are like the first pains when something new is about to be born .
40024009	“ Then people will arrest you , hand you over to be hurt , and kill you . They will hate you because you believe in me .
40024010	At that time , many will lose their faith , and they will turn against each other and hate each other .
40024011	Many false prophets will come and cause many people to believe lies .
40024012	There will be more and more evil in the world , so most people will stop showing their love for each other .
40024013	But those people who keep their faith until the end will be saved .
40024014	The Good News about God’s kingdom will be preached in all the world , to every nation . Then the end will come .
40024015	“ Daniel the prophet spoke about ‘ a blasphemous object that brings destruction . ’ You will see this standing in the holy place . ” ( You who read this should understand what it means . )
40024016	“ At that time , the people in Judea should run away to the mountains .
40024017	If people are on the roofs of their houses , they must not go down to get anything out of their houses .
40024018	If people are in the fields , they must not go back to get their coats .
40024019	At that time , how terrible it will be for women who are pregnant or have nursing babies !
40024020	Pray that it will not be winter or a Sabbath day when these things happen and you have to run away ,
40024021	because at that time there will be much trouble . There will be more trouble than there has ever been since the beginning of the world until now , and nothing as bad will ever happen again .
40024022	God has decided to make that terrible time short . Otherwise , no one would go on living . But God will make that time short to help the people he has chosen .
40024023	At that time , someone might say to you , ‘ Look , there is the Christ ! ’ Or another person might say , ‘ There he is ! ’ But don’t believe them .
40024024	False Christs and false prophets will come and perform great wonders and miracles . They will try to fool even the people God has chosen , if that is possible .
40024025	Now I have warned you about this before it happens .
40024026	“ If people tell you , ‘ The Christ is in the desert , ’ don’t go there . If they say , ‘ The Christ is in the inner room , ’ don’t believe it .
40024027	When the Son of Man comes , he will be seen by everyone , like lightning flashing from the east to the west .
40024028	Wherever the dead body is , there the vultures will gather .
40024029	“ Soon after the trouble of those days , ‘ the sun will grow dark , and the moon will not give its light . The stars will fall from the sky . And the powers of the heavens will be shaken . ’
40024030	“ At that time , the sign of the Son of Man will appear in the sky . Then all the peoples of the world will cry . They will see the Son of Man coming on clouds in the sky with great power and glory .
40024031	He will use a loud trumpet to send his angels all around the earth , and they will gather his chosen people from every part of the world .
40024032	“ Learn a lesson from the fig tree : When its branches become green and soft and new leaves appear , you know summer is near .
40024033	In the same way , when you see all these things happening , you will know that the time is near , ready to come .
40024034	I tell you the truth , all these things will happen while the people of this time are still living .
40024035	Earth and sky will be destroyed , but the words I have said will never be destroyed .
40024036	“ No one knows when that day or time will be , not the angels in heaven , not even the Son . Only the Father knows .
40024037	When the Son of Man comes , it will be like what happened during Noah’s time .
40024038	In those days before the flood , people were eating and drinking , marrying and giving their children to be married , until the day Noah entered the boat .
40024039	They knew nothing about what was happening until the flood came and destroyed them . It will be the same when the Son of Man comes .
40024040	Two men will be in the field . One will be taken , and the other will be left .
40024041	Two women will be grinding grain with a mill . One will be taken , and the other will be left .
40024042	“ So always be ready , because you don’t know the day your Lord will come .
40024043	Remember this : If the owner of the house knew what time of night a thief was coming , the owner would watch and not let the thief break in .
40024044	So you also must be ready , because the Son of Man will come at a time you don’t expect him .
40024045	“ Who is the wise and loyal servant that the master trusts to give the other servants their food at the right time ?
40024046	When the master comes and finds the servant doing his work , the servant will be blessed .
40024047	I tell you the truth , the master will choose that servant to take care of everything he owns .
40024048	But suppose that evil servant thinks to himself , ‘ My master will not come back soon , ’
40024049	and he begins to beat the other servants and eat and get drunk with others like him ?
40024050	The master will come when that servant is not ready and is not expecting him .
40024051	Then the master will cut him in pieces and send him away to be with the hypocrites , where people will cry and grind their teeth with pain .
40025001	“ At that time the kingdom of heaven will be like ten bridesmaids who took their lamps and went to wait for the bridegroom .
40025002	Five of them were foolish and five were wise .
40025003	The five foolish bridesmaids took their lamps , but they did not take more oil for the lamps to burn .
40025004	The wise bridesmaids took their lamps and more oil in jars .
40025005	Because the bridegroom was late , they became sleepy and went to sleep .
40025006	“ At midnight someone cried out , ‘ The bridegroom is coming ! Come and meet him ! ’
40025007	Then all the bridesmaids woke up and got their lamps ready .
40025008	But the foolish ones said to the wise , ‘ Give us some of your oil , because our lamps are going out . ’
40025009	The wise bridesmaids answered , ‘ No , the oil we have might not be enough for all of us . Go to the people who sell oil and buy some for yourselves . ’
40025010	“ So while the five foolish bridesmaids went to buy oil , the bridegroom came . The bridesmaids who were ready went in with the bridegroom to the wedding feast . Then the door was closed and locked .
40025011	“ Later the others came back and said , ‘ Sir , sir , open the door to let us in . ’
40025012	But the bridegroom answered , ‘ I tell you the truth , I don’t want to know you . ’
40025013	“ So always be ready , because you don’t know the day or the hour the Son of Man will come .
40025014	“ The kingdom of heaven is like a man who was going to another place for a visit . Before he left , he called for his servants and told them to take care of his things while he was gone .
40025015	He gave one servant five bags of gold , another servant two bags of gold , and a third servant one bag of gold , to each one as much as he could handle . Then he left .
40025016	The servant who got five bags went quickly to invest the money and earned five more bags .
40025017	In the same way , the servant who had two bags invested them and earned two more .
40025018	But the servant who got one bag went out and dug a hole in the ground and hid the master’s money .
40025019	“ After a long time the master came home and asked the servants what they did with his money .
40025020	The servant who was given five bags of gold brought five more bags to the master and said , ‘ Master , you trusted me to care for five bags of gold , so I used your five bags to earn five more . ’
40025021	The master answered , ‘ You did well . You are a good and loyal servant . Because you were loyal with small things , I will let you care for much greater things . Come and share my joy with me . ’
40025022	“ Then the servant who had been given two bags of gold came to the master and said , ‘ Master , you gave me two bags of gold to care for , so I used your two bags to earn two more . ’
40025023	The master answered , ‘ You did well . You are a good and loyal servant . Because you were loyal with small things , I will let you care for much greater things . Come and share my joy with me . ’
40025024	“ Then the servant who had been given one bag of gold came to the master and said , ‘ Master , I knew that you were a hard man . You harvest things you did not plant . You gather crops where you did not sow any seed .
40025025	So I was afraid and went and hid your money in the ground . Here is your bag of gold . ’
40025026	The master answered , ‘ You are a wicked and lazy servant ! You say you knew that I harvest things I did not plant and that I gather crops where I did not sow any seed .
40025027	So you should have put my gold in the bank . Then , when I came home , I would have received my gold back with interest . ’
40025028	“ So the master told his other servants , ‘ Take the bag of gold from that servant and give it to the servant who has ten bags of gold .
40025029	Those who have much will get more , and they will have much more than they need . But those who do not have much will have everything taken away from them . ’
40025030	Then the master said , ‘ Throw that useless servant outside , into the darkness where people will cry and grind their teeth with pain . ’
40025031	“ The Son of Man will come again in his great glory , with all his angels . He will be King and sit on his great throne .
40025032	All the nations of the world will be gathered before him , and he will separate them into two groups as a shepherd separates the sheep from the goats .
40025033	The Son of Man will put the sheep on his right and the goats on his left .
40025034	“ Then the King will say to the people on his right , ‘ Come , my Father has given you his blessing . Receive the kingdom God has prepared for you since the world was made .
40025035	I was hungry , and you gave me food . I was thirsty , and you gave me something to drink . I was alone and away from home , and you invited me into your house .
40025036	I was without clothes , and you gave me something to wear . I was sick , and you cared for me . I was in prison , and you visited me . ’
40025037	“ Then the good people will answer , ‘ Lord , when did we see you hungry and give you food , or thirsty and give you something to drink ?
40025038	When did we see you alone and away from home and invite you into our house ? When did we see you without clothes and give you something to wear ?
40025039	When did we see you sick or in prison and care for you ? ’
40025040	“ Then the King will answer , ‘ I tell you the truth , anything you did for even the least of my people here , you also did for me . ’
40025041	“ Then the King will say to those on his left , ‘ Go away from me . You will be punished . Go into the fire that burns forever that was prepared for the devil and his angels .
40025042	I was hungry , and you gave me nothing to eat . I was thirsty , and you gave me nothing to drink .
40025043	I was alone and away from home , and you did not invite me into your house . I was without clothes , and you gave me nothing to wear . I was sick and in prison , and you did not care for me . ’
40025044	“ Then those people will answer , ‘ Lord , when did we see you hungry or thirsty or alone and away from home or without clothes or sick or in prison ? When did we see these things and not help you ? ’
40025045	“ Then the King will answer , ‘ I tell you the truth , anything you refused to do for even the least of my people here , you refused to do for me . ’
40025046	“ These people will go off to be punished forever , but the good people will go to live forever . ”
40026001	After Jesus finished saying all these things , he told his followers ,
40026002	“ You know that the day after tomorrow is the day of the Passover Feast . On that day the Son of Man will be given to his enemies to be crucified . ”
40026003	Then the leading priests and the elders had a meeting at the palace of the high priest , named Caiaphas .
40026004	At the meeting , they planned to set a trap to arrest Jesus and kill him .
40026005	But they said , “ We must not do it during the feast , because the people might cause a riot . ”
40026006	Jesus was in Bethany at the house of Simon , who had a skin disease .
40026007	While Jesus was there , a woman approached him with an alabaster jar filled with expensive perfume . She poured this perfume on Jesus’ head while he was eating .
40026008	His followers were upset when they saw the woman do this . They asked , “ Why waste that perfume ?
40026009	It could have been sold for a great deal of money and the money given to the poor . ”
40026010	Knowing what had happened , Jesus said , “ Why are you troubling this woman ? She did an excellent thing for me .
40026011	You will always have the poor with you , but you will not always have me .
40026012	This woman poured perfume on my body to prepare me for burial .
40026013	I tell you the truth , wherever the Good News is preached in all the world , what this woman has done will be told , and people will remember her . ”
40026014	Then one of the twelve apostles , Judas Iscariot , went to talk to the leading priests .
40026015	He said , “ What will you pay me for giving Jesus to you ? ” And they gave him thirty silver coins .
40026016	After that , Judas watched for the best time to turn Jesus in .
40026017	On the first day of the Feast of Unleavened Bread , the followers came to Jesus . They said , “ Where do you want us to prepare for you to eat the Passover meal ? ”
40026018	Jesus answered , “ Go into the city to a certain man and tell him , ‘ The Teacher says : “ The chosen time is near . I will have the Passover with my followers at your house . ” ’ ”
40026019	The followers did what Jesus told them to do , and they prepared the Passover meal .
40026020	In the evening Jesus was sitting at the table with his twelve followers .
40026021	As they were eating , Jesus said , “ I tell you the truth , one of you will turn against me . ”
40026022	This made the followers very sad . Each one began to say to Jesus , “ Surely , Lord , I am not the one who will turn against you , am I ? ”
40026023	Jesus answered , “ The man who has dipped his hand with me into the bowl is the one who will turn against me .
40026024	The Son of Man will die , just as the Scriptures say . But how terrible it will be for the person who hands the Son of Man over to be killed . It would be better for him if he had never been born . ”
40026025	Then Judas , who would give Jesus to his enemies , said to Jesus , “ Teacher , surely I am not the one , am I ? ” Jesus answered , “ Yes , it is you . ”
40026026	While they were eating , Jesus took some bread and thanked God for it and broke it . Then he gave it to his followers and said , “ Take this bread and eat it ; this is my body . ”
40026027	Then Jesus took a cup and thanked God for it and gave it to the followers . He said , “ Every one of you drink this .
40026028	This is my blood which is the new agreement that God makes with his people . This blood is poured out for many to forgive their sins .
40026029	I tell you this : I will not drink of this fruit of the vine again until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father’s kingdom . ”
40026030	After singing a hymn , they went out to the Mount of Olives .
40026031	Jesus told his followers , “ Tonight you will all stumble in your faith on account of me , because it is written in the Scriptures : ‘ I will kill the shepherd , and the sheep will scatter . ’
40026032	But after I rise from the dead , I will go ahead of you into Galilee . ”
40026033	Peter said , “ Everyone else may stumble in their faith because of you , but I will not . ”
40026034	Jesus said , “ I tell you the truth , tonight before the rooster crows you will say three times that you don’t know me . ”
40026035	But Peter said , “ I will never say that I don’t know you ! I will even die with you ! ” And all the other followers said the same thing .
40026036	Then Jesus went with his followers to a place called Gethsemane . He said to them , “ Sit here while I go over there and pray . ”
40026037	He took Peter and the two sons of Zebedee with him , and he began to be very sad and troubled .
40026038	He said to them , “ My heart is full of sorrow , to the point of death . Stay here and watch with me . ”
40026039	After walking a little farther away from them , Jesus fell to the ground and prayed , “ My Father , if it is possible , do not give me this cup of suffering . But do what you want , not what I want . ”
40026040	Then Jesus went back to his followers and found them asleep . He said to Peter , “ You men could not stay awake with me for one hour ?
40026041	Stay awake and pray for strength against temptation . The spirit wants to do what is right , but the body is weak . ”
40026042	Then Jesus went away a second time and prayed , “ My Father , if it is not possible for this painful thing to be taken from me , and if I must do it , I pray that what you want will be done . ”
40026043	Then he went back to his followers , and again he found them asleep , because their eyes were heavy .
40026044	So Jesus left them and went away and prayed a third time , saying the same thing .
40026045	Then Jesus went back to his followers and said , “ Are you still sleeping and resting ? The time has come for the Son of Man to be handed over to sinful people .
40026046	Get up , we must go . Look , here comes the man who has turned against me . ”
40026047	While Jesus was still speaking , Judas , one of the twelve apostles , came up . With him were many people carrying swords and clubs who had been sent from the leading priests and the Jewish elders of the people .
40026048	Judas had planned to give them a signal , saying , “ The man I kiss is Jesus . Arrest him . ”
40026049	At once Judas went to Jesus and said , “ Greetings , Teacher ! ” and kissed him .
40026050	Jesus answered , “ Friend , do what you came to do . ” Then the people came and grabbed Jesus and arrested him .
40026051	When that happened , one of Jesus’ followers reached for his sword and pulled it out . He struck the servant of the high priest and cut off his ear .
40026052	Jesus said to the man , “ Put your sword back in its place . All who use swords will be killed with swords .
40026053	Surely you know I could ask my Father , and he would give me more than twelve armies of angels .
40026054	But it must happen this way to bring about what the Scriptures say . ”
40026055	Then Jesus said to the crowd , “ You came to get me with swords and clubs as if I were a criminal . Every day I sat in the Temple teaching , and you did not arrest me there .
40026056	But all these things have happened so that it will come about as the prophets wrote . ” Then all of Jesus’ followers left him and ran away .
40026057	Those people who arrested Jesus led him to the house of Caiaphas , the high priest , where the teachers of the law and the elders were gathered .
40026058	Peter followed far behind to the courtyard of the high priest’s house , and he sat down with the guards to see what would happen to Jesus .
40026059	The leading priests and the whole Jewish council tried to find something false against Jesus so they could kill him .
40026060	Many people came and told lies about him , but the council could find no real reason to kill him . Then two people came and said ,
40026061	“ This man said , ‘ I can destroy the Temple of God and build it again in three days . ’ ”
40026062	Then the high priest stood up and said to Jesus , “ Aren’t you going to answer ? Don’t you have something to say about their charges against you ? ”
40026063	But Jesus said nothing . Again the high priest said to Jesus , “ I command you by the power of the living God : Tell us if you are the Christ , the Son of God . ”
40026064	Jesus answered , “ Those are your words . But I tell you , in the future you will see the Son of Man sitting at the right hand of God , the Powerful One , and coming on clouds in the sky . ”
40026065	When the high priest heard this , he tore his clothes and said , “ This man has said things that are against God ! We don’t need any more witnesses ; you all heard him say these things against God .
40026066	What do you think ? ” The people answered , “ He should die . ”
40026067	Then the people there spat in Jesus’ face and beat him with their fists . Others slapped him .
40026068	They said , “ Prove to us that you are a prophet , you Christ ! Tell us who hit you ! ”
40026069	At that time , as Peter was sitting in the courtyard , a servant girl came to him and said , “ You also were with Jesus of Galilee . ”
40026070	But Peter said to all the people there that he was never with Jesus . He said , “ I don’t know what you are talking about . ”
40026071	When he left the courtyard and was at the gate , another girl saw him . She said to the people there , “ This man was with Jesus of Nazareth . ”
40026072	Again , Peter said he was never with him , saying , “ I swear I don’t know this man Jesus ! ”
40026073	A short time later , some people standing there went to Peter and said , “ Surely you are one of those who followed Jesus . The way you talk shows it . ”
40026074	Then Peter began to place a curse on himself and swear , “ I don’t know the man . ” At once , a rooster crowed .
40026075	And Peter remembered what Jesus had told him : “ Before the rooster crows , you will say three times that you don’t know me . ” Then Peter went outside and cried painfully .
40027001	Early the next morning , all the leading priests and elders of the people decided that Jesus should die .
40027002	They tied him , led him away , and turned him over to Pilate , the governor .
40027003	Judas , the one who had given Jesus to his enemies , saw that they had decided to kill Jesus . Then he was very sorry for what he had done . So he took the thirty silver coins back to the priests and the leaders ,
40027004	saying , “ I sinned ; I handed over to you an innocent man . ” The leaders answered , “ What is that to us ? That’s your problem , not ours . ”
40027005	So Judas threw the money into the Temple . Then he went off and hanged himself .
40027006	The leading priests picked up the silver coins in the Temple and said , “ Our law does not allow us to keep this money with the Temple money , because it has paid for a man’s death . ”
40027007	So they decided to use the coins to buy Potter’s Field as a place to bury strangers who died in Jerusalem .
40027008	That is why that field is still called the Field of Blood .
40027009	So what Jeremiah the prophet had said came true : “ They took thirty silver coins . That is how little the Israelites thought he was worth .
40027010	They used those thirty silver coins to buy the potter’s field , as the Lord commanded me . ”
40027011	Jesus stood before Pilate the governor , and Pilate asked him , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ” Jesus answered , “ Those are your words . ”
40027012	When the leading priests and the elders accused Jesus , he said nothing .
40027013	So Pilate said to Jesus , “ Don’t you hear them accusing you of all these things ? ”
40027014	But Jesus said nothing in answer to Pilate , and Pilate was very surprised at this .
40027015	Every year at the time of Passover the governor would free one prisoner whom the people chose .
40027016	At that time there was a man in prison , named Barabbas , who was known to be very bad .
40027017	When the people gathered at Pilate’s house , Pilate said , “ Whom do you want me to set free : Barabbas or Jesus who is called the Christ ? ”
40027018	Pilate knew that they turned Jesus in to him because they were jealous .
40027019	While Pilate was sitting there on the judge’s seat , his wife sent this message to him : “ Don’t do anything to that man , because he is innocent . Today I had a dream about him , and it troubled me very much . ”
40027020	But the leading priests and elders convinced the crowd to ask for Barabbas to be freed and for Jesus to be killed .
40027021	Pilate said , “ I have Barabbas and Jesus . Which do you want me to set free for you ? ” The people answered , “ Barabbas . ”
40027022	Pilate asked , “ So what should I do with Jesus , the one called the Christ ? ” They all answered , “ Crucify him ! ”
40027023	Pilate asked , “ Why ? What wrong has he done ? ” But they shouted louder , “ Crucify him ! ”
40027024	When Pilate saw that he could do nothing about this and that a riot was starting , he took some water and washed his hands in front of the crowd . Then he said , “ I am not guilty of this man’s death . You are the ones who are causing it ! ”
40027025	All the people answered , “ We and our children will be responsible for his death . ”
40027026	Then he set Barabbas free . But Jesus was beaten with whips and handed over to the soldiers to be crucified .
40027027	The governor’s soldiers took Jesus into the governor’s palace , and they all gathered around him .
40027028	They took off his clothes and put a red robe on him .
40027029	Using thorny branches , they made a crown , put it on his head , and put a stick in his right hand . Then the soldiers bowed before Jesus and made fun of him , saying , “ Hail , King of the Jews ! ”
40027030	They spat on Jesus . Then they took his stick and began to beat him on the head .
40027031	After they finished , the soldiers took off the robe and put his own clothes on him again . Then they led him away to be crucified .
40027032	As the soldiers were going out of the city with Jesus , they forced a man from Cyrene , named Simon , to carry the cross for Jesus .
40027033	They all came to the place called Golgotha , which means the Place of the Skull .
40027034	The soldiers gave Jesus wine mixed with gall to drink . He tasted the wine but refused to drink it .
40027035	When the soldiers had crucified him , they threw lots to decide who would get his clothes .
40027036	The soldiers sat there and continued watching him .
40027037	They put a sign above Jesus’ head with a charge against him . It said : this is jesus , the king of the jews .
40027038	Two robbers were crucified beside Jesus , one on the right and the other on the left .
40027039	People walked by and insulted Jesus and shook their heads ,
40027040	saying , “ You said you could destroy the Temple and build it again in three days . So save yourself ! Come down from that cross if you are really the Son of God ! ”
40027041	The leading priests , the teachers of the law , and the Jewish elders were also making fun of Jesus .
40027042	They said , “ He saved others , but he can’t save himself ! He says he is the king of Israel ! If he is the king , let him come down now from the cross . Then we will believe in him .
40027043	He trusts in God , so let God save him now , if God really wants him . He himself said , ‘ I am the Son of God . ’ ”
40027044	And in the same way , the robbers who were being crucified beside Jesus also insulted him .
40027045	At noon the whole country became dark , and the darkness lasted for three hours .
40027046	About three o’clock Jesus cried out in a loud voice , “ Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? ” This means , “ My God , my God , why have you abandoned me ? ”
40027047	Some of the people standing there who heard this said , “ He is calling Elijah . ”

40027059	Then Joseph took the body and wrapped it in a clean linen cloth .

40027061	Mary Magdalene and the other woman named Mary were sitting near the tomb .
40027062	The next day , the day after Preparation Day , the leading priests and the Pharisees went to Pilate .
40027063	They said , “ Sir , we remember that while that liar was still alive he said , ‘ After three days I will rise from the dead . ’

40027065	Pilate said , “ Take some soldiers and go guard the tomb the best way you know . ”

40028001	The day after the Sabbath day was the first day of the week . At dawn on the first day , Mary Magdalene and another woman named Mary went to look at the tomb .
40028002	At that time there was a strong earthquake . An angel of the Lord came down from heaven , went to the tomb , and rolled the stone away from the entrance . Then he sat on the stone .

40028004	The soldiers guarding the tomb shook with fear because of the angel , and they became like dead men .

41001001	This is the beginning of the Good News about Jesus Christ , the Son of God ,
41001002	as the prophet Isaiah wrote : “ I will send my messenger ahead of you , who will prepare your way . ”
41001003	“ This is a voice of one who calls out in the desert : ‘ Prepare the way for the Lord . Make the road straight for him . ’ ”
41001004	John was baptizing people in the desert and preaching a baptism of changed hearts and lives for the forgiveness of sins .

41001006	John wore clothes made from camel’s hair , had a leather belt around his waist , and ate locusts and wild honey .

41001015	He said , “ The right time has come . The kingdom of God is near . Change your hearts and lives and believe the Good News ! ”
41001016	When Jesus was walking by Lake Galilee , he saw Simon and his brother Andrew throwing a net into the lake because they were fishermen .
41001017	Jesus said to them , “ Come follow me , and I will make you fish for people . ”

41001019	Going a little farther , Jesus saw two more brothers , James and John , the sons of Zebedee . They were in a boat , mending their nets .

41001026	The evil spirit shook the man violently , gave a loud cry , and then came out of him .
41001027	The people were so amazed they asked each other , “ What is happening here ? This man is teaching something new , and with authority . He even gives commands to evil spirits , and they obey him . ”

41001029	As soon as Jesus and his followers left the synagogue , they went with James and John to the home of Simon and Andrew .
41001030	Simon’s mother-in-law was sick in bed with a fever , and the people told Jesus about her .

41001038	Jesus answered , “ We should go to other towns around here so I can preach there too . That is the reason I came . ”

41001042	Immediately the disease left the man , and he was healed .

41002001	A few days later , when Jesus came back to Capernaum , the news spread that he was at home .
41002002	Many people gathered together so that there was no room in the house , not even outside the door . And Jesus was teaching them God’s message .

41002004	Since they could not get to Jesus because of the crowd , they dug a hole in the roof right above where he was speaking . When they got through , they lowered the mat with the paralyzed man on it .
41002005	When Jesus saw the faith of these people , he said to the paralyzed man , “ Young man , your sins are forgiven . ”

41002007	“ Why does this man say things like that ? He is speaking as if he were God . Only God can forgive sins . ”

41002010	But I will prove to you that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins . ” So Jesus said to the paralyzed man ,
41002011	“ I tell you , stand up , take your mat , and go home . ”

41002016	When the teachers of the law who were Pharisees saw Jesus eating with the tax collectors and “ sinners , ” they asked his followers , “ Why does he eat with tax collectors and sinners ? ”
41002017	Jesus heard this and said to them , “ It is not the healthy people who need a doctor , but the sick . I did not come to invite good people but to invite sinners . ”
41002018	Now the followers of John and the Pharisees often fasted for a certain time . Some people came to Jesus and said , “ Why do John’s followers and the followers of the Pharisees often fast , but your followers don’t ? ”
41002019	Jesus answered , “ The friends of the bridegroom do not fast while the bridegroom is still with them . As long as the bridegroom is with them , they cannot fast .
41002020	But the time will come when the bridegroom will be taken from them , and then they will fast .
41002021	“ No one sews a patch of unshrunk cloth over a hole in an old coat . Otherwise , the patch will shrink and pull away — the new patch will pull away from the old coat . Then the hole will be worse .
41002022	Also , no one ever pours new wine into old leather bags . Otherwise , the new wine will break the bags , and the wine will be ruined along with the bags . But new wine should be put into new leather bags . ”
41002023	One Sabbath day , as Jesus was walking through some fields of grain , his followers began to pick some grain to eat .
41002024	The Pharisees said to Jesus , “ Why are your followers doing what is not lawful on the Sabbath day ? ”
41002025	Jesus answered , “ Have you never read what David did when he and those with him were hungry and needed food ?
41002026	During the time of Abiathar the high priest , David went into God’s house and ate the holy bread , which is lawful only for priests to eat . And David also gave some of the bread to those who were with him . ”
41002027	Then Jesus said to the Pharisees , “ The Sabbath day was made to help people ; they were not made to be ruled by the Sabbath day .
41002028	So then , the Son of Man is Lord even of the Sabbath day . ”
41003001	Another time when Jesus went into a synagogue , a man with a crippled hand was there .
41003002	Some people watched Jesus closely to see if he would heal the man on the Sabbath day so they could accuse him .
41003003	Jesus said to the man with the crippled hand , “ Stand up here in the middle of everyone . ”

41003005	Jesus was angry as he looked at the people , and he felt very sad because they were stubborn . Then he said to the man , “ Hold out your hand . ” The man held out his hand and it was healed .

41003010	He had healed many people , so all the sick were pushing toward him to touch him .

41003019	and Judas Iscariot , who later turned against Jesus .
41003020	Then Jesus went home , but again a crowd gathered . There were so many people that Jesus and his followers could not eat .
41003021	When his family heard this , they went to get him because they thought he was out of his mind .
41003022	But the teachers of the law from Jerusalem were saying , “ Beelzebul is living inside him ! He uses power from the ruler of demons to force demons out of people . ”
41003023	So Jesus called the people together and taught them with stories . He said , “ Satan will not force himself out of people .
41003024	A kingdom that is divided cannot continue ,
41003025	and a family that is divided cannot continue .
41003026	And if Satan is against himself and fights against his own people , he cannot continue ; that is the end of Satan .
41003027	No one can enter a strong person’s house and steal his things unless he first ties up the strong person . Then he can steal things from the house .
41003028	I tell you the truth , all sins that people do and all the things people say against God can be forgiven .
41003029	But anyone who speaks against the Holy Spirit will never be forgiven ; he is guilty of a sin that continues forever . ”
41003030	Jesus said this because the teachers of the law said that he had an evil spirit inside him .
41003031	Then Jesus’ mother and brothers arrived . Standing outside , they sent someone in to tell him to come out .
41003032	Many people were sitting around Jesus , and they said to him , “ Your mother and brothers are waiting for you outside . ”
41003033	Jesus asked , “ Who are my mother and my brothers ? ”
41003034	Then he looked at those sitting around him and said , “ Here are my mother and my brothers !
41003035	My true brother and sister and mother are those who do what God wants . ”
41004001	Again Jesus began teaching by the lake . A great crowd gathered around him , so he sat down in a boat near the shore . All the people stayed on the shore close to the water .
41004002	Jesus taught them many things , using stories . He said ,
41004003	“ Listen ! A farmer went out to plant his seed .
41004004	While he was planting , some seed fell by the road , and the birds came and ate it up .
41004005	Some seed fell on rocky ground where there wasn’t much dirt . That seed grew very fast , because the ground was not deep .
41004006	But when the sun rose , the plants dried up because they did not have deep roots .
41004007	Some other seed fell among thorny weeds , which grew and choked the good plants . So those plants did not produce a crop .
41004008	Some other seed fell on good ground and began to grow . It got taller and produced a crop . Some plants made thirty times more , some made sixty times more , and some made a hundred times more . ”
41004009	Then Jesus said , “ Let those with ears use them and listen ! ”
41004010	Later , when Jesus was alone , the twelve apostles and others around him asked him about the stories .
41004011	Jesus said , “ You can know the secret about the kingdom of God . But to other people I tell everything by using stories
41004012	so that : ‘ They will look and look , but they will not learn . They will listen and listen , but they will not understand . If they did learn and understand , they would come back to me and be forgiven . ’ ”
41004013	Then Jesus said to his followers , “ Don’t you understand this story ? If you don’t , how will you understand any story ?
41004014	The farmer is like a person who plants God’s message in people .
41004015	Sometimes the teaching falls on the road . This is like the people who hear the teaching of God , but Satan quickly comes and takes away the teaching that was planted in them .
41004016	Others are like the seed planted on rocky ground . They hear the teaching and quickly accept it with joy .
41004017	But since they don’t allow the teaching to go deep into their lives , they keep it only a short time . When trouble or persecution comes because of the teaching they accepted , they quickly give up .
41004018	Others are like the seed planted among the thorny weeds . They hear the teaching ,
41004019	but the worries of this life , the temptation of wealth , and many other evil desires keep the teaching from growing and producing fruit in their lives .
41004020	Others are like the seed planted in the good ground . They hear the teaching and accept it . Then they grow and produce fruit — sometimes thirty times more , sometimes sixty times more , and sometimes a hundred times more . ”
41004021	Then Jesus said to them , “ Do you hide a lamp under a bowl or under a bed ? No ! You put the lamp on a lampstand .
41004022	Everything that is hidden will be made clear and every secret thing will be made known .
41004023	Let those with ears use them and listen !
41004024	“ Think carefully about what you hear . The way you give to others is the way God will give to you , but God will give you even more .
41004025	Those who have understanding will be given more . But those who do not have understanding , even what they have will be taken away from them . ”
41004026	Then Jesus said , “ The kingdom of God is like someone who plants seed in the ground .
41004027	Night and day , whether the person is asleep or awake , the seed still grows , but the person does not know how it grows .
41004028	By itself the earth produces grain . First the plant grows , then the head , and then all the grain in the head .
41004029	When the grain is ready , the farmer cuts it , because this is the harvest time . ”
41004030	Then Jesus said , “ How can I show you what the kingdom of God is like ? What story can I use to explain it ?
41004031	The kingdom of God is like a mustard seed , the smallest seed you plant in the ground .
41004032	But when planted , this seed grows and becomes the largest of all garden plants . It produces large branches , and the wild birds can make nests in its shade . ”
41004033	Jesus used many stories like these to teach the crowd God’s message — as much as they could understand .
41004034	He always used stories to teach them . But when he and his followers were alone , Jesus explained everything to them .
41004035	That evening , Jesus said to his followers , “ Let’s go across the lake . ”
41004036	Leaving the crowd behind , they took him in the boat just as he was . There were also other boats with them .
41004037	A very strong wind came up on the lake . The waves came over the sides and into the boat so that it was already full of water .
41004038	Jesus was at the back of the boat , sleeping with his head on a cushion . His followers woke him and said , “ Teacher , don’t you care that we are drowning ! ”
41004039	Jesus stood up and commanded the wind and said to the waves , “ Quiet ! Be still ! ” Then the wind stopped , and it became completely calm .
41004040	Jesus said to his followers , “ Why are you afraid ? Do you still have no faith ? ”
41004041	The followers were very afraid and asked each other , “ Who is this ? Even the wind and the waves obey him ! ”
41005001	Jesus and his followers went to the other side of the lake to the area of the Gerasene people .
41005002	When Jesus got out of the boat , instantly a man with an evil spirit came to him from the burial caves .
41005003	This man lived in the caves , and no one could tie him up , not even with a chain .
41005004	Many times people had used chains to tie the man’s hands and feet , but he always broke them off . No one was strong enough to control him .
41005005	Day and night he would wander around the burial caves and on the hills , screaming and cutting himself with stones .
41005006	While Jesus was still far away , the man saw him , ran to him , and fell down before him .
41005007	The man shouted in a loud voice , “ What do you want with me , Jesus , Son of the Most High God ? I command you in God’s name not to torture me ! ”
41005008	He said this because Jesus was saying to him , “ You evil spirit , come out of the man . ”
41005009	Then Jesus asked him , “ What is your name ? ” He answered , “ My name is Legion , because we are many spirits . ”
41005010	He begged Jesus again and again not to send them out of that area .
41005011	A large herd of pigs was feeding on a hill near there .
41005012	The demons begged Jesus , “ Send us into the pigs ; let us go into them . ”
41005013	So Jesus allowed them to do this . The evil spirits left the man and went into the pigs . Then the herd of pigs — about two thousand of them — rushed down the hill into the lake and were drowned .
41005014	The herdsmen ran away and went to the town and to the countryside , telling everyone about this . So people went out to see what had happened .
41005015	They came to Jesus and saw the man who used to have the many evil spirits , sitting , clothed , and in his right mind . And they were frightened .
41005016	The people who saw this told the others what had happened to the man who had the demons living in him , and they told about the pigs .
41005017	Then the people began to beg Jesus to leave their area .
41005018	As Jesus was getting back into the boat , the man who was freed from the demons begged to go with him .
41005019	But Jesus would not let him . He said , “ Go home to your family and tell them how much the Lord has done for you and how he has had mercy on you . ”
41005020	So the man left and began to tell the people in the Ten Towns about what Jesus had done for him . And everyone was amazed .
41005021	When Jesus went in the boat back to the other side of the lake , a large crowd gathered around him there .
41005022	A leader of the synagogue , named Jairus , came there , saw Jesus , and fell at his feet .
41005023	He begged Jesus , saying again and again , “ My daughter is dying . Please come and put your hands on her so she will be healed and will live . ”
41005024	So Jesus went with him . A large crowd followed Jesus and pushed very close around him .
41005025	Among them was a woman who had been bleeding for twelve years .
41005026	She had suffered very much from many doctors and had spent all the money she had , but instead of improving , she was getting worse .
41005027	When the woman heard about Jesus , she came up behind him in the crowd and touched his coat .
41005028	She thought , “ If I can just touch his clothes , I will be healed . ”
41005029	Instantly her bleeding stopped , and she felt in her body that she was healed from her disease .
41005030	At once Jesus felt power go out from him . So he turned around in the crowd and asked , “ Who touched my clothes ? ”
41005031	His followers said , “ Look at how many people are pushing against you ! And you ask , ‘ Who touched me ? ’ ”
41005032	But Jesus continued looking around to see who had touched him .
41005033	The woman , knowing that she was healed , came and fell at Jesus’ feet . Shaking with fear , she told him the whole truth .
41005034	Jesus said to her , “ Dear woman , you are made well because you believed . Go in peace ; be healed of your disease . ”
41005035	While Jesus was still speaking , some people came from the house of the synagogue leader . They said , “ Your daughter is dead . There is no need to bother the teacher anymore . ”
41005036	But Jesus paid no attention to what they said . He told the synagogue leader , “ Don’t be afraid ; just believe . ”
41005037	Jesus let only Peter , James , and John the brother of James go with him .
41005038	When they came to the house of the synagogue leader , Jesus found many people there making lots of noise and crying loudly .
41005039	Jesus entered the house and said to them , “ Why are you crying and making so much noise ? The child is not dead , only asleep . ”
41005040	But they laughed at him . So , after throwing them out of the house , Jesus took the child’s father and mother and his three followers into the room where the child was .
41005041	Taking hold of the girl’s hand , he said to her , “ Talitha , koum ! ” ( This means , “ Young girl , I tell you to stand up ! ” )
41005042	At once the girl stood right up and began walking . ( She was twelve years old . ) Everyone was completely amazed .
41005043	Jesus gave them strict orders not to tell people about this . Then he told them to give the girl something to eat .
41006001	Jesus left there and went to his hometown , and his followers went with him .
41006002	On the Sabbath day he taught in the synagogue . Many people heard him and were amazed , saying , “ Where did this man get these teachings ? What is this wisdom that has been given to him ? And where did he get the power to do miracles ?
41006003	He is just the carpenter , the son of Mary and the brother of James , Joseph , Judas , and Simon . And his sisters are here with us . ” So the people were upset with Jesus .
41006004	Jesus said to them , “ A prophet is honored everywhere except in his hometown and with his own people and in his own home . ”
41006005	So Jesus was not able to work any miracles there except to heal a few sick people by putting his hands on them .
41006006	He was amazed at how many people had no faith . Then Jesus went to other villages in that area and taught .
41006007	He called his twelve followers together and got ready to send them out two by two and gave them authority over evil spirits .
41006008	This is what Jesus commanded them : “ Take nothing for your trip except a walking stick . Take no bread , no bag , and no money in your pockets .
41006009	Wear sandals , but take only the clothes you are wearing .
41006010	When you enter a house , stay there until you leave that town .
41006011	If the people in a certain place refuse to welcome you or listen to you , leave that place . Shake its dust off your feet as a warning to them . ”
41006012	So the followers went out and preached that people should change their hearts and lives .
41006013	They forced many demons out and put olive oil on many sick people and healed them .
41006014	King Herod heard about Jesus , because he was now well known . Some people said , “ He is John the Baptist , who has risen from the dead . That is why he can work these miracles . ”
41006015	Others said , “ He is Elijah . ” Other people said , “ Jesus is a prophet , like the prophets who lived long ago . ”
41006016	When Herod heard this , he said , “ I killed John by cutting off his head . Now he has risen from the dead ! ”
41006017	Herod himself had ordered his soldiers to arrest John and put him in prison in order to please his wife , Herodias . She had been the wife of Philip , Herod’s brother , but then Herod had married her .
41006018	John had been telling Herod , “ It is not lawful for you to be married to your brother’s wife . ”
41006019	So Herodias hated John and wanted to kill him . But she couldn’t ,
41006020	because Herod was afraid of John and protected him . He knew John was a good and holy man . Also , though John’s preaching always bothered him , he enjoyed listening to John .
41006021	Then the perfect time came for Herodias to cause John’s death . On Herod’s birthday , he gave a dinner party for the most important government leaders , the commanders of his army , and the most important people in Galilee .
41006022	When the daughter of Herodias came in and danced , she pleased Herod and the people eating with him . So King Herod said to the girl , “ Ask me for anything you want , and I will give it to you . ”
41006023	He promised her , “ Anything you ask for I will give to you — up to half of my kingdom . ”
41006024	The girl went to her mother and asked , “ What should I ask for ? ” Her mother answered , “ Ask for the head of John the Baptist . ”
41006025	At once the girl went back to the king and said to him , “ I want the head of John the Baptist right now on a platter . ”
41006026	Although the king was very sad , he had made a promise , and his dinner guests had heard it . So he did not want to refuse what she asked .
41006027	Immediately the king sent a soldier to bring John’s head . The soldier went and cut off John’s head in the prison
41006028	and brought it back on a platter . He gave it to the girl , and the girl gave it to her mother .
41006029	When John’s followers heard this , they came and got John’s body and put it in a tomb .
41006030	The apostles gathered around Jesus and told him about all the things they had done and taught .
41006031	Crowds of people were coming and going so that Jesus and his followers did not even have time to eat . He said to them , “ Come away by yourselves , and we will go to a lonely place to get some rest . ”
41006032	So they went in a boat by themselves to a lonely place .
41006033	But many people saw them leave and recognized them . So from all the towns they ran to the place where Jesus was going , and they got there before him .
41006034	When he arrived , he saw a great crowd waiting . He felt sorry for them , because they were like sheep without a shepherd . So he began to teach them many things .
41006035	When it was late in the day , his followers came to him and said , “ No one lives in this place , and it is already very late .
41006036	Send the people away so they can go to the countryside and towns around here to buy themselves something to eat . ”
41006037	But Jesus answered , “ You give them something to eat . ” They said to him , “ We would all have to work a month to earn enough money to buy that much bread ! ”
41006038	Jesus asked them , “ How many loaves of bread do you have ? Go and see . ” When they found out , they said , “ Five loaves and two fish . ”
41006039	Then Jesus told his followers to have the people sit in groups on the green grass .
41006040	So they sat in groups of fifty or a hundred .
41006041	Jesus took the five loaves and two fish and , looking up to heaven , he thanked God for the food . He divided the bread and gave it to his followers for them to give to the people . Then he divided the two fish among them all .
41006042	All the people ate and were satisfied .
41006043	The followers filled twelve baskets with the leftover pieces of bread and fish .
41006044	There were five thousand men who ate .
41006045	Immediately Jesus told his followers to get into the boat and go ahead of him to Bethsaida across the lake . He stayed there to send the people home .
41006046	After sending them away , he went into the hills to pray .
41006047	That night , the boat was in the middle of the lake , and Jesus was alone on the land .
41006048	He saw his followers struggling hard to row the boat , because the wind was blowing against them . Between three and six o’clock in the morning , Jesus came to them , walking on the water , and he wanted to walk past the boat .
41006049	But when they saw him walking on the water , they thought he was a ghost and cried out .
41006050	They all saw him and were afraid . But quickly Jesus spoke to them and said , “ Have courage ! It is I . Do not be afraid . ”
41006051	Then he got into the boat with them , and the wind became calm . The followers were greatly amazed .
41006052	They did not understand about the miracle of the five loaves , because their minds were closed .
41006053	When they had crossed the lake , they came to shore at Gennesaret and tied the boat there .
41006054	When they got out of the boat , people immediately recognized Jesus .
41006055	They ran everywhere in that area and began to bring sick people on mats wherever they heard he was .
41006056	And everywhere he went — into towns , cities , or countryside — the people brought the sick to the marketplaces . They begged him to let them touch just the edge of his coat , and all who touched it were healed .
41007001	When some Pharisees and some teachers of the law came from Jerusalem , they gathered around Jesus .
41007002	They saw that some of Jesus’ followers ate food with hands that were not clean , that is , they hadn’t washed them .
41007003	( The Pharisees and all the Jews never eat before washing their hands in the way required by their unwritten laws .
41007004	And when they buy something in the market , they never eat it until they wash themselves in a special way . They also follow many other unwritten laws , such as the washing of cups , pitchers , and pots . )
41007005	The Pharisees and the teachers of the law said to Jesus , “ Why don’t your followers obey the unwritten laws which have been handed down to us ? Why do your followers eat their food with hands that are not clean ? ”
41007006	Jesus answered , “ Isaiah was right when he spoke about you hypocrites . He wrote , ‘ These people show honor to me with words , but their hearts are far from me .
41007007	Their worship of me is worthless . The things they teach are nothing but human rules . ’
41007008	You have stopped following the commands of God , and you follow only human teachings . ”
41007009	Then Jesus said to them , “ You cleverly ignore the commands of God so you can follow your own teachings .
41007010	Moses said , ‘ Honor your father and your mother , ’ and ‘ Anyone who says cruel things to his father or mother must be put to death . ’
41007011	But you say a person can tell his father or mother , ‘ I have something I could use to help you , but it is Corban — a gift to God . ’
41007012	You no longer let that person use that money for his father or his mother .
41007013	By your own rules , which you teach people , you are rejecting what God said . And you do many things like that . ”
41007014	After Jesus called the crowd to him again , he said , “ Every person should listen to me and understand what I am saying .
41007015	There is nothing people put into their bodies that makes them unclean . People are made unclean by the things that come out of them . [
41007016	Let those with ears use them and listen . ] ”
41007017	When Jesus left the people and went into the house , his followers asked him about this story .
41007018	Jesus said , “ Do you still not understand ? Surely you know that nothing that enters someone from the outside can make that person unclean .
41007019	It does not go into the mind , but into the stomach . Then it goes out of the body . ” ( When Jesus said this , he meant that no longer was any food unclean for people to eat . )
41007020	And Jesus said , “ The things that come out of people are the things that make them unclean .
41007021	All these evil things begin inside people , in the mind : evil thoughts , sexual sins , stealing , murder , adultery ,
41007022	greed , evil actions , lying , doing sinful things , jealousy , speaking evil of others , pride , and foolish living .
41007023	All these evil things come from inside and make people unclean . ”
41007024	Jesus left that place and went to the area around Tyre . When he went into a house , he did not want anyone to know he was there , but he could not stay hidden .
41007025	A woman whose daughter had an evil spirit in her heard that he was there . So she quickly came to Jesus and fell at his feet .
41007026	She was Greek , born in Phoenicia , in Syria . She begged Jesus to force the demon out of her daughter .
41007027	Jesus told the woman , “ It is not right to take the children’s bread and give it to the dogs . First let the children eat all they want . ”
41007028	But she answered , “ Yes , Lord , but even the dogs under the table can eat the children’s crumbs . ”
41007029	Then Jesus said , “ Because of your answer , you may go . The demon has left your daughter . ”
41007030	The woman went home and found her daughter lying in bed ; the demon was gone .
41007031	Then Jesus left the area around Tyre and went through Sidon to Lake Galilee , to the area of the Ten Towns .
41007032	While he was there , some people brought a man to him who was deaf and could not talk plainly . The people begged Jesus to put his hand on the man to heal him .
41007033	Jesus led the man away from the crowd , by himself . He put his fingers in the man’s ears and then spit and touched the man’s tongue .
41007034	Looking up to heaven , he sighed and said to the man , “ Ephphatha ! ” ( This means , “ Be opened . ” )
41007035	Instantly the man was able to hear and to use his tongue so that he spoke clearly .
41007036	Jesus commanded the people not to tell anyone about what happened . But the more he commanded them , the more they told about it .
41007037	They were completely amazed and said , “ Jesus does everything well . He makes the deaf hear ! And those who can’t talk he makes able to speak . ”
41008001	Another time there was a great crowd with Jesus that had nothing to eat . So Jesus called his followers and said ,
41008002	“ I feel sorry for these people , because they have already been with me for three days , and they have nothing to eat .
41008003	If I send them home hungry , they will faint on the way . Some of them live a long way from here . ”
41008004	Jesus’ followers answered , “ How can we get enough bread to feed all these people ? We are far away from any town . ”
41008005	Jesus asked , “ How many loaves of bread do you have ? ” They answered , “ Seven . ”

41008007	The followers also had a few small fish . After Jesus gave thanks for the fish , he told his followers to give them to the people also .

41008014	His followers had only one loaf of bread with them in the boat ; they had forgotten to bring more .

41008018	You have eyes , but you don’t really see . You have ears , but you don’t really listen . Remember when
41008019	I divided five loaves of bread for the five thousand ? How many baskets did you fill with leftover pieces of food ? ” They answered , “ Twelve . ”
41008020	“ And when I divided seven loaves of bread for the four thousand , how many baskets did you fill with leftover pieces of food ? ” They answered , “ Seven . ”
41008021	Then Jesus said to them , “ Don’t you understand yet ? ”
41008022	Jesus and his followers came to Bethsaida . There some people brought a blind man to Jesus and begged him to touch the man .
41008023	So Jesus took the blind man’s hand and led him out of the village . Then he spit on the man’s eyes and put his hands on the man and asked , “ Can you see now ? ”
41008024	The man looked up and said , “ Yes , I see people , but they look like trees walking around . ”
