41008025	Again Jesus put his hands on the man’s eyes . Then the man opened his eyes wide and they were healed , and he was able to see everything clearly .
41008026	Jesus told him to go home , saying , “ Don’t go into the town . ”
41008027	Jesus and his followers went to the towns around Caesarea Philippi . While they were traveling , Jesus asked them , “ Who do people say I am ? ”
41008028	They answered , “ Some say you are John the Baptist . Others say you are Elijah , and others say you are one of the prophets . ”
41008029	Then Jesus asked , “ But who do you say I am ? ” Peter answered , “ You are the Christ . ”
41008030	Jesus warned his followers not to tell anyone who he was .
41008031	Then Jesus began to teach them that the Son of Man must suffer many things and that he would be rejected by the Jewish elders , the leading priests , and the teachers of the law . He told them that the Son of Man must be killed and then rise from the dead after three days .
41008032	Jesus told them plainly what would happen . Then Peter took Jesus aside and began to tell him not to talk like that .
41008033	But Jesus turned and looked at his followers . Then he told Peter not to talk that way . He said , “ Go away from me , Satan ! You don’t care about the things of God , but only about things people think are important . ”
41008034	Then Jesus called the crowd to him , along with his followers . He said , “ If people want to follow me , they must give up the things they want . They must be willing even to give up their lives to follow me .
41008035	Those who want to save their lives will give up true life . But those who give up their lives for me and for the Good News will have true life .
41008036	It is worthless to have the whole world if they lose their souls .
41008037	They could never pay enough to buy back their souls .
41008038	The people who live now are living in a sinful and evil time . If people are ashamed of me and my teaching , the Son of Man will be ashamed of them when he comes with his Father’s glory and with the holy angels . ”
41009001	Then Jesus said to the people , “ I tell you the truth , some people standing here will see the kingdom of God come with power before they die . ”
41009002	Six days later , Jesus took Peter , James , and John up on a high mountain by themselves . While they watched , Jesus’ appearance was changed .
41009003	His clothes became shining white , whiter than any person could make them .
41009004	Then Elijah and Moses appeared to them , talking with Jesus .
41009005	Peter said to Jesus , “ Teacher , it is good that we are here . Let us make three tents — one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ”
41009006	Peter did not know what to say , because he and the others were so frightened .
41009007	Then a cloud came and covered them , and a voice came from the cloud , saying , “ This is my Son , whom I love . Listen to him ! ”
41009008	Suddenly Peter , James , and John looked around , but they saw only Jesus there alone with them .
41009009	As they were coming down the mountain , Jesus commanded them not to tell anyone about what they had seen until the Son of Man had risen from the dead .
41009010	So the followers obeyed Jesus , but they discussed what he meant about rising from the dead .
41009011	Then they asked Jesus , “ Why do the teachers of the law say that Elijah must come first ? ”
41009012	Jesus answered , “ They are right to say that Elijah must come first and make everything the way it should be . But why does the Scripture say that the Son of Man will suffer much and that people will treat him as if he were nothing ?
41009013	I tell you that Elijah has already come . And people did to him whatever they wanted to do , just as the Scriptures said it would happen . ”
41009014	When Jesus , Peter , James , and John came back to the other followers , they saw a great crowd around them and the teachers of the law arguing with them .
41009015	But as soon as the crowd saw Jesus , the people were surprised and ran to welcome him .
41009016	Jesus asked , “ What are you arguing about ? ”
41009017	A man answered , “ Teacher , I brought my son to you . He has an evil spirit in him that stops him from talking .
41009018	When the spirit attacks him , it throws him on the ground . Then my son foams at the mouth , grinds his teeth , and becomes very stiff . I asked your followers to force the evil spirit out , but they couldn’t . ”
41009019	Jesus answered , “ You people have no faith . How long must I stay with you ? How long must I put up with you ? Bring the boy to me . ”
41009020	So the followers brought him to Jesus . As soon as the evil spirit saw Jesus , it made the boy lose control of himself , and he fell down and rolled on the ground , foaming at the mouth .
41009021	Jesus asked the boy’s father , “ How long has this been happening ? ” The father answered , “ Since he was very young .
41009022	The spirit often throws him into a fire or into water to kill him . If you can do anything for him , please have pity on us and help us . ”
41009023	Jesus said to the father , “ You said , ‘ If you can ! ’ All things are possible for the one who believes . ”
41009024	Immediately the father cried out , “ I do believe ! Help me to believe more ! ”
41009025	When Jesus saw that a crowd was quickly gathering , he ordered the evil spirit , saying , “ You spirit that makes people unable to hear or speak , I command you to come out of this boy and never enter him again ! ”
41009026	The evil spirit screamed and caused the boy to fall on the ground again . Then the spirit came out . The boy looked as if he were dead , and many people said , “ He is dead ! ”
41009027	But Jesus took hold of the boy’s hand and helped him to stand up .
41009028	When Jesus went into the house , his followers began asking him privately , “ Why couldn’t we force that evil spirit out ? ”
41009029	Jesus answered , “ That kind of spirit can only be forced out by prayer . ”
41009030	Then Jesus and his followers left that place and went through Galilee . He didn’t want anyone to know where he was ,
41009031	because he was teaching his followers . He said to them , “ The Son of Man will be handed over to people , and they will kill him . After three days , he will rise from the dead . ”
41009032	But the followers did not understand what Jesus meant , and they were afraid to ask him .
41009033	Jesus and his followers went to Capernaum . When they went into a house there , he asked them , “ What were you arguing about on the road ? ”
41009034	But the followers did not answer , because their argument on the road was about which one of them was the greatest .
41009035	Jesus sat down and called the twelve apostles to him . He said , “ Whoever wants to be the most important must be last of all and servant of all . ”
41009036	Then Jesus took a small child and had him stand among them . Taking the child in his arms , he said ,
41009037	“ Whoever accepts a child like this in my name accepts me . And whoever accepts me accepts the One who sent me . ”
41009038	Then John said , “ Teacher , we saw someone using your name to force demons out of a person . We told him to stop , because he does not belong to our group . ”
41009039	But Jesus said , “ Don’t stop him , because anyone who uses my name to do powerful things will not easily say evil things about me .
41009040	Whoever is not against us is with us .
41009041	I tell you the truth , whoever gives you a drink of water because you belong to the Christ will truly get his reward .
41009042	“ If one of these little children believes in me , and someone causes that child to sin , it would be better for that person to have a large stone tied around his neck and be drowned in the sea .
41009043	If your hand causes you to sin , cut it off . It is better for you to lose part of your body and live forever than to have two hands and go to hell , where the fire never goes out . [
41009044	In hell the worm does not die ; the fire is never put out . ]
41009045	If your foot causes you to sin , cut it off . It is better for you to lose part of your body and to live forever than to have two feet and be thrown into hell . [
41009046	In hell the worm does not die ; the fire is never put out . ]
41009047	If your eye causes you to sin , take it out . It is better for you to enter the kingdom of God with only one eye than to have two eyes and be thrown into hell .
41009048	In hell the worm does not die ; the fire is never put out .
41009049	Every person will be salted with fire .
41009050	“ Salt is good , but if the salt loses its salty taste , you cannot make it salty again . So , be full of salt , and have peace with each other . ”
41010001	Then Jesus left that place and went into the area of Judea and across the Jordan River . Again , crowds came to him , and he taught them as he usually did .
41010002	Some Pharisees came to Jesus and tried to trick him . They asked , “ Is it right for a man to divorce his wife ? ”
41010003	Jesus answered , “ What did Moses command you to do ? ”
41010004	They said , “ Moses allowed a man to write out divorce papers and send her away . ”
41010005	Jesus said , “ Moses wrote that command for you because you were stubborn .
41010006	But when God made the world , ‘ he made them male and female . ’
41010007	‘ So a man will leave his father and mother and be united with his wife ,
41010008	and the two will become one body . ’ So there are not two , but one .
41010009	God has joined the two together , so no one should separate them . ”
41010010	Later , in the house , his followers asked Jesus again about the question of divorce .
41010011	He answered , “ Anyone who divorces his wife and marries another woman is guilty of adultery against her .
41010012	And the woman who divorces her husband and marries another man is also guilty of adultery . ”
41010013	Some people brought their little children to Jesus so he could touch them , but his followers told them to stop .
41010014	When Jesus saw this , he was upset and said to them , “ Let the little children come to me . Don’t stop them , because the kingdom of God belongs to people who are like these children .
41010015	I tell you the truth , you must accept the kingdom of God as if you were a little child , or you will never enter it . ”
41010016	Then Jesus took the children in his arms , put his hands on them , and blessed them .
41010017	As Jesus started to leave , a man ran to him and fell on his knees before Jesus . The man asked , “ Good teacher , what must I do to have life forever ? ”
41010018	Jesus answered , “ Why do you call me good ? Only God is good .
41010019	You know the commands : ‘ You must not murder anyone . You must not be guilty of adultery . You must not steal . You must not tell lies about your neighbor . You must not cheat . Honor your father and mother . ’ ”
41010020	The man said , “ Teacher , I have obeyed all these things since I was a boy . ”
41010021	Jesus , looking at the man , loved him and said , “ There is one more thing you need to do . Go and sell everything you have , and give the money to the poor , and you will have treasure in heaven . Then come and follow me . ”
41010022	He was very sad to hear Jesus say this , and he left sorrowfully , because he was rich .
41010023	Then Jesus looked at his followers and said , “ How hard it will be for the rich to enter the kingdom of God ! ”
41010024	The followers were amazed at what Jesus said . But he said again , “ My children , it is very hard to enter the kingdom of God !
41010025	It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich person to enter the kingdom of God . ”
41010026	The followers were even more surprised and said to each other , “ Then who can be saved ? ”
41010027	Jesus looked at them and said , “ For people this is impossible , but for God all things are possible . ”
41010028	Peter said to Jesus , “ Look , we have left everything and followed you . ”
41010029	Jesus said , “ I tell you the truth , all those who have left houses , brothers , sisters , mother , father , children , or farms for me and for the Good News
41010030	will get more than they left . Here in this world they will have a hundred times more homes , brothers , sisters , mothers , children , and fields . And with those things , they will also suffer for their belief . But in this age they will have life forever .
41010031	Many who are first now will be last in the future . And many who are last now will be first in the future . ”
41010032	As Jesus and the people with him were on the road to Jerusalem , he was leading the way . His followers were amazed , but others in the crowd who followed were afraid . Again Jesus took the twelve apostles aside and began to tell them what was about to happen in Jerusalem .
41010033	He said , “ Look , we are going to Jerusalem . The Son of Man will be turned over to the leading priests and the teachers of the law . They will say that he must die , and they will turn him over to the non-Jewish people ,
41010034	who will laugh at him and spit on him . They will beat him with whips and crucify him . But on the third day , he will rise to life again . ”
41010035	Then James and John , sons of Zebedee , came to Jesus and said , “ Teacher , we want to ask you to do something for us . ”
41010036	Jesus asked , “ What do you want me to do for you ? ”
41010037	They answered , “ Let one of us sit at your right side and one of us sit at your left side in your glory in your kingdom . ”
41010038	Jesus said , “ You don’t understand what you are asking . Can you drink the cup that I must drink ? And can you be baptized with the same kind of baptism that I must go through ? ”
41010039	They answered , “ Yes , we can . ” Jesus said to them , “ You will drink the same cup that I will drink , and you will be baptized with the same baptism that I must go through .
41010040	But I cannot choose who will sit at my right or my left ; those places belong to those for whom they have been prepared . ”
41010041	When the other ten followers heard this , they began to be angry with James and John .
41010042	Jesus called them together and said , “ The other nations have rulers . You know that those rulers love to show their power over the people , and their important leaders love to use all their authority .
41010043	But it should not be that way among you . Whoever wants to become great among you must serve the rest of you like a servant .
41010044	Whoever wants to become the first among you must serve all of you like a slave .
41010045	In the same way , the Son of Man did not come to be served . He came to serve others and to give his life as a ransom for many people . ”
41010046	Then they came to the town of Jericho . As Jesus was leaving there with his followers and a great many people , a blind beggar named Bartimaeus son of Timaeus was sitting by the road .
41010047	When he heard that Jesus from Nazareth was walking by , he began to shout , “ Jesus , Son of David , have mercy on me ! ”
41010048	Many people warned the blind man to be quiet , but he shouted even more , “ Son of David , have mercy on me ! ”
41010049	Jesus stopped and said , “ Tell the man to come here . ” So they called the blind man , saying , “ Cheer up ! Get to your feet . Jesus is calling you . ”
41010050	The blind man jumped up , left his coat there , and went to Jesus .
41010051	Jesus asked him , “ What do you want me to do for you ? ” The blind man answered , “ Teacher , I want to see . ”
41010052	Jesus said , “ Go , you are healed because you believed . ” At once the man could see , and he followed Jesus on the road .
41011001	As Jesus and his followers were coming closer to Jerusalem , they came to the towns of Bethphage and Bethany near the Mount of Olives . From there Jesus sent two of his followers
41011002	and said to them , “ Go to the town you can see there . When you enter it , you will quickly find a colt tied , which no one has ever ridden . Untie it and bring it here to me .
41011003	If anyone asks you why you are doing this , tell him its Master needs the colt , and he will send it at once . ”
41011004	The followers went into the town , found a colt tied in the street near the door of a house , and untied it .
41011005	Some people were standing there and asked , “ What are you doing ? Why are you untying that colt ? ”
41011006	The followers answered the way Jesus told them to answer , and the people let them take the colt .
41011007	They brought the colt to Jesus and put their coats on it , and Jesus sat on it .
41011008	Many people spread their coats on the road . Others cut branches in the fields and spread them on the road .
41011009	The people were walking ahead of Jesus and behind him , shouting , “ Praise God ! God bless the One who comes in the name of the Lord !
41011010	God bless the kingdom of our father David ! That kingdom is coming ! Praise to God in heaven ! ”
41011011	Jesus entered Jerusalem and went into the Temple . After he had looked at everything , since it was already late , he went out to Bethany with the twelve apostles .
41011012	The next day as Jesus was leaving Bethany , he became hungry .
41011013	Seeing a fig tree in leaf from far away , he went to see if it had any figs on it . But he found no figs , only leaves , because it was not the right season for figs .
41011014	So Jesus said to the tree , “ May no one ever eat fruit from you again . ” And Jesus’ followers heard him say this .
41011015	When Jesus returned to Jerusalem , he went into the Temple and began to throw out those who were buying and selling there . He turned over the tables of those who were exchanging different kinds of money , and he upset the benches of those who were selling doves .
41011016	Jesus refused to allow anyone to carry goods through the Temple courts .
41011017	Then he taught the people , saying , “ It is written in the Scriptures , ‘ My Temple will be called a house for prayer for people from all nations . ’ But you are changing God’s house into a ‘ hideout for robbers . ’ ”
41011018	The leading priests and the teachers of the law heard all this and began trying to find a way to kill Jesus . They were afraid of him , because all the people were amazed at his teaching .
41011019	That evening , Jesus and his followers left the city .
41011020	The next morning as Jesus was passing by with his followers , they saw the fig tree dry and dead , even to the roots .
41011021	Peter remembered the tree and said to Jesus , “ Teacher , look ! The fig tree you cursed is dry and dead ! ”
41011022	Jesus answered , “ Have faith in God .
41011023	I tell you the truth , you can say to this mountain , ‘ Go , fall into the sea . ’ And if you have no doubts in your mind and believe that what you say will happen , God will do it for you .
41011024	So I tell you to believe that you have received the things you ask for in prayer , and God will give them to you .
41011025	When you are praying , if you are angry with someone , forgive him so that your Father in heaven will also forgive your sins . [
41011026	But if you don’t forgive other people , then your Father in heaven will not forgive your sins . ] ”
41011027	Jesus and his followers went again to Jerusalem . As Jesus was walking in the Temple , the leading priests , the teachers of the law , and the elders came to him .
41011028	They said to him , “ What authority do you have to do these things ? Who gave you this authority ? ”
41011029	Jesus answered , “ I will ask you one question . If you answer me , I will tell you what authority I have to do these things .
41011030	Tell me : When John baptized people , was that authority from God or just from other people ? ”
41011031	They argued about Jesus’ question , saying , “ If we answer , ‘ John’s baptism was from God , ’ Jesus will say , ‘ Then why didn’t you believe him ? ’
41011032	But if we say , ‘ It was from other people , ’ the crowd will be against us . ” ( These leaders were afraid of the people , because all the people believed that John was a prophet . )
41011033	So they answered Jesus , “ We don’t know . ” Jesus said to them , “ Then I won’t tell you what authority I have to do these things . ”
41012001	Jesus began to use stories to teach the people . He said , “ A man planted a vineyard . He put a wall around it and dug a hole for a winepress and built a tower . Then he leased the land to some farmers and left for a trip .
41012002	When it was time for the grapes to be picked , he sent a servant to the farmers to get his share of the grapes .
41012003	But the farmers grabbed the servant and beat him and sent him away empty-handed .
41012004	Then the man sent another servant . They hit him on the head and showed no respect for him .
41012005	So the man sent another servant , whom they killed . The man sent many other servants ; the farmers beat some of them and killed others .
41012006	“ The man had one person left to send , his son whom he loved . He sent him last of all , saying , ‘ They will respect my son . ’
41012007	“ But the farmers said to each other , ‘ This son will inherit the vineyard . If we kill him , it will be ours . ’
41012008	So they took the son , killed him , and threw him out of the vineyard .
41012009	“ So what will the owner of the vineyard do ? He will come and kill those farmers and will give the vineyard to other farmers .
41012010	Surely you have read this Scripture : ‘ The stone that the builders rejected became the cornerstone .
41012011	The Lord did this , and it is wonderful to us . ’ ”
41012012	The Jewish leaders knew that the story was about them . So they wanted to find a way to arrest Jesus , but they were afraid of the people . So the leaders left him and went away .
41012013	Later , the Jewish leaders sent some Pharisees and Herodians to Jesus to trap him in saying something wrong .
41012014	They came to him and said , “ Teacher , we know that you are an honest man . You are not afraid of what other people think about you , because you pay no attention to who they are . And you teach the truth about God’s way . Tell us : Is it right to pay taxes to Caesar or not ?
41012015	Should we pay them , or not ? ” But knowing what these men were really trying to do , Jesus said to them , “ Why are you trying to trap me ? Bring me a coin to look at . ”
41012016	They gave Jesus a coin , and he asked , “ Whose image and name are on the coin ? ” They answered , “ Caesar’s . ”
41012017	Then Jesus said to them , “ Give to Caesar the things that are Caesar’s , and give to God the things that are God’s . ” The men were amazed at what Jesus said .
41012018	Then some Sadducees came to Jesus and asked him a question . ( Sadducees believed that people would not rise from the dead . )
41012019	They said , “ Teacher , Moses wrote that if a man’s brother dies , leaving a wife but no children , then that man must marry the widow and have children for his brother .
41012020	Once there were seven brothers . The first brother married and died , leaving no children .
41012021	So the second brother married the widow , but he also died and had no children . The same thing happened with the third brother .
41012022	All seven brothers married her and died , and none of the brothers had any children . Finally the woman died too .
41012023	Since all seven brothers had married her , when people rise from the dead , whose wife will she be ? ”
41012024	Jesus answered , “ Why don’t you understand ? Don’t you know what the Scriptures say , and don’t you know about the power of God ?
41012025	When people rise from the dead , they will not marry , nor will they be given to someone to marry . They will be like the angels in heaven .
41012026	Surely you have read what God said about people rising from the dead . In the book in which Moses wrote about the burning bush , it says that God told Moses , ‘ I am the God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . ’
41012027	God is the God of the living , not the dead . You Sadducees are wrong ! ”
41012028	One of the teachers of the law came and heard Jesus arguing with the Sadducees . Seeing that Jesus gave good answers to their questions , he asked Jesus , “ Which of the commands is most important ? ”
41012029	Jesus answered , “ The most important command is this : ‘ Listen , people of Israel ! The Lord our God is the only Lord .
41012030	Love the Lord your God with all your heart , all your soul , all your mind , and all your strength . ’
41012031	The second command is this : ‘ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ’ There are no commands more important than these . ”
41012032	The man answered , “ That was a good answer , Teacher . You were right when you said God is the only Lord and there is no other God besides him .
41012033	One must love God with all his heart , all his mind , and all his strength . And one must love his neighbor as he loves himself . These commands are more important than all the animals and sacrifices we offer to God . ”
41012034	When Jesus saw that the man answered him wisely , Jesus said to him , “ You are close to the kingdom of God . ” And after that , no one was brave enough to ask Jesus any more questions .
41012035	As Jesus was teaching in the Temple , he asked , “ Why do the teachers of the law say that the Christ is the son of David ?
41012036	David himself , speaking by the Holy Spirit , said : ‘ The Lord said to my Lord , “ Sit by me at my right side , until I put your enemies under your control . ” ’
41012037	David himself calls the Christ ‘ Lord , ’ so how can the Christ be his son ? ” The large crowd listened to Jesus with pleasure .
41012038	Jesus continued teaching and said , “ Beware of the teachers of the law . They like to walk around wearing fancy clothes , and they love for people to greet them with respect in the marketplaces .
41012039	They love to have the most important seats in the synagogues and at feasts .
41012040	But they cheat widows and steal their houses and then try to make themselves look good by saying long prayers . They will receive a greater punishment . ”
41012041	Jesus sat near the Temple money box and watched the people put in their money . Many rich people gave large sums of money .
41012042	Then a poor widow came and put in two small copper coins , which were only worth a few cents .
41012043	Calling his followers to him , Jesus said , “ I tell you the truth , this poor widow gave more than all those rich people .
41012044	They gave only what they did not need . This woman is very poor , but she gave all she had ; she gave all she had to live on . ”
41013001	As Jesus was leaving the Temple , one of his followers said to him , “ Look , Teacher ! How beautiful the buildings are ! How big the stones are ! ”
41013002	Jesus said , “ Do you see all these great buildings ? Not one stone will be left on another . Every stone will be thrown down to the ground . ”
41013003	Later , as Jesus was sitting on the Mount of Olives , opposite the Temple , he was alone with Peter , James , John , and Andrew . They asked Jesus ,
41013004	“ Tell us , when will these things happen ? And what will be the sign that they are going to happen ? ”
41013005	Jesus began to answer them , “ Be careful that no one fools you .
41013006	Many people will come in my name , saying , ‘ I am the One , ’ and they will fool many people .
41013007	When you hear about wars and stories of wars that are coming , don’t be afraid . These things must happen before the end comes .
41013008	Nations will fight against other nations , and kingdoms against other kingdoms . There will be earthquakes in different places , and there will be times when there is no food for people to eat . These things are like the first pains when something new is about to be born .
41013009	“ You must be careful . People will arrest you and take you to court and beat you in their synagogues . You will be forced to stand before kings and governors , to tell them about me . This will happen to you because you follow me .
41013010	But before these things happen , the Good News must be told to all people .
41013011	When you are arrested and judged , don’t worry ahead of time about what you should say . Say whatever is given you to say at that time , because it will not really be you speaking ; it will be the Holy Spirit .
41013012	“ Brothers will give their own brothers to be killed , and fathers will give their own children to be killed . Children will fight against their own parents and cause them to be put to death .
41013013	All people will hate you because you follow me , but those people who keep their faith until the end will be saved .
41013014	“ You will see ‘ a blasphemous object that brings destruction ’ standing where it should not be . ” ( You who read this should understand what it means . ) “ At that time , the people in Judea should run away to the mountains .
41013015	If people are on the roofs of their houses , they must not go down or go inside to get anything out of their houses .
41013016	If people are in the fields , they must not go back to get their coats .
41013017	At that time , how terrible it will be for women who are pregnant or have nursing babies !
41013018	Pray that these things will not happen in winter ,
41013019	because those days will be full of trouble . There will be more trouble than there has ever been since the beginning , when God made the world , until now , and nothing as bad will ever happen again .
41013020	God has decided to make that terrible time short . Otherwise , no one would go on living . But God will make that time short to help the people he has chosen .
41013021	At that time , someone might say to you , ‘ Look , there is the Christ ! ’ Or another person might say , ‘ There he is ! ’ But don’t believe them .
41013022	False Christs and false prophets will come and perform great wonders and miracles . They will try to fool even the people God has chosen , if that is possible .
41013023	So be careful . I have warned you about all this before it happens .
41013024	“ During the days after this trouble comes , ‘ the sun will grow dark , and the moon will not give its light .
41013025	The stars will fall from the sky . And the powers of the heavens will be shaken . ’
41013026	“ Then people will see the Son of Man coming in clouds with great power and glory .
41013027	Then he will send his angels all around the earth to gather his chosen people from every part of the earth and from every part of heaven .
41013028	“ Learn a lesson from the fig tree : When its branches become green and soft and new leaves appear , you know summer is near .
41013029	In the same way , when you see these things happening , you will know that the time is near , ready to come .
41013030	I tell you the truth , all these things will happen while the people of this time are still living .
41013031	Earth and sky will be destroyed , but the words I have said will never be destroyed .
41013032	“ No one knows when that day or time will be , not the angels in heaven , not even the Son . Only the Father knows .
41013033	Be careful ! Always be ready , because you don’t know when that time will be .
41013034	It is like a man who goes on a trip . He leaves his house and lets his servants take care of it , giving each one a special job to do . The man tells the servant guarding the door always to be watchful .
41013035	So always be ready , because you don’t know when the owner of the house will come back . It might be in the evening , or at midnight , or in the morning while it is still dark , or when the sun rises .
41013036	Always be ready . Otherwise he might come back suddenly and find you sleeping .
41013037	I tell you this , and I say this to everyone : ‘ Be ready ! ’ ”
41014001	It was now only two days before the Passover and the Feast of Unleavened Bread . The leading priests and teachers of the law were trying to find a trick to arrest Jesus and kill him .
41014002	But they said , “ We must not do it during the feast , because the people might cause a riot . ”
41014003	Jesus was in Bethany at the house of Simon , who had a skin disease . While Jesus was eating there , a woman approached him with an alabaster jar filled with very expensive perfume , made of pure nard . She opened the jar and poured the perfume on Jesus’ head .
41014004	Some who were there became upset and said to each other , “ Why waste that perfume ?
41014005	It was worth a full year’s work . It could have been sold and the money given to the poor . ” And they got very angry with the woman .
41014006	Jesus said , “ Leave her alone . Why are you troubling her ? She did an excellent thing for me .
41014007	You will always have the poor with you , and you can help them anytime you want . But you will not always have me .
41014008	This woman did the only thing she could do for me ; she poured perfume on my body to prepare me for burial .
41014009	I tell you the truth , wherever the Good News is preached in all the world , what this woman has done will be told , and people will remember her . ”
41014010	One of the twelve apostles , Judas Iscariot , went to talk to the leading priests to offer to hand Jesus over to them .
41014011	These priests were pleased about this and promised to pay Judas money . So he watched for the best time to turn Jesus in .
41014012	It was now the first day of the Feast of Unleavened Bread when the Passover lamb was sacrificed . Jesus’ followers said to him , “ Where do you want us to go and prepare for you to eat the Passover meal ? ”
41014013	Jesus sent two of his followers and said to them , “ Go into the city and a man carrying a jar of water will meet you . Follow him .
41014014	When he goes into a house , tell the owner of the house , ‘ The Teacher says : “ Where is my guest room in which I can eat the Passover meal with my followers ? ” ’
41014015	The owner will show you a large room upstairs that is furnished and ready . Prepare the food for us there . ”
41014016	So the followers left and went into the city . Everything happened as Jesus had said , so they prepared the Passover meal .
41014017	In the evening , Jesus went to that house with the twelve .
41014018	While they were all eating , Jesus said , “ I tell you the truth , one of you will turn against me — one of you eating with me now . ”
41014019	The followers were very sad to hear this . Each one began to say to Jesus , “ I am not the one , am I ? ”
41014020	Jesus answered , “ It is one of the twelve — the one who dips his bread into the bowl with me .
41014021	The Son of Man will die , just as the Scriptures say . But how terrible it will be for the person who hands the Son of Man over to be killed . It would be better for him if he had never been born . ”
41014022	While they were eating , Jesus took some bread and thanked God for it and broke it . Then he gave it to his followers and said , “ Take it ; this is my body . ”
41014023	Then Jesus took a cup and thanked God for it and gave it to the followers , and they all drank from the cup .
41014024	Then Jesus said , “ This is my blood which is the new agreement that God makes with his people . This blood is poured out for many .
41014025	I tell you the truth , I will not drink of this fruit of the vine again until that day when I drink it new in the kingdom of God . ”
41014026	After singing a hymn , they went out to the Mount of Olives .
41014027	Then Jesus told the followers , “ You will all stumble in your faith , because it is written in the Scriptures : ‘ I will kill the shepherd , and the sheep will scatter . ’
41014028	But after I rise from the dead , I will go ahead of you into Galilee . ”
41014029	Peter said , “ Everyone else may stumble in their faith , but I will not . ”
41014030	Jesus answered , “ I tell you the truth , tonight before the rooster crows twice you will say three times you don’t know me . ”
41014031	But Peter insisted , “ I will never say that I don’t know you ! I will even die with you ! ” And all the other followers said the same thing .
41014032	Jesus and his followers went to a place called Gethsemane . He said to them , “ Sit here while I pray . ”
41014033	Jesus took Peter , James , and John with him , and he began to be very sad and troubled .
41014034	He said to them , “ My heart is full of sorrow , to the point of death . Stay here and watch . ”
41014035	After walking a little farther away from them , Jesus fell to the ground and prayed that , if possible , he would not have this time of suffering .
41014036	He prayed , “ Abba , Father ! You can do all things . Take away this cup of suffering . But do what you want , not what I want . ”
41014037	Then Jesus went back to his followers and found them asleep . He said to Peter , “ Simon , are you sleeping ? Couldn’t you stay awake with me for one hour ?
41014038	Stay awake and pray for strength against temptation . The spirit wants to do what is right , but the body is weak . ”
41014039	Again Jesus went away and prayed the same thing .
41014040	Then he went back to his followers , and again he found them asleep , because their eyes were very heavy . And they did not know what to say to him .
41014041	After Jesus prayed a third time , he went back to his followers and said to them , “ Are you still sleeping and resting ? That’s enough . The time has come for the Son of Man to be handed over to sinful people .
41014042	Get up , we must go . Look , here comes the man who has turned against me . ”
41014043	At once , while Jesus was still speaking , Judas , one of the twelve apostles , came up . With him were many people carrying swords and clubs who had been sent from the leading priests , the teachers of the law , and the Jewish elders .
41014044	Judas had planned a signal for them , saying , “ The man I kiss is Jesus . Arrest him and guard him while you lead him away . ”
41014045	So Judas went straight to Jesus and said , “ Teacher ! ” and kissed him .
41014046	Then the people grabbed Jesus and arrested him .
41014047	One of his followers standing nearby pulled out his sword and struck the servant of the high priest and cut off his ear .
41014048	Then Jesus said , “ You came to get me with swords and clubs as if I were a criminal .
41014049	Every day I was with you teaching in the Temple , and you did not arrest me there . But all these things have happened to make the Scriptures come true . ”
41014050	Then all of Jesus’ followers left him and ran away .
41014051	A young man , wearing only a linen cloth , was following Jesus , and the people also grabbed him .
41014052	But the cloth he was wearing came off , and he ran away naked .
41014053	The people who arrested Jesus led him to the house of the high priest , where all the leading priests , the elders , and the teachers of the law were gathered .
41014054	Peter followed far behind and entered the courtyard of the high priest’s house . There he sat with the guards , warming himself by the fire .
41014055	The leading priests and the whole Jewish council tried to find something that Jesus had done wrong so they could kill him . But the council could find no proof of anything .
41014056	Many people came and told false things about him , but all said different things — none of them agreed .
41014057	Then some people stood up and lied about Jesus , saying ,
41014058	“ We heard this man say , ‘ I will destroy this Temple that people made . And three days later , I will build another Temple not made by people . ’ ”
41014059	But even the things these people said did not agree .
41014060	Then the high priest stood before them and asked Jesus , “ Aren’t you going to answer ? Don’t you have something to say about their charges against you ? ”
41014061	But Jesus said nothing ; he did not answer . The high priest asked Jesus another question : “ Are you the Christ , the Son of the blessed God ? ”
41014062	Jesus answered , “ I am . And in the future you will see the Son of Man sitting at the right hand of God , the Powerful One , and coming on clouds in the sky . ”
41014063	When the high priest heard this , he tore his clothes and said , “ We don’t need any more witnesses !
41014064	You all heard him say these things against God . What do you think ? ” They all said that Jesus was guilty and should die .
41014065	Some of the people there began to spit at Jesus . They blindfolded him and beat him with their fists and said , “ Prove you are a prophet ! ” Then the guards led Jesus away and beat him .
41014066	While Peter was in the courtyard , a servant girl of the high priest came there .
41014067	She saw Peter warming himself at the fire and looked closely at him . Then she said , “ You also were with Jesus , that man from Nazareth . ”
41014068	But Peter said that he was never with Jesus . He said , “ I don’t know or understand what you are talking about . ” Then Peter left and went toward the entrance of the courtyard . And the rooster crowed .
41014069	The servant girl saw Peter there , and again she said to the people who were standing nearby , “ This man is one of those who followed Jesus . ”
41014070	Again Peter said that it was not true . A short time later , some people were standing near Peter saying , “ Surely you are one of those who followed Jesus , because you are from Galilee , too . ”
41014071	Then Peter began to place a curse on himself and swear , “ I don’t know this man you’re talking about ! ”
41014072	At once , the rooster crowed the second time . Then Peter remembered what Jesus had told him : “ Before the rooster crows twice , you will say three times that you don’t know me . ” Then Peter lost control of himself and began to cry .
41015001	Very early in the morning , the leading priests , the elders , the teachers of the law , and all the Jewish council decided what to do with Jesus . They tied him , led him away , and turned him over to Pilate , the governor .
41015002	Pilate asked Jesus , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ” Jesus answered , “ Those are your words . ”
41015003	The leading priests accused Jesus of many things .
41015004	So Pilate asked Jesus another question , “ You can see that they are accusing you of many things . Aren’t you going to answer ? ”
41015005	But Jesus still said nothing , so Pilate was very surprised .
41015006	Every year at the time of the Passover the governor would free one prisoner whom the people chose .
41015007	At that time , there was a man named Barabbas in prison who was a rebel and had committed murder during a riot .
41015008	The crowd came to Pilate and began to ask him to free a prisoner as he always did .
41015009	So Pilate asked them , “ Do you want me to free the king of the Jews ? ”
41015010	Pilate knew that the leading priests had turned Jesus in to him because they were jealous .
41015011	But the leading priests had persuaded the people to ask Pilate to free Barabbas , not Jesus .
41015012	Then Pilate asked the crowd again , “ So what should I do with this man you call the king of the Jews ? ”
41015013	They shouted , “ Crucify him ! ”
41015014	Pilate asked , “ Why ? What wrong has he done ? ” But they shouted even louder , “ Crucify him ! ”
41015015	Pilate wanted to please the crowd , so he freed Barabbas for them . After having Jesus beaten with whips , he handed Jesus over to the soldiers to be crucified .
41015016	The soldiers took Jesus into the governor’s palace ( called the Praetorium ) and called all the other soldiers together .
41015017	They put a purple robe on Jesus and used thorny branches to make a crown for his head .
41015018	They began to call out to him , “ Hail , King of the Jews ! ”
41015019	The soldiers beat Jesus on the head many times with a stick . They spit on him and made fun of him by bowing on their knees and worshiping him .
41015020	After they finished , the soldiers took off the purple robe and put his own clothes on him again . Then they led him out of the palace to be crucified .
41015021	A man named Simon from Cyrene , the father of Alexander and Rufus , was coming from the fields to the city . The soldiers forced Simon to carry the cross for Jesus .
41015022	They led Jesus to the place called Golgotha , which means the Place of the Skull .
41015023	The soldiers tried to give Jesus wine mixed with myrrh to drink , but he refused .
41015024	The soldiers crucified Jesus and divided his clothes among themselves , throwing lots to decide what each soldier would get .
41015025	It was nine o’clock in the morning when they crucified Jesus .
41015026	There was a sign with this charge against Jesus written on it : the king of the jews .
41015027	They also put two robbers on crosses beside Jesus , one on the right , and the other on the left . [
41015028	And the Scripture came true that says , “ They put him with criminals . ” ]
41015029	People walked by and insulted Jesus and shook their heads , saying , “ You said you could destroy the Temple and build it again in three days .
41015030	So save yourself ! Come down from that cross ! ”
41015031	The leading priests and the teachers of the law were also making fun of Jesus . They said to each other , “ He saved other people , but he can’t save himself .
41015032	If he is really the Christ , the king of Israel , let him come down now from the cross . When we see this , we will believe in him . ” The robbers who were being crucified beside Jesus also insulted him .
41015033	At noon the whole country became dark , and the darkness lasted for three hours .
41015034	At three o’clock Jesus cried in a loud voice , “ Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani . ” This means , “ My God , my God , why have you abandoned me ? ”
41015035	When some of the people standing there heard this , they said , “ Listen ! He is calling Elijah . ”
41015036	Someone there ran and got a sponge , filled it with vinegar , tied it to a stick , and gave it to Jesus to drink . He said , “ We want to see if Elijah will come to take him down from the cross . ”
41015037	Then Jesus cried in a loud voice and died .
41015038	The curtain in the Temple was torn into two pieces , from the top to the bottom .
41015039	When the army officer who was standing in front of the cross saw what happened when Jesus died , he said , “ This man really was the Son of God ! ”
41015040	Some women were standing at a distance from the cross , watching ; among them were Mary Magdalene , Salome , and Mary the mother of James and Joseph . ( James was her youngest son . )
41015041	These women had followed Jesus in Galilee and helped him . Many other women were also there who had come with Jesus to Jerusalem .
41015042	This was Preparation Day . ( That means the day before the Sabbath day . ) That evening ,
41015043	Joseph from Arimathea was brave enough to go to Pilate and ask for Jesus’ body . Joseph , an important member of the Jewish council , was one of the people who was waiting for the kingdom of God to come .
41015044	Pilate was amazed that Jesus would have already died , so he called the army officer who had guarded Jesus and asked him if Jesus had already died .
41015045	The officer told Pilate that he was dead , so Pilate told Joseph he could have the body .
41015046	Joseph bought some linen cloth , took the body down from the cross , and wrapped it in the linen . He put the body in a tomb that was cut out of a wall of rock . Then he rolled a very large stone to block the entrance of the tomb .
41015047	And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joseph saw the place where Jesus was laid .
41016001	The day after the Sabbath day , Mary Magdalene , Mary the mother of James , and Salome bought some sweet-smelling spices to put on Jesus’ body .
41016002	Very early on that day , the first day of the week , soon after sunrise , the women were on their way to the tomb .
41016003	They said to each other , “ Who will roll away for us the stone that covers the entrance of the tomb ? ”
41016004	Then the women looked and saw that the stone had already been rolled away , even though it was very large .
41016005	The women entered the tomb and saw a young man wearing a white robe and sitting on the right side , and they were afraid .
41016006	But the man said , “ Don’t be afraid . You are looking for Jesus from Nazareth , who has been crucified . He has risen from the dead ; he is not here . Look , here is the place they laid him .
41016007	Now go and tell his followers and Peter , ‘ Jesus is going into Galilee ahead of you , and you will see him there as he told you before . ’ ”
41016008	The women were confused and shaking with fear , so they left the tomb and ran away . They did not tell anyone about what happened , because they were afraid .
41016009	After Jesus rose from the dead early on the first day of the week , he showed himself first to Mary Magdalene . One time in the past , he had forced seven demons out of her .
41016010	After Mary saw Jesus , she went and told his followers , who were very sad and were crying .
41016011	But Mary told them that Jesus was alive . She said that she had seen him , but the followers did not believe her .
41016012	Later , Jesus showed himself to two of his followers while they were walking in the country , but he did not look the same as before .
41016013	These followers went back to the others and told them what had happened , but again , the followers did not believe them .
41016014	Later Jesus showed himself to the eleven apostles while they were eating , and he criticized them because they had no faith . They were stubborn and refused to believe those who had seen him after he had risen from the dead .
41016015	Jesus said to his followers , “ Go everywhere in the world , and tell the Good News to everyone .
41016016	Anyone who believes and is baptized will be saved , but anyone who does not believe will be punished .
41016017	And those who believe will be able to do these things as proof : They will use my name to force out demons . They will speak in new languages .
41016018	They will pick up snakes and drink poison without being hurt . They will touch the sick , and the sick will be healed . ”
41016019	After the Lord Jesus said these things to his followers , he was carried up into heaven , and he sat at the right side of God .
41016020	The followers went everywhere in the world and told the Good News to people , and the Lord helped them . The Lord proved that the Good News they told was true by giving them power to work miracles . ]
42001001	Many have tried to report on the things that happened among us .
42001002	They have written the same things that we learned from others — the people who saw those things from the beginning and served God by telling people his message .
42001003	Since I myself have studied everything carefully from the beginning , most excellent Theophilus , it seemed good for me to write it out for you . I arranged it in order ,
42001004	to help you know that what you have been taught is true .
42001005	During the time Herod ruled Judea , there was a priest named Zechariah who belonged to Abijah’s group . Zechariah’s wife , Elizabeth , came from the family of Aaron .
42001006	Zechariah and Elizabeth truly did what God said was good . They did everything the Lord commanded and were without fault in keeping his law .
42001007	But they had no children , because Elizabeth could not have a baby , and both of them were very old .
42001008	One day Zechariah was serving as a priest before God , because his group was on duty .
42001009	According to the custom of the priests , he was chosen by lot to go into the Temple of the Lord and burn incense .
42001010	There were a great many people outside praying at the time the incense was offered .
42001011	Then an angel of the Lord appeared to Zechariah , standing on the right side of the incense table .
42001012	When he saw the angel , Zechariah was startled and frightened .
42001013	But the angel said to him , “ Zechariah , don’t be afraid . God has heard your prayer . Your wife , Elizabeth , will give birth to a son , and you will name him John .
42001014	He will bring you joy and gladness , and many people will be happy because of his birth .
42001015	John will be a great man for the Lord . He will never drink wine or beer , and even from birth , he will be filled with the Holy Spirit .
42001016	He will help many people of Israel return to the Lord their God .
42001017	He will go before the Lord in spirit and power like Elijah . He will make peace between parents and their children and will bring those who are not obeying God back to the right way of thinking , to make a people ready for the coming of the Lord . ”
42001018	Zechariah said to the angel , “ How can I know that what you say is true ? I am an old man , and my wife is old , too . ”
42001019	The angel answered him , “ I am Gabriel . I stand before God , who sent me to talk to you and to tell you this good news .
42001020	Now , listen ! You will not be able to speak until the day these things happen , because you did not believe what I told you . But they will really happen . ”
42001021	Outside , the people were still waiting for Zechariah and were surprised that he was staying so long in the Temple .
42001022	When Zechariah came outside , he could not speak to them , and they knew he had seen a vision in the Temple . He could only make signs to them and remained unable to speak .
42001023	When his time of service at the Temple was finished , he went home .
42001024	Later , Zechariah’s wife , Elizabeth , became pregnant and did not go out of her house for five months . Elizabeth said ,
42001025	“ Look what the Lord has done for me ! My people were ashamed of me , but now the Lord has taken away that shame . ”
42001026	During Elizabeth’s sixth month of pregnancy , God sent the angel Gabriel to Nazareth , a town in Galilee ,
42001027	to a virgin . She was engaged to marry a man named Joseph from the family of David . Her name was Mary .
42001028	The angel came to her and said , “ Greetings ! The Lord has blessed you and is with you . ”
42001029	But Mary was very startled by what the angel said and wondered what this greeting might mean .
42001030	The angel said to her , “ Don’t be afraid , Mary ; God has shown you his grace .
42001031	Listen ! You will become pregnant and give birth to a son , and you will name him Jesus .
42001032	He will be great and will be called the Son of the Most High . The Lord God will give him the throne of King David , his ancestor .
42001033	He will rule over the people of Jacob forever , and his kingdom will never end . ”
42001034	Mary said to the angel , “ How will this happen since I am a virgin ? ”
42001035	The angel said to Mary , “ The Holy Spirit will come upon you , and the power of the Most High will cover you . For this reason the baby will be holy and will be called the Son of God .
42001036	Now Elizabeth , your relative , is also pregnant with a son though she is very old . Everyone thought she could not have a baby , but she has been pregnant for six months .
42001037	God can do anything ! ”
42001038	Mary said , “ I am the servant of the Lord . Let this happen to me as you say ! ” Then the angel went away .
42001039	Mary got up and went quickly to a town in the hills of Judea .
42001040	She came to Zechariah’s house and greeted Elizabeth .
42001041	When Elizabeth heard Mary’s greeting , the unborn baby inside her jumped , and Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit .
42001042	She cried out in a loud voice , “ God has blessed you more than any other woman , and he has blessed the baby to which you will give birth .
42001043	Why has this good thing happened to me , that the mother of my Lord comes to me ?
42001044	When I heard your voice , the baby inside me jumped with joy .
42001045	You are blessed because you believed that what the Lord said to you would really happen . ”
42001046	Then Mary said , “ My soul praises the Lord ;
42001047	my heart rejoices in God my Savior ,
42001048	because he has shown his concern for his humble servant girl . From now on , all people will say that I am blessed ,
42001049	because the Powerful One has done great things for me . His name is holy .
42001050	God will show his mercy forever and ever to those who worship and serve him .
42001051	He has done mighty deeds by his power . He has scattered the people who are proud and think great things about themselves .
42001052	He has brought down rulers from their thrones and raised up the humble .
42001053	He has filled the hungry with good things and sent the rich away with nothing .
42001054	He has helped his servant , the people of Israel , remembering to show them mercy
42001055	as he promised to our ancestors , to Abraham and to his children forever . ”
42001056	Mary stayed with Elizabeth for about three months and then returned home .
42001057	When it was time for Elizabeth to give birth , she had a boy .
42001058	Her neighbors and relatives heard how good the Lord was to her , and they rejoiced with her .
42001059	When the baby was eight days old , they came to circumcise him . They wanted to name him Zechariah because this was his father’s name ,
42001060	but his mother said , “ No ! He will be named John . ”
42001061	The people said to Elizabeth , “ But no one in your family has this name . ”
42001062	Then they made signs to his father to find out what he would like to name him .
42001063	Zechariah asked for a writing tablet and wrote , “ His name is John , ” and everyone was surprised .
42001064	Immediately Zechariah could talk again , and he began praising God .
42001065	All their neighbors became alarmed , and in all the mountains of Judea people continued talking about all these things .
42001066	The people who heard about them wondered , saying , “ What will this child be ? ” because the Lord was with him .
42001067	Then Zechariah , John’s father , was filled with the Holy Spirit and prophesied :
42001068	“ Let us praise the Lord , the God of Israel , because he has come to help his people and has given them freedom .
42001069	He has given us a powerful Savior from the family of God’s servant David .
42001070	He said that he would do this through his holy prophets who lived long ago :
42001071	He promised he would save us from our enemies and from the power of all those who hate us .
42001072	He said he would give mercy to our ancestors and that he would remember his holy promise .
42001073	God promised Abraham , our father ,
42001074	that he would save us from the power of our enemies so we could serve him without fear ,
42001075	being holy and good before God as long as we live .
42001076	“ Now you , child , will be called a prophet of the Most High God . You will go before the Lord to prepare his way .
42001077	You will make his people know that they will be saved by having their sins forgiven .
42001078	With the loving mercy of our God , a new day from heaven will dawn upon us .
42001079	It will shine on those who live in darkness , in the shadow of death . It will guide us into the path of peace . ”
42001080	And so the child grew up and became strong in spirit . John lived in the desert until the time when he came out to preach to Israel .
42002001	At that time , Augustus Caesar sent an order that all people in the countries under Roman rule must list their names in a register .
42002002	This was the first registration ; it was taken while Quirinius was governor of Syria .
42002003	And all went to their own towns to be registered .
42002004	So Joseph left Nazareth , a town in Galilee , and went to the town of Bethlehem in Judea , known as the town of David . Joseph went there because he was from the family of David .
42002005	Joseph registered with Mary , to whom he was engaged and who was now pregnant .
42002006	While they were in Bethlehem , the time came for Mary to have the baby ,
42002007	and she gave birth to her first son . Because there were no rooms left in the inn , she wrapped the baby with pieces of cloth and laid him in a feeding trough .
42002008	That night , some shepherds were in the fields nearby watching their sheep .
42002009	Then an angel of the Lord stood before them . The glory of the Lord was shining around them , and they became very frightened .
42002010	The angel said to them , “ Do not be afraid . I am bringing you good news that will be a great joy to all the people .
42002011	Today your Savior was born in the town of David . He is Christ , the Lord .
42002012	This is how you will know him : You will find a baby wrapped in pieces of cloth and lying in a feeding box . ”
42002013	Then a very large group of angels from heaven joined the first angel , praising God and saying :
42002014	“ Give glory to God in heaven , and on earth let there be peace among the people who please God . ”
42002015	When the angels left them and went back to heaven , the shepherds said to each other , “ Let’s go to Bethlehem . Let’s see this thing that has happened which the Lord has told us about . ”
42002016	So the shepherds went quickly and found Mary and Joseph and the baby , who was lying in a feeding trough .
42002017	When they had seen him , they told what the angels had said about this child .
42002018	Everyone was amazed at what the shepherds said to them .
42002019	But Mary treasured these things and continued to think about them .
42002020	Then the shepherds went back to their sheep , praising God and thanking him for everything they had seen and heard . It had been just as the angel had told them .
42002021	When the baby was eight days old , he was circumcised and was named Jesus , the name given by the angel before the baby began to grow inside Mary .
42002022	When the time came for Mary and Joseph to do what the law of Moses taught about being made pure , they took Jesus to Jerusalem to present him to the Lord .
42002023	( It is written in the law of the Lord : “ Every firstborn male shall be given to the Lord . ” )
42002024	Mary and Joseph also went to offer a sacrifice , as the law of the Lord says : “ You must sacrifice two doves or two young pigeons . ”
42002025	In Jerusalem lived a man named Simeon who was a good man and godly . He was waiting for the time when God would take away Israel’s sorrow , and the Holy Spirit was in him .
42002026	Simeon had been told by the Holy Spirit that he would not die before he saw the Christ promised by the Lord .
42002027	The Spirit led Simeon to the Temple . When Mary and Joseph brought the baby Jesus to the Temple to do what the law said they must do ,
42002028	Simeon took the baby in his arms and thanked God :
42002029	“ Now , Lord , you can let me , your servant , die in peace as you said .
42002030	With my own eyes I have seen your salvation ,
42002031	which you prepared before all people .
42002032	It is a light for the non-Jewish people to see and an honor for your people , the Israelites . ”
42002033	Jesus’ father and mother were amazed at what Simeon had said about him .
42002034	Then Simeon blessed them and said to Mary , “ God has chosen this child to cause the fall and rise of many in Israel . He will be a sign from God that many people will not accept
42002035	so that the thoughts of many will be made known . And the things that will happen will make your heart sad , too . ”
42002036	There was a prophetess , Anna , from the family of Phanuel in the tribe of Asher . Anna was very old . She had once been married for seven years .
42002037	Then her husband died , and she was a widow for eighty-four years . Anna never left the Temple but worshiped God , going without food and praying day and night .
42002038	Standing there at that time , she thanked God and spoke about Jesus to all who were waiting for God to free Jerusalem .
42002039	When Joseph and Mary had done everything the law of the Lord commanded , they went home to Nazareth , their own town in Galilee .
42002040	The little child grew and became strong . He was filled with wisdom , and God’s goodness was upon him .
42002041	Every year Jesus’ parents went to Jerusalem for the Passover Feast .
42002042	When he was twelve years old , they went to the feast as they always did .
42002043	After the feast days were over , they started home . The boy Jesus stayed behind in Jerusalem , but his parents did not know it .
42002044	Thinking that Jesus was with them in the group , they traveled for a whole day . Then they began to look for him among their family and friends .
42002045	When they did not find him , they went back to Jerusalem to look for him there .
42002046	After three days they found Jesus sitting in the Temple with the teachers , listening to them and asking them questions .
42002047	All who heard him were amazed at his understanding and answers .
42002048	When Jesus’ parents saw him , they were astonished . His mother said to him , “ Son , why did you do this to us ? Your father and I were very worried about you and have been looking for you . ”
42002049	Jesus said to them , “ Why were you looking for me ? Didn’t you know that I must be in my Father’s house ? ”
42002050	But they did not understand the meaning of what he said .
42002051	Jesus went with them to Nazareth and was obedient to them . But his mother kept in her mind all that had happened .
42002052	Jesus became wiser and grew physically . People liked him , and he pleased God .
42003001	It was the fifteenth year of the rule of Tiberius Caesar . These men were under Caesar : Pontius Pilate , the ruler of Judea ; Herod , the ruler of Galilee ; Philip , Herod’s brother , the ruler of Iturea and Traconitis ; and Lysanias , the ruler of Abilene .
42003002	Annas and Caiaphas were the high priests . At this time , the word of God came to John son of Zechariah in the desert .
42003003	He went all over the area around the Jordan River preaching a baptism of changed hearts and lives for the forgiveness of sins .
42003004	As it is written in the book of Isaiah the prophet : “ This is a voice of one who calls out in the desert : ‘ Prepare the way for the Lord . Make the road straight for him .
42003005	Every valley should be filled in , and every mountain and hill should be made flat . Roads with turns should be made straight , and rough roads should be made smooth .
42003006	And all people will know about the salvation of God ! ’ ”
42003007	To the crowds of people who came to be baptized by John , he said , “ You are all snakes ! Who warned you to run away from God’s coming punishment ?
42003008	Do the things that show you really have changed your hearts and lives . Don’t begin to say to yourselves , ‘ Abraham is our father . ’ I tell you that God could make children for Abraham from these rocks .
42003009	The ax is now ready to cut down the trees , and every tree that does not produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into the fire . ”
42003010	The people asked John , “ Then what should we do ? ”
42003011	John answered , “ If you have two shirts , share with the person who does not have one . If you have food , share that also . ”
42003012	Even tax collectors came to John to be baptized . They said to him , “ Teacher , what should we do ? ”
42003013	John said to them , “ Don’t take more taxes from people than you have been ordered to take . ”
42003014	The soldiers asked John , “ What about us ? What should we do ? ” John said to them , “ Don’t force people to give you money , and don’t lie about them . Be satisfied with the pay you get . ”
42003015	Since the people were hoping for the Christ to come , they wondered if John might be the one .
42003016	John answered everyone , “ I baptize you with water , but there is one coming who is greater than I am . I am not good enough to untie his sandals . He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and fire .
42003017	He will come ready to clean the grain , separating the good grain from the chaff . He will put the good part of the grain into his barn , but he will burn the chaff with a fire that cannot be put out . ”
42003018	And John continued to preach the Good News , saying many other things to encourage the people .
42003019	But John spoke against Herod , the governor , because of his sin with Herodias , the wife of Herod’s brother , and because of the many other evil things Herod did .
42003020	So Herod did something even worse : He put John in prison .
42003021	When all the people were being baptized by John , Jesus also was baptized . While Jesus was praying , heaven opened
42003022	and the Holy Spirit came down on him in the form of a dove . Then a voice came from heaven , saying , “ You are my Son , whom I love , and I am very pleased with you . ”
42003023	When Jesus began his ministry , he was about thirty years old . People thought that Jesus was Joseph’s son . Joseph was the son of Heli .
42003024	Heli was the son of Matthat . Matthat was the son of Levi . Levi was the son of Melki . Melki was the son of Jannai . Jannai was the son of Joseph .
42003025	Joseph was the son of Mattathias . Mattathias was the son of Amos . Amos was the son of Nahum . Nahum was the son of Esli . Esli was the son of Naggai .
42003026	Naggai was the son of Maath . Maath was the son of Mattathias . Mattathias was the son of Semein . Semein was the son of Josech . Josech was the son of Joda .
42003027	Joda was the son of Joanan . Joanan was the son of Rhesa . Rhesa was the son of Zerubbabel . Zerubbabel was the grandson of Shealtiel . Shealtiel was the son of Neri .
42003028	Neri was the son of Melki . Melki was the son of Addi . Addi was the son of Cosam . Cosam was the son of Elmadam . Elmadam was the son of Er .
42003029	Er was the son of Joshua . Joshua was the son of Eliezer . Eliezer was the son of Jorim . Jorim was the son of Matthat . Matthat was the son of Levi .
42003030	Levi was the son of Simeon . Simeon was the son of Judah . Judah was the son of Joseph . Joseph was the son of Jonam . Jonam was the son of Eliakim .
42003031	Eliakim was the son of Melea . Melea was the son of Menna . Menna was the son of Mattatha . Mattatha was the son of Nathan . Nathan was the son of David .
42003032	David was the son of Jesse . Jesse was the son of Obed . Obed was the son of Boaz . Boaz was the son of Salmon . Salmon was the son of Nahshon .
42003033	Nahshon was the son of Amminadab . Amminadab was the son of Admin . Admin was the son of Arni . Arni was the son of Hezron . Hezron was the son of Perez . Perez was the son of Judah .
42003034	Judah was the son of Jacob . Jacob was the son of Isaac . Isaac was the son of Abraham . Abraham was the son of Terah . Terah was the son of Nahor .
42003035	Nahor was the son of Serug . Serug was the son of Reu . Reu was the son of Peleg . Peleg was the son of Eber . Eber was the son of Shelah .
42003036	Shelah was the son of Cainan . Cainan was the son of Arphaxad . Arphaxad was the son of Shem . Shem was the son of Noah . Noah was the son of Lamech .
42003037	Lamech was the son of Methuselah . Methuselah was the son of Enoch . Enoch was the son of Jared . Jared was the son of Mahalalel . Mahalalel was the son of Kenan .
42003038	Kenan was the son of Enosh . Enosh was the son of Seth . Seth was the son of Adam . Adam was the son of God .
42004001	Jesus , filled with the Holy Spirit , returned from the Jordan River . The Spirit led Jesus into the desert
42004002	where the devil tempted Jesus for forty days . Jesus ate nothing during that time , and when those days were ended , he was very hungry .
42004003	The devil said to Jesus , “ If you are the Son of God , tell this rock to become bread . ”
42004004	Jesus answered , “ It is written in the Scriptures : ‘ A person does not live on bread alone . ’ ”
42004005	Then the devil took Jesus and showed him all the kingdoms of the world in an instant .
42004006	The devil said to Jesus , “ I will give you all these kingdoms and all their power and glory . It has all been given to me , and I can give it to anyone I wish .
42004007	If you worship me , then it will all be yours . ”
42004008	Jesus answered , “ It is written in the Scriptures : ‘ You must worship the Lord your God and serve only him . ’ ”
42004009	Then the devil led Jesus to Jerusalem and put him on a high place of the Temple . He said to Jesus , “ If you are the Son of God , jump down .
42004010	It is written in the Scriptures : ‘ He has put his angels in charge of you to watch over you . ’
42004011	It is also written : ‘ They will catch you in their hands so that you will not hit your foot on a rock . ’ ”
42004012	Jesus answered , “ But it also says in the Scriptures : ‘ Do not test the Lord your God . ’ ”
42004013	After the devil had tempted Jesus in every way , he left him to wait until a better time .
42004014	Jesus returned to Galilee in the power of the Holy Spirit , and stories about him spread all through the area .
42004015	He began to teach in their synagogues , and everyone praised him .
42004016	Jesus traveled to Nazareth , where he had grown up . On the Sabbath day he went to the synagogue , as he always did , and stood up to read .
42004017	The book of Isaiah the prophet was given to him . He opened the book and found the place where this is written :
42004018	“ The Lord has put his Spirit in me , because he appointed me to tell the Good News to the poor . He has sent me to tell the captives they are free and to tell the blind that they can see again . God sent me to free those who have been treated unfairly
42004019	and to announce the time when the Lord will show his kindness . ”
42004020	Jesus closed the book , gave it back to the assistant , and sat down . Everyone in the synagogue was watching Jesus closely .
42004021	He began to say to them , “ While you heard these words just now , they were coming true ! ”
42004022	All the people spoke well of Jesus and were amazed at the words of grace he spoke . They asked , “ Isn’t this Joseph’s son ? ”
42004023	Jesus said to them , “ I know that you will tell me the old saying : ‘ Doctor , heal yourself . ’ You want to say , ‘ We heard about the things you did in Capernaum . Do those things here in your own town ! ’ ”
42004024	Then Jesus said , “ I tell you the truth , a prophet is not accepted in his hometown .
42004025	But I tell you the truth , there were many widows in Israel during the time of Elijah . It did not rain in Israel for three and one-half years , and there was no food anywhere in the whole country .
42004026	But Elijah was sent to none of those widows , only to a widow in Zarephath , a town in Sidon .
42004027	And there were many with skin diseases living in Israel during the time of the prophet Elisha . But none of them were healed , only Naaman , who was from the country of Syria . ”
42004028	When all the people in the synagogue heard these things , they became very angry .
42004029	They got up , forced Jesus out of town , and took him to the edge of the cliff on which the town was built . They planned to throw him off the edge ,
42004030	but Jesus walked through the crowd and went on his way .
42004031	Jesus went to Capernaum , a city in Galilee , and on the Sabbath day , he taught the people .
42004032	They were amazed at his teaching , because he spoke with authority .
42004033	In the synagogue a man who had within him an evil spirit shouted in a loud voice ,
42004034	“ Jesus of Nazareth ! What do you want with us ? Did you come to destroy us ? I know who you are — God’s Holy One ! ”
42004035	Jesus commanded the evil spirit , “ Be quiet ! Come out of the man ! ” The evil spirit threw the man down to the ground before all the people and then left the man without hurting him .
42004036	The people were amazed and said to each other , “ What does this mean ? With authority and power he commands evil spirits , and they come out . ”
42004037	And so the news about Jesus spread to every place in the whole area .
42004038	Jesus left the synagogue and went to the home of Simon . Simon’s mother-in-law was sick with a high fever , and they asked Jesus to help her .
42004039	He came to her side and commanded the fever to leave . It left her , and immediately she got up and began serving them .
42004040	When the sun went down , the people brought those who were sick to Jesus . Putting his hands on each sick person , he healed every one of them .
42004041	Demons came out of many people , shouting , “ You are the Son of God . ” But Jesus commanded the demons and would not allow them to speak , because they knew Jesus was the Christ .
42004042	At daybreak , Jesus went to a lonely place , but the people looked for him . When they found him , they tried to keep him from leaving .
42004043	But Jesus said to them , “ I must preach about God’s kingdom to other towns , too . This is why I was sent . ”
42004044	Then he kept on preaching in the synagogues of Judea .
42005001	One day while Jesus was standing beside Lake Galilee , many people were pressing all around him to hear the word of God .
42005002	Jesus saw two boats at the shore of the lake . The fishermen had left them and were washing their nets .
42005003	Jesus got into one of the boats , the one that belonged to Simon , and asked him to push off a little from the land . Then Jesus sat down and continued to teach the people from the boat .
42005004	When Jesus had finished speaking , he said to Simon , “ Take the boat into deep water , and put your nets in the water to catch some fish . ”
42005005	Simon answered , “ Master , we worked hard all night trying to catch fish , and we caught nothing . But you say to put the nets in the water , so I will . ”
42005006	When the fishermen did as Jesus told them , they caught so many fish that the nets began to break .
42005007	They called to their partners in the other boat to come and help them . They came and filled both boats so full that they were almost sinking .
42005008	When Simon Peter saw what had happened , he bowed down before Jesus and said , “ Go away from me , Lord . I am a sinful man ! ”
42005009	He and the other fishermen were amazed at the many fish they caught , as were
42005010	James and John , the sons of Zebedee , Simon’s partners . Jesus said to Simon , “ Don’t be afraid . From now on you will fish for people . ”
42005011	When the men brought their boats to the shore , they left everything and followed Jesus .
42005012	When Jesus was in one of the towns , there was a man covered with a skin disease . When he saw Jesus , he bowed before him and begged him , “ Lord , you can heal me if you will . ”
42005013	Jesus reached out his hand and touched the man and said , “ I will . Be healed ! ” Immediately the disease disappeared .
42005014	Then Jesus said , “ Don’t tell anyone about this , but go and show yourself to the priest and offer a gift for your healing , as Moses commanded . This will show the people what I have done . ”
42005015	But the news about Jesus spread even more . Many people came to hear Jesus and to be healed of their sicknesses ,
42005016	but Jesus often slipped away to be alone so he could pray .
42005017	One day as Jesus was teaching the people , the Pharisees and teachers of the law from every town in Galilee and Judea and from Jerusalem were there . The Lord was giving Jesus the power to heal people .
42005018	Just then , some men were carrying on a mat a man who was paralyzed . They tried to bring him in and put him down before Jesus .
42005019	But because there were so many people there , they could not find a way in . So they went up on the roof and lowered the man on his mat through the ceiling into the middle of the crowd right before Jesus .
42005020	Seeing their faith , Jesus said , “ Friend , your sins are forgiven . ”
42005021	The Jewish teachers of the law and the Pharisees thought to themselves , “ Who is this man who is speaking as if he were God ? Only God can forgive sins . ”
42005022	But Jesus knew what they were thinking and said , “ Why are you thinking these things ?
42005023	Which is easier : to say , ‘ Your sins are forgiven , ’ or to say , ‘ Stand up and walk ’ ?
