42005024	But I will prove to you that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins . ” So Jesus said to the paralyzed man , “ I tell you , stand up , take your mat , and go home . ”
42005025	At once the man stood up before them , picked up his mat , and went home , praising God .
42005026	All the people were fully amazed and began to praise God . They were filled with much respect and said , “ Today we have seen amazing things ! ”
42005027	After this , Jesus went out and saw a tax collector named Levi sitting in the tax collector’s booth . Jesus said to him , “ Follow me ! ”
42005028	So Levi got up , left everything , and followed him .
42005029	Then Levi gave a big dinner for Jesus at his house . Many tax collectors and other people were eating there , too .
42005030	But the Pharisees and the men who taught the law for the Pharisees began to complain to Jesus’ followers , “ Why do you eat and drink with tax collectors and sinners ? ”
42005031	Jesus answered them , “ It is not the healthy people who need a doctor , but the sick .
42005032	I have not come to invite good people but sinners to change their hearts and lives . ”
42005033	They said to Jesus , “ John’s followers often fast for a certain time and pray , just as the Pharisees do . But your followers eat and drink all the time . ”
42005034	Jesus said to them , “ You cannot make the friends of the bridegroom fast while he is still with them .
42005035	But the time will come when the bridegroom will be taken away from them , and then they will fast . ”
42005036	Jesus told them this story : “ No one takes cloth off a new coat to cover a hole in an old coat . Otherwise , he ruins the new coat , and the cloth from the new coat will not be the same as the old cloth .
42005037	Also , no one ever pours new wine into old leather bags . Otherwise , the new wine will break the bags , the wine will spill out , and the leather bags will be ruined .
42005038	New wine must be put into new leather bags .
42005039	No one after drinking old wine wants new wine , because he says , ‘ The old wine is better . ’ ”
42006001	One Sabbath day Jesus was walking through some fields of grain . His followers picked the heads of grain , rubbed them in their hands , and ate them .
42006002	Some Pharisees said , “ Why do you do what is not lawful on the Sabbath day ? ”
42006003	Jesus answered , “ Have you not read what David did when he and those with him were hungry ?
42006004	He went into God’s house and took and ate the holy bread , which is lawful only for priests to eat . And he gave some to the people who were with him . ”
42006005	Then Jesus said to the Pharisees , “ The Son of Man is Lord of the Sabbath day . ”
42006006	On another Sabbath day Jesus went into the synagogue and was teaching , and a man with a crippled right hand was there .
42006007	The teachers of the law and the Pharisees were watching closely to see if Jesus would heal on the Sabbath day so they could accuse him .
42006008	But he knew what they were thinking , and he said to the man with the crippled hand , “ Stand up here in the middle of everyone . ” The man got up and stood there .
42006009	Then Jesus said to them , “ I ask you , which is lawful on the Sabbath day : to do good or to do evil , to save a life or to destroy it ? ”
42006010	Jesus looked around at all of them and said to the man , “ Hold out your hand . ” The man held out his hand , and it was healed .
42006011	But the Pharisees and the teachers of the law were very angry and discussed with each other what they could do to Jesus .
42006012	At that time Jesus went off to a mountain to pray , and he spent the night praying to God .
42006013	The next morning , Jesus called his followers to him and chose twelve of them , whom he named apostles :
42006014	Simon ( Jesus named him Peter ) , his brother Andrew , James , John , Philip , Bartholomew ,
42006015	Matthew , Thomas , James son of Alphaeus , Simon ( called the Zealot ) ,
42006016	Judas son of James , and Judas Iscariot , who later turned Jesus over to his enemies .
42006017	Jesus and the apostles came down from the mountain , and he stood on level ground . A large group of his followers was there , as well as many people from all around Judea , Jerusalem , and the seacoast cities of Tyre and Sidon .
42006018	They all came to hear Jesus teach and to be healed of their sicknesses , and he healed those who were troubled by evil spirits .
42006019	All the people were trying to touch Jesus , because power was coming from him and healing them all .
42006020	Jesus looked at his followers and said , “ You people who are poor are blessed , because the kingdom of God belongs to you .
42006021	You people who are now hungry are blessed , because you will be satisfied . You people who are now crying are blessed , because you will laugh with joy .
42006022	“ People will hate you , shut you out , insult you , and say you are evil because you follow the Son of Man . But when they do , you will be blessed .
42006023	Be full of joy at that time , because you have a great reward in heaven . Their ancestors did the same things to the prophets .
42006024	“ But how terrible it will be for you who are rich , because you have had your easy life .
42006025	How terrible it will be for you who are full now , because you will be hungry . How terrible it will be for you who are laughing now , because you will be sad and cry .
42006026	“ How terrible when everyone says only good things about you , because their ancestors said the same things about the false prophets .
42006027	“ But I say to you who are listening , love your enemies . Do good to those who hate you ,
42006028	bless those who curse you , pray for those who are cruel to you .
42006029	If anyone slaps you on one cheek , offer him the other cheek , too . If someone takes your coat , do not stop him from taking your shirt .
42006030	Give to everyone who asks you , and when someone takes something that is yours , don’t ask for it back .
42006031	Do to others what you would want them to do to you .
42006032	If you love only the people who love you , what praise should you get ? Even sinners love the people who love them .
42006033	If you do good only to those who do good to you , what praise should you get ? Even sinners do that !
42006034	If you lend things to people , always hoping to get something back , what praise should you get ? Even sinners lend to other sinners so that they can get back the same amount !
42006035	But love your enemies , do good to them , and lend to them without hoping to get anything back . Then you will have a great reward , and you will be children of the Most High God , because he is kind even to people who are ungrateful and full of sin .
42006036	Show mercy , just as your Father shows mercy .
42006037	“ Don’t judge others , and you will not be judged . Don’t accuse others of being guilty , and you will not be accused of being guilty . Forgive , and you will be forgiven .
42006038	Give , and you will receive . You will be given much . Pressed down , shaken together , and running over , it will spill into your lap . The way you give to others is the way God will give to you . ”
42006039	Jesus told them this story : “ Can a blind person lead another blind person ? No ! Both of them will fall into a ditch .
42006040	A student is not better than the teacher , but the student who has been fully trained will be like the teacher .
42006041	“ Why do you notice the little piece of dust in your friend’s eye , but you don’t notice the big piece of wood in your own eye ?
42006042	How can you say to your friend , ‘ Friend , let me take that little piece of dust out of your eye ’ when you cannot see that big piece of wood in your own eye ! You hypocrite ! First , take the wood out of your own eye . Then you will see clearly to take the dust out of your friend’s eye .
42006043	“ A good tree does not produce bad fruit , nor does a bad tree produce good fruit .
42006044	Each tree is known by its own fruit . People don’t gather figs from thornbushes , and they don’t get grapes from bushes .
42006045	Good people bring good things out of the good they stored in their hearts . But evil people bring evil things out of the evil they stored in their hearts . People speak the things that are in their hearts .
42006046	“ Why do you call me , ‘ Lord , Lord , ’ but do not do what I say ?
42006047	I will show you what everyone is like who comes to me and hears my words and obeys .
42006048	That person is like a man building a house who dug deep and laid the foundation on rock . When the floods came , the water tried to wash the house away , but it could not shake it , because the house was built well .
42006049	But the one who hears my words and does not obey is like a man who built his house on the ground without a foundation . When the floods came , the house quickly fell and was completely destroyed . ”
42007001	When Jesus finished saying all these things to the people , he went to Capernaum .
42007002	There was an army officer who had a servant who was very important to him . The servant was so sick he was nearly dead .
42007003	When the officer heard about Jesus , he sent some Jewish elders to him to ask Jesus to come and heal his servant .
42007004	The men went to Jesus and begged him , saying , “ This officer is worthy of your help .
42007005	He loves our people , and he built us a synagogue . ”
42007006	So Jesus went with the men . He was getting near the officer’s house when the officer sent friends to say , “ Lord , don’t trouble yourself , because I am not worthy to have you come into my house .
42007007	That is why I did not come to you myself . But you only need to command it , and my servant will be healed .
42007008	I , too , am a man under the authority of others , and I have soldiers under my command . I tell one soldier , ‘ Go , ’ and he goes . I tell another soldier , ‘ Come , ’ and he comes . I say to my servant , ‘ Do this , ’ and my servant does it . ”
42007009	When Jesus heard this , he was amazed . Turning to the crowd that was following him , he said , “ I tell you , this is the greatest faith I have found anywhere , even in Israel . ”
42007010	Those who had been sent to Jesus went back to the house where they found the servant in good health .
42007011	Soon afterwards Jesus went to a town called Nain , and his followers and a large crowd traveled with him .
42007012	When he came near the town gate , he saw a funeral . A mother , who was a widow , had lost her only son . A large crowd from the town was with the mother while her son was being carried out .
42007013	When the Lord saw her , he felt very sorry for her and said , “ Don’t cry . ”
42007014	He went up and touched the coffin , and the people who were carrying it stopped . Jesus said , “ Young man , I tell you , get up ! ”
42007015	And the son sat up and began to talk . Then Jesus gave him back to his mother .
42007016	All the people were amazed and began praising God , saying , “ A great prophet has come to us ! God has come to help his people . ”
42007017	This news about Jesus spread through all Judea and into all the places around there .
42007018	John’s followers told him about all these things . He called for two of his followers
42007019	and sent them to the Lord to ask , “ Are you the One who is to come , or should we wait for someone else ? ”
42007020	When the men came to Jesus , they said , “ John the Baptist sent us to you with this question : ‘ Are you the One who is to come , or should we wait for someone else ? ’ ”
42007021	At that time , Jesus healed many people of their sicknesses , diseases , and evil spirits , and he gave sight to many blind people .
42007022	Then Jesus answered John’s followers , “ Go tell John what you saw and heard here . The blind can see , the crippled can walk , and people with skin diseases are healed . The deaf can hear , the dead are raised to life , and the Good News is preached to the poor .
42007023	Those who do not stumble in their faith because of me are blessed ! ”
42007024	When John’s followers left , Jesus began talking to the people about John : “ What did you go out into the desert to see ? A reed blown by the wind ?
42007025	What did you go out to see ? A man dressed in fine clothes ? No , people who have fine clothes and much wealth live in kings’ palaces .
42007026	But what did you go out to see ? A prophet ? Yes , and I tell you , John is more than a prophet .
42007027	This was written about him : ‘ I will send my messenger ahead of you , who will prepare the way for you . ’
42007028	I tell you , John is greater than any other person ever born , but even the least important person in the kingdom of God is greater than John . ”
42007029	( When the people , including the tax collectors , heard this , they all agreed that God’s teaching was good , because they had been baptized by John .
42007030	But the Pharisees and experts on the law refused to accept God’s plan for themselves ; they did not let John baptize them . )
42007031	Then Jesus said , “ What shall I say about the people of this time ? What are they like ?
42007032	They are like children sitting in the marketplace , calling to one another and saying , ‘ We played music for you , but you did not dance ; we sang a sad song , but you did not cry . ’
42007033	John the Baptist came and did not eat bread or drink wine , and you say , ‘ He has a demon in him . ’
42007034	The Son of Man came eating and drinking , and you say , ‘ Look at him ! He eats too much and drinks too much wine , and he is a friend of tax collectors and sinners ! ’
42007035	But wisdom is proved to be right by what it does . ”
42007036	One of the Pharisees asked Jesus to eat with him , so Jesus went into the Pharisee’s house and sat at the table .
42007037	A sinful woman in the town learned that Jesus was eating at the Pharisee’s house . So she brought an alabaster jar of perfume
42007038	and stood behind Jesus at his feet , crying . She began to wash his feet with her tears , and she dried them with her hair , kissing them many times and rubbing them with the perfume .
42007039	When the Pharisee who asked Jesus to come to his house saw this , he thought to himself , “ If Jesus were a prophet , he would know that the woman touching him is a sinner ! ”
42007040	Jesus said to the Pharisee , “ Simon , I have something to say to you . ” Simon said , “ Teacher , tell me . ”
42007041	Jesus said , “ Two people owed money to the same banker . One owed five hundred coins and the other owed fifty .
42007042	They had no money to pay what they owed , but the banker told both of them they did not have to pay him . Which person will love the banker more ? ”
42007043	Simon , the Pharisee , answered , “ I think it would be the one who owed him the most money . ” Jesus said to Simon , “ You are right . ”
42007044	Then Jesus turned toward the woman and said to Simon , “ Do you see this woman ? When I came into your house , you gave me no water for my feet , but she washed my feet with her tears and dried them with her hair .
42007045	You gave me no kiss of greeting , but she has been kissing my feet since I came in .
42007046	You did not put oil on my head , but she poured perfume on my feet .
42007047	I tell you that her many sins are forgiven , so she showed great love . But the person who is forgiven only a little will love only a little . ”
42007048	Then Jesus said to her , “ Your sins are forgiven . ”
42007049	The people sitting at the table began to say among themselves , “ Who is this who even forgives sins ? ”
42007050	Jesus said to the woman , “ Because you believed , you are saved from your sins . Go in peace . ”
42008001	After this , while Jesus was traveling through some cities and small towns , he preached and told the Good News about God’s kingdom . The twelve apostles were with him ,
42008002	and also some women who had been healed of sicknesses and evil spirits : Mary , called Magdalene , from whom seven demons had gone out ;
42008003	Joanna , the wife of Cuza ( the manager of Herod’s house ) ; Susanna ; and many others . These women used their own money to help Jesus and his apostles .
42008004	When a great crowd was gathered , and people were coming to Jesus from every town , he told them this story :
42008005	“ A farmer went out to plant his seed . While he was planting , some seed fell by the road . People walked on the seed , and the birds ate it up .
42008006	Some seed fell on rock , and when it began to grow , it died because it had no water .
42008007	Some seed fell among thorny weeds , but the weeds grew up with it and choked the good plants .
42008008	And some seed fell on good ground and grew and made a hundred times more . ” As Jesus finished the story , he called out , “ Let those with ears use them and listen ! ”
42008009	Jesus’ followers asked him what this story meant .
42008010	Jesus said , “ You have been chosen to know the secrets about the kingdom of God . But I use stories to speak to other people so that : ‘ They will look , but they may not see . They will listen , but they may not understand . ’
42008011	“ This is what the story means : The seed is God’s message .
42008012	The seed that fell beside the road is like the people who hear God’s teaching , but the devil comes and takes it away from them so they cannot believe it and be saved .
42008013	The seed that fell on rock is like those who hear God’s teaching and accept it gladly , but they don’t allow the teaching to go deep into their lives . They believe for a while , but when trouble comes , they give up .
42008014	The seed that fell among the thorny weeds is like those who hear God’s teaching , but they let the worries , riches , and pleasures of this life keep them from growing and producing good fruit .
42008015	And the seed that fell on the good ground is like those who hear God’s teaching with good , honest hearts and obey it and patiently produce good fruit .
42008016	“ No one after lighting a lamp covers it with a bowl or hides it under a bed . Instead , the person puts it on a lampstand so those who come in will see the light .
42008017	Everything that is hidden will become clear , and every secret thing will be made known .
42008018	So be careful how you listen . Those who have understanding will be given more . But those who do not have understanding , even what they think they have will be taken away from them . ”
42008019	Jesus’ mother and brothers came to see him , but there was such a crowd they could not get to him .
42008020	Someone said to Jesus , “ Your mother and your brothers are standing outside , wanting to see you . ”
42008021	Jesus answered them , “ My mother and my brothers are those who listen to God’s teaching and obey it ! ”
42008022	One day Jesus and his followers got into a boat , and he said to them , “ Let’s go across the lake . ” And so they started across .
42008023	While they were sailing , Jesus fell asleep . A very strong wind blew up on the lake , causing the boat to fill with water , and they were in danger .
42008024	The followers went to Jesus and woke him , saying , “ Master ! Master ! We will drown ! ” Jesus got up and gave a command to the wind and the waves . They stopped , and it became calm .
42008025	Jesus said to his followers , “ Where is your faith ? ” The followers were afraid and amazed and said to each other , “ Who is this that commands even the wind and the water , and they obey him ? ”
42008026	Jesus and his followers sailed across the lake from Galilee to the area of the Gerasene people .
42008027	When Jesus got out on the land , a man from the town who had demons inside him came to Jesus . For a long time he had worn no clothes and had lived in the burial caves , not in a house .
42008028	When he saw Jesus , he cried out and fell down before him . He said with a loud voice , “ What do you want with me , Jesus , Son of the Most High God ? I beg you , don’t torture me ! ”
42008029	He said this because Jesus was commanding the evil spirit to come out of the man . Many times it had taken hold of him . Though he had been kept under guard and chained hand and foot , he had broken his chains and had been forced by the demon out into a lonely place .
42008030	Jesus asked him , “ What is your name ? ” He answered , “ Legion , ” because many demons were in him .
42008031	The demons begged Jesus not to send them into eternal darkness .
42008032	A large herd of pigs was feeding on a hill , and the demons begged Jesus to allow them to go into the pigs . So Jesus allowed them to do this .
42008033	When the demons came out of the man , they went into the pigs , and the herd ran down the hill into the lake and was drowned .
42008034	When the herdsmen saw what had happened , they ran away and told about this in the town and the countryside .
42008035	And people went to see what had happened . When they came to Jesus , they found the man sitting at Jesus’ feet , clothed and in his right mind , because the demons were gone . But the people were frightened .
42008036	The people who saw this happen told the others how Jesus had made the man well .
42008037	All the people of the Gerasene country asked Jesus to leave , because they were all very afraid . So Jesus got into the boat and went back to Galilee .
42008038	The man whom Jesus had healed begged to go with him , but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
42008039	“ Go back home and tell people how much God has done for you . ” So the man went all over town telling how much Jesus had done for him .
42008040	When Jesus got back to Galilee , a crowd welcomed him , because everyone was waiting for him .
42008041	A man named Jairus , a leader of the synagogue , came to Jesus and fell at his feet , begging him to come to his house .
42008042	Jairus’ only daughter , about twelve years old , was dying . While Jesus was on his way to Jairus’ house , the people were crowding all around him .
42008043	A woman was in the crowd who had been bleeding for twelve years , but no one was able to heal her .
42008044	She came up behind Jesus and touched the edge of his coat , and instantly her bleeding stopped .
42008045	Then Jesus said , “ Who touched me ? ” When all the people said they had not touched him , Peter said , “ Master , the people are all around you and are pushing against you . ”
42008046	But Jesus said , “ Someone did touch me , because I felt power go out from me . ”
42008047	When the woman saw she could not hide , she came forward , shaking , and fell down before Jesus . While all the people listened , she told why she had touched him and how she had been instantly healed .
42008048	Jesus said to her , “ Dear woman , you are made well because you believed . Go in peace . ”
42008049	While Jesus was still speaking , someone came from the house of the synagogue leader and said to him , “ Your daughter is dead . Don’t bother the teacher anymore . ”
42008050	When Jesus heard this , he said to Jairus , “ Don’t be afraid . Just believe , and your daughter will be well . ”
42008051	When Jesus went to the house , he let only Peter , John , James , and the girl’s father and mother go inside with him .
42008052	All the people were crying and feeling sad because the girl was dead , but Jesus said , “ Stop crying . She is not dead , only asleep . ”
42008053	The people laughed at Jesus because they knew the girl was dead .
42008054	But Jesus took hold of her hand and called to her , “ My child , stand up ! ”
42008055	Her spirit came back into her , and she stood up at once . Then Jesus ordered that she be given something to eat .
42008056	The girl’s parents were amazed , but Jesus told them not to tell anyone what had happened .
42009001	Jesus called the twelve apostles together and gave them power and authority over all demons and the ability to heal sicknesses .
42009002	He sent the apostles out to tell about God’s kingdom and to heal the sick .
42009003	He said to them , “ Take nothing for your trip , neither a walking stick , bag , bread , money , or extra clothes .
42009004	When you enter a house , stay there until it is time to leave .
42009005	If people do not welcome you , shake the dust off of your feet as you leave the town , as a warning to them . ”
42009006	So the apostles went out and traveled through all the towns , preaching the Good News and healing people everywhere .
42009007	Herod , the governor , heard about all the things that were happening and was confused , because some people said , “ John the Baptist has risen from the dead . ”
42009008	Others said , “ Elijah has come to us . ” And still others said , “ One of the prophets who lived long ago has risen from the dead . ”
42009009	Herod said , “ I cut off John’s head , so who is this man I hear such things about ? ” And Herod kept trying to see Jesus .
42009010	When the apostles returned , they told Jesus everything they had done . Then Jesus took them with him to a town called Bethsaida where they could be alone together .
42009011	But the people learned where Jesus went and followed him . He welcomed them and talked with them about God’s kingdom and healed those who needed to be healed .
42009012	Late in the afternoon , the twelve apostles came to Jesus and said , “ Send the people away . They need to go to the towns and countryside around here and find places to sleep and something to eat , because no one lives in this place . ”
42009013	But Jesus said to them , “ You give them something to eat . ” They said , “ We have only five loaves of bread and two fish , unless we go buy food for all these people . ”
42009014	( There were about five thousand men there . ) Jesus said to his followers , “ Tell the people to sit in groups of about fifty people . ”
42009015	So the followers did this , and all the people sat down .
42009016	Then Jesus took the five loaves of bread and two fish , and looking up to heaven , he thanked God for the food . Then he divided the food and gave it to the followers to give to the people .
42009017	They all ate and were satisfied , and what was left over was gathered up , filling twelve baskets .
42009018	One time when Jesus was praying alone , his followers were with him , and he asked them , “ Who do the people say I am ? ”
42009019	They answered , “ Some say you are John the Baptist . Others say you are Elijah . And others say you are one of the prophets from long ago who has come back to life . ”
42009020	Then Jesus asked , “ But who do you say I am ? ” Peter answered , “ You are the Christ from God . ”
42009021	Jesus warned them not to tell anyone , saying ,
42009022	“ The Son of Man must suffer many things . He will be rejected by the Jewish elders , the leading priests , and the teachers of the law . He will be killed and after three days will be raised from the dead . ”
42009023	Jesus said to all of them , “ If people want to follow me , they must give up the things they want . They must be willing to give up their lives daily to follow me .
42009024	Those who want to save their lives will give up true life . But those who give up their lives for me will have true life .
42009025	It is worthless to have the whole world if they themselves are destroyed or lost .
42009026	If people are ashamed of me and my teaching , then the Son of Man will be ashamed of them when he comes in his glory and with the glory of the Father and the holy angels .
42009027	I tell you the truth , some people standing here will see the kingdom of God before they die . ”
42009028	About eight days after Jesus said these things , he took Peter , John , and James and went up on a mountain to pray .
42009029	While Jesus was praying , the appearance of his face changed , and his clothes became shining white .
42009030	Then two men , Moses and Elijah , were talking with Jesus .
42009031	They appeared in heavenly glory , talking about his departure which he would soon bring about in Jerusalem .
42009032	Peter and the others were very sleepy , but when they awoke fully , they saw the glory of Jesus and the two men standing with him .
42009033	When Moses and Elijah were about to leave , Peter said to Jesus , “ Master , it is good that we are here . Let us make three tents — one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ” ( Peter did not know what he was talking about . )
42009034	While he was saying these things , a cloud came and covered them , and they became afraid as the cloud covered them .
42009035	A voice came from the cloud , saying , “ This is my Son , whom I have chosen . Listen to him ! ”
42009036	When the voice finished speaking , only Jesus was there . Peter , John , and James said nothing and told no one at that time what they had seen .
42009037	The next day , when they came down from the mountain , a large crowd met Jesus .
42009038	A man in the crowd shouted to him , “ Teacher , please come and look at my son , because he is my only child .
42009039	An evil spirit seizes my son , and suddenly he screams . It causes him to lose control of himself and foam at the mouth . The evil spirit keeps on hurting him and almost never leaves him .
42009040	I begged your followers to force the evil spirit out , but they could not do it . ”
42009041	Jesus answered , “ You people have no faith , and your lives are all wrong . How long must I stay with you and put up with you ? Bring your son here . ”
42009042	While the boy was coming , the demon threw him on the ground and made him lose control of himself . But Jesus gave a strong command to the evil spirit and healed the boy and gave him back to his father .
42009043	All the people were amazed at the great power of God . While everyone was wondering about all that Jesus did , he said to his followers ,
42009044	“ Don’t forget what I tell you now : The Son of Man will be handed over to people . ”
42009045	But the followers did not understand what this meant ; the meaning was hidden from them so they could not understand . But they were afraid to ask Jesus about it .
42009046	Jesus’ followers began to have an argument about which one of them was the greatest .
42009047	Jesus knew what they were thinking , so he took a little child and stood the child beside him .
42009048	Then Jesus said , “ Whoever accepts this little child in my name accepts me . And whoever accepts me accepts the One who sent me , because whoever is least among you all is really the greatest . ”
42009049	John answered , “ Master , we saw someone using your name to force demons out of people . We told him to stop , because he does not belong to our group . ”
42009050	But Jesus said to him , “ Don’t stop him , because whoever is not against you is for you . ”
42009051	When the time was coming near for Jesus to depart , he was determined to go to Jerusalem .
42009052	He sent some messengers ahead of him , who went into a town in Samaria to make everything ready for him .
42009053	But the people there would not welcome him , because he was set on going to Jerusalem .
42009054	When James and John , followers of Jesus , saw this , they said , “ Lord , do you want us to call fire down from heaven and destroy those people ? ”
42009055	But Jesus turned and scolded them . [ And Jesus said , “ You don’t know what kind of spirit you belong to .
42009056	The Son of Man did not come to destroy the souls of people but to save them . ” ] Then they went to another town .
42009057	As they were going along the road , someone said to Jesus , “ I will follow you any place you go . ”
42009058	Jesus said to them , “ The foxes have holes to live in , and the birds have nests , but the Son of Man has no place to rest his head . ”
42009059	Jesus said to another man , “ Follow me ! ” But he said , “ Lord , first let me go and bury my father . ”
42009060	But Jesus said to him , “ Let the people who are dead bury their own dead . You must go and tell about the kingdom of God . ”
42009061	Another man said , “ I will follow you , Lord , but first let me go and say good-bye to my family . ”
42009062	Jesus said , “ Anyone who begins to plow a field but keeps looking back is of no use in the kingdom of God . ”
42010001	After this , the Lord chose seventy-two others and sent them out in pairs ahead of him into every town and place where he planned to go .
42010002	He said to them , “ There are a great many people to harvest , but there are only a few workers . So pray to God , who owns the harvest , that he will send more workers to help gather his harvest .
42010003	Go now , but listen ! I am sending you out like sheep among wolves .
42010004	Don’t carry a purse , a bag , or sandals , and don’t waste time talking with people on the road .
42010005	Before you go into a house , say , ‘ Peace be with this house . ’
42010006	If peace-loving people live there , your blessing of peace will stay with them , but if not , then your blessing will come back to you .
42010007	Stay in the same house , eating and drinking what the people there give you . A worker should be given his pay . Don’t move from house to house .
42010008	If you go into a town and the people welcome you , eat what they give you .
42010009	Heal the sick who live there , and tell them , ‘ The kingdom of God is near you . ’
42010010	But if you go into a town , and the people don’t welcome you , then go into the streets and say ,
42010011	‘ Even the dirt from your town that sticks to our feet we wipe off against you . But remember that the kingdom of God is near . ’
42010012	I tell you , on the Judgment Day it will be better for the people of Sodom than for the people of that town .
42010013	“ How terrible for you , Korazin ! How terrible for you , Bethsaida ! If the miracles I did in you had happened in Tyre and Sidon , those people would have changed their lives long ago . They would have worn rough cloth and put ashes on themselves to show they had changed .
42010014	But on the Judgment Day it will be better for Tyre and Sidon than for you .
42010015	And you , Capernaum , will you be lifted up to heaven ? No ! You will be thrown down to the depths !
42010016	“ Whoever listens to you listens to me , and whoever refuses to accept you refuses to accept me . And whoever refuses to accept me refuses to accept the One who sent me . ”
42010017	When the seventy-two came back , they were very happy and said , “ Lord , even the demons obeyed us when we used your name ! ”
42010018	Jesus said , “ I saw Satan fall like lightning from heaven .
42010019	Listen , I have given you power to walk on snakes and scorpions , power that is greater than the enemy has . So nothing will hurt you .
42010020	But you should not be happy because the spirits obey you but because your names are written in heaven . ”
42010021	Then Jesus rejoiced in the Holy Spirit and said , “ I praise you , Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because you have hidden these things from the people who are wise and smart . But you have shown them to those who are like little children . Yes , Father , this is what you really wanted .
42010022	“ My Father has given me all things . No one knows who the Son is , except the Father . And no one knows who the Father is , except the Son and those whom the Son chooses to tell . ”
42010023	Then Jesus turned to his followers and said privately , “ You are blessed to see what you now see .
42010024	I tell you , many prophets and kings wanted to see what you now see , but they did not , and they wanted to hear what you now hear , but they did not . ”
42010025	Then an expert on the law stood up to test Jesus , saying , “ Teacher , what must I do to get life forever ? ”
42010026	Jesus said , “ What is written in the law ? What do you read there ? ”
42010027	The man answered , “ Love the Lord your God with all your heart , all your soul , all your strength , and all your mind . ” Also , “ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ”
42010028	Jesus said to him , “ Your answer is right . Do this and you will live . ”
42010029	But the man , wanting to show the importance of his question , said to Jesus , “ And who is my neighbor ? ”
42010030	Jesus answered , “ As a man was going down from Jerusalem to Jericho , some robbers attacked him . They tore off his clothes , beat him , and left him lying there , almost dead .
42010031	It happened that a priest was going down that road . When he saw the man , he walked by on the other side .
42010032	Next , a Levite came there , and after he went over and looked at the man , he walked by on the other side of the road .
42010033	Then a Samaritan traveling down the road came to where the hurt man was . When he saw the man , he felt very sorry for him .
42010034	The Samaritan went to him , poured olive oil and wine on his wounds , and bandaged them . Then he put the hurt man on his own donkey and took him to an inn where he cared for him .
42010035	The next day , the Samaritan brought out two coins , gave them to the innkeeper , and said , ‘ Take care of this man . If you spend more money on him , I will pay it back to you when I come again . ’ ”
42010036	Then Jesus said , “ Which one of these three men do you think was a neighbor to the man who was attacked by the robbers ? ”
42010037	The expert on the law answered , “ The one who showed him mercy . ” Jesus said to him , “ Then go and do what he did . ”
42010038	While Jesus and his followers were traveling , Jesus went into a town . A woman named Martha let Jesus stay at her house .
42010039	Martha had a sister named Mary , who was sitting at Jesus’ feet and listening to him teach .
42010040	But Martha was busy with all the work to be done . She went in and said , “ Lord , don’t you care that my sister has left me alone to do all the work ? Tell her to help me . ”
42010041	But the Lord answered her , “ Martha , Martha , you are worried and upset about many things .
42010042	Only one thing is important . Mary has chosen the better thing , and it will never be taken away from her . ”
42011001	One time Jesus was praying in a certain place . When he finished , one of his followers said to him , “ Lord , teach us to pray as John taught his followers . ”
42011002	Jesus said to them , “ When you pray , say : ‘ Father , may your name always be kept holy . May your kingdom come .
42011003	Give us the food we need for each day .
42011004	Forgive us for our sins , because we forgive everyone who has done wrong to us . And do not cause us to be tempted . ’ ”
42011005	Then Jesus said to them , “ Suppose one of you went to your friend’s house at midnight and said to him , ‘ Friend , loan me three loaves of bread .
42011006	A friend of mine has come into town to visit me , but I have nothing for him to eat . ’
42011007	Your friend inside the house answers , ‘ Don’t bother me ! The door is already locked , and my children and I are in bed . I cannot get up and give you anything . ’
42011008	I tell you , if friendship is not enough to make him get up to give you the bread , your boldness will make him get up and give you whatever you need .
42011009	So I tell you , ask , and God will give to you . Search , and you will find . Knock , and the door will open for you .
42011010	Yes , everyone who asks will receive . The one who searches will find . And everyone who knocks will have the door opened .
42011011	If your children ask for a fish , which of you would give them a snake instead ?
42011012	Or , if your children ask for an egg , would you give them a scorpion ?
42011013	Even though you are bad , you know how to give good things to your children . How much more your heavenly Father will give the Holy Spirit to those who ask him ! ”
42011014	One time Jesus was sending out a demon who could not talk . When the demon came out , the man who had been unable to speak , then spoke . The people were amazed .
42011015	But some of them said , “ Jesus uses the power of Beelzebul , the ruler of demons , to force demons out of people . ”
42011016	Other people , wanting to test Jesus , asked him to give them a sign from heaven .
42011017	But knowing their thoughts , he said to them , “ Every kingdom that is divided against itself will be destroyed . And a family that is divided against itself will not continue .
42011018	So if Satan is divided against himself , his kingdom will not continue . You say that I use the power of Beelzebul to force out demons .
42011019	But if I use the power of Beelzebul to force out demons , what power do your people use to force demons out ? So they will be your judges .
42011020	But if I use the power of God to force out demons , then the kingdom of God has come to you .
42011021	“ When a strong person with many weapons guards his own house , his possessions are safe .
42011022	But when someone stronger comes and defeats him , the stronger one will take away the weapons the first man trusted and will give away the possessions .
42011023	“ Anyone who is not with me is against me , and anyone who does not work with me is working against me .
42011024	“ When an evil spirit comes out of a person , it travels through dry places , looking for a place to rest . But when it finds no place , it says , ‘ I will go back to the house I left . ’
42011025	And when it comes back , it finds that house swept clean and made neat .
42011026	Then the evil spirit goes out and brings seven other spirits more evil than it is , and they go in and live there . So the person has even more trouble than before . ”
42011027	As Jesus was saying these things , a woman in the crowd called out to Jesus , “ Blessed is the mother who gave birth to you and nursed you . ”
42011028	But Jesus said , “ No , blessed are those who hear the teaching of God and obey it . ”
42011029	As the crowd grew larger , Jesus said , “ The people who live today are evil . They want to see a miracle for a sign , but no sign will be given them , except the sign of Jonah .
42011030	As Jonah was a sign for those people who lived in Nineveh , the Son of Man will be a sign for the people of this time .
42011031	On the Judgment Day the Queen of the South will stand up with the people who live now . She will show they are guilty , because she came from far away to listen to Solomon’s wise teaching . And I tell you that someone greater than Solomon is here .
42011032	On the Judgment Day the people of Nineveh will stand up with the people who live now , and they will show that you are guilty . When Jonah preached to them , they were sorry and changed their lives . And I tell you that someone greater than Jonah is here .
42011033	“ No one lights a lamp and puts it in a secret place or under a bowl , but on a lampstand so the people who come in can see .
42011034	Your eye is a light for the body . When your eyes are good , your whole body will be full of light . But when your eyes are evil , your whole body will be full of darkness .
42011035	So be careful not to let the light in you become darkness .
42011036	If your whole body is full of light , and none of it is dark , then you will shine bright , as when a lamp shines on you . ”
42011037	After Jesus had finished speaking , a Pharisee asked Jesus to eat with him . So Jesus went in and sat at the table .
42011038	But the Pharisee was surprised when he saw that Jesus did not wash his hands before the meal .
42011039	The Lord said to him , “ You Pharisees clean the outside of the cup and the dish , but inside you are full of greed and evil .
42011040	You foolish people ! The same one who made what is outside also made what is inside .
42011041	So give what is in your dishes to the poor , and then you will be fully clean .
42011042	How terrible for you Pharisees ! You give God one-tenth of even your mint , your rue , and every other plant in your garden . But you fail to be fair to others and to love God . These are the things you should do while continuing to do those other things .
42011043	How terrible for you Pharisees , because you love to have the most important seats in the synagogues , and you love to be greeted with respect in the marketplaces .
42011044	How terrible for you , because you are like hidden graves , which people walk on without knowing . ”
42011045	One of the experts on the law said to Jesus , “ Teacher , when you say these things , you are insulting us , too . ”
42011046	Jesus answered , “ How terrible for you , you experts on the law ! You make strict rules that are very hard for people to obey , but you yourselves don’t even try to follow those rules .
42011047	How terrible for you , because you build tombs for the prophets whom your ancestors killed !
42011048	And now you show that you approve of what your ancestors did . They killed the prophets , and you build tombs for them !
42011049	This is why in his wisdom God said , ‘ I will send prophets and apostles to them . They will kill some , and they will treat others cruelly . ’
42011050	So you who live now will be punished for the deaths of all the prophets who were killed since the beginning of the world —
42011051	from the killing of Abel to the killing of Zechariah , who died between the altar and the Temple . Yes , I tell you that you who are alive now will be punished for them all .
42011052	“ How terrible for you , you experts on the law . You have taken away the key to learning about God . You yourselves would not learn , and you stopped others from learning , too . ”
42011053	When Jesus left , the teachers of the law and the Pharisees began to give him trouble , asking him questions about many things ,
42011054	trying to catch him saying something wrong .
42012001	So many thousands of people had gathered that they were stepping on each other . Jesus spoke first to his followers , saying , “ Beware of the yeast of the Pharisees , because they are hypocrites .
42012002	Everything that is hidden will be shown , and everything that is secret will be made known .
42012003	What you have said in the dark will be heard in the light , and what you have whispered in an inner room will be shouted from the housetops .
42012004	“ I tell you , my friends , don’t be afraid of people who can kill the body but after that can do nothing more to hurt you .
42012005	I will show you the one to fear . Fear the one who has the power to kill you and also to throw you into hell . Yes , this is the one you should fear .
42012006	“ Five sparrows are sold for only two pennies , and God does not forget any of them .
42012007	But God even knows how many hairs you have on your head . Don’t be afraid . You are worth much more than many sparrows .
42012008	“ I tell you , all those who stand before others and say they believe in me , I , the Son of Man , will say before the angels of God that they belong to me .
42012009	But all who stand before others and say they do not believe in me , I will say before the angels of God that they do not belong to me .

42012014	But Jesus said to him , “ Who said I should judge or decide between you ? ”

42012017	He thought to himself , ‘ What will I do ? I have no place to keep all my crops . ’
42012018	Then he said , ‘ This is what I will do : I will tear down my barns and build bigger ones , and there I will store all my grain and other goods .
42012019	Then I can say to myself , “ I have enough good things stored to last for many years . Rest , eat , drink , and enjoy life ! ” ’
42012020	“ But God said to him , ‘ Foolish man ! Tonight your life will be taken from you . So who will get those things you have prepared for yourself ? ’
42012021	“ This is how it will be for those who store up things for themselves and are not rich toward God . ”

42012023	Life is more than food , and the body is more than clothes .
42012024	Look at the birds . They don’t plant or harvest , they don’t have storerooms or barns , but God feeds them . And you are worth much more than birds .
42012025	You cannot add any time to your life by worrying about it .
42012026	If you cannot do even the little things , then why worry about the big things ?
42012027	Consider how the lilies grow ; they don’t work or make clothes for themselves . But I tell you that even Solomon with his riches was not dressed as beautifully as one of these flowers .
42012028	God clothes the grass in the field , which is alive today but tomorrow is thrown into the fire . So how much more will God clothe you ? Don’t have so little faith !
42012029	Don’t always think about what you will eat or what you will drink , and don’t keep worrying .
42012030	All the people in the world are trying to get these things , and your Father knows you need them .
42012031	But seek God’s kingdom , and all your other needs will be met as well .
42012032	“ Don’t fear , little flock , because your Father wants to give you the kingdom .

42012034	Your heart will be where your treasure is .
42012035	“ Be dressed , ready for service , and have your lamps shining .

42012037	They will be blessed when their master comes home , because he sees that they were watching for him . I tell you the truth , the master will dress himself to serve and tell the servants to sit at the table , and he will serve them .
42012038	Those servants will be blessed when he comes in and finds them still waiting , even if it is midnight or later .
42012039	“ Remember this : If the owner of the house knew what time a thief was coming , he would not allow the thief to enter his house .

42012041	Peter said , “ Lord , did you tell this story to us or to all people ? ”

42012044	I tell you the truth , the master will choose that servant to take care of everything he owns .
42012045	But suppose the servant thinks to himself , ‘ My master will not come back soon , ’ and he begins to beat the other servants , men and women , and to eat and drink and get drunk .
42012046	The master will come when that servant is not ready and is not expecting him . Then the master will cut him in pieces and send him away to be with the others who don’t obey .
42012047	“ The servant who knows what his master wants but is not ready , or who does not do what the master wants , will be beaten with many blows !
42012048	But the servant who does not know what his master wants and does things that should be punished will be beaten with few blows . From everyone who has been given much , much will be demanded . And from the one trusted with much , much more will be expected .
42012049	“ I came to set fire to the world , and I wish it were already burning !

42012054	Then Jesus said to the people , “ When you see clouds coming up in the west , you say , ‘ It’s going to rain , ’ and it happens .
42012055	When you feel the wind begin to blow from the south , you say , ‘ It will be a hot day , ’ and it happens .

42012057	“ Why can’t you decide for yourselves what is right ?

42012059	I tell you , you will not get out of there until you have paid everything you owe . ”

42013007	So the man said to his gardener , ‘ I have been looking for fruit on this tree for three years , but I never find any . Cut it down . Why should it waste the ground ? ’
42013008	But the servant answered , ‘ Master , let the tree have one more year to produce fruit . Let me dig up the dirt around it and put on some fertilizer .
42013009	If the tree produces fruit next year , good . But if not , you can cut it down . ’ ”

42014006	And they could not answer him .

42014008	“ When someone invites you to a wedding feast , don’t take the most important seat , because someone more important than you may have been invited .

42015006	and goes home . He calls to his friends and neighbors and says , ‘ Be happy with me because I found my lost sheep . ’

42016001	Jesus also said to his followers , “ Once there was a rich man who had a manager to take care of his business . This manager was accused of cheating him .

42016003	The manager thought to himself , ‘ What will I do since my master is taking my job away from me ? I am not strong enough to dig ditches , and I am ashamed to beg .
42016004	I know what I’ll do so that when I lose my job people will welcome me into their homes . ’

42023023	But they continued to shout , demanding that Jesus be crucified . Their yelling became so loud that
42023024	Pilate decided to give them what they wanted .
42023025	He set free the man who was in jail for rioting and murder , and he handed Jesus over to them to do with him as they wished .
42023026	As they led Jesus away , Simon , a man from Cyrene , was coming in from the fields . They forced him to carry Jesus’ cross and to walk behind him .
42023027	A large crowd of people was following Jesus , including some women who were sad and crying for him .
42023028	But Jesus turned and said to them , “ Women of Jerusalem , don’t cry for me . Cry for yourselves and for your children .
42023029	The time is coming when people will say , ‘ Blessed are the women who cannot have children and who have no babies to nurse . ’
42023030	Then people will say to the mountains , ‘ Fall on us ! ’ And they will say to the hills , ‘ Cover us ! ’
42023031	If they act like this now when life is good , what will happen when bad times come ? ”
42023032	There were also two criminals led out with Jesus to be put to death .
42023033	When they came to a place called the Skull , the soldiers crucified Jesus and the criminals — one on his right and the other on his left .
42023034	Jesus said , “ Father , forgive them , because they don’t know what they are doing . ” The soldiers threw lots to decide who would get his clothes .
42023035	The people stood there watching . And the leaders made fun of Jesus , saying , “ He saved others . Let him save himself if he is God’s Chosen One , the Christ . ”
42023036	The soldiers also made fun of him , coming to Jesus and offering him some vinegar .
42023037	They said , “ If you are the king of the Jews , save yourself ! ”
42023038	At the top of the cross these words were written : this is the king of the jews .
42023039	One of the criminals on a cross began to shout insults at Jesus : “ Aren’t you the Christ ? Then save yourself and us . ”
42023040	But the other criminal stopped him and said , “ You should fear God ! You are getting the same punishment he is .
42023041	We are punished justly , getting what we deserve for what we did . But this man has done nothing wrong . ”
42023042	Then he said , “ Jesus , remember me when you come into your kingdom . ”
42023043	Jesus said to him , “ I tell you the truth , today you will be with me in paradise . ”
42023044	It was about noon , and the whole land became dark until three o’clock in the afternoon ,
42023045	because the sun did not shine . The curtain in the Temple was torn in two .
42023046	Jesus cried out in a loud voice , “ Father , I give you my life . ” After Jesus said this , he died .
42023047	When the army officer there saw what happened , he praised God , saying , “ Surely this was a good man ! ”
42023048	When all the people who had gathered there to watch saw what happened , they returned home , beating their chests because they were so sad .
42023049	But those who were close friends of Jesus , including the women who had followed him from Galilee , stood at a distance and watched .
42023050	There was a good and religious man named Joseph who was a member of the council .
42023051	But he had not agreed to the other leaders’ plans and actions against Jesus . He was from the town of Arimathea and was waiting for the kingdom of God to come .
42023052	Joseph went to Pilate to ask for the body of Jesus .
42023053	He took the body down from the cross , wrapped it in cloth , and put it in a tomb that was cut out of a wall of rock . This tomb had never been used before .
42023054	This was late on Preparation Day , and when the sun went down , the Sabbath day would begin .
42023055	The women who had come from Galilee with Jesus followed Joseph and saw the tomb and how Jesus’ body was laid .
42023056	Then the women left to prepare spices and perfumes . On the Sabbath day they rested , as the law of Moses commanded .
42024001	Very early on the first day of the week , at dawn , the women came to the tomb , bringing the spices they had prepared .
42024002	They found the stone rolled away from the entrance of the tomb ,
42024003	but when they went in , they did not find the body of the Lord Jesus .
42024004	While they were wondering about this , two men in shining clothes suddenly stood beside them .
42024005	The women were very afraid and bowed their heads to the ground . The men said to them , “ Why are you looking for a living person in this place for the dead ?
42024006	He is not here ; he has risen from the dead . Do you remember what he told you in Galilee ?
42024007	He said the Son of Man must be handed over to sinful people , be crucified , and rise from the dead on the third day . ”
42024008	Then the women remembered what Jesus had said .
42024009	The women left the tomb and told all these things to the eleven apostles and the other followers .
42024010	It was Mary Magdalene , Joanna , Mary the mother of James , and some other women who told the apostles everything that had happened at the tomb .
42024011	But they did not believe the women , because it sounded like nonsense .
42024012	But Peter got up and ran to the tomb . Bending down and looking in , he saw only the cloth that Jesus’ body had been wrapped in . Peter went away to his home , wondering about what had happened .
42024013	That same day two of Jesus’ followers were going to a town named Emmaus , about seven miles from Jerusalem .
42024014	They were talking about everything that had happened .
42024015	While they were talking and discussing , Jesus himself came near and began walking with them ,
42024016	but they were kept from recognizing him .
42024017	Then he said , “ What are these things you are talking about while you walk ? ” The two followers stopped , looking very sad .
42024018	The one named Cleopas answered , “ Are you the only visitor in Jerusalem who does not know what just happened there ? ”
42024019	Jesus said to them , “ What are you talking about ? ” They said , “ About Jesus of Nazareth . He was a prophet who said and did many powerful things before God and all the people .
42024020	Our leaders and the leading priests handed him over to be sentenced to death , and they crucified him .
42024021	But we were hoping that he would free Israel . Besides this , it is now the third day since this happened .
42024022	And today some women among us amazed us . Early this morning they went to the tomb ,
42024023	but they did not find his body there . They came and told us that they had seen a vision of angels who said that Jesus was alive !
42024024	So some of our group went to the tomb , too . They found it just as the women said , but they did not see Jesus . ”
42024025	Then Jesus said to them , “ You are foolish and slow to believe everything the prophets said .
42024026	They said that the Christ must suffer these things before he enters his glory . ”
42024027	Then starting with what Moses and all the prophets had said about him , Jesus began to explain everything that had been written about himself in the Scriptures .
42024028	They came near the town of Emmaus , and Jesus acted as if he were going farther .
42024029	But they begged him , “ Stay with us , because it is late ; it is almost night . ” So he went in to stay with them .
42024030	When Jesus was at the table with them , he took some bread , gave thanks , divided it , and gave it to them .
42024031	And then , they were allowed to recognize Jesus . But when they saw who he was , he disappeared .
42024032	They said to each other , “ It felt like a fire burning in us when Jesus talked to us on the road and explained the Scriptures to us . ”
42024033	So the two followers got up at once and went back to Jerusalem . There they found the eleven apostles and others gathered .
42024034	They were saying , “ The Lord really has risen from the dead ! He showed himself to Simon . ”
42024035	Then the two followers told what had happened on the road and how they recognized Jesus when he divided the bread .
42024036	While the two followers were telling this , Jesus himself stood right in the middle of them and said , “ Peace be with you . ”
42024037	They were fearful and terrified and thought they were seeing a ghost .
42024038	But Jesus said , “ Why are you troubled ? Why do you doubt what you see ?
42024039	Look at my hands and my feet . It is I myself ! Touch me and see , because a ghost does not have a living body as you see I have . ”
42024040	After Jesus said this , he showed them his hands and feet .
42024041	While they still could not believe it because they were amazed and happy , Jesus said to them , “ Do you have any food here ? ”
42024042	They gave him a piece of broiled fish .
42024043	While the followers watched , Jesus took the fish and ate it .
42024044	He said to them , “ Remember when I was with you before ? I said that everything written about me must happen — everything in the law of Moses , the books of the prophets , and the Psalms . ”
42024045	Then Jesus opened their minds so they could understand the Scriptures .
42024046	He said to them , “ It is written that the Christ would suffer and rise from the dead on the third day
42024047	and that a change of hearts and lives and forgiveness of sins would be preached in his name to all nations , starting at Jerusalem .
42024048	You are witnesses of these things .
42024049	I will send you what my Father has promised , but you must stay in Jerusalem until you have received that power from heaven . ”
42024050	Jesus led his followers as far as Bethany , and he raised his hands and blessed them .
42024051	While he was blessing them , he was separated from them and carried into heaven .
42024052	They worshiped him and returned to Jerusalem very happy .
42024053	They stayed in the Temple all the time , praising God .
43001001	In the beginning there was the Word . The Word was with God , and the Word was God .
43001002	He was with God in the beginning .
43001003	All things were made by him , and nothing was made without him .
43001004	In him there was life , and that life was the light of all people .
43001005	The Light shines in the darkness , and the darkness has not overpowered it .
43001006	There was a man named John who was sent by God .
43001007	He came to tell people the truth about the Light so that through him all people could hear about the Light and believe .
43001008	John was not the Light , but he came to tell people the truth about the Light .
43001009	The true Light that gives light to all was coming into the world !
43001010	The Word was in the world , and the world was made by him , but the world did not know him .
43001011	He came to the world that was his own , but his own people did not accept him .
43001012	But to all who did accept him and believe in him he gave the right to become children of God .
43001013	They did not become his children in any human way — by any human parents or human desire . They were born of God .
43001014	The Word became a human and lived among us . We saw his glory — the glory that belongs to the only Son of the Father — and he was full of grace and truth .
43001015	John tells the truth about him and cries out , saying , “ This is the One I told you about : ‘ The One who comes after me is greater than I am , because he was living before me . ’ ”
43001016	Because he was full of grace and truth , from him we all received one gift after another .
43001017	The law was given through Moses , but grace and truth came through Jesus Christ .
43001018	No one has ever seen God . But God the only Son is very close to the Father , and he has shown us what God is like .
43001019	Here is the truth John told when the leaders in Jerusalem sent priests and Levites to ask him , “ Who are you ? ”
43001020	John spoke freely and did not refuse to answer . He said , “ I am not the Christ . ”
43001021	So they asked him , “ Then who are you ? Are you Elijah ? ” He answered , “ No , I am not . ” “ Are you the Prophet ? ” they asked . He answered , “ No . ”
43001022	Then they said , “ Who are you ? Give us an answer to tell those who sent us . What do you say about yourself ? ”
43001023	John told them in the words of the prophet Isaiah : “ I am the voice of one calling out in the desert : ‘ Make the road straight for the Lord . ’ ”
43001024	Some Pharisees who had been sent asked John :
43001025	“ If you are not the Christ or Elijah or the Prophet , why do you baptize people ? ”
43001026	John answered , “ I baptize with water , but there is one here with you that you don’t know about .
43001027	He is the One who comes after me . I am not good enough to untie the strings of his sandals . ”
43001028	This all happened at Bethany on the other side of the Jordan River , where John was baptizing people .
43001029	The next day John saw Jesus coming toward him . John said , “ Look , the Lamb of God , who takes away the sin of the world !
43001030	This is the One I was talking about when I said , ‘ A man will come after me , but he is greater than I am , because he was living before me . ’
43001031	Even I did not know who he was , although I came baptizing with water so that the people of Israel would know who he is . ”
43001034	I have seen this happen , and I tell you the truth : This man is the Son of God . ”
43001035	The next day John was there again with two of his followers .
43001036	When he saw Jesus walking by , he said , “ Look , the Lamb of God ! ”
43001037	The two followers heard John say this , so they followed Jesus .
43001038	When Jesus turned and saw them following him , he asked , “ What are you looking for ? ” They said , “ Rabbi , where are you staying ? ” ( “ Rabbi ” means “ Teacher . ” )
43001039	He answered , “ Come and see . ” So the two men went with Jesus and saw where he was staying and stayed there with him that day . It was about four o’clock in the afternoon .
43001040	One of the two men who followed Jesus after they heard John speak about him was Andrew , Simon Peter’s brother .
43001041	The first thing Andrew did was to find his brother Simon and say to him , “ We have found the Messiah . ” ( “ Messiah ” means “ Christ . ” )
43001042	Then Andrew took Simon to Jesus . Jesus looked at him and said , “ You are Simon son of John . You will be called Cephas . ” ( “ Cephas ” means “ Peter . ” )
43001043	The next day Jesus decided to go to Galilee . He found Philip and said to him , “ Follow me . ”
43001044	Philip was from the town of Bethsaida , where Andrew and Peter lived .
43001045	Philip found Nathanael and told him , “ We have found the man that Moses wrote about in the law , and the prophets also wrote about him . He is Jesus , the son of Joseph , from Nazareth . ”
43001046	But Nathanael said to Philip , “ Can anything good come from Nazareth ? ” Philip answered , “ Come and see . ”
43001047	As Jesus saw Nathanael coming toward him , he said , “ Here is truly an Israelite . There is nothing false in him . ”
43001048	Nathanael asked , “ How do you know me ? ” Jesus answered , “ I saw you when you were under the fig tree , before Philip told you about me . ”
43001049	Then Nathanael said to Jesus , “ Teacher , you are the Son of God ; you are the King of Israel . ”
43001050	Jesus said to Nathanael , “ Do you believe simply because I told you I saw you under the fig tree ? You will see greater things than that . ”
43001051	And Jesus said to them , “ I tell you the truth , you will all see heaven open and ‘ angels of God going up and coming down ’ on the Son of Man . ”
43002001	Two days later there was a wedding in the town of Cana in Galilee . Jesus’ mother was there ,
43002002	and Jesus and his followers were also invited to the wedding .
43002003	When all the wine was gone , Jesus’ mother said to him , “ They have no more wine . ”
43002004	Jesus answered , “ Dear woman , why come to me ? My time has not yet come . ”
43002005	His mother said to the servants , “ Do whatever he tells you to do . ”
43002006	In that place there were six stone water jars that the Jews used in their washing ceremony . Each jar held about twenty or thirty gallons .
43002007	Jesus said to the servants , “ Fill the jars with water . ” So they filled the jars to the top .
43002008	Then he said to them , “ Now take some out and give it to the master of the feast . ” So they took the water to the master .
43002009	When he tasted it , the water had become wine . He did not know where the wine came from , but the servants who had brought the water knew . The master of the wedding called the bridegroom
43002010	and said to him , “ People always serve the best wine first . Later , after the guests have been drinking awhile , they serve the cheaper wine . But you have saved the best wine till now . ”
43002011	So in Cana of Galilee Jesus did his first miracle . There he showed his glory , and his followers believed in him .
43002012	After this , Jesus went to the town of Capernaum with his mother , brothers , and followers . They stayed there for just a few days .
43002013	When it was almost time for the Jewish Passover Feast , Jesus went to Jerusalem .
43002014	In the Temple he found people selling cattle , sheep , and doves . He saw others sitting at tables , exchanging different kinds of money .
43002015	Jesus made a whip out of cords and forced all of them , both the sheep and cattle , to leave the Temple . He turned over the tables and scattered the money of those who were exchanging it .
43002016	Then he said to those who were selling pigeons , “ Take these things out of here ! Don’t make my Father’s house a place for buying and selling ! ”
43002017	When this happened , the followers remembered what was written in the Scriptures : “ My strong love for your Temple completely controls me . ”
43002018	Some of his people said to Jesus , “ Show us a miracle to prove you have the right to do these things . ”
43002019	Jesus answered them , “ Destroy this temple , and I will build it again in three days . ”
43002020	They answered , “ It took forty-six years to build this Temple ! Do you really believe you can build it again in three days ? ”
43002021	( But the temple Jesus meant was his own body .
43002022	After Jesus was raised from the dead , his followers remembered that Jesus had said this . Then they believed the Scripture and the words Jesus had said . )
43002023	When Jesus was in Jerusalem for the Passover Feast , many people believed in him because they saw the miracles he did .
43002024	But Jesus did not believe in them because he knew them all .
43002025	He did not need anyone to tell him about people , because he knew what was in people’s minds .
43003001	There was a man named Nicodemus who was one of the Pharisees and an important Jewish leader .
43003002	One night Nicodemus came to Jesus and said , “ Teacher , we know you are a teacher sent from God , because no one can do the miracles you do unless God is with him . ”
43003003	Jesus answered , “ I tell you the truth , unless you are born again , you cannot be in God’s kingdom . ”
43003004	Nicodemus said , “ But if a person is already old , how can he be born again ? He cannot enter his mother’s womb again . So how can a person be born a second time ? ”
43003005	But Jesus answered , “ I tell you the truth , unless you are born from water and the Spirit , you cannot enter God’s kingdom .
43003006	Human life comes from human parents , but spiritual life comes from the Spirit .
43003007	Don’t be surprised when I tell you , ‘ You must all be born again . ’
43003008	The wind blows where it wants to and you hear the sound of it , but you don’t know where the wind comes from or where it is going . It is the same with every person who is born from the Spirit . ”
43003009	Nicodemus asked , “ How can this happen ? ”
43003010	Jesus said , “ You are an important teacher in Israel , and you don’t understand these things ?
43003011	I tell you the truth , we talk about what we know , and we tell about what we have seen , but you don’t accept what we tell you .
43003012	I have told you about things here on earth , and you do not believe me . So you will not believe me if I tell you about things of heaven .
43003013	The only one who has ever gone up to heaven is the One who came down from heaven — the Son of Man .
43003014	“ Just as Moses lifted up the snake in the desert , the Son of Man must also be lifted up .
43003015	So that everyone who believes can have eternal life in him .
43003016	“ God loved the world so much that he gave his one and only Son so that whoever believes in him may not be lost , but have eternal life .
43003017	God did not send his Son into the world to judge the world guilty , but to save the world through him .
43003018	People who believe in God’s Son are not judged guilty . Those who do not believe have already been judged guilty , because they have not believed in God’s one and only Son .
43003019	They are judged by this fact : The Light has come into the world , but they did not want light . They wanted darkness , because they were doing evil things .
43003020	All who do evil hate the light and will not come to the light , because it will show all the evil things they do .
43003021	But those who follow the true way come to the light , and it shows that the things they do were done through God . ”
43003022	After this , Jesus and his followers went into the area of Judea , where he stayed with his followers and baptized people .

43003024	( This was before John was put into prison . )

43003027	John answered , “ A man can get only what God gives him .
43003028	You yourselves heard me say , ‘ I am not the Christ , but I am the one sent to prepare the way for him . ’
43003029	The bride belongs only to the bridegroom . But the friend who helps the bridegroom stands by and listens to him . He is thrilled that he gets to hear the bridegroom’s voice . In the same way , I am really happy .
43003030	He must become greater , and I must become less important .

43004001	The Pharisees heard that Jesus was making and baptizing more followers than John ,
43004002	although Jesus himself did not baptize people , but his followers did .

43004005	In Samaria Jesus came to the town called Sychar , which is near the field Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
43004006	Jacob’s well was there . Jesus was tired from his long trip , so he sat down beside the well . It was about twelve o’clock noon .
43004007	When a Samaritan woman came to the well to get some water , Jesus said to her , “ Please give me a drink . ”
43004008	( This happened while Jesus’ followers were in town buying some food . )
43004009	The woman said , “ I am surprised that you ask me for a drink , since you are a Jewish man and I am a Samaritan woman . ” ( Jewish people are not friends with Samaritans . )
43004010	Jesus said , “ If you only knew the free gift of God and who it is that is asking you for water , you would have asked him , and he would have given you living water . ”
43004011	The woman said , “ Sir , where will you get this living water ? The well is very deep , and you have nothing to get water with .
43004012	Are you greater than Jacob , our father , who gave us this well and drank from it himself along with his sons and flocks ? ”
43004013	Jesus answered , “ Everyone who drinks this water will be thirsty again ,
43004014	but whoever drinks the water I give will never be thirsty . The water I give will become a spring of water gushing up inside that person , giving eternal life . ”
43004015	The woman said to him , “ Sir , give me this water so I will never be thirsty again and will not have to come back here to get more water . ”
43004016	Jesus told her , “ Go get your husband and come back here . ”
43004017	The woman answered , “ I have no husband . ” Jesus said to her , “ You are right to say you have no husband .

43004023	The time is coming when the true worshipers will worship the Father in spirit and truth , and that time is here already . You see , the Father too is actively seeking such people to worship him .
43004024	God is spirit , and those who worship him must worship in spirit and truth . ”
43004025	The woman said , “ I know that the Messiah is coming . ” ( Messiah is the One called Christ . ) “ When the Messiah comes , he will explain everything to us . ”
43004026	Then Jesus said , “ I am he — I , the one talking to you . ”
43004027	Just then his followers came back from town and were surprised to see him talking with a woman . But none of them asked , “ What do you want ? ” or “ Why are you talking with her ? ”
43004028	Then the woman left her water jar and went back to town . She said to the people ,
43004029	“ Come and see a man who told me everything I ever did . Do you think he might be the Christ ? ”
43004030	So the people left the town and went to see Jesus .
43004031	Meanwhile , his followers were begging him , “ Teacher , eat something . ”
43004032	But Jesus answered , “ I have food to eat that you know nothing about . ”
43004033	So the followers asked themselves , “ Did somebody already bring him food ? ”
43004034	Jesus said , “ My food is to do what the One who sent me wants me to do and to finish his work .
43004035	You have a saying , ‘ Four more months till harvest . ’ But I tell you , open your eyes and look at the fields ready for harvest now .
43004036	Already , the one who harvests is being paid and is gathering crops for eternal life . So the one who plants and the one who harvests celebrate at the same time .
43004037	Here the saying is true , ‘ One person plants , and another harvests . ’
43004038	I sent you to harvest a crop that you did not work on . Others did the work , and you get to finish up their work . ”
43004039	Many of the Samaritans in that town believed in Jesus because of what the woman said : “ He told me everything I ever did . ”

43004043	Two days later , Jesus left and went to Galilee .
43004044	( Jesus had said before that a prophet is not respected in his own country . )
43004045	When Jesus arrived in Galilee , the people there welcomed him . They had seen all the things he did at the Passover Feast in Jerusalem , because they had been there , too .
43004046	Jesus went again to visit Cana in Galilee where he had changed the water into wine . One of the king’s important officers lived in the city of Capernaum , and his son was sick .
43004047	When he heard that Jesus had come from Judea to Galilee , he went to Jesus and begged him to come to Capernaum and heal his son , because his son was almost dead .
43004048	Jesus said to him , “ You people must see signs and miracles before you will believe in me . ”
