43004050	Jesus answered , “ Go . Your son will live . ” The man believed what Jesus told him and went home .
43004051	On the way the man’s servants came and met him and told him , “ Your son is alive . ”
43004052	The man asked , “ What time did my son begin to get well ? ” They answered , “ Yesterday at one o’clock the fever left him . ”
43004053	The father knew that one o’clock was the exact time that Jesus had said , “ Your son will live . ” So the man and all the people who lived in his house believed in Jesus .
43004054	That was the second miracle Jesus did after coming from Judea to Galilee .
43005001	Later Jesus went to Jerusalem for a special feast .
43005002	In Jerusalem there is a pool with five covered porches , which is called Bethesda in the Hebrew language . This pool is near the Sheep Gate .
43005003	Many sick people were lying on the porches beside the pool . Some were blind , some were crippled , and some were paralyzed [ , and they waited for the water to move .
43005004	Sometimes an angel of the Lord came down to the pool and stirred up the water . After the angel did this , the first person to go into the pool was healed from any sickness he had ] .
43005005	A man was lying there who had been sick for thirty-eight years .
43005006	When Jesus saw the man and knew that he had been sick for such a long time , Jesus asked him , “ Do you want to be well ? ”
43005007	The sick man answered , “ Sir , there is no one to help me get into the pool when the water starts moving . While I am coming to the water , someone else always gets in before me . ”
43005008	Then Jesus said , “ Stand up . Pick up your mat and walk . ”
43005009	And immediately the man was well ; he picked up his mat and began to walk . The day this happened was a Sabbath day .
43005010	So the Jews said to the man who had been healed , “ Today is the Sabbath . It is against our law for you to carry your mat on the Sabbath day . ”
43005011	But he answered , “ The man who made me well told me , ‘ Pick up your mat and walk . ’ ”
43005012	Then they asked him , “ Who is the man who told you to pick up your mat and walk ? ”
43005013	But the man who had been healed did not know who it was , because there were many people in that place , and Jesus had left .
43005014	Later , Jesus found the man at the Temple and said to him , “ See , you are well now . Stop sinning so that something worse does not happen to you . ”
43005015	Then the man left and told his people that Jesus was the one who had made him well .
43005016	Because Jesus was doing this on the Sabbath day , some evil people began to persecute him .
43005017	But Jesus said to them , “ My Father never stops working , and so I keep working , too . ”
43005018	This made them try still harder to kill him . They said , “ First Jesus was breaking the law about the Sabbath day . Now he says that God is his own Father , making himself equal with God ! ”
43005019	But Jesus said , “ I tell you the truth , the Son can do nothing alone . The Son does only what he sees the Father doing , because the Son does whatever the Father does .
43005020	The Father loves the Son and shows the Son all the things he himself does . But the Father will show the Son even greater things than this so that you can all be amazed .
43005021	Just as the Father raises the dead and gives them life , so also the Son gives life to those he wants to .
43005022	In fact , the Father judges no one , but he has given the Son power to do all the judging
43005023	so that all people will honor the Son as much as they honor the Father . Anyone who does not honor the Son does not honor the Father who sent him .
43005024	“ I tell you the truth , whoever hears what I say and believes in the One who sent me has eternal life . That person will not be judged guilty but has already left death and entered life .
43005025	I tell you the truth , the time is coming and is already here when the dead will hear the voice of the Son of God , and those who hear will have life .
43005026	Life comes from the Father himself , and he has allowed the Son to have life in himself as well .
43005027	And the Father has given the Son the approval to judge , because he is the Son of Man .
43005028	Don’t be surprised at this : A time is coming when all who are dead and in their graves will hear his voice .
43005029	Then they will come out of their graves . Those who did good will rise and have life forever , but those who did evil will rise to be judged guilty .
43005030	“ I can do nothing alone . I judge only the way I am told , so my judgment is fair . I don’t try to please myself , but I try to please the One who sent me .
43005031	“ If only I tell people about myself , what I say is not true .
43005032	But there is another who tells about me , and I know that the things he says about me are true .
43005033	“ You have sent people to John , and he has told you the truth .
43005034	It is not that I need what humans say ; I tell you this so you can be saved .
43005035	John was like a burning and shining lamp , and you were happy to enjoy his light for a while .
43005036	“ But I have a proof about myself that is greater than that of John . The things I do , which are the things my Father gave me to do , prove that the Father sent me .
43005037	And the Father himself who sent me has given proof about me . You have never heard his voice or seen what he looks like .
43005038	His teaching does not live in you , because you don’t believe in the One the Father sent .
43005039	You carefully study the Scriptures because you think they give you eternal life . They do in fact tell about me ,
43005040	but you refuse to come to me to have that life .
43005041	“ I don’t need praise from people .
43005042	But I know you — I know that you don’t have God’s love in you .
43005043	I have come from my Father and speak for him , but you don’t accept me . But when another person comes , speaking only for himself , you will accept him .
43005044	You try to get praise from each other , but you do not try to get the praise that comes from the only God . So how can you believe ?
43005045	Don’t think that I will stand before the Father and say you are wrong . The one who says you are wrong is Moses , the one you hoped would save you .
43005046	If you really believed Moses , you would believe me , because Moses wrote about me .
43005047	But if you don’t believe what Moses wrote , how can you believe what I say ? ”
43006001	After this , Jesus went across Lake Galilee ( or , Lake Tiberias ) .
43006002	Many people followed him because they saw the miracles he did to heal the sick .
43006003	Jesus went up on a hill and sat down there with his followers .
43006004	It was almost the time for the Jewish Passover Feast .
43006005	When Jesus looked up and saw a large crowd coming toward him , he said to Philip , “ Where can we buy enough bread for all these people to eat ? ”
43006006	( Jesus asked Philip this question to test him , because Jesus already knew what he planned to do . )
43006007	Philip answered , “ Someone would have to work almost a year to buy enough bread for each person to have only a little piece . ”
43006008	Another one of his followers , Andrew , Simon Peter’s brother , said ,
43006009	“ Here is a boy with five loaves of barley bread and two little fish , but that is not enough for so many people . ”
43006010	Jesus said , “ Tell the people to sit down . ” There was plenty of grass there , and about five thousand men sat down there .
43006011	Then Jesus took the loaves of bread , thanked God for them , and gave them to the people who were sitting there . He did the same with the fish , giving as much as the people wanted .
43006012	When they had all had enough to eat , Jesus said to his followers , “ Gather the leftover pieces of fish and bread so that nothing is wasted . ”
43006013	So they gathered up the pieces and filled twelve baskets with the pieces left from the five barley loaves .
43006014	When the people saw this miracle that Jesus did , they said , “ He must truly be the Prophet who is coming into the world . ”
43006015	Jesus knew that the people planned to come and take him by force and make him their king , so he left and went into the hills alone .
43006016	That evening Jesus’ followers went down to Lake Galilee .
43006017	It was dark now , and Jesus had not yet come to them . The followers got into a boat and started across the lake to Capernaum .
43006018	By now a strong wind was blowing , and the waves on the lake were getting bigger .
43006019	When they had rowed the boat about three or four miles , they saw Jesus walking on the water , coming toward the boat . The followers were afraid ,
43006020	but Jesus said to them , “ It is I . Do not be afraid . ”
43006021	Then they were glad to take him into the boat . At once the boat came to land at the place where they wanted to go .
43006022	The next day the people who had stayed on the other side of the lake knew that Jesus had not gone in the boat with his followers but that they had left without him . And they knew that only one boat had been there .
43006023	But then some boats came from Tiberias and landed near the place where the people had eaten the bread after the Lord had given thanks .
43006024	When the people saw that Jesus and his followers were not there now , they got into boats and went to Capernaum to find Jesus .
43006025	When the people found Jesus on the other side of the lake , they asked him , “ Teacher , when did you come here ? ”
43006026	Jesus answered , “ I tell you the truth , you aren’t looking for me because you saw me do miracles . You are looking for me because you ate the bread and were satisfied .
43006027	Don’t work for the food that spoils . Work for the food that stays good always and gives eternal life . The Son of Man will give you this food , because on him God the Father has put his power . ”
43006028	The people asked Jesus , “ What are the things God wants us to do ? ”
43006029	Jesus answered , “ The work God wants you to do is this : Believe the One he sent . ”
43006030	So the people asked , “ What miracle will you do ? If we see a miracle , we will believe you . What will you do ?
43006031	Our ancestors ate the manna in the desert . This is written in the Scriptures : ‘ He gave them bread from heaven to eat . ’ ”
43006032	Jesus said , “ I tell you the truth , it was not Moses who gave you bread from heaven ; it is my Father who is giving you the true bread from heaven .
43006033	God’s bread is the One who comes down from heaven and gives life to the world . ”
43006034	The people said , “ Sir , give us this bread always . ”
43006035	Then Jesus said , “ I am the bread that gives life . Whoever comes to me will never be hungry , and whoever believes in me will never be thirsty .
43006036	But as I told you before , you have seen me and still don’t believe .
43006037	The Father gives me the people who are mine . Every one of them will come to me , and I will always accept them .
43006038	I came down from heaven to do what God wants me to do , not what I want to do .
43006039	Here is what the One who sent me wants me to do : I must not lose even one whom God gave me , but I must raise them all on the last day .
43006040	Those who see the Son and believe in him have eternal life , and I will raise them on the last day . This is what my Father wants . ”
43006041	Some people began to complain about Jesus because he said , “ I am the bread that comes down from heaven . ”
43006042	They said , “ This is Jesus , the son of Joseph . We know his father and mother . How can he say , ‘ I came down from heaven ’ ? ”
43006043	But Jesus answered , “ Stop complaining to each other .
43006044	The Father is the One who sent me . No one can come to me unless the Father draws him to me , and I will raise that person up on the last day .
43006045	It is written in the prophets , ‘ They will all be taught by God . ’ Everyone who listens to the Father and learns from him comes to me .
43006046	No one has seen the Father except the One who is from God ; only he has seen the Father .
43006047	I tell you the truth , whoever believes has eternal life .
43006048	I am the bread that gives life .
43006049	Your ancestors ate the manna in the desert , but still they died .
43006050	Here is the bread that comes down from heaven . Anyone who eats this bread will never die .
43006051	I am the living bread that came down from heaven . Anyone who eats this bread will live forever . This bread is my flesh , which I will give up so that the world may have life . ”
43006052	Then the evil people began to argue among themselves , saying , “ How can this man give us his flesh to eat ? ”
43006053	Jesus said , “ I tell you the truth , you must eat the flesh of the Son of Man and drink his blood . Otherwise , you won’t have real life in you .
43006054	Those who eat my flesh and drink my blood have eternal life , and I will raise them up on the last day .
43006055	My flesh is true food , and my blood is true drink .
43006056	Those who eat my flesh and drink my blood live in me , and I live in them .
43006057	The living Father sent me , and I live because of the Father . So whoever eats me will live because of me .
43006058	I am not like the bread your ancestors ate . They ate that bread and still died . I am the bread that came down from heaven , and whoever eats this bread will live forever . ”
43006059	Jesus said all these things while he was teaching in the synagogue in Capernaum .
43006060	When the followers of Jesus heard this , many of them said , “ This teaching is hard . Who can accept it ? ”
43006061	Knowing that his followers were complaining about this , Jesus said , “ Does this teaching bother you ?
43006062	Then will it also bother you to see the Son of Man going back to the place where he came from ?
43006063	It is the Spirit that gives life . The flesh doesn’t give life . The words I told you are spirit , and they give life .
43006064	But some of you don’t believe . ” ( Jesus knew from the beginning who did not believe and who would turn against him . )
43006065	Jesus said , “ That is the reason I said , ‘ If the Father does not bring a person to me , that one cannot come . ’ ”
43006066	After Jesus said this , many of his followers left him and stopped following him .
43006067	Jesus asked the twelve followers , “ Do you want to leave , too ? ”
43006068	Simon Peter answered him , “ Lord , who would we go to ? You have the words that give eternal life .
43006069	We believe and know that you are the Holy One from God . ”
43006070	Then Jesus answered , “ I chose all twelve of you , but one of you is a devil . ”
43006071	Jesus was talking about Judas , the son of Simon Iscariot . Judas was one of the twelve , but later he was going to turn against Jesus .
43007001	After this , Jesus traveled around Galilee . He did not want to travel in Judea , because some evil people there wanted to kill him .
43007002	It was time for the Feast of Shelters .
43007003	So Jesus’ brothers said to him , “ You should leave here and go to Judea so your followers there can see the miracles you do .
43007004	Anyone who wants to be well known does not hide what he does . If you are doing these things , show yourself to the world . ”
43007005	( Even Jesus’ brothers did not believe in him . )
43007006	Jesus said to his brothers , “ The right time for me has not yet come , but any time is right for you .
43007007	The world cannot hate you , but it hates me , because I tell it the evil things it does .
43007008	So you go to the feast . I will not go yet to this feast , because the right time for me has not yet come . ”
43007009	After saying this , Jesus stayed in Galilee .
43007010	But after Jesus’ brothers had gone to the feast , Jesus went also . But he did not let people see him .
43007011	At the feast some people were looking for him and saying , “ Where is that man ? ”
43007012	Within the large crowd there , many people were whispering to each other about Jesus . Some said , “ He is a good man . ” Others said , “ No , he fools the people . ”
43007013	But no one was brave enough to talk about Jesus openly , because they were afraid of the elders .
43007014	When the feast was about half over , Jesus went to the Temple and began to teach .
43007015	The people were amazed and said , “ This man has never studied in school . How did he learn so much ? ”
43007016	Jesus answered , “ The things I teach are not my own , but they come from him who sent me .
43007017	If people choose to do what God wants , they will know that my teaching comes from God and not from me .
43007018	Those who teach their own ideas are trying to get honor for themselves . But those who try to bring honor to the one who sent them speak the truth , and there is nothing false in them .
43007019	Moses gave you the law , but none of you obeys that law . Why are you trying to kill me ? ”
43007020	The people answered , “ A demon has come into you . We are not trying to kill you . ”
43007021	Jesus said to them , “ I did one miracle , and you are all amazed .
43007022	Moses gave you the law about circumcision . ( But really Moses did not give you circumcision ; it came from our ancestors . ) And yet you circumcise a baby boy on a Sabbath day .
43007023	If a baby boy can be circumcised on a Sabbath day to obey the law of Moses , why are you angry at me for healing a person’s whole body on the Sabbath day ?
43007024	Stop judging by the way things look , but judge by what is really right . ”
43007025	Then some of the people who lived in Jerusalem said , “ This is the man they are trying to kill .
43007026	But he is teaching where everyone can see and hear him , and no one is trying to stop him . Maybe the leaders have decided he really is the Christ .
43007027	But we know where this man is from . Yet when the real Christ comes , no one will know where he comes from . ”
43007028	Jesus , teaching in the Temple , cried out , “ Yes , you know me , and you know where I am from . But I have not come by my own authority . I was sent by the One who is true , whom you don’t know .
43007029	But I know him , because I am from him , and he sent me . ”
43007030	When Jesus said this , they tried to seize him . But no one was able to touch him , because it was not yet the right time .
43007031	But many of the people believed in Jesus . They said , “ When the Christ comes , will he do more miracles than this man has done ? ”
43007032	The Pharisees heard the crowd whispering these things about Jesus . So the leading priests and the Pharisees sent some Temple guards to arrest him .
43007033	Jesus said , “ I will be with you a little while longer . Then I will go back to the One who sent me .
43007034	You will look for me , but you will not find me . And you cannot come where I am . ”
43007035	Some people said to each other , “ Where will this man go so we cannot find him ? Will he go to the Greek cities where our people live and teach the Greek people there ?
43007036	What did he mean when he said , ‘ You will look for me , but you will not find me , ’ and ‘ You cannot come where I am ’ ? ”
43007037	On the last and most important day of the feast Jesus stood up and said in a loud voice , “ Let anyone who is thirsty come to me and drink .
43007038	If anyone believes in me , rivers of living water will flow out from that person’s heart , as the Scripture says . ”
43007039	Jesus was talking about the Holy Spirit . The Spirit had not yet been given , because Jesus had not yet been raised to glory . But later , those who believed in Jesus would receive the Spirit .
43007040	When the people heard Jesus’ words , some of them said , “ This man really is the Prophet . ”
43007041	Others said , “ He is the Christ . ” Still others said , “ The Christ will not come from Galilee .
43007042	The Scripture says that the Christ will come from David’s family and from Bethlehem , the town where David lived . ”
43007043	So the people did not agree with each other about Jesus .
43007044	Some of them wanted to arrest him , but no one was able to touch him .
43007045	The Temple guards went back to the leading priests and the Pharisees , who asked , “ Why didn’t you bring Jesus ? ”
43007046	The guards answered , “ The words he says are greater than the words of any other person who has ever spoken ! ”
43007047	The Pharisees answered , “ So Jesus has fooled you also !
43007048	Have any of the leaders or the Pharisees believed in him ? No !
43007049	But these people , who know nothing about the law , are under God’s curse . ”
43007050	Nicodemus , who had gone to see Jesus before , was in that group . He said ,
43007051	“ Our law does not judge a person without hearing him and knowing what he has done . ”
43007052	They answered , “ Are you from Galilee , too ? Study the Scriptures , and you will learn that no prophet comes from Galilee . ”
43007053	And everyone left and went home .
43008001	Jesus went to the Mount of Olives .
43008002	But early in the morning he went back to the Temple , and all the people came to him , and he sat and taught them .
43008003	The teachers of the law and the Pharisees brought a woman who had been caught in adultery . They forced her to stand before the people .
43008004	They said to Jesus , “ Teacher , this woman was caught having sexual relations with a man who is not her husband .
43008005	The law of Moses commands that we stone to death every woman who does this . What do you say we should do ? ”
43008006	They were asking this to trick Jesus so that they could have some charge against him . But Jesus bent over and started writing on the ground with his finger .
43008007	When they continued to ask Jesus their question , he raised up and said , “ Anyone here who has never sinned can throw the first stone at her . ”
43008008	Then Jesus bent over again and wrote on the ground .
43008009	Those who heard Jesus began to leave one by one , first the older men and then the others . Jesus was left there alone with the woman standing before him .
43008010	Jesus raised up again and asked her , “ Woman , where are they ? Has no one judged you guilty ? ”
43008011	She answered , “ No one , sir . ” Then Jesus said , “ I also don’t judge you guilty . You may go now , but don’t sin anymore . ” ] _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _
43008012	Later , Jesus talked to the people again , saying , “ I am the light of the world . The person who follows me will never live in darkness but will have the light that gives life . ”
43008013	The Pharisees said to Jesus , “ When you talk about yourself , you are the only one to say these things are true . We cannot accept what you say . ”
43008014	Jesus answered , “ Yes , I am saying these things about myself , but they are true . I know where I came from and where I am going . But you don’t know where I came from or where I am going .
43008015	You judge by human standards . I am not judging anyone .
43008016	But when I do judge , I judge truthfully , because I am not alone . The Father who sent me is with me .
43008017	Your own law says that when two witnesses say the same thing , you must accept what they say .
43008018	I am one of the witnesses who speaks about myself , and the Father who sent me is the other witness . ”
43008019	They asked , “ Where is your father ? ” Jesus answered , “ You don’t know me or my Father . If you knew me , you would know my Father , too . ”
43008020	Jesus said these things while he was teaching in the Temple , near where the money is kept . But no one arrested him , because the right time for him had not yet come .
43008021	Again , Jesus said to the people , “ I will leave you , and you will look for me , but you will die in your sins . You cannot come where I am going . ”
43008022	So the Jews asked , “ Will he kill himself ? Is that why he said , ‘ You cannot come where I am going ’ ? ”
43008023	Jesus said , “ You people are from here below , but I am from above . You belong to this world , but I don’t belong to this world .
43008024	So I told you that you would die in your sins . Yes , you will die in your sins if you don’t believe that I am he . ”
43008025	They asked , “ Then who are you ? ” Jesus answered , “ I am what I have told you from the beginning .
43008026	I have many things to say and decide about you . But I tell people only the things I have heard from the One who sent me , and he speaks the truth . ”
43008027	The people did not understand that he was talking to them about the Father .
43008028	So Jesus said to them , “ When you lift up the Son of Man , you will know that I am he . You will know that these things I do are not by my own authority but that I say only what the Father has taught me .
43008029	The One who sent me is with me . I always do what is pleasing to him , so he has not left me alone . ”
43008030	While Jesus was saying these things , many people believed in him .
43008031	So Jesus said to the Jews who believed in him , “ If you continue to obey my teaching , you are truly my followers .
43008032	Then you will know the truth , and the truth will make you free . ”
43008033	They answered , “ We are Abraham’s children , and we have never been anyone’s slaves . So why do you say we will be free ? ”
43008034	Jesus answered , “ I tell you the truth , everyone who lives in sin is a slave to sin .
43008035	A slave does not stay with a family forever , but a son belongs to the family forever .
43008036	So if the Son makes you free , you will be truly free .
43008037	I know you are Abraham’s children , but you want to kill me because you don’t accept my teaching .
43008038	I am telling you what my Father has shown me , but you do what your father has told you . ”
43008039	They answered , “ Our father is Abraham . ” Jesus said , “ If you were really Abraham’s children , you would do the things Abraham did .
43008040	I am a man who has told you the truth which I heard from God , but you are trying to kill me . Abraham did nothing like that .
43008041	So you are doing the things your own father did . ” But they said , “ We are not like children who never knew who their father was . God is our Father ; he is the only Father we have . ”
43008042	Jesus said to them , “ If God were really your Father , you would love me , because I came from God and now I am here . I did not come by my own authority ; God sent me .
43008043	You don’t understand what I say , because you cannot accept my teaching .
43008044	You belong to your father the devil , and you want to do what he wants . He was a murderer from the beginning and was against the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he tells a lie , he shows what he is really like , because he is a liar and the father of lies .
43008045	But because I speak the truth , you don’t believe me .
43008046	Can any of you prove that I am guilty of sin ? If I am telling the truth , why don’t you believe me ?
43008047	The person who belongs to God accepts what God says . But you don’t accept what God says , because you don’t belong to God . ”
43008048	They answered , “ We say you are a Samaritan and have a demon in you . Are we not right ? ”
43008049	Jesus answered , “ I have no demon in me . I give honor to my Father , but you dishonor me .
43008050	I am not trying to get honor for myself . There is One who wants this honor for me , and he is the judge .
43008051	I tell you the truth , whoever obeys my teaching will never die . ”
43008052	They said to Jesus , “ Now we know that you have a demon in you ! Even Abraham and the prophets died . But you say , ‘ Whoever obeys my teaching will never die . ’
43008053	Do you think you are greater than our father Abraham , who died ? And the prophets died , too . Who do you think you are ? ”
43008054	Jesus answered , “ If I give honor to myself , that honor is worth nothing . The One who gives me honor is my Father , and you say he is your God .
43008055	You don’t really know him , but I know him . If I said I did not know him , I would be a liar like you . But I do know him , and I obey what he says .
43008056	Your father Abraham was very happy that he would see my day . He saw that day and was glad . ”
43008057	They said to him , “ You have never seen Abraham ! You are not even fifty years old . ”
43008058	Jesus answered , “ I tell you the truth , before Abraham was even born , I am ! ”
43008059	When Jesus said this , the people picked up stones to throw at him . But Jesus hid himself , and then he left the Temple .
43009001	As Jesus was walking along , he saw a man who had been born blind .
43009002	His followers asked him , “ Teacher , whose sin caused this man to be born blind — his own sin or his parents’ sin ? ”
43009003	Jesus answered , “ It is not this man’s sin or his parents’ sin that made him blind . This man was born blind so that God’s power could be shown in him .
43009004	While it is daytime , we must continue doing the work of the One who sent me . Night is coming , when no one can work .
43009005	While I am in the world , I am the light of the world . ”
43009006	After Jesus said this , he spit on the ground and made some mud with it and put the mud on the man’s eyes .
43009007	Then he told the man , “ Go and wash in the Pool of Siloam . ” ( Siloam means Sent . ) So the man went , washed , and came back seeing .
43009008	The neighbors and some people who had earlier seen this man begging said , “ Isn’t this the same man who used to sit and beg ? ”
43009009	Some said , “ He is the one , ” but others said , “ No , he only looks like him . ” The man himself said , “ I am the man . ”
43009010	They asked , “ How did you get your sight ? ”
43009011	He answered , “ The man named Jesus made some mud and put it on my eyes . Then he told me to go to Siloam and wash . So I went and washed , and then I could see . ”
43009012	They asked him , “ Where is this man ? ” “ I don’t know , ” he answered .
43009013	Then the people took to the Pharisees the man who had been blind .
43009014	The day Jesus had made mud and healed his eyes was a Sabbath day .
43009015	So now the Pharisees asked the man , “ How did you get your sight ? ” He answered , “ He put mud on my eyes , I washed , and now I see . ”
43009016	So some of the Pharisees were saying , “ This man does not keep the Sabbath day , so he is not from God . ” But others said , “ A man who is a sinner can’t do miracles like these . ” So they could not agree with each other .
43009017	They asked the man again , “ What do you say about him since it was your eyes he opened ? ” The man answered , “ He is a prophet . ”
43009018	These leaders did not believe that he had been blind and could now see again . So they sent for the man’s parents
43009019	and asked them , “ Is this your son who you say was born blind ? Then how does he now see ? ”
43009020	His parents answered , “ We know that this is our son and that he was born blind .
43009021	But we don’t know how he can now see . We don’t know who opened his eyes . Ask him . He is old enough to speak for himself . ”
43009022	His parents said this because they were afraid of the elders , who had already decided that anyone who said Jesus was the Christ would be avoided .
43009023	That is why his parents said , “ He is old enough . Ask him . ”
43009024	So for the second time , they called the man who had been blind . They said , “ You should give God the glory by telling the truth . We know that this man is a sinner . ”
43009025	He answered , “ I don’t know if he is a sinner . One thing I do know : I was blind , and now I see . ”
43009026	They asked , “ What did he do to you ? How did he make you see again ? ”
43009027	He answered , “ I already told you , and you didn’t listen . Why do you want to hear it again ? Do you want to become his followers , too ? ”
43009028	Then they insulted him and said , “ You are his follower , but we are followers of Moses .
43009029	We know that God spoke to Moses , but we don’t even know where this man comes from . ”
43009030	The man answered , “ This is a very strange thing . You don’t know where he comes from , and yet he opened my eyes .
43009031	We all know that God does not listen to sinners , but he listens to anyone who worships and obeys him .
43009032	Nobody has ever heard of anyone giving sight to a man born blind .
43009033	If this man were not from God , he could do nothing . ”
43009034	They answered , “ You were born full of sin ! Are you trying to teach us ? ” And they threw him out .
43009035	When Jesus heard that they had thrown him out , Jesus found him and said , “ Do you believe in the Son of Man ? ”
43009036	He asked , “ Who is the Son of Man , sir , so that I can believe in him ? ”
43009037	Jesus said to him , “ You have seen him . The Son of Man is the one talking with you . ”
43009038	He said , “ Lord , I believe ! ” Then the man worshiped Jesus .
43009039	Jesus said , “ I came into this world so that the world could be judged . I came so that the blind would see and so that those who see will become blind . ”
43009040	Some of the Pharisees who were nearby heard Jesus say this and asked , “ Are you saying we are blind , too ? ”
43009041	Jesus said , “ If you were blind , you would not be guilty of sin . But since you keep saying you see , your guilt remains . ”
43010001	Jesus said , “ I tell you the truth , the person who does not enter the sheepfold by the door , but climbs in some other way , is a thief and a robber .
43010002	The one who enters by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
43010003	The one who guards the door opens it for him . And the sheep listen to the voice of the shepherd . He calls his own sheep by name and leads them out .
43010004	When he brings all his sheep out , he goes ahead of them , and they follow him because they know his voice .
43010005	But they will never follow a stranger . They will run away from him because they don’t know his voice . ”
43010006	Jesus told the people this story , but they did not understand what it meant .
43010007	So Jesus said again , “ I tell you the truth , I am the door for the sheep .
43010008	All the people who came before me were thieves and robbers . The sheep did not listen to them .
43010009	I am the door , and the person who enters through me will be saved and will be able to come in and go out and find pasture .
43010010	A thief comes to steal and kill and destroy , but I came to give life — life in all its fullness .
43010011	“ I am the good shepherd . The good shepherd gives his life for the sheep .
43010012	The worker who is paid to keep the sheep is different from the shepherd who owns them . When the worker sees a wolf coming , he runs away and leaves the sheep alone . Then the wolf attacks the sheep and scatters them .
43010013	The man runs away because he is only a paid worker and does not really care about the sheep .
43010014	“ I am the good shepherd . I know my sheep , and my sheep know me ,
43010015	just as the Father knows me , and I know the Father . I give my life for the sheep .
43010016	I have other sheep that are not in this flock , and I must bring them also . They will listen to my voice , and there will be one flock and one shepherd .
43010017	The Father loves me because I give my life so that I can take it back again .
43010018	No one takes it away from me ; I give my own life freely . I have the right to give my life , and I have the right to take it back . This is what my Father commanded me to do . ”
43010019	Again the leaders did not agree with each other because of these words of Jesus .
43010020	Many of them said , “ A demon has come into him and made him crazy . Why listen to him ? ”
43010021	But others said , “ A man who is crazy with a demon does not say things like this . Can a demon open the eyes of the blind ? ”
43010022	The time came for the Feast of Dedication at Jerusalem . It was winter ,
43010023	and Jesus was walking in the Temple in Solomon’s Porch .
43010024	Some people gathered around him and said , “ How long will you make us wonder about you ? If you are the Christ , tell us plainly . ”
43010025	Jesus answered , “ I told you already , but you did not believe . The miracles I do in my Father’s name show who I am .
43010026	But you don’t believe , because you are not my sheep .
43010027	My sheep listen to my voice ; I know them , and they follow me .
43010028	I give them eternal life , and they will never die , and no one can steal them out of my hand .
43010029	My Father gave my sheep to me . He is greater than all , and no person can steal my sheep out of my Father’s hand .
43010030	The Father and I are one . ”
43010031	Again some of the people picked up stones to kill Jesus .
43010032	But he said to them , “ I have done many good works from the Father . Which of these good works are you killing me for ? ”
43010033	They answered , “ We are not killing you because of any good work you did , but because you speak against God . You are only a human , but you say you are the same as God ! ”
43010034	Jesus answered , “ It is written in your law that God said , ‘ I said , you are gods . ’
43010035	This Scripture called those people gods who received God’s message , and Scripture is always true .
43010036	So why do you say that I speak against God because I said , ‘ I am God’s Son ’ ? I am the one God chose and sent into the world .
43010037	If I don’t do what my Father does , then don’t believe me .
43010038	But if I do what my Father does , even though you don’t believe in me , believe what I do . Then you will know and understand that the Father is in me and I am in the Father . ”
43010039	They tried to take Jesus again , but he escaped from them .
43010040	Then he went back across the Jordan River to the place where John had first baptized . Jesus stayed there ,
43010041	and many people came to him and said , “ John never did a miracle , but everything John said about this man is true . ”
43010042	And in that place many believed in Jesus .
43011001	A man named Lazarus was sick . He lived in the town of Bethany , where Mary and her sister Martha lived .
43011002	Mary was the woman who later put perfume on the Lord and wiped his feet with her hair . Mary’s brother was Lazarus , the man who was now sick .
43011003	So Mary and Martha sent someone to tell Jesus , “ Lord , the one you love is sick . ”
43011004	When Jesus heard this , he said , “ This sickness will not end in death . It is for the glory of God , to bring glory to the Son of God . ”
43011005	Jesus loved Martha and her sister and Lazarus .
43011006	But when he heard that Lazarus was sick , he stayed where he was for two more days .
43011007	Then Jesus said to his followers , “ Let’s go back to Judea . ”
43011008	The followers said , “ But Teacher , some people there tried to stone you to death only a short time ago . Now you want to go back there ? ”
43011009	Jesus answered , “ Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If anyone walks in the daylight , he will not stumble , because he can see by this world’s light .
43011010	But if anyone walks at night , he stumbles because there is no light to help him see . ”
43011011	After Jesus said this , he added , “ Our friend Lazarus has fallen asleep , but I am going there to wake him . ”
43011012	The followers said , “ But Lord , if he is only asleep , he will be all right . ”
43011013	Jesus meant that Lazarus was dead , but his followers thought he meant Lazarus was really sleeping .
43011014	So then Jesus said plainly , “ Lazarus is dead .
43011015	And I am glad for your sakes I was not there so that you may believe . But let’s go to him now . ”
43011016	Then Thomas ( the one called Didymus ) said to the other followers , “ Let us also go so that we can die with him . ”
43011017	When Jesus arrived , he learned that Lazarus had already been dead and in the tomb for four days .
43011018	Bethany was about two miles from Jerusalem .
43011019	Many of the Jews had come there to comfort Martha and Mary about their brother .
43011020	When Martha heard that Jesus was coming , she went out to meet him , but Mary stayed home .
43011021	Martha said to Jesus , “ Lord , if you had been here , my brother would not have died .
43011022	But I know that even now God will give you anything you ask . ”
43011023	Jesus said , “ Your brother will rise and live again . ”
43011024	Martha answered , “ I know that he will rise and live again in the resurrection on the last day . ”
43011025	Jesus said to her , “ I am the resurrection and the life . Those who believe in me will have life even if they die .
43011026	And everyone who lives and believes in me will never die . Martha , do you believe this ? ”
43011027	Martha answered , “ Yes , Lord . I believe that you are the Christ , the Son of God , the One coming to the world . ”
43011028	After Martha said this , she went back and talked to her sister Mary alone . Martha said , “ The Teacher is here and he is asking for you . ”
43011029	When Mary heard this , she got up quickly and went to Jesus .
43011030	Jesus had not yet come into the town but was still at the place where Martha had met him .
43011031	The Jews were with Mary in the house , comforting her . When they saw her stand and leave quickly , they followed her , thinking she was going to the tomb to cry there .
43011032	But Mary went to the place where Jesus was . When she saw him , she fell at his feet and said , “ Lord , if you had been here , my brother would not have died . ”
43011033	When Jesus saw Mary crying and the Jews who came with her also crying , he was upset and was deeply troubled .
43011034	He asked , “ Where did you bury him ? ” “ Come and see , Lord , ” they said .
43011035	Jesus cried .
43011036	So the Jews said , “ See how much he loved him . ”
43011037	But some of them said , “ If Jesus opened the eyes of the blind man , why couldn’t he keep Lazarus from dying ? ”
43011038	Again feeling very upset , Jesus came to the tomb . It was a cave with a large stone covering the entrance .
43011039	Jesus said , “ Move the stone away . ” Martha , the sister of the dead man , said , “ But , Lord , it has been four days since he died . There will be a bad smell . ”
43011040	Then Jesus said to her , “ Didn’t I tell you that if you believed you would see the glory of God ? ”
43011041	So they moved the stone away from the entrance . Then Jesus looked up and said , “ Father , I thank you that you heard me .
43011042	I know that you always hear me , but I said these things because of the people here around me . I want them to believe that you sent me . ”
43011043	After Jesus said this , he cried out in a loud voice , “ Lazarus , come out ! ”
43011044	The dead man came out , his hands and feet wrapped with pieces of cloth , and a cloth around his face . Jesus said to them , “ Take the cloth off of him and let him go . ”
43011045	Many of the people , who had come to visit Mary and saw what Jesus did , believed in him .
43011046	But some of them went to the Pharisees and told them what Jesus had done .
43011047	Then the leading priests and Pharisees called a meeting of the council . They asked , “ What should we do ? This man is doing many miracles .
43011048	If we let him continue doing these things , everyone will believe in him . Then the Romans will come and take away our Temple and our nation . ”
43011049	One of the men there was Caiaphas , the high priest that year . He said , “ You people know nothing !
43011050	You don’t realize that it is better for one man to die for the people than for the whole nation to be destroyed . ”
43011051	Caiaphas did not think of this himself . As high priest that year , he was really prophesying that Jesus would die for their nation
43011052	and for God’s scattered children to bring them all together and make them one .
43011053	That day they started planning to kill Jesus .
43011054	So Jesus no longer traveled openly among the people . He left there and went to a place near the desert , to a town called Ephraim and stayed there with his followers .
43011055	It was almost time for the Passover Feast . Many from the country went up to Jerusalem before the Passover to do the special things to make themselves pure .
43011056	The people looked for Jesus and stood in the Temple asking each other , “ Is he coming to the Feast ? What do you think ? ”
43011057	But the leading priests and the Pharisees had given orders that if anyone knew where Jesus was , he must tell them . Then they could arrest him .
43012001	Six days before the Passover Feast , Jesus went to Bethany , where Lazarus lived . ( Lazarus is the man Jesus raised from the dead . )
43012002	There they had a dinner for Jesus . Martha served the food , and Lazarus was one of the people eating with Jesus .
43012003	Mary brought in a pint of very expensive perfume made from pure nard . She poured the perfume on Jesus’ feet , and then she wiped his feet with her hair . And the sweet smell from the perfume filled the whole house .
43012004	Judas Iscariot , one of Jesus’ followers who would later turn against him , was there . Judas said ,
43012005	“ This perfume was worth an entire year’s wages . Why wasn’t it sold and the money given to the poor ? ”
43012006	But Judas did not really care about the poor ; he said this because he was a thief . He was the one who kept the money box , and he often stole from it .
43012007	Jesus answered , “ Leave her alone . It was right for her to save this perfume for today , the day for me to be prepared for burial .
43012008	You will always have the poor with you , but you will not always have me . ”
43012009	A large crowd of people heard that Jesus was in Bethany . So they went there to see not only Jesus but Lazarus , whom Jesus raised from the dead .
43012010	So the leading priests made plans to kill Lazarus , too .
43012011	Because of Lazarus many of the Jews were leaving them and believing in Jesus .
43012012	The next day a great crowd who had come to Jerusalem for the Passover Feast heard that Jesus was coming there .
43012013	So they took branches of palm trees and went out to meet Jesus , shouting , “ Praise God ! God bless the One who comes in the name of the Lord ! God bless the King of Israel ! ”
43012014	Jesus found a colt and sat on it . This was as the Scripture says ,
43012015	“ Don’t be afraid , people of Jerusalem ! Your king is coming , sitting on the colt of a donkey . ”
43012016	The followers of Jesus did not understand this at first . But after Jesus was raised to glory , they remembered that this had been written about him and that they had done these things to him .
43012017	There had been many people with Jesus when he raised Lazarus from the dead and told him to come out of the tomb . Now they were telling others about what Jesus did .
43012018	Many people went out to meet Jesus , because they had heard about this miracle .
43012019	So the Pharisees said to each other , “ You can see that nothing is going right for us . Look ! The whole world is following him . ”
43012020	There were some Greek people , too , who came to Jerusalem to worship at the Passover Feast .
43012021	They went to Philip , who was from Bethsaida in Galilee , and said , “ Sir , we would like to see Jesus . ”
43012022	Philip told Andrew , and then Andrew and Philip told Jesus .
43012023	Jesus said to them , “ The time has come for the Son of Man to receive his glory .
43012024	I tell you the truth , a grain of wheat must fall to the ground and die to make many seeds . But if it never dies , it remains only a single seed .
43012025	Those who love their lives will lose them , but those who hate their lives in this world will keep true life forever .
43012026	Whoever serves me must follow me . Then my servant will be with me everywhere I am . My Father will honor anyone who serves me .
43012027	“ Now I am very troubled . Should I say , ‘ Father , save me from this time ’ ? No , I came to this time so I could suffer .
43012028	Father , bring glory to your name ! ” Then a voice came from heaven , “ I have brought glory to it , and I will do it again . ”
43012029	The crowd standing there , who heard the voice , said it was thunder . But others said , “ An angel has spoken to him . ”
43012030	Jesus said , “ That voice was for your sake , not mine .
43012031	Now is the time for the world to be judged ; now the ruler of this world will be thrown down .
43012032	If I am lifted up from the earth , I will draw all people toward me . ”
43012033	Jesus said this to show how he would die .
43012034	The crowd said , “ We have heard from the law that the Christ will live forever . So why do you say , ‘ The Son of Man must be lifted up ’ ? Who is this ‘ Son of Man ’ ? ”
43012035	Then Jesus said , “ The light will be with you for a little longer , so walk while you have the light . Then the darkness will not catch you . If you walk in the darkness , you will not know where you are going .
43012036	Believe in the light while you still have it so that you will become children of light . ” When Jesus had said this , he left and hid himself from them .
43012037	Though Jesus had done many miracles in front of the people , they still did not believe in him .
43012038	This was to bring about what Isaiah the prophet had said : “ Lord , who believed what we told them ? Who saw the Lord’s power in this ? ”
43012039	This is why the people could not believe : Isaiah also had said ,
43012040	“ He has blinded their eyes , and he has closed their minds . Otherwise they would see with their eyes and understand in their minds and come back to me and be healed . ”
43012041	Isaiah said this because he saw Jesus’ glory and spoke about him .
43012042	But many believed in Jesus , even many of the leaders . But because of the Pharisees , they did not say they believed in him for fear they would be put out of the synagogue .
43012043	They loved praise from people more than praise from God .
43012044	Then Jesus cried out , “ Whoever believes in me is really believing in the One who sent me .
43012045	Whoever sees me sees the One who sent me .
43012046	I have come as light into the world so that whoever believes in me would not stay in darkness .
43012047	“ Anyone who hears my words and does not obey them , I do not judge , because I did not come to judge the world , but to save the world .
43012048	There is a judge for those who refuse to believe in me and do not accept my words . The word I have taught will be their judge on the last day .
43012049	The things I taught were not from myself . The Father who sent me told me what to say and what to teach .
43012050	And I know that eternal life comes from what the Father commands . So whatever I say is what the Father told me to say . ”
43013001	It was almost time for the Passover Feast . Jesus knew that it was time for him to leave this world and go back to the Father . He had always loved those who were his own in the world , and he loved them all the way to the end .
43013002	Jesus and his followers were at the evening meal . The devil had already persuaded Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon , to turn against Jesus .
43013003	Jesus knew that the Father had given him power over everything and that he had come from God and was going back to God .
43013004	So during the meal Jesus stood up and took off his outer clothing . Taking a towel , he wrapped it around his waist .
43013005	Then he poured water into a bowl and began to wash the followers’ feet , drying them with the towel that was wrapped around him .
43013006	Jesus came to Simon Peter , who said to him , “ Lord , are you going to wash my feet ? ”
43013007	Jesus answered , “ You don’t understand now what I am doing , but you will understand later . ”
43013008	Peter said , “ No , you will never wash my feet . ” Jesus answered , “ If I don’t wash your feet , you are not one of my people . ”
43013009	Simon Peter answered , “ Lord , then wash not only my feet , but wash my hands and my head , too ! ”
43013010	Jesus said , “ After a person has had a bath , his whole body is clean . He needs only to wash his feet . And you men are clean , but not all of you . ”
43013011	Jesus knew who would turn against him , and that is why he said , “ Not all of you are clean . ”
43013012	When he had finished washing their feet , he put on his clothes and sat down again . He asked , “ Do you understand what I have just done for you ?
43013013	You call me ‘ Teacher ’ and ‘ Lord , ’ and you are right , because that is what I am .
43013014	If I , your Lord and Teacher , have washed your feet , you also should wash each other’s feet .
43013015	I did this as an example so that you should do as I have done for you .
43013016	I tell you the truth , a servant is not greater than his master . A messenger is not greater than the one who sent him .
43013017	If you know these things , you will be blessed if you do them .
43013018	“ I am not talking about all of you . I know those I have chosen . But this is to bring about what the Scripture said : ‘ The man who ate at my table has turned against me . ’
43013019	I am telling you this now before it happens so that when it happens , you will believe that I am he .
43013020	I tell you the truth , whoever accepts anyone I send also accepts me . And whoever accepts me also accepts the One who sent me . ”
43013021	After Jesus said this , he was very troubled . He said openly , “ I tell you the truth , one of you will turn against me . ”
43013022	The followers all looked at each other , because they did not know whom Jesus was talking about .
43013023	One of the followers sitting next to Jesus was the follower Jesus loved .
43013024	Simon Peter motioned to him to ask Jesus whom he was talking about .
43013025	That follower leaned closer to Jesus and asked , “ Lord , who is it ? ”
43013026	Jesus answered , “ I will dip this bread into the dish . The man I give it to is the man who will turn against me . ” So Jesus took a piece of bread , dipped it , and gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
43013027	As soon as Judas took the bread , Satan entered him . Jesus said to him , “ The thing that you will do — do it quickly . ”
43013028	No one at the table understood why Jesus said this to Judas .
43013029	Since he was the one who kept the money box , some of the followers thought Jesus was telling him to buy what was needed for the feast or to give something to the poor .
43013030	Judas took the bread Jesus gave him and immediately went out . It was night .
43013031	When Judas was gone , Jesus said , “ Now the Son of Man receives his glory , and God receives glory through him .
43013032	If God receives glory through him , then God will give glory to the Son through himself . And God will give him glory quickly . ”
43013033	Jesus said , “ My children , I will be with you only a little longer . You will look for me , and what I told the Jews , I tell you now : Where I am going you cannot come .

43013035	All people will know that you are my followers if you love each other . ”
43013036	Simon Peter asked Jesus , “ Lord , where are you going ? ” Jesus answered , “ Where I am going you cannot follow now , but you will follow later . ”
43013037	Peter asked , “ Lord , why can’t I follow you now ? I am ready to die for you ! ”
43013038	Jesus answered , “ Are you ready to die for me ? I tell you the truth , before the rooster crows , you will say three times that you don’t know me . ”
43014001	Jesus said , “ Don’t let your hearts be troubled . Trust in God , and trust in me .
43014002	There are many rooms in my Father’s house ; I would not tell you this if it were not true . I am going there to prepare a place for you .

43014006	Jesus answered , “ I am the way , and the truth , and the life . The only way to the Father is through me .

43014008	Philip said to him , “ Lord , show us the Father . That is all we need . ”

43014010	Don’t you believe that I am in the Father and the Father is in me ? The words I say to you don’t come from me , but the Father lives in me and does his own work .
43014011	Believe me when I say that I am in the Father and the Father is in me . Or believe because of the miracles I have done .

43014017	the Spirit of truth . The world cannot accept him , because it does not see him or know him . But you know him , because he lives with you and he will be in you .

43014020	On that day you will know that I am in my Father , and that you are in me and I am in you .
43014021	Those who know my commands and obey them are the ones who love me , and my Father will love those who love me . I will love them and will show myself to them . ”
43014022	Then Judas ( not Judas Iscariot ) said , “ But , Lord , why do you plan to show yourself to us and not to the rest of the world ? ”
43014023	Jesus answered , “ If people love me , they will obey my teaching . My Father will love them , and we will come to them and make our home with them .
43014024	Those who do not love me do not obey my teaching . This teaching that you hear is not really mine ; it is from my Father , who sent me .
43014025	“ I have told you all these things while I am with you .
43014026	But the Helper will teach you everything and will cause you to remember all that I told you . This Helper is the Holy Spirit whom the Father will send in my name .
43014027	“ I leave you peace ; my peace I give you . I do not give it to you as the world does . So don’t let your hearts be troubled or afraid .
43014028	You heard me say to you , ‘ I am going , but I am coming back to you . ’ If you loved me , you should be happy that I am going back to the Father , because he is greater than I am .
43014029	I have told you this now , before it happens , so that when it happens , you will believe .
43014030	I will not talk with you much longer , because the ruler of this world is coming . He has no power over me ,
43014031	but the world must know that I love the Father , so I do exactly what the Father told me to do . “ Come now , let us go .
43015001	“ I am the true vine ; my Father is the gardener .
43015002	He cuts off every branch of mine that does not produce fruit . And he trims and cleans every branch that produces fruit so that it will produce even more fruit .
43015003	You are already clean because of the words I have spoken to you .
43015004	Remain in me , and I will remain in you . A branch cannot produce fruit alone but must remain in the vine . In the same way , you cannot produce fruit alone but must remain in me .
43015005	“ I am the vine , and you are the branches . If any remain in me and I remain in them , they produce much fruit . But without me they can do nothing .
43015006	If any do not remain in me , they are like a branch that is thrown away and then dies . People pick up dead branches , throw them into the fire , and burn them .
43015007	If you remain in me and follow my teachings , you can ask anything you want , and it will be given to you .
43015008	You should produce much fruit and show that you are my followers , which brings glory to my Father .
43015009	I loved you as the Father loved me . Now remain in my love .
43015010	I have obeyed my Father’s commands , and I remain in his love . In the same way , if you obey my commands , you will remain in my love .
43015011	I have told you these things so that you can have the same joy I have and so that your joy will be the fullest possible joy .
43015012	“ This is my command : Love each other as I have loved you .
43015013	The greatest love a person can show is to die for his friends .
43015014	You are my friends if you do what I command you .
43015015	I no longer call you servants , because a servant does not know what his master is doing . But I call you friends , because I have made known to you everything I heard from my Father .
43015016	You did not choose me ; I chose you . And I gave you this work : to go and produce fruit , fruit that will last . Then the Father will give you anything you ask for in my name .
43015017	This is my command : Love each other .
43015018	“ If the world hates you , remember that it hated me first .
43015019	If you belonged to the world , it would love you as it loves its own . But I have chosen you out of the world , so you don’t belong to it . That is why the world hates you .
43015020	Remember what I told you : A servant is not greater than his master . If people did wrong to me , they will do wrong to you , too . And if they obeyed my teaching , they will obey yours , too .
43015021	They will do all this to you on account of me , because they do not know the One who sent me .
43015022	If I had not come and spoken to them , they would not be guilty of sin , but now they have no excuse for their sin .
43015023	Whoever hates me also hates my Father .
43015024	I did works among them that no one else has ever done . If I had not done these works , they would not be guilty of sin . But now they have seen what I have done , and yet they have hated both me and my Father .
43015025	But this happened so that what is written in their law would be true : ‘ They hated me for no reason . ’
43015026	“ I will send you the Helper from the Father ; he is the Spirit of truth who comes from the Father . When he comes , he will tell about me ,
43015027	and you also must tell people about me , because you have been with me from the beginning .
43016001	“ I have told you these things to keep you from giving up .
43016002	People will put you out of their synagogues . Yes , the time is coming when those who kill you will think they are offering service to God .
43016003	They will do this because they have not known the Father and they have not known me .
43016004	I have told you these things now so that when the time comes you will remember that I warned you . “ I did not tell you these things at the beginning , because I was with you then .
43016005	Now I am going back to the One who sent me . But none of you asks me , ‘ Where are you going ? ’
43016006	Your hearts are filled with sadness because I have told you these things .
43016007	But I tell you the truth , it is better for you that I go away . When I go away , I will send the Helper to you . If I do not go away , the Helper will not come .
43016008	When the Helper comes , he will prove to the people of the world the truth about sin , about being right with God , and about judgment .
43016009	He will prove to them that sin is not believing in me .
43016010	He will prove to them that being right with God comes from my going to the Father and not being seen anymore .
43016011	And the Helper will prove to them that judgment happened when the ruler of this world was judged .
43016012	“ I have many more things to say to you , but they are too much for you now .
43016013	But when the Spirit of truth comes , he will lead you into all truth . He will not speak his own words , but he will speak only what he hears , and he will tell you what is to come .
43016014	The Spirit of truth will bring glory to me , because he will take what I have to say and tell it to you .
43016015	All that the Father has is mine . That is why I said that the Spirit will take what I have to say and tell it to you .
43016016	“ After a little while you will not see me , and then after a little while you will see me again . ”
43016017	Some of the followers said to each other , “ What does Jesus mean when he says , ‘ After a little while you will not see me , and then after a little while you will see me again ’ ? And what does he mean when he says , ‘ Because I am going to the Father ’ ? ”
43016018	They also asked , “ What does he mean by ‘ a little while ’ ? We don’t understand what he is saying . ”
43016019	Jesus saw that the followers wanted to ask him about this , so he said to them , “ Are you asking each other what I meant when I said , ‘ After a little while you will not see me , and then after a little while you will see me again ’ ?
43016020	I tell you the truth , you will cry and be sad , but the world will be happy . You will be sad , but your sadness will become joy .
43016021	When a woman gives birth to a baby , she has pain , because her time has come . But when her baby is born , she forgets the pain , because she is so happy that a child has been born into the world .
43016022	It is the same with you . Now you are sad , but I will see you again and you will be happy , and no one will take away your joy .
43016023	In that day you will not ask me for anything . I tell you the truth , my Father will give you anything you ask for in my name .
43016024	Until now you have not asked for anything in my name . Ask and you will receive , so that your joy will be the fullest possible joy .
43016025	“ I have told you these things indirectly in stories . But the time will come when I will not use stories like that to tell you things ; I will speak to you in plain words about the Father .
43016026	In that day you will ask the Father for things in my name . I mean , I will not need to ask the Father for you .
43016027	The Father himself loves you . He loves you because you loved me and believed that I came from God .
43016028	I came from the Father into the world . Now I am leaving the world and going back to the Father . ”
43016029	Then the followers of Jesus said , “ You are speaking clearly to us now and are not using stories that are hard to understand .
43016030	We can see now that you know all things . You can answer a person’s question even before it is asked . This makes us believe you came from God . ”
43016031	Jesus answered , “ So now you believe ?
43016032	Listen to me ; a time is coming when you will be scattered , each to your own home . That time is now here . You will leave me alone , but I am never really alone , because the Father is with me .
43016033	“ I told you these things so that you can have peace in me . In this world you will have trouble , but be brave ! I have defeated the world . ”
43017001	After Jesus said these things , he looked toward heaven and prayed , “ Father , the time has come . Give glory to your Son so that the Son can give glory to you .
43017002	You gave the Son power over all people so that the Son could give eternal life to all those you gave him .
43017003	And this is eternal life : that people know you , the only true God , and that they know Jesus Christ , the One you sent .
43017004	Having finished the work you gave me to do , I brought you glory on earth .
43017005	And now , Father , give me glory with you ; give me the glory I had with you before the world was made .
43017006	“ I showed what you are like to those you gave me from the world . They belonged to you , and you gave them to me , and they have obeyed your teaching .
43017007	Now they know that everything you gave me comes from you .
43017008	I gave them the teachings you gave me , and they accepted them . They knew that I truly came from you , and they believed that you sent me .
43017009	I am praying for them . I am not praying for people in the world but for those you gave me , because they are yours .
43017010	All I have is yours , and all you have is mine . And my glory is shown through them .
43017011	I am coming to you ; I will not stay in the world any longer . But they are still in the world . Holy Father , keep them safe by the power of your name , the name you gave me , so that they will be one , just as you and I are one .
43017012	While I was with them , I kept them safe by the power of your name , the name you gave me . I protected them , and only one of them , the one worthy of destruction , was lost so that the Scripture would come true .
43017013	“ I am coming to you now . But I pray these things while I am still in the world so that these followers can have all of my joy in them .
43017014	I have given them your teaching . And the world has hated them , because they don’t belong to the world , just as I don’t belong to the world .
43017015	I am not asking you to take them out of the world but to keep them safe from the Evil One .
43017016	They don’t belong to the world , just as I don’t belong to the world .
43017017	Make them ready for your service through your truth ; your teaching is truth .
43017018	I have sent them into the world , just as you sent me into the world .
43017019	For their sake , I am making myself ready to serve so that they can be ready for their service of the truth .
43017020	“ I pray for these followers , but I am also praying for all those who will believe in me because of their teaching .
43017021	Father , I pray that they can be one . As you are in me and I am in you , I pray that they can also be one in us . Then the world will believe that you sent me .
43017022	I have given these people the glory that you gave me so that they can be one , just as you and I are one .
43017023	I will be in them and you will be in me so that they will be completely one . Then the world will know that you sent me and that you loved them just as much as you loved me .
43017024	“ Father , I want these people that you gave me to be with me where I am . I want them to see my glory , which you gave me because you loved me before the world was made .
43017025	Father , you are the One who is good . The world does not know you , but I know you , and these people know you sent me .
43017026	I showed them what you are like , and I will show them again . Then they will have the same love that you have for me , and I will live in them . ”
43018001	When Jesus finished praying , he went with his followers across the Kidron Valley . On the other side there was a garden , and Jesus and his followers went into it .
43018002	Judas knew where this place was , because Jesus met there often with his followers . Judas was the one who turned against Jesus .
43018003	So Judas came there with a group of soldiers and some guards from the leading priests and the Pharisees . They were carrying torches , lanterns , and weapons .
43018004	Knowing everything that would happen to him , Jesus went out and asked , “ Who is it you are looking for ? ”
43018005	They answered , “ Jesus from Nazareth . ” “ I am he , ” Jesus said . ( Judas , the one who turned against Jesus , was standing there with them . )
43018006	When Jesus said , “ I am he , ” they moved back and fell to the ground .
43018007	Jesus asked them again , “ Who is it you are looking for ? ” They said , “ Jesus of Nazareth . ”
43018008	“ I told you that I am he , ” Jesus said . “ So if you are looking for me , let the others go . ”
43018009	This happened so that the words Jesus said before would come true : “ I have not lost any of the ones you gave me . ”
43018010	Simon Peter , who had a sword , pulled it out and struck the servant of the high priest , cutting off his right ear . ( The servant’s name was Malchus . )
43018011	Jesus said to Peter , “ Put your sword back . Shouldn’t I drink the cup the Father gave me ? ”
43018012	Then the soldiers with their commander and the guards arrested Jesus . They tied him
43018013	and led him first to Annas , the father-in-law of Caiaphas , the high priest that year .
43018014	Caiaphas was the one who told the Jews that it would be better if one man died for all the people .
43018015	Simon Peter and another one of Jesus’ followers went along after Jesus . This follower knew the high priest , so he went with Jesus into the high priest’s courtyard .
43018016	But Peter waited outside near the door . The follower who knew the high priest came back outside , spoke to the girl at the door , and brought Peter inside .
43018017	The girl at the door said to Peter , “ Aren’t you also one of that man’s followers ? ” Peter answered , “ No , I am not ! ”
43018018	It was cold , so the servants and guards had built a fire and were standing around it , warming themselves . Peter also was standing with them , warming himself .
43018019	The high priest asked Jesus questions about his followers and his teaching .
43018020	Jesus answered , “ I have spoken openly to everyone . I have always taught in synagogues and in the Temple , where all the Jews come together . I never said anything in secret .
43018021	So why do you question me ? Ask the people who heard my teaching . They know what I said . ”
43018022	When Jesus said this , one of the guards standing there hit him . The guard said , “ Is that the way you answer the high priest ? ”
43018023	Jesus answered him , “ If I said something wrong , then show what it was . But if what I said is true , why do you hit me ? ”
43018024	Then Annas sent Jesus , who was still tied , to Caiaphas the high priest .
43018025	As Simon Peter was standing and warming himself , they said to him , “ Aren’t you one of that man’s followers ? ” Peter said it was not true ; he said , “ No , I am not . ”
43018026	One of the servants of the high priest was there . This servant was a relative of the man whose ear Peter had cut off . The servant said , “ Didn’t I see you with him in the garden ? ”
43018027	Again Peter said it wasn’t true . At once a rooster crowed .
43018028	Early in the morning they led Jesus from Caiaphas’s house to the Roman governor’s palace . They would not go inside the palace , because they did not want to make themselves unclean ; they wanted to eat the Passover meal .
43018029	So Pilate went outside to them and asked , “ What charges do you bring against this man ? ”
43018030	They answered , “ If he were not a criminal , we wouldn’t have brought him to you . ”
43018031	Pilate said to them , “ Take him yourselves and judge him by your own law . ” “ But we are not allowed to put anyone to death , ” the Jews answered .
43018032	( This happened so that what Jesus said about how he would die would come true . )
43018033	Then Pilate went back inside the palace and called Jesus to him and asked , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ”
43018034	Jesus said , “ Is that your own question , or did others tell you about me ? ”
43018035	Pilate answered , “ I am not one of you . It was your own people and their leading priests who handed you over to me . What have you done wrong ? ”
43018036	Jesus answered , “ My kingdom does not belong to this world . If it belonged to this world , my servants would have fought to keep me from being given over to the Jewish leaders . But my kingdom is from another place . ”
43018037	Pilate said , “ So you are a king ! ” Jesus answered , “ You are the one saying I am a king . This is why I was born and came into the world : to tell people the truth . And everyone who belongs to the truth listens to me . ”
43018038	Pilate said , “ What is truth ? ” After he said this , he went out to the crowd again and said to them , “ I find nothing against this man .
43018039	But it is your custom that I free one prisoner to you at Passover time . Do you want me to free the ‘ king of the Jews’ ? ”
43018040	They shouted back , “ No , not him ! Let Barabbas go free ! ” ( Barabbas was a robber . )
43019001	Then Pilate ordered that Jesus be taken away and whipped .
43019002	The soldiers made a crown from some thorny branches and put it on Jesus’ head and put a purple robe around him .
43019003	Then they came to him many times and said , “ Hail , King of the Jews ! ” and hit him in the face .
43019004	Again Pilate came out and said to them , “ Look , I am bringing Jesus out to you . I want you to know that I find nothing against him . ”
43019005	So Jesus came out , wearing the crown of thorns and the purple robe . Pilate said to them , “ Here is the man ! ”
43019006	When the leading priests and the guards saw Jesus , they shouted , “ Crucify him ! Crucify him ! ” But Pilate answered , “ Crucify him yourselves , because I find nothing against him . ”
43019007	The leaders answered , “ We have a law that says he should die , because he said he is the Son of God . ”
43019008	When Pilate heard this , he was even more afraid .
43019009	He went back inside the palace and asked Jesus , “ Where do you come from ? ” But Jesus did not answer him .
43019010	Pilate said , “ You refuse to speak to me ? Don’t you know I have power to set you free and power to have you crucified ? ”
43019011	Jesus answered , “ The only power you have over me is the power given to you by God . The man who turned me in to you is guilty of a greater sin . ”
43019012	After this , Pilate tried to let Jesus go . But some in the crowd cried out , “ Anyone who makes himself king is against Caesar . If you let this man go , you are no friend of Caesar . ”
43019013	When Pilate heard what they were saying , he brought Jesus out and sat down on the judge’s seat at the place called The Stone Pavement . ( In the Hebrew language the name is Gabbatha . )
43019014	It was about noon on Preparation Day of Passover week . Pilate said to the crowd , “ Here is your king ! ”
43019015	They shouted , “ Take him away ! Take him away ! Crucify him ! ” Pilate asked them , “ Do you want me to crucify your king ? ” The leading priests answered , “ The only king we have is Caesar . ”
43019016	So Pilate handed Jesus over to them to be crucified . The soldiers took charge of Jesus .
43019017	Carrying his own cross , Jesus went out to a place called The Place of the Skull , which in the Hebrew language is called Golgotha .
43019018	There they crucified Jesus . They also crucified two other men , one on each side , with Jesus in the middle .
43019019	Pilate wrote a sign and put it on the cross . It read : jesus of nazareth , the king of the jews .
43019020	The sign was written in Hebrew , in Latin , and in Greek . Many of the people read the sign , because the place where Jesus was crucified was near the city .
43019021	The leading priests said to Pilate , “ Don’t write , ‘ The King of the Jews . ’ But write , ‘ This man said , “ I am the King of the Jews . ” ’ ”
43019022	Pilate answered , “ What I have written , I have written . ”
43019023	After the soldiers crucified Jesus , they took his clothes and divided them into four parts , with each soldier getting one part . They also took his long shirt , which was all one piece of cloth , woven from top to bottom .
43019024	So the soldiers said to each other , “ We should not tear this into parts . Let’s throw lots to see who will get it . ” This happened so that this Scripture would come true : “ They divided my clothes among them , and they threw lots for my clothing . ” So the soldiers did this .
43019025	Standing near his cross were Jesus’ mother , his mother’s sister , Mary the wife of Clopas , and Mary Magdalene .
43019026	When Jesus saw his mother and the follower he loved standing nearby , he said to his mother , “ Dear woman , here is your son . ”
43019027	Then he said to the follower , “ Here is your mother . ” From that time on , the follower took her to live in his home .
43019028	After this , Jesus knew that everything had been done . So that the Scripture would come true , he said , “ I am thirsty . ”
43019029	There was a jar full of vinegar there , so the soldiers soaked a sponge in it , put the sponge on a branch of a hyssop plant , and lifted it to Jesus’ mouth .
43019030	When Jesus tasted the vinegar , he said , “ It is finished . ” Then he bowed his head and died .
43019031	This day was Preparation Day , and the next day was a special Sabbath day . Since the religious leaders did not want the bodies to stay on the cross on the Sabbath day , they asked Pilate to order that the legs of the men be broken and the bodies be taken away .
43019032	So the soldiers came and broke the legs of the first man on the cross beside Jesus . Then they broke the legs of the man on the other cross beside Jesus .
43019033	But when the soldiers came to Jesus and saw that he was already dead , they did not break his legs .
43019034	But one of the soldiers stuck his spear into Jesus’ side , and at once blood and water came out .
