43019035	( The one who saw this happen is the one who told us this , and whatever he says is true . And he knows that he tells the truth , and he tells it so that you might believe . )
43019036	These things happened to make the Scripture come true : “ Not one of his bones will be broken . ”
43019037	And another Scripture says , “ They will look at the one they stabbed . ”
43019038	Later , Joseph from Arimathea asked Pilate if he could take the body of Jesus . ( Joseph was a secret follower of Jesus , because he was afraid of some of the leaders . ) Pilate gave his permission , so Joseph came and took Jesus’ body away .
43019039	Nicodemus , who earlier had come to Jesus at night , went with Joseph . He brought about seventy-five pounds of myrrh and aloes .
43019040	These two men took Jesus’ body and wrapped it with the spices in pieces of linen cloth , which is how they bury the dead .
43019041	In the place where Jesus was crucified , there was a garden . In the garden was a new tomb that had never been used before .
43019042	The men laid Jesus in that tomb because it was nearby , and they were preparing to start their Sabbath day .
43020001	Early on the first day of the week , Mary Magdalene went to the tomb while it was still dark . When she saw that the large stone had been moved away from the tomb ,
43020002	she ran to Simon Peter and the follower whom Jesus loved . Mary said , “ They have taken the Lord out of the tomb , and we don’t know where they have put him . ”
43020003	So Peter and the other follower started for the tomb .
43020004	They were both running , but the other follower ran faster than Peter and reached the tomb first .
43020005	He bent down and looked in and saw the strips of linen cloth lying there , but he did not go in .
43020006	Then following him , Simon Peter arrived and went into the tomb and saw the strips of linen lying there .
43020007	He also saw the cloth that had been around Jesus’ head , which was folded up and laid in a different place from the strips of linen .
43020008	Then the other follower , who had reached the tomb first , also went in . He saw and believed .
43020009	( They did not yet understand from the Scriptures that Jesus must rise from the dead . )
43020010	Then the followers went back home .
43020011	But Mary stood outside the tomb , crying . As she was crying , she bent down and looked inside the tomb .
43020012	She saw two angels dressed in white , sitting where Jesus’ body had been , one at the head and one at the feet .
43020013	They asked her , “ Woman , why are you crying ? ” She answered , “ They have taken away my Lord , and I don’t know where they have put him . ”
43020014	When Mary said this , she turned around and saw Jesus standing there , but she did not know it was Jesus .
43020015	Jesus asked her , “ Woman , why are you crying ? Whom are you looking for ? ” Thinking he was the gardener , she said to him , “ Did you take him away , sir ? Tell me where you put him , and I will get him . ”
43020016	Jesus said to her , “ Mary . ” Mary turned toward Jesus and said in the Hebrew language , “ Rabboni . ” ( This means “ Teacher . ” )
43020017	Jesus said to her , “ Don’t hold on to me , because I have not yet gone up to the Father . But go to my brothers and tell them , ‘ I am going back to my Father and your Father , to my God and your God . ’ ”
43020018	Mary Magdalene went and said to the followers , “ I saw the Lord ! ” And she told them what Jesus had said to her .
43020019	When it was evening on the first day of the week , Jesus’ followers were together . The doors were locked , because they were afraid of the elders . Then Jesus came and stood right in the middle of them and said , “ Peace be with you . ”
43020020	After he said this , he showed them his hands and his side . His followers were thrilled when they saw the Lord .
43020021	Then Jesus said again , “ Peace be with you . As the Father sent me , I now send you . ”
43020022	After he said this , he breathed on them and said , “ Receive the Holy Spirit .
43020023	If you forgive anyone his sins , they are forgiven . If you don’t forgive them , they are not forgiven . ”
43020024	Thomas ( called Didymus ) , who was one of the twelve , was not with them when Jesus came .
43020025	The other followers kept telling Thomas , “ We saw the Lord . ” But Thomas said , “ I will not believe it until I see the nail marks in his hands and put my finger where the nails were and put my hand into his side . ”
43020026	A week later the followers were in the house again , and Thomas was with them . The doors were locked , but Jesus came in and stood right in the middle of them . He said , “ Peace be with you . ”
43020027	Then he said to Thomas , “ Put your finger here , and look at my hands . Put your hand here in my side . Stop being an unbeliever and believe . ”
43020028	Thomas said to him , “ My Lord and my God ! ”
43020029	Then Jesus told him , “ You believe because you see me . Those who believe without seeing me will be truly blessed . ”
43020030	Jesus did many other miracles in the presence of his followers that are not written in this book .
43020031	But these are written so that you may believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God . Then , by believing , you may have life through his name .
43021001	Later , Jesus showed himself to his followers again — this time at Lake Galilee . This is how he showed himself :
43021002	Some of the followers were together : Simon Peter , Thomas ( called Didymus ) , Nathanael from Cana in Galilee , the two sons of Zebedee , and two other followers .
43021003	Simon Peter said , “ I am going out to fish . ” The others said , “ We will go with you . ” So they went out and got into the boat . They fished that night but caught nothing .
43021004	Early the next morning Jesus stood on the shore , but the followers did not know it was Jesus .
43021005	Then he said to them , “ Friends , did you catch any fish ? ” They answered , “ No . ”
43021006	He said , “ Throw your net on the right side of the boat , and you will find some . ” So they did , and they caught so many fish they could not pull the net back into the boat .
43021007	The follower whom Jesus loved said to Peter , “ It is the Lord ! ” When Peter heard him say this , he wrapped his coat around himself . ( Peter had taken his clothes off . ) Then he jumped into the water .
43021008	The other followers went to shore in the boat , dragging the net full of fish . They were not very far from shore , only about a hundred yards .
43021009	When the followers stepped out of the boat and onto the shore , they saw a fire of hot coals . There were fish on the fire , and there was bread .
43021010	Then Jesus said , “ Bring some of the fish you just caught . ”
43021011	Simon Peter went into the boat and pulled the net to the shore . It was full of big fish , one hundred fifty-three in all , but even though there were so many , the net did not tear .
43021012	Jesus said to them , “ Come and eat . ” None of the followers dared ask him , “ Who are you ? ” because they knew it was the Lord .
43021013	Jesus came and took the bread and gave it to them , along with the fish .
43021014	This was now the third time Jesus showed himself to his followers after he was raised from the dead .
43021015	When they finished eating , Jesus said to Simon Peter , “ Simon son of John , do you love me more than these ? ” He answered , “ Yes , Lord , you know that I love you . ” Jesus said , “ Feed my lambs . ”
43021016	Again Jesus said , “ Simon son of John , do you love me ? ” He answered , “ Yes , Lord , you know that I love you . ” Jesus said , “ Take care of my sheep . ”
43021017	A third time he said , “ Simon son of John , do you love me ? ” Peter was hurt because Jesus asked him the third time , “ Do you love me ? ” Peter said , “ Lord , you know everything ; you know that I love you ! ” He said to him , “ Feed my sheep .
43021018	I tell you the truth , when you were younger , you tied your own belt and went where you wanted . But when you are old , you will put out your hands and someone else will tie you and take you where you don’t want to go . ”
43021019	( Jesus said this to show how Peter would die to give glory to God . ) Then Jesus said to Peter , “ Follow me ! ”
43021020	Peter turned and saw that the follower Jesus loved was walking behind them . ( This was the follower who had leaned against Jesus at the supper and had said , “ Lord , who will turn against you ? ” )
43021021	When Peter saw him behind them , he asked Jesus , “ Lord , what about him ? ”
43021022	Jesus answered , “ If I want him to live until I come back , that is not your business . You follow me . ”
43021023	So a story spread among the followers that this one would not die . But Jesus did not say he would not die . He only said , “ If I want him to live until I come back , that is not your business . ”
43021024	That follower is the one who is telling these things and who has now written them down . We know that what he says is true .
43021025	There are many other things Jesus did . If every one of them were written down , I suppose the whole world would not be big enough for all the books that would be written .
44001001	To Theophilus . The first book I wrote was about everything Jesus began to do and teach
44001002	until the day he was taken up into heaven . Before this , with the help of the Holy Spirit , Jesus told the apostles he had chosen what they should do .
44001003	After his death , he showed himself to them and proved in many ways that he was alive . The apostles saw Jesus during the forty days after he was raised from the dead , and he spoke to them about the kingdom of God .
44001004	Once when he was eating with them , he told them not to leave Jerusalem . He said , “ Wait here to receive the promise from the Father which I told you about .
44001005	John baptized people with water , but in a few days you will be baptized with the Holy Spirit . ”
44001006	When the apostles were all together , they asked Jesus , “ Lord , are you now going to give the kingdom back to Israel ? ”
44001007	Jesus said to them , “ The Father is the only One who has the authority to decide dates and times . These things are not for you to know .
44001008	But when the Holy Spirit comes to you , you will receive power . You will be my witnesses — in Jerusalem , in all of Judea , in Samaria , and in every part of the world . ”
44001009	After he said this , as they were watching , he was lifted up , and a cloud hid him from their sight .
44001010	As he was going , they were looking into the sky . Suddenly , two men wearing white clothes stood beside them .
44001011	They said , “ Men of Galilee , why are you standing here looking into the sky ? Jesus , whom you saw taken up from you into heaven , will come back in the same way you saw him go . ”
44001012	Then they went back to Jerusalem from the Mount of Olives . ( This mountain is about half a mile from Jerusalem . )
44001013	When they entered the city , they went to the upstairs room where they were staying . Peter , John , James , Andrew , Philip , Thomas , Bartholomew , Matthew , James son of Alphaeus , Simon ( known as the Zealot ) , and Judas son of James were there .
44001014	They all continued praying together with some women , including Mary the mother of Jesus , and Jesus’ brothers .
44001015	During this time there was a meeting of the believers ( about one hundred twenty of them ) . Peter stood up and said ,
44001018	( Judas bought a field with the money he got for his evil act . But he fell to his death , his body burst open , and all his intestines poured out .
44001019	Everyone in Jerusalem learned about this so they named this place Akeldama . In their language Akeldama means “ Field of Blood . ” )
44001020	“ In the Book of Psalms , ” Peter said , “ this is written : ‘ May his place be empty ; leave no one to live in it . ’ And it is also written : ‘ Let another man replace him as leader . ’
44001023	They put the names of two men before the group . One was Joseph Barsabbas , who was also called Justus . The other was Matthias .
44001026	Then they used lots to choose between them , and the lots showed that Matthias was the one . So he became an apostle with the other eleven .
44002001	When the day of Pentecost came , they were all together in one place .
44002002	Suddenly a noise like a strong , blowing wind came from heaven and filled the whole house where they were sitting .
44002003	They saw something like flames of fire that were separated and stood over each person there .
44002004	They were all filled with the Holy Spirit , and they began to speak different languages by the power the Holy Spirit was giving them .
44002005	There were some religious Jews staying in Jerusalem who were from every country in the world .
44002006	When they heard this noise , a crowd came together . They were all surprised , because each one heard them speaking in his own language .
44002007	They were completely amazed at this . They said , “ Look ! Aren’t all these people that we hear speaking from Galilee ?
44002008	Then how is it possible that we each hear them in our own languages ? We are from different places :
44002009	Parthia , Media , Elam , Mesopotamia , Judea , Cappadocia , Pontus , Asia ,
44002010	Phrygia , Pamphylia , Egypt , the areas of Libya near Cyrene , Rome
44002011	( both Jews and those who had become Jews ) , Crete , and Arabia . But we hear them telling in our own languages about the great things God has done ! ”
44002012	They were all amazed and confused , asking each other , “ What does this mean ? ”
44002013	But others were making fun of them , saying , “ They have had too much wine . ”
44002014	But Peter stood up with the eleven apostles , and in a loud voice he spoke to the crowd : “ My fellow Jews , and all of you who are in Jerusalem , listen to me . Pay attention to what I have to say .
44002015	These people are not drunk , as you think ; it is only nine o’clock in the morning !
44002016	But Joel the prophet wrote about what is happening here today :
44002017	‘ God says : In the last days I will pour out my Spirit on all kinds of people . Your sons and daughters will prophesy . Your young men will see visions , and your old men will dream dreams .
44002018	At that time I will pour out my Spirit also on my male slaves and female slaves , and they will prophesy .
44002019	I will show miracles in the sky and on the earth : blood , fire , and thick smoke .
44002020	The sun will become dark , the moon red as blood , before the overwhelming and glorious day of the Lord will come .
44002021	Then anyone who calls on the Lord will be saved . ’
44002022	“ People of Israel , listen to these words : Jesus from Nazareth was a very special man . God clearly showed this to you by the miracles , wonders , and signs he did through Jesus . You all know this , because it happened right here among you .
44002023	Jesus was given to you , and with the help of those who don’t know the law , you put him to death by nailing him to a cross . But this was God’s plan which he had made long ago ; he knew all this would happen .
44002024	God raised Jesus from the dead and set him free from the pain of death , because death could not hold him .
44002025	For David said this about him : ‘ I keep the Lord before me always . Because he is close by my side , I will not be hurt .
44002026	So I am glad , and I rejoice . Even my body has hope ,
44002027	because you will not leave me in the grave . You will not let your Holy One rot .
44002028	You will teach me how to live a holy life . Being with you will fill me with joy . ’
44002029	“ Brothers and sisters , I can tell you truly that David , our ancestor , died and was buried . His grave is still here with us today .
44002030	He was a prophet and knew God had promised him that he would make a person from David’s family a king just as he was .
44002031	Knowing this before it happened , David talked about the Christ rising from the dead . He said : ‘ He was not left in the grave . His body did not rot . ’
44002032	So Jesus is the One whom God raised from the dead . And we are all witnesses to this .
44002033	Jesus was lifted up to heaven and is now at God’s right side . The Father has given the Holy Spirit to Jesus as he promised . So Jesus has poured out that Spirit , and this is what you now see and hear .
44002034	David was not the one who was lifted up to heaven , but he said : ‘ The Lord said to my Lord , “ Sit by me at my right side ,
44002035	until I put your enemies under your control . ” ’
44002036	“ So , all the people of Israel should know this truly : God has made Jesus — the man you nailed to the cross — both Lord and Christ . ”
44002037	When the people heard this , they felt guilty and asked Peter and the other apostles , “ What shall we do ? ”
44002038	Peter said to them , “ Change your hearts and lives and be baptized , each one of you , in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins . And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit .
44002039	This promise is for you , for your children , and for all who are far away . It is for everyone the Lord our God calls to himself . ”
44002040	Peter warned them with many other words . He begged them , “ Save yourselves from the evil of today’s people ! ”
44002041	Then those people who accepted what Peter said were baptized . About three thousand people were added to the number of believers that day .
44002042	They spent their time learning the apostles’ teaching , sharing , breaking bread , and praying together .
44002043	The apostles were doing many miracles and signs , and everyone felt great respect for God .
44002044	All the believers were together and shared everything .
44002045	They would sell their land and the things they owned and then divide the money and give it to anyone who needed it .
44002046	The believers met together in the Temple every day . They ate together in their homes , happy to share their food with joyful hearts .
44002047	They praised God and were liked by all the people . Every day the Lord added those who were being saved to the group of believers .
44003001	One day Peter and John went to the Temple at three o’clock , the time set each day for the afternoon prayer service .
44003002	There , at the Temple gate called Beautiful Gate , was a man who had been crippled all his life . Every day he was carried to this gate to beg for money from the people going into the Temple .
44003003	The man saw Peter and John going into the Temple and asked them for money .
44003004	Peter and John looked straight at him and said , “ Look at us ! ”
44003005	The man looked at them , thinking they were going to give him some money .
44003006	But Peter said , “ I don’t have any silver or gold , but I do have something else I can give you . By the power of Jesus Christ from Nazareth , stand up and walk ! ”
44003007	Then Peter took the man’s right hand and lifted him up . Immediately the man’s feet and ankles became strong .
44003008	He jumped up , stood on his feet , and began to walk . He went into the Temple with them , walking and jumping and praising God .
44003011	While the man was holding on to Peter and John , all the people were amazed and ran to them at Solomon’s Porch .
44003012	When Peter saw this , he said to them , “ People of Israel , why are you surprised ? You are looking at us as if it were our own power or goodness that made this man walk .
44003013	The God of Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob , the God of our ancestors , gave glory to Jesus , his servant . But you handed him over to be killed . Pilate decided to let him go free , but you told Pilate you did not want Jesus .
44003014	You did not want the One who is holy and good but asked Pilate to give you a murderer instead .
44003015	And so you killed the One who gives life , but God raised him from the dead . We are witnesses to this .
44003016	It was faith in Jesus that made this crippled man well . You can see this man , and you know him . He was made completely well because of trust in Jesus , and you all saw it happen !
44003017	“ Brothers and sisters , I know you did those things to Jesus because neither you nor your leaders understood what you were doing .
44003018	God said through the prophets that his Christ would suffer and die . And now God has made these things come true in this way .
44003019	So you must change your hearts and lives ! Come back to God , and he will forgive your sins . Then the Lord will send the time of rest .
44003020	And he will send Jesus , the One he chose to be the Christ .
44003021	But Jesus must stay in heaven until the time comes when all things will be made right again . God told about this time long ago when he spoke through his holy prophets .
44003022	Moses said , ‘ The Lord your God will give you a prophet like me , who is one of your own people . You must listen to everything he tells you .
44003023	Anyone who does not listen to that prophet will die , cut off from God’s people . ’
44003024	Samuel , and all the other prophets who spoke for God after Samuel , told about this time now .
44003025	You are descendants of the prophets . You have received the agreement God made with your ancestors . He said to your father Abraham , ‘ Through your descendants all the nations on the earth will be blessed . ’
44003026	God has raised up his servant Jesus and sent him to you first to bless you by turning each of you away from doing evil . ”
44004001	While Peter and John were speaking to the people , priests , the captain of the soldiers that guarded the Temple , and Sadducees came up to them .
44004002	They were upset because the two apostles were teaching the people and were preaching that people will rise from the dead through the power of Jesus .
44004003	The older leaders grabbed Peter and John and put them in jail . Since it was already night , they kept them in jail until the next day .
44004004	But many of those who had heard Peter and John preach believed the things they said . There were now about five thousand in the group of believers .
44004005	The next day the rulers , the elders , and the teachers of the law met in Jerusalem .
44004006	Annas the high priest , Caiaphas , John , and Alexander were there , as well as everyone from the high priest’s family .
44004007	They made Peter and John stand before them and then asked them , “ By what power or authority did you do this ? ”
44004008	Then Peter , filled with the Holy Spirit , said to them , “ Rulers of the people and you elders ,
44004009	are you questioning us about a good thing that was done to a crippled man ? Are you asking us who made him well ?
44004010	We want all of you and all the people to know that this man was made well by the power of Jesus Christ from Nazareth . You crucified him , but God raised him from the dead . This man was crippled , but he is now well and able to stand here before you because of the power of Jesus .
44004011	Jesus is ‘ the stone that you builders rejected , which has become the cornerstone . ’
44004012	Jesus is the only One who can save people . No one else in the world is able to save us . ”
44004013	The leaders saw that Peter and John were not afraid to speak , and they understood that these men had no special training or education . So they were amazed . Then they realized that Peter and John had been with Jesus .
44004014	Because they saw the healed man standing there beside the two apostles , they could say nothing against them .
44004015	After the leaders ordered them to leave the meeting , they began to talk to each other .
44004016	They said , “ What shall we do with these men ? Everyone in Jerusalem knows they have done a great miracle , and we cannot say it is not true .
44004017	But to keep it from spreading among the people , we must warn them not to talk to people anymore using that name . ”
44004018	So they called Peter and John in again and told them not to speak or to teach at all in the name of Jesus .
44004019	But Peter and John answered them , “ You decide what God would want . Should we obey you or God ?
44004020	We cannot keep quiet . We must speak about what we have seen and heard . ”
44004021	The leaders warned the apostles again and let them go free . They could not find a way to punish them , because all the people were praising God for what had been done .
44004022	The man who received the miracle of healing was more than forty years old .
44004023	After Peter and John left the meeting of leaders , they went to their own group and told them everything the leading priests and the elders had said to them .
44004024	When the believers heard this , they prayed to God together , “ Lord , you are the One who made the sky , the earth , the sea , and everything in them .
44004025	By the Holy Spirit , through our father David your servant , you said : ‘ Why are the nations so angry ? Why are the people making useless plans ?
44004026	The kings of the earth prepare to fight , and their leaders make plans together against the Lord and his Christ . ’
44004027	These things really happened when Herod , Pontius Pilate , and some Jews and non-Jews all came together against Jesus here in Jerusalem . Jesus is your holy servant , the One you made to be the Christ .
44004028	These people made your plan happen because of your power and your will .
44004029	And now , Lord , listen to their threats . Lord , help us , your servants , to speak your word without fear .
44004030	Show us your power to heal . Give proofs and make miracles happen by the power of Jesus , your holy servant . ”
44004031	After they had prayed , the place where they were meeting was shaken . They were all filled with the Holy Spirit , and they spoke God’s word without fear .
44004032	The group of believers were united in their hearts and spirit . All those in the group acted as though their private property belonged to everyone in the group . In fact , they shared everything .
44004033	With great power the apostles were telling people that the Lord Jesus was truly raised from the dead . And God blessed all the believers very much .
44004034	There were no needy people among them . From time to time those who owned fields or houses sold them , brought the money ,
44004035	and gave it to the apostles . Then the money was given to anyone who needed it .
44004036	One of the believers was named Joseph , a Levite born in Cyprus . The apostles called him Barnabas ( which means “ one who encourages ” ) .
44004037	Joseph owned a field , sold it , brought the money , and gave it to the apostles .
44005001	But a man named Ananias and his wife Sapphira sold some land .
44005002	He kept back part of the money for himself ; his wife knew about this and agreed to it . But he brought the rest of the money and gave it to the apostles .
44005003	Peter said , “ Ananias , why did you let Satan rule your thoughts to lie to the Holy Spirit and to keep for yourself part of the money you received for the land ?
44005004	Before you sold the land , it belonged to you . And even after you sold it , you could have used the money any way you wanted . Why did you think of doing this ? You lied to God , not to us ! ”
44005007	About three hours later his wife came in , but she did not know what had happened .
44005008	Peter said to her , “ Tell me , was the money you got for your field this much ? ” Sapphira answered , “ Yes , that was the price . ”
44005009	Peter said to her , “ Why did you and your husband agree to test the Spirit of the Lord ? Look ! The men who buried your husband are at the door , and they will carry you out . ”
44005010	At that moment Sapphira fell down by his feet and died . When the young men came in and saw that she was dead , they carried her out and buried her beside her husband .
44005011	The whole church and all the others who heard about these things were filled with fear .
44005012	The apostles did many signs and miracles among the people . And they would all meet together on Solomon’s Porch .
44005013	None of the others dared to join them , but all the people respected them .
44005014	More and more men and women believed in the Lord and were added to the group of believers .
44005015	The people placed their sick on beds and mats in the streets , hoping that when Peter passed by at least his shadow might fall on them .
44005016	Crowds came from all the towns around Jerusalem , bringing their sick and those who were bothered by evil spirits , and all of them were healed .
44005017	The high priest and all his friends ( a group called the Sadducees ) became very jealous .
44005018	They took the apostles and put them in jail .
44005019	But during the night , an angel of the Lord opened the doors of the jail and led the apostles outside . The angel said ,
44005020	“ Go stand in the Temple and tell the people everything about this new life . ”
44005021	When the apostles heard this , they obeyed and went into the Temple early in the morning and continued teaching . When the high priest and his friends arrived , they called a meeting of the leaders and all the important elders . They sent some men to the jail to bring the apostles to them .
44005022	But , upon arriving , the officers could not find the apostles . So they went back and reported to the leaders .
44005023	They said , “ The jail was closed and locked , and the guards were standing at the doors . But when we opened the doors , the jail was empty ! ”
44005024	Hearing this , the captain of the Temple guards and the leading priests were confused and wondered what was happening .
44005025	Then someone came and told them , “ Listen ! The men you put in jail are standing in the Temple teaching the people . ”
44005026	Then the captain and his men went out and brought the apostles back . But the soldiers did not use force , because they were afraid the people would stone them to death .
44005027	The soldiers brought the apostles to the meeting and made them stand before the leaders . The high priest questioned them ,
44005028	saying , “ We gave you strict orders not to continue teaching in that name . But look , you have filled Jerusalem with your teaching and are trying to make us responsible for this man’s death . ”
44005029	Peter and the other apostles answered , “ We must obey God , not human authority !
44005030	You killed Jesus by hanging him on a cross . But God , the God of our ancestors , raised Jesus up from the dead !
44005031	Jesus is the One whom God raised to be on his right side , as Leader and Savior . Through him , all people could change their hearts and lives and have their sins forgiven .
44005032	We saw all these things happen . The Holy Spirit , whom God has given to all who obey him , also proves these things are true . ”
44005033	When the leaders heard this , they became angry and wanted to kill them .
44005034	But a Pharisee named Gamaliel stood up in the meeting . He was a teacher of the law , and all the people respected him . He ordered the apostles to leave the meeting for a little while .
44005035	Then he said , “ People of Israel , be careful what you are planning to do to these men .
44005036	Remember when Theudas appeared ? He said he was a great man , and about four hundred men joined him . But he was killed , and all his followers were scattered ; they were able to do nothing .
44005037	Later , a man named Judas came from Galilee at the time of the registration . He also led a group of followers and was killed , and all his followers were scattered .
44005038	And so now I tell you : Stay away from these men , and leave them alone . If their plan comes from human authority , it will fail .
44005039	But if it is from God , you will not be able to stop them . You might even be fighting against God himself ! ” The leaders agreed with what Gamaliel said .
44005040	They called the apostles in , beat them , and told them not to speak in the name of Jesus again . Then they let them go free .
44005041	The apostles left the meeting full of joy because they were given the honor of suffering disgrace for Jesus .
44005042	Every day in the Temple and in people’s homes they continued teaching the people and telling the Good News — that Jesus is the Christ .
44006001	The number of followers was growing . But during this same time , the Greek-speaking followers had an argument with the other followers . The Greek-speaking widows were not getting their share of the food that was given out every day .
44006002	The twelve apostles called the whole group of followers together and said , “ It is not right for us to stop our work of teaching God’s word in order to serve tables .
44006003	So , brothers and sisters , choose seven of your own men who are good , full of the Spirit and full of wisdom . We will put them in charge of this work .
44006004	Then we can continue to pray and to teach the word of God . ”
44006005	The whole group liked the idea , so they chose these seven men : Stephen ( a man with great faith and full of the Holy Spirit ) , Philip , Procorus , Nicanor , Timon , Parmenas , and Nicolas ( a man from Antioch who had become a follower of the Jewish religion ) .
44006006	Then they put these men before the apostles , who prayed and laid their hands on them .
44006007	The word of God was continuing to spread . The group of followers in Jerusalem increased , and a great number of the Jewish priests believed and obeyed .
44006008	Stephen was richly blessed by God who gave him the power to do great miracles and signs among the people .
44006009	But some people were against him . They belonged to the synagogue of Free Men ( as it was called ) , which included people from Cyrene , Alexandria , Cilicia , and Asia . They all came and argued with Stephen .
44006010	But the Spirit was helping him to speak with wisdom , and his words were so strong that they could not argue with him .
44006011	So they secretly urged some men to say , “ We heard Stephen speak against Moses and against God . ”
44006012	This upset the people , the elders , and the teachers of the law . They came and grabbed Stephen and brought him to a meeting of the leaders .
44006013	They brought in some people to tell lies about Stephen , saying , “ This man is always speaking against this holy place and the law of Moses .
44006014	We heard him say that Jesus from Nazareth will destroy this place and that Jesus will change the customs Moses gave us . ”
44006015	All the people in the meeting were watching Stephen closely and saw that his face looked like the face of an angel .
44007001	The high priest said to Stephen , “ Are these things true ? ”
44007002	Stephen answered , “ Brothers and fathers , listen to me . Our glorious God appeared to Abraham , our ancestor , in Mesopotamia before he lived in Haran .
44007003	God said to Abraham , ‘ Leave your country and your relatives , and go to the land I will show you . ’
44007004	So Abraham left the country of Chaldea and went to live in Haran . After Abraham’s father died , God sent him to this place where you now live .
44007005	God did not give Abraham any of this land , not even a foot of it . But God promised that he would give this land to him and his descendants , even before Abraham had a child .
44007006	This is what God said to him : ‘ Your descendants will be strangers in a land they don’t own . The people there will make them slaves and will mistreat them for four hundred years .
44007007	But I will punish the nation where they are slaves . Then your descendants will leave that land and will worship me in this place . ’
44007008	God made an agreement with Abraham , the sign of which was circumcision . And so when Abraham had his son Isaac , Abraham circumcised him when he was eight days old . Isaac also circumcised his son Jacob , and Jacob did the same for his sons , the twelve ancestors of our people .
44007009	“ Jacob’s sons became jealous of Joseph and sold him to be a slave in Egypt . But God was with him
44007010	and saved him from all his troubles . The king of Egypt liked Joseph and respected him because of the wisdom God gave him . The king made him governor of Egypt and put him in charge of all the people in his palace .
44007011	“ Then all the land of Egypt and Canaan became so dry that nothing would grow , and the people suffered very much . Jacob’s sons , our ancestors , could not find anything to eat .
44007012	But when Jacob heard there was grain in Egypt , he sent his sons there . This was their first trip to Egypt .
44007013	When they went there a second time , Joseph told his brothers who he was , and the king learned about Joseph’s family .
44007014	Then Joseph sent messengers to invite Jacob , his father , to come to Egypt along with all his relatives ( seventy-five persons altogether ) .
44007015	So Jacob went down to Egypt , where he and his sons died .
44007016	Later their bodies were moved to Shechem and put in a grave there . ( It was the same grave Abraham had bought for a sum of money from the sons of Hamor in Shechem . )
44007017	“ The promise God made to Abraham was soon to come true , and the number of people in Egypt grew large .
44007018	Then a new king , who did not know who Joseph was , began to rule Egypt .
44007019	This king tricked our people and was cruel to our ancestors , forcing them to leave their babies outside to die .
44007020	At this time Moses was born , and he was very beautiful . For three months Moses was cared for in his father’s house .
44007021	When they put Moses outside , the king’s daughter adopted him and raised him as if he were her own son .
44007022	The Egyptians taught Moses everything they knew , and he was a powerful man in what he said and did .
44007023	“ When Moses was about forty years old , he thought it would be good to visit his own people , the people of Israel .
44007024	Moses saw an Egyptian mistreating one of his people , so he defended the Israelite and punished the Egyptian by killing him .
44007025	Moses thought his own people would understand that God was using him to save them , but they did not .
44007026	The next day when Moses saw two men of Israel fighting , he tried to make peace between them . He said , ‘ Men , you are brothers . Why are you hurting each other ? ’
44007027	The man who was hurting the other pushed Moses away and said , ‘ Who made you our ruler and judge ?
44007028	Are you going to kill me as you killed the Egyptian yesterday ? ’
44007029	When Moses heard him say this , he left Egypt and went to live in the land of Midian where he was a stranger . While Moses lived in Midian , he had two sons .
44007030	“ Forty years later an angel appeared to Moses in the flames of a burning bush as he was in the desert near Mount Sinai .
44007031	When Moses saw this , he was amazed and went near to look closer . Moses heard the Lord’s voice say ,
44007032	‘ I am the God of your ancestors , the God of Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob . ’ Moses began to shake with fear and was afraid to look .
44007033	The Lord said to him , ‘ Take off your sandals , because you are standing on holy ground .
44007034	I have seen the troubles my people have suffered in Egypt . I have heard their cries and have come down to save them . And now , Moses , I am sending you back to Egypt . ’
44007035	“ This Moses was the same man the two men of Israel rejected , saying , ‘ Who made you a ruler and judge ? ’ Moses is the same man God sent to be a ruler and savior , with the help of the angel that Moses saw in the burning bush .
44007036	So Moses led the people out of Egypt . He worked miracles and signs in Egypt , at the Red Sea , and then in the desert for forty years .
44007037	This is the same Moses that said to the people of Israel , ‘ God will give you a prophet like me , who is one of your own people . ’
44007038	This is the Moses who was with the gathering of the Israelites in the desert . He was with the angel that spoke to him at Mount Sinai , and he was with our ancestors . He received commands from God that give life , and he gave those commands to us .
44007039	“ But our ancestors did not want to obey Moses . They rejected him and wanted to go back to Egypt .
44007040	They said to Aaron , ‘ Make us gods who will lead us . Moses led us out of Egypt , but we don’t know what has happened to him . ’
44007041	So the people made an idol that looked like a calf . Then they brought sacrifices to it and were proud of what they had made with their own hands .
44007042	But God turned against them and did not try to stop them from worshiping the sun , moon , and stars . This is what is written in the book of the prophets : God says , ‘ People of Israel , you did not bring me sacrifices and offerings while you traveled in the desert for forty years .
44007043	You have carried with you the tent to worship Molech and the idols of the star god Rephan that you made to worship . So I will send you away beyond Babylon . ’
44007044	“ The Holy Tent where God spoke to our ancestors was with them in the desert . God told Moses how to make this Tent , and he made it like the plan God showed him .
44007045	Later , Joshua led our ancestors to capture the lands of the other nations . Our people went in , and God forced the other people out . When our people went into this new land , they took with them this same Tent they had received from their ancestors . They kept it until the time of David ,
44007046	who pleased God and asked God to let him build a house for him , the God of Jacob .
44007047	But Solomon was the one who built the Temple .
44007048	“ But the Most High does not live in houses that people build with their hands . As the prophet says :
44007049	‘ Heaven is my throne , and the earth is my footstool . So do you think you can build a house for me ? says the Lord . Do I need a place to rest ?
44007050	Remember , my hand made all these things ! ’ ”
44007051	Stephen continued speaking : “ You stubborn people ! You have not given your hearts to God , nor will you listen to him ! You are always against what the Holy Spirit is trying to tell you , just as your ancestors were .
44007052	Your ancestors tried to hurt every prophet who ever lived . Those prophets said long ago that the One who is good would come , but your ancestors killed them . And now you have turned against and killed the One who is good .
44007053	You received the law of Moses , which God gave you through his angels , but you haven’t obeyed it . ”
44007054	When the leaders heard this , they became furious . They were so mad they were grinding their teeth at Stephen .
44007055	But Stephen was full of the Holy Spirit . He looked up to heaven and saw the glory of God and Jesus standing at God’s right side .
44007056	He said , “ Look ! I see heaven open and the Son of Man standing at God’s right side . ”
44007057	Then they shouted loudly and covered their ears and all ran at Stephen .
44007058	They took him out of the city and began to throw stones at him to kill him . And those who told lies against Stephen left their coats with a young man named Saul .
44007059	While they were throwing stones , Stephen prayed , “ Lord Jesus , receive my spirit . ”
44007060	He fell on his knees and cried in a loud voice , “ Lord , do not hold this sin against them . ” After Stephen said this , he died .
44008001	Saul agreed that the killing of Stephen was good . On that day the church of Jerusalem began to be persecuted , and all the believers , except the apostles , were scattered throughout Judea and Samaria .
44008002	And some religious people buried Stephen and cried loudly for him .
44008003	Saul was also trying to destroy the church , going from house to house , dragging out men and women and putting them in jail .
44008004	And wherever they were scattered , they told people the Good News .
44008005	Philip went to the city of Samaria and preached about the Christ .
44008006	When the people there heard Philip and saw the miracles he was doing , they all listened carefully to what he said .
44008007	Many of these people had evil spirits in them , but Philip made the evil spirits leave . The spirits made a loud noise when they came out . Philip also healed many weak and crippled people there .
44008008	So the people in that city were very happy .
44008009	But there was a man named Simon in that city . Before Philip came there , Simon had practiced magic and amazed all the people of Samaria . He bragged and called himself a great man .
44008010	All the people — the least important and the most important — paid attention to Simon , saying , “ This man has the power of God , called ‘ the Great Power ’ ! ”
44008011	Simon had amazed them with his magic so long that the people became his followers .
44008012	But when Philip told them the Good News about the kingdom of God and the power of Jesus Christ , men and women believed Philip and were baptized .
44008013	Simon himself believed , and after he was baptized , he stayed very close to Philip . When he saw the miracles and the powerful things Philip did , Simon was amazed .
44008014	When the apostles who were still in Jerusalem heard that the people of Samaria had accepted the word of God , they sent Peter and John to them .
44008015	When Peter and John arrived , they prayed that the Samaritan believers might receive the Holy Spirit .
44008016	These people had been baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus , but the Holy Spirit had not yet come upon any of them .
44008017	Then , when the two apostles began laying their hands on the people , they received the Holy Spirit .
44008018	Simon saw that the Spirit was given to people when the apostles laid their hands on them . So he offered the apostles money ,
44008019	saying , “ Give me also this power so that anyone on whom I lay my hands will receive the Holy Spirit . ”
44008020	Peter said to him , “ You and your money should both be destroyed , because you thought you could buy God’s gift with money .
44008021	You cannot share with us in this work since your heart is not right before God .
44008022	Change your heart ! Turn away from this evil thing you have done , and pray to the Lord . Maybe he will forgive you for thinking this .
44008023	I see that you are full of bitter jealousy and ruled by sin . ”
44008024	Simon answered , “ Both of you pray for me to the Lord so the things you have said will not happen to me . ”
44008025	After Peter and John told the people what they had seen Jesus do and after they had spoken the message of the Lord , they went back to Jerusalem . On the way , they went through many Samaritan towns and preached the Good News to the people .
44008026	An angel of the Lord said to Philip , “ Get ready and go south to the road that leads down to Gaza from Jerusalem — the desert road . ”
44008027	So Philip got ready and went . On the road he saw a man from Ethiopia , a eunuch . He was an important officer in the service of Candace , the queen of the Ethiopians ; he was responsible for taking care of all her money . He had gone to Jerusalem to worship .
44008028	Now , as he was on his way home , he was sitting in his chariot reading from the Book of Isaiah , the prophet .
44008029	The Spirit said to Philip , “ Go to that chariot and stay near it . ”
44008030	So when Philip ran toward the chariot , he heard the man reading from Isaiah the prophet . Philip asked , “ Do you understand what you are reading ? ”
44008031	He answered , “ How can I understand unless someone explains it to me ? ” Then he invited Philip to climb in and sit with him .
44008032	The portion of Scripture he was reading was this : “ He was like a sheep being led to be killed . He was quiet , as a lamb is quiet while its wool is being cut ; he never opened his mouth .
44008033	He was shamed and was treated unfairly . He died without children to continue his family . His life on earth has ended . ”
44008034	The officer said to Philip , “ Please tell me , who is the prophet talking about — himself or someone else ? ”
44008035	Philip began to speak , and starting with this same Scripture , he told the man the Good News about Jesus .
44008036	While they were traveling down the road , they came to some water . The officer said , “ Look , here is water . What is stopping me from being baptized ? ” [
44008037	Philip answered , “ If you believe with all your heart , you can . ” The officer said , “ I believe that Jesus Christ is the Son of God . ” ]
44008038	Then the officer commanded the chariot to stop . Both Philip and the officer went down into the water , and Philip baptized him .
44008039	When they came up out of the water , the Spirit of the Lord took Philip away ; the officer never saw him again . And the officer continued on his way home , full of joy .
44008040	But Philip appeared in a city called Azotus and preached the Good News in all the towns on the way from Azotus to Caesarea .
44009001	In Jerusalem Saul was still threatening the followers of the Lord by saying he would kill them . So he went to the high priest
44009002	and asked him to write letters to the synagogues in the city of Damascus . Then if Saul found any followers of Christ’s Way , men or women , he would arrest them and bring them back to Jerusalem .
44009003	So Saul headed toward Damascus . As he came near the city , a bright light from heaven suddenly flashed around him .
44009004	Saul fell to the ground and heard a voice saying to him , “ Saul , Saul ! Why are you persecuting me ? ”
44009005	Saul said , “ Who are you , Lord ? ” The voice answered , “ I am Jesus , whom you are persecuting .
44009006	Get up now and go into the city . Someone there will tell you what you must do . ”
44009007	The people traveling with Saul stood there but said nothing . They heard the voice , but they saw no one .
44009008	Saul got up from the ground and opened his eyes , but he could not see . So those with Saul took his hand and led him into Damascus .
44009009	For three days Saul could not see and did not eat or drink .
44009010	There was a follower of Jesus in Damascus named Ananias . The Lord spoke to Ananias in a vision , “ Ananias ! ” Ananias answered , “ Here I am , Lord . ”
44009011	The Lord said to him , “ Get up and go to Straight Street . Find the house of Judas , and ask for a man named Saul from the city of Tarsus . He is there now , praying .
44009012	Saul has seen a vision in which a man named Ananias comes to him and lays his hands on him . Then he is able to see again . ”
44009013	But Ananias answered , “ Lord , many people have told me about this man and the terrible things he did to your holy people in Jerusalem .
44009014	Now he has come here to Damascus , and the leading priests have given him the power to arrest everyone who worships you . ”
44009015	But the Lord said to Ananias , “ Go ! I have chosen Saul for an important work . He must tell about me to those who are not Jews , to kings , and to the people of Israel .
44009016	I will show him how much he must suffer for my name . ”
44009017	So Ananias went to the house of Judas . He laid his hands on Saul and said , “ Brother Saul , the Lord Jesus sent me . He is the one you saw on the road on your way here . He sent me so that you can see again and be filled with the Holy Spirit . ”
44009018	Immediately , something that looked like fish scales fell from Saul’s eyes , and he was able to see again ! Then Saul got up and was baptized .
44009019	After he ate some food , his strength returned . Saul stayed with the followers of Jesus in Damascus for a few days .
44009020	Soon he began to preach about Jesus in the synagogues , saying , “ Jesus is the Son of God . ”
44009021	All the people who heard him were amazed . They said , “ This is the man who was in Jerusalem trying to destroy those who trust in this name ! He came here to arrest the followers of Jesus and take them back to the leading priests . ”
44009022	But Saul grew more powerful . His proofs that Jesus is the Christ were so strong that his own people in Damascus could not argue with him .
44009023	After many days , they made plans to kill Saul .
44009024	They were watching the city gates day and night , but Saul learned about their plan .
44009025	One night some followers of Saul helped him leave the city by lowering him in a basket through an opening in the city wall .
44009026	When Saul went to Jerusalem , he tried to join the group of followers , but they were all afraid of him . They did not believe he was really a follower .
44009027	But Barnabas accepted Saul and took him to the apostles . Barnabas explained to them that Saul had seen the Lord on the road and the Lord had spoken to Saul . Then he told them how boldly Saul had preached in the name of Jesus in Damascus .
44009028	And so Saul stayed with the followers , going everywhere in Jerusalem , preaching boldly in the name of the Lord .
44009029	He would often talk and argue with the Jewish people who spoke Greek , but they were trying to kill him .
44009030	When the followers learned about this , they took Saul to Caesarea and from there sent him to Tarsus .
44009031	The church everywhere in Judea , Galilee , and Samaria had a time of peace and became stronger . Respecting the Lord by the way they lived , and being encouraged by the Holy Spirit , the group of believers continued to grow .
44009032	As Peter was traveling through all the area , he visited God’s people who lived in Lydda .
44009033	There he met a man named Aeneas , who was paralyzed and had not been able to leave his bed for the past eight years .
44009034	Peter said to him , “ Aeneas , Jesus Christ heals you . Stand up and make your bed . ” Aeneas stood up immediately .
44009035	All the people living in Lydda and on the Plain of Sharon saw him and turned to the Lord .
44009036	In the city of Joppa there was a follower named Tabitha ( whose Greek name was Dorcas ) . She was always doing good deeds and kind acts .
44009037	While Peter was in Lydda , Tabitha became sick and died . Her body was washed and put in a room upstairs .
44009038	Since Lydda is near Joppa and the followers in Joppa heard that Peter was in Lydda , they sent two messengers to Peter . They begged him , “ Hurry , please come to us ! ”
44009039	So Peter got ready and went with them . When he arrived , they took him to the upstairs room where all the widows stood around Peter , crying . They showed him the shirts and coats Tabitha had made when she was still alive .
44009040	Peter sent everyone out of the room and kneeled and prayed . Then he turned to the body and said , “ Tabitha , stand up . ” She opened her eyes , and when she saw Peter , she sat up .
44009041	He gave her his hand and helped her up . Then he called the saints and the widows into the room and showed them that Tabitha was alive .
44009042	People everywhere in Joppa learned about this , and many believed in the Lord .
44009043	Peter stayed in Joppa for many days with a man named Simon who was a tanner .
44010001	At Caesarea there was a man named Cornelius , an officer in the Italian group of the Roman army .
44010002	Cornelius was a religious man . He and all the other people who lived in his house worshiped the true God . He gave much of his money to the poor and prayed to God often .
44010003	One afternoon about three o’clock , Cornelius clearly saw a vision . An angel of God came to him and said , “ Cornelius ! ”
44010004	Cornelius stared at the angel . He became afraid and said , “ What do you want , Lord ? ” The angel said , “ God has heard your prayers . He has seen that you give to the poor , and he remembers you .
44010005	Send some men now to Joppa to bring back a man named Simon who is also called Peter .
44010006	He is staying with a man , also named Simon , who is a tanner and has a house beside the sea . ”
44010007	When the angel who spoke to Cornelius left , Cornelius called two of his servants and a soldier , a religious man who worked for him .
44010008	Cornelius explained everything to them and sent them to Joppa .
44010009	About noon the next day as they came near Joppa , Peter was going up to the roof to pray .
44010010	He was hungry and wanted to eat , but while the food was being prepared , he had a vision .
44010011	He saw heaven opened and something coming down that looked like a big sheet being lowered to earth by its four corners .
44010012	In it were all kinds of animals , reptiles , and birds .
44010013	Then a voice said to Peter , “ Get up , Peter ; kill and eat . ”
44010014	But Peter said , “ No , Lord ! I have never eaten food that is unholy or unclean . ”
44010015	But the voice said to him again , “ God has made these things clean , so don’t call them unholy ! ”
44010016	This happened three times , and at once the sheet was taken back to heaven .
44010017	While Peter was wondering what this vision meant , the men Cornelius sent had found Simon’s house and were standing at the gate .
44010018	They asked , “ Is Simon Peter staying here ? ”
44010019	While Peter was still thinking about the vision , the Spirit said to him , “ Listen , three men are looking for you .
44010020	Get up and go downstairs . Go with them without doubting , because I have sent them to you . ”
44010021	So Peter went down to the men and said , “ I am the one you are looking for . Why did you come here ? ”
44010022	They said , “ A holy angel spoke to Cornelius , an army officer and a good man ; he worships God . All the people respect him . The angel told Cornelius to ask you to come to his house so that he can hear what you have to say . ”
44010023	So Peter asked the men to come in and spend the night . The next day Peter got ready and went with them , and some of the followers from Joppa joined him .
44010024	On the following day they came to Caesarea . Cornelius was waiting for them and had called together his relatives and close friends .
44010025	When Peter entered , Cornelius met him , fell at his feet , and worshiped him .
44010026	But Peter helped him up , saying , “ Stand up . I too am only a human . ”
44010027	As he talked with Cornelius , Peter went inside where he saw many people gathered .
44010028	He said , “ You people understand that it is against our law for Jewish people to associate with or visit anyone who is not Jewish . But God has shown me that I should not call any person ‘ unholy ’ or ‘ unclean . ’
44010029	That is why I did not argue when I was asked to come here . Now , please tell me why you sent for me . ”
44010030	Cornelius said , “ Four days ago , I was praying in my house at this same time — three o’clock in the afternoon . Suddenly , there was a man standing before me wearing shining clothes .
44010031	He said , ‘ Cornelius , God has heard your prayer and has seen that you give to the poor and remembers you .
44010032	So send some men to Joppa and ask Simon Peter to come . Peter is staying in the house of a man , also named Simon , who is a tanner and has a house beside the sea . ’
44010033	So I sent for you immediately , and it was very good of you to come . Now we are all here before God to hear everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us . ”
44010034	Peter began to speak : “ I really understand now that to God every person is the same .
44010035	In every country God accepts anyone who worships him and does what is right .
44010036	You know the message that God has sent to the people of Israel is the Good News that peace has come through Jesus Christ . Jesus is the Lord of all people !
44010037	You know what has happened all over Judea , beginning in Galilee after John preached to the people about baptism .
44010038	You know about Jesus from Nazareth , that God gave him the Holy Spirit and power . You know how Jesus went everywhere doing good and healing those who were ruled by the devil , because God was with him .
44010039	We saw what Jesus did in Judea and in Jerusalem , but the Jews in Jerusalem killed him by hanging him on a cross .
44010040	Yet , on the third day , God raised Jesus to life and caused him to be seen ,
44010041	not by all the people , but only by the witnesses God had already chosen . And we are those witnesses who ate and drank with him after he was raised from the dead .
44010042	He told us to preach to the people and to tell them that he is the one whom God chose to be the judge of the living and the dead .
44010043	All the prophets say it is true that all who believe in Jesus will be forgiven of their sins through Jesus’ name . ”
44010044	While Peter was still saying this , the Holy Spirit came down on all those who were listening .
44010045	The Jewish believers who came with Peter were amazed that the gift of the Holy Spirit had been given even to the nations .
44010046	These believers heard them speaking in different languages and praising God . Then Peter said ,
44010047	“ Can anyone keep these people from being baptized with water ? They have received the Holy Spirit just as we did ! ”
44010048	So Peter ordered that they be baptized in the name of Jesus Christ . Then they asked Peter to stay with them for a few days .
44011001	The apostles and the believers in Judea heard that some who were not Jewish had accepted God’s teaching too .
44011002	But when Peter came to Jerusalem , some people argued with him .
44011003	They said , “ You went into the homes of people who are not circumcised and ate with them ! ”
44011004	So Peter explained the whole story to them .
44011005	He said , “ I was in the city of Joppa , and while I was praying , I had a vision . I saw something that looked like a big sheet being lowered from heaven by its four corners . It came very close to me .
44011006	I looked inside it and saw animals , wild beasts , reptiles , and birds .
44011007	I heard a voice say to me , ‘ Get up , Peter . Kill and eat . ’
44011008	But I said , ‘ No , Lord ! I have never eaten anything that is unholy or unclean . ’
44011009	But the voice from heaven spoke again , ‘ God has made these things clean , so don’t call them unholy . ’
44011010	This happened three times . Then the whole thing was taken back to heaven .
44011011	Right then three men who were sent to me from Caesarea came to the house where I was staying .
44011012	The Spirit told me to go with them without doubting . These six believers here also went with me , and we entered the house of Cornelius .
44011013	He told us about the angel he saw standing in his house . The angel said to him , ‘ Send some men to Joppa and invite Simon Peter to come .
44011014	By the words he will say to you , you and all your family will be saved . ’
44011015	When I began my speech , the Holy Spirit came on them just as he came on us at the beginning .
44011016	Then I remembered the words of the Lord . He said , ‘ John baptized with water , but you will be baptized with the Holy Spirit . ’
44011017	Since God gave them the same gift he gave us who believed in the Lord Jesus Christ , how could I stop the work of God ? ”
44011018	When the believers heard this , they stopped arguing . They praised God and said , “ So God is allowing even other nations to turn to him and live . ”
44011019	Many of the believers were scattered when they were persecuted after Stephen was killed . Some of them went as far as Phoenicia , Cyprus , and Antioch telling the message to others , but only to Jews .
44011020	Some of these believers were people from Cyprus and Cyrene . When they came to Antioch , they spoke also to Greeks , telling them the Good News about the Lord Jesus .
44011021	The Lord was helping the believers , and a large group of people believed and turned to the Lord .
44011022	The church in Jerusalem heard about all of this , so they sent Barnabas to Antioch .
44011025	Then Barnabas went to the city of Tarsus to look for Saul ,
44011026	and when he found Saul , he brought him to Antioch . For a whole year Saul and Barnabas met with the church and taught many people there . In Antioch the followers were called Christians for the first time .
44011027	About that time some prophets came from Jerusalem to Antioch .
44011028	One of them , named Agabus , stood up and spoke with the help of the Holy Spirit . He said , “ A very hard time is coming to the whole world . There will be no food to eat . ” ( This happened when Claudius ruled . )
44011029	The followers all decided to help the believers who lived in Judea , as much as each one could .
44011030	They gathered the money and gave it to Barnabas and Saul , who brought it to the elders in Judea .
44012001	During that same time King Herod began to mistreat some who belonged to the church .
44012002	He ordered James , the brother of John , to be killed by the sword .
44012003	Herod saw that some of the people liked this , so he decided to arrest Peter , too . ( This happened during the time of the Feast of Unleavened Bread . )
44012004	After Herod arrested Peter , he put him in jail and handed him over to be guarded by sixteen soldiers . Herod planned to bring Peter before the people for trial after the Passover Feast .
44012005	So Peter was kept in jail , but the church prayed earnestly to God for him .
44012006	The night before Herod was to bring him to trial , Peter was sleeping between two soldiers , bound with two chains . Other soldiers were guarding the door of the jail .
44012007	Suddenly , an angel of the Lord stood there , and a light shined in the cell . The angel struck Peter on the side and woke him up . “ Hurry ! Get up ! ” the angel said . And the chains fell off Peter’s hands .
44012008	Then the angel told him , “ Get dressed and put on your sandals . ” And Peter did . Then the angel said , “ Put on your coat and follow me . ”
44012009	So Peter followed him out , but he did not know if what the angel was doing was real ; he thought he might be seeing a vision .
44012010	They went past the first and second guards and came to the iron gate that separated them from the city . The gate opened by itself for them , and they went through it . When they had walked down one street , the angel suddenly left him .
44012011	Then Peter realized what had happened . He thought , “ Now I know that the Lord really sent his angel to me . He rescued me from Herod and from all the things the people thought would happen . ”
44012012	When he considered this , he went to the home of Mary , the mother of John Mark . Many people were gathered there , praying .
44012013	Peter knocked on the outside door , and a servant girl named Rhoda came to answer it .
44012014	When she recognized Peter’s voice , she was so happy she forgot to open the door . Instead , she ran inside and told the group , “ Peter is at the door ! ”
44012015	They said to her , “ You are crazy ! ” But she kept on saying it was true , so they said , “ It must be Peter’s angel . ”
44012016	Peter continued to knock , and when they opened the door , they saw him and were amazed .
44012017	Peter made a sign with his hand to tell them to be quiet . He explained how the Lord led him out of the jail , and he said , “ Tell James and the other believers what happened . ” Then he left to go to another place .
44012018	The next day the soldiers were very upset and wondered what had happened to Peter .
44012019	Herod looked everywhere for him but could not find him . So he questioned the guards and ordered that they be killed . Later Herod moved from Judea and went to the city of Caesarea , where he stayed .
44012020	Herod was very angry with the people of Tyre and Sidon , but the people of those cities all came in a group to him . After convincing Blastus , the king’s personal servant , to be on their side , they asked Herod for peace , because their country got its food from his country .
44012021	On a chosen day Herod put on his royal robes , sat on his throne , and made a speech to the people .
44012022	They shouted , “ This is the voice of a god , not a human ! ”
44012023	Because Herod did not give the glory to God , an angel of the Lord immediately caused him to become sick , and he was eaten by worms and died .
44012024	God’s message continued to spread and reach people .
44012025	After Barnabas and Saul finished their task in Jerusalem , they returned to Antioch , taking John Mark with them .
44013001	In the church at Antioch there were these prophets and teachers : Barnabas , Simeon ( also called Niger ) , Lucius ( from the city of Cyrene ) , Manaen ( who had grown up with Herod , the ruler ) , and Saul .
44013002	They were all worshiping the Lord and fasting for a certain time . During this time the Holy Spirit said to them , “ Set apart for me Barnabas and Saul to do a special work for which I have chosen them . ”
44013003	So after they fasted and prayed , they laid their hands on Barnabas and Saul and sent them out .
44013004	Barnabas and Saul , sent out by the Holy Spirit , went to the city of Seleucia . From there they sailed to the island of Cyprus .
44013005	When they came to Salamis , they preached the Good News of God in the synagogues . John Mark was with them to help .
44013006	They went across the whole island to Paphos where they met a magician named Bar-Jesus . He was a false prophet
44013007	who always stayed close to Sergius Paulus , the governor and a smart man . He asked Barnabas and Saul to come to him , because he wanted to hear the message of God .
44013008	But Elymas , the magician , was against them . ( Elymas is the name for Bar-Jesus in the Greek language . ) He tried to stop the governor from believing in Jesus .
44013009	But Saul , who was also called Paul , was filled with the Holy Spirit . He looked straight at Elymas
44013010	and said , “ You son of the devil ! You are an enemy of everything that is right ! You are full of evil tricks and lies , always trying to change the Lord’s truths into lies .
44013011	Now the Lord will touch you , and you will be blind . For a time you will not be able to see anything — not even the light from the sun . ” Then everything became dark for Elymas , and he walked around , trying to find someone to lead him by the hand .
44013012	When the governor saw this , he believed because he was amazed at the teaching about the Lord .
44013013	Paul and those with him sailed from Paphos and came to Perga , in Pamphylia . There John Mark left them to return to Jerusalem .
44013014	They continued their trip from Perga and went to Antioch , a city in Pisidia . On the Sabbath day they went into the synagogue and sat down .
44013015	After the law of Moses and the writings of the prophets were read , the leaders of the synagogue sent a message to Paul and Barnabas : “ Brothers , if you have any message that will encourage the people , please speak . ”
44013016	Paul stood up , raised his hand , and said , “ You Israelites and you who worship God , please listen !
44013017	The God of the Israelites chose our ancestors . He made the people great during the time they lived in Egypt , and he brought them out of that country with great power .
44013018	And he was patient with them for forty years in the desert .
44013019	God destroyed seven nations in the land of Canaan and gave the land to his people .
44013020	All this happened in about four hundred fifty years . “ After this , God gave them judges until the time of Samuel the prophet .
44013021	Then the people asked for a king , so God gave them Saul son of Kish . Saul was from the tribe of Benjamin and was king for forty years .
44013022	After God took him away , God made David their king . God said about him : ‘ I have found in David son of Jesse the kind of man I want . He will do all I want him to do . ’
44013023	So God has brought Jesus , one of David’s descendants , to Israel to be its Savior , as he promised .
44013024	Before Jesus came , John preached to all the people of Israel about a baptism of changed hearts and lives .
44013025	When he was finishing his work , he said , ‘ Who do you think I am ? I am not the Christ . He is coming later , and I am not worthy to untie his sandals . ’
44013026	“ Brothers , sons of the family of Abraham , and others who worship God , listen ! The news about this salvation has been sent to us .
44013027	Those who live in Jerusalem and their leaders did not realize that Jesus was the Savior . They did not understand the words that the prophets wrote , which are read every Sabbath day . But they made them come true when they said Jesus was guilty .
44013028	They could not find any real reason for Jesus to be put to death , but they asked Pilate to have him killed .
44013029	When they had done to him all that the Scriptures had said , they took him down from the cross and laid him in a tomb .
44013030	But God raised him up from the dead !
44013031	After this , for many days , those who had gone with Jesus from Galilee to Jerusalem saw him . They are now his witnesses to the people .
44013032	We tell you the Good News about the promise God made to our ancestors .
44013033	God has made this promise come true for us , his children , by raising Jesus from the dead .
44013034	God raised Jesus from the dead , and he will never go back to the grave and become dust . So God said : ‘ I will give you the holy and sure blessings that I promised to David . ’
44013035	But in another place God says : ‘ You will not let your Holy One rot . ’
44013036	David did God’s will during his lifetime . Then he died and was buried beside his ancestors , and his body did rot in the grave .
44013037	But the One God raised from the dead did not rot in the grave .
44013040	Be careful ! Don’t let what the prophets said happen to you :
44013041	‘ Listen , you people who doubt ! You can wonder , and then die . I will do something in your lifetime that you won’t believe even when you are told about it ! ’ ”
44013042	While Paul and Barnabas were leaving the synagogue , the people asked them to tell them more about these things on the next Sabbath .
44013043	When the meeting was over , many people with those who had changed to worship God followed Paul and Barnabas from that place . Paul and Barnabas were persuading them to continue trusting in God’s grace .
44013044	On the next Sabbath day , almost everyone in the city came to hear the word of the Lord .
44013045	Seeing the crowd , the Jewish people became very jealous and said insulting things and argued against what Paul said .
44013046	But Paul and Barnabas spoke very boldly , saying , “ We must speak the message of God to you first . But you refuse to listen . You are judging yourselves not worthy of having eternal life ! So we will now go to the people of other nations .
44013047	This is what the Lord told us to do , saying : ‘ I have made you a light for the nations ; you will show people all over the world the way to be saved . ’ ”
44013048	When those who were not Jewish heard Paul say this , they were happy and gave honor to the message of the Lord . And the people who were chosen to have life forever believed the message .
44013049	So the message of the Lord was spreading through the whole country .
44013050	But the Jewish people stirred up some of the important religious women and the leaders of the city . They started trouble against Paul and Barnabas and forced them out of their area .
44013051	So Paul and Barnabas shook the dust off their feet and went to Iconium .
44013052	But the followers were filled with joy and the Holy Spirit .
44014001	In Iconium , Paul and Barnabas went as usual to the synagogue . They spoke so well that a great many Jews and Greeks believed .
44014002	But some people who did not believe excited the others and turned them against the believers .
44014003	Paul and Barnabas stayed in Iconium a long time and spoke bravely for the Lord . He showed that their message about his grace was true by giving them the power to work miracles and signs .
44014004	But the city was divided . Some of the people agreed with the Jews , and others believed the apostles .
44014005	Some who were not Jews , some Jews , and some of their rulers wanted to mistreat Paul and Barnabas and to stone them to death .
44014006	When Paul and Barnabas learned about this , they ran away to Lystra and Derbe , cities in Lycaonia , and to the areas around those cities .
44014007	They announced the Good News there , too .
44014008	In Lystra there sat a man who had been born crippled ; he had never walked .
44014009	As this man was listening to Paul speak , Paul looked straight at him and saw that he believed God could heal him .
44014010	So he cried out , “ Stand up on your feet ! ” The man jumped up and began walking around .
44014011	When the crowds saw what Paul did , they shouted in the Lycaonian language , “ The gods have become like humans and have come down to us ! ”
44014012	Then the people began to call Barnabas “ Zeus ” and Paul “ Hermes , ” because he was the main speaker .
44014013	The priest in the temple of Zeus , which was near the city , brought some bulls and flowers to the city gates . He and the people wanted to offer a sacrifice to Paul and Barnabas .
44014014	But when the apostles , Barnabas and Paul , heard about it , they tore their clothes . They ran in among the people , shouting ,
44014015	“ Friends , why are you doing these things ? We are only human beings like you . We are bringing you the Good News and are telling you to turn away from these worthless things and turn to the living God . He is the One who made the sky , the earth , the sea , and everything in them .
44014016	In the past , God let all the nations do what they wanted .
44014017	Yet he proved he is real by showing kindness , by giving you rain from heaven and crops at the right times , by giving you food and filling your hearts with joy . ”
44014018	Even with these words , they were barely able to keep the crowd from offering sacrifices to them .
44014019	Then some evil people came from Antioch and Iconium and persuaded the people to turn against Paul . So they threw stones at him and dragged him out of town , thinking they had killed him .
44014020	But the followers gathered around him , and he got up and went back into the town . The next day he and Barnabas left and went to the city of Derbe .
44014021	Paul and Barnabas told the Good News in Derbe , and many became followers . Paul and Barnabas returned to Lystra , Iconium , and Antioch ,
44014022	making the followers of Jesus stronger and helping them stay in the faith . They said , “ We must suffer many things to enter God’s kingdom . ”
44014023	They chose elders for each church , by praying and fasting for a certain time . These elders had trusted the Lord , so Paul and Barnabas put them in the Lord’s care .
44014024	Then they went through Pisidia and came to Pamphylia .
44014025	When they had preached the message in Perga , they went down to Attalia .
44014026	And from there they sailed away to Antioch where the believers had put them into God’s care and had sent them out to do this work . Now they had finished .
44014027	When they arrived in Antioch , Paul and Barnabas gathered the church together . They told the church all about what God had done with them and how God had made it possible for those who were not Jewish to believe .
44014028	And they stayed there a long time with the followers .
44015001	Then some people came to Antioch from Judea and began teaching the non-Jewish believers : “ You cannot be saved if you are not circumcised as Moses taught us . ”
44015002	Paul and Barnabas were against this teaching and argued with them about it . So the church decided to send Paul , Barnabas , and some others to Jerusalem where they could talk more about this with the apostles and elders .
44015003	The church helped them leave on the trip , and they went through the countries of Phoenicia and Samaria , telling all about how the other nations had turned to God . This made all the believers very happy .
