45003015	“ They are always ready to kill people .
45003016	Everywhere they go they cause ruin and misery .
45003017	They don’t know how to live in peace . ”
45003018	“ They have no fear of God . ”
45003019	We know that the law’s commands are for those who have the law . This stops all excuses and brings the whole world under God’s judgment ,
45003020	because no one can be made right with God by following the law . The law only shows us our sin .
45003021	But God has a way to make people right with him without the law , and he has now shown us that way which the law and the prophets told us about .
45003022	God makes people right with himself through their faith in Jesus Christ . This is true for all who believe in Christ , because all people are the same :
45003023	Everyone has sinned and fallen short of God’s glorious standard ,
45003024	and all need to be made right with God by his grace , which is a free gift . They need to be made free from sin through Jesus Christ .
45003025	God sent him to die in our place to take away our sins . We receive forgiveness through faith in the blood of Jesus’ death . This showed that God always does what is right and fair , as in the past when he was patient and did not punish people for their sins .
45003026	And God gave Jesus to show today that he does what is right . God did this so he could judge rightly and so he could make right any person who has faith in Jesus .
45003027	So do we have a reason to brag about ourselves ? No ! And why not ? It is the way of faith that stops all bragging , not the way of trying to obey the law .
45003028	A person is made right with God through faith , not through obeying the law .
45003029	Is God only the God of the Jews ? Is he not also the God of those who are not Jews ?
45003030	Of course he is , because there is only one God . He will make Jews right with him by their faith , and he will also make those who are not Jews right with him through their faith .
45003031	So do we destroy the law by following the way of faith ? No ! Faith causes us to be what the law truly wants .
45004001	So what can we say that Abraham , the father of our people , learned about faith ?
45004002	If Abraham was made right by the things he did , he had a reason to brag . But this is not God’s view ,
45004003	because the Scripture says , “ Abraham believed God , and God accepted Abraham’s faith , and that faith made him right with God . ”
45004004	When people work , their pay is not given as a gift , but as something earned .
45004005	But people cannot do any work that will make them right with God . So they must trust in him , who makes even evil people right in his sight . Then God accepts their faith , and that makes them right with him .
45004006	David said the same thing . He said that people are truly blessed when God , without paying attention to their deeds , makes people right with himself .
45004007	“ Blessed are they whose sins are forgiven , whose wrongs are pardoned .
45004008	Blessed is the person whom the Lord does not consider guilty . ”
45004009	Is this blessing only for those who are circumcised or also for those who are not circumcised ? We have already said that God accepted Abraham’s faith and that faith made him right with God .
45004010	So how did this happen ? Did God accept Abraham before or after he was circumcised ? It was before his circumcision .
45004011	Abraham was circumcised to show that he was right with God through faith before he was circumcised . So Abraham is the father of all those who believe but are not circumcised ; he is the father of all believers who are accepted as being right with God .
45004012	And Abraham is also the father of those who have been circumcised and who live following the faith that our father Abraham had before he was circumcised .
45004013	Abraham and his descendants received the promise that they would get the whole world . He did not receive that promise through the law , but through being right with God by his faith .
45004014	If people could receive what God promised by following the law , then faith is worthless . And God’s promise to Abraham is worthless ,
45004015	because the law can only bring God’s anger . But if there is no law , there is nothing to disobey .
45004016	So people receive God’s promise by having faith . This happens so the promise can be a free gift . Then all of Abraham’s children can have that promise . It is not only for those who live under the law of Moses but for anyone who lives with faith like that of Abraham , who is the father of us all .
45004017	As it is written in the Scriptures : “ I am making you a father of many nations . ” This is true before God , the God Abraham believed , the God who gives life to the dead and who creates something out of nothing .
45004018	There was no hope that Abraham would have children . But Abraham believed God and continued hoping , and so he became the father of many nations . As God told him , “ Your descendants also will be too many to count . ”
45004019	Abraham was almost a hundred years old , much past the age for having children , and Sarah could not have children . Abraham thought about all this , but his faith in God did not become weak .
45004020	He never doubted that God would keep his promise , and he never stopped believing . He grew stronger in his faith and gave praise to God .
45004021	Abraham felt sure that God was able to do what he had promised .
45004022	So , “ God accepted Abraham’s faith , and that faith made him right with God . ”
45004023	Those words ( “ God accepted Abraham’s faith ” ) were written not only for Abraham
45004024	but also for us . God will accept us also because we believe in the One who raised Jesus our Lord from the dead .
45004025	Jesus was given to die for our sins , and he was raised from the dead to make us right with God .
45005001	Since we have been made right with God by our faith , we have peace with God . This happened through our Lord Jesus Christ ,
45005002	who through our faith has brought us into that blessing of God’s grace that we now enjoy . And we are happy because of the hope we have of sharing God’s glory .
45005003	We also have joy with our troubles , because we know that these troubles produce patience .
45005004	And patience produces character , and character produces hope .
45005005	And this hope will never disappoint us , because God has poured out his love to fill our hearts . He gave us his love through the Holy Spirit , whom God has given to us .
45005006	When we were unable to help ourselves , at the right time , Christ died for us , although we were living against God .
45005007	Very few people will die to save the life of someone else . Although perhaps for a good person someone might possibly die .
45005008	But God shows his great love for us in this way : Christ died for us while we were still sinners .
45005009	So through Christ we will surely be saved from God’s anger , because we have been made right with God by the blood of Christ’s death .
45005010	While we were God’s enemies , he made us his friends through the death of his Son . Surely , now that we are his friends , he will save us through his Son’s life .
45005011	And not only that , but now we are also very happy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ . Through him we are now God’s friends again .
45005012	Sin came into the world because of what one man did , and with sin came death . This is why everyone must die — because everyone sinned .
45005013	Sin was in the world before the law of Moses , but sin is not counted against us as breaking a command when there is no law .
45005014	But from the time of Adam to the time of Moses , everyone had to die , even those who had not sinned by breaking a command , as Adam had . Adam was like the One who was coming in the future .
45005015	But God’s free gift is not like Adam’s sin . Many people died because of the sin of that one man . But the grace from God was much greater ; many people received God’s gift of life by the grace of the one man , Jesus Christ .
45005016	After Adam sinned once , he was judged guilty . But the gift of God is different . God’s free gift came after many sins , and it makes people right with God .
45005017	One man sinned , and so death ruled all people because of that one man . But now those people who accept God’s full grace and the great gift of being made right with him will surely have true life and rule through the one man , Jesus Christ .
45005018	So as one sin of Adam brought the punishment of death to all people , one good act that Christ did makes all people right with God . And that brings true life for all .
45005019	One man disobeyed God , and many became sinners . In the same way , one man obeyed God , and many will be made right .
45005020	The law came to make sin worse . But when sin grew worse , God’s grace increased .
45005021	Sin once used death to rule us , but God gave people more of his grace so that grace could rule by making people right with him . And this brings life forever through Jesus Christ our Lord .
45006001	So do you think we should continue sinning so that God will give us even more grace ?
45006002	No ! We died to our old sinful lives , so how can we continue living with sin ?
45006003	Did you forget that all of us became part of Christ when we were baptized ? We shared his death in our baptism .
45006004	When we were baptized , we were buried with Christ and shared his death . So , just as Christ was raised from the dead by the wonderful power of the Father , we also can live a new life .
45006005	Christ died , and we have been joined with him by dying too . So we will also be joined with him by rising from the dead as he did .
45006006	We know that our old life died with Christ on the cross so that our sinful selves would have no power over us and we would not be slaves to sin .
45006007	Anyone who has died is made free from sin’s control .
45006008	If we died with Christ , we know we will also live with him .
45006009	Christ was raised from the dead , and we know that he cannot die again . Death has no power over him now .
45006010	Yes , when Christ died , he died to defeat the power of sin one time — enough for all time . He now has a new life , and his new life is with God .
45006011	In the same way , you should see yourselves as being dead to the power of sin and alive with God through Christ Jesus .
45006012	So , do not let sin control your life here on earth so that you do what your sinful self wants to do .
45006013	Do not offer the parts of your body to serve sin , as things to be used in doing evil . Instead , offer yourselves to God as people who have died and now live . Offer the parts of your body to God to be used in doing good .
45006014	Sin will not be your master , because you are not under law but under God’s grace .
45006015	So what should we do ? Should we sin because we are under grace and not under law ? No !
45006016	Surely you know that when you give yourselves like slaves to obey someone , then you are really slaves of that person . The person you obey is your master . You can follow sin , which brings spiritual death , or you can obey God , which makes you right with him .
45006017	In the past you were slaves to sin — sin controlled you . But thank God , you fully obeyed the things that you were taught .
45006018	You were made free from sin , and now you are slaves to goodness .
45006019	I use this example because this is hard for you to understand . In the past you offered the parts of your body to be slaves to sin and evil ; you lived only for evil . In the same way now you must give yourselves to be slaves of goodness . Then you will live only for God .
45006020	In the past you were slaves to sin , and goodness did not control you .
45006021	You did evil things , and now you are ashamed of them . Those things only bring death .
45006022	But now you are free from sin and have become slaves of God . This brings you a life that is only for God , and this gives you life forever .
45006023	The payment for sin is death . But God gives us the free gift of life forever in Christ Jesus our Lord .
45007001	Brothers and sisters , all of you understand the law of Moses . So surely you know that the law rules over people only while they are alive .
45007002	For example , a woman must stay married to her husband as long as he is alive . But if her husband dies , she is free from the law of marriage .
45007003	But if she marries another man while her husband is still alive , the law says she is guilty of adultery . But if her husband dies , she is free from the law of marriage . Then if she marries another man , she is not guilty of adultery .
45007004	In the same way , my brothers and sisters , your old selves died , and you became free from the law through the body of Christ . This happened so that you might belong to someone else — the One who was raised from the dead — and so that we might be used in service to God .
45007005	In the past , we were ruled by our sinful selves . The law made us want to do sinful things that controlled our bodies , so the things we did were bringing us death .
45007006	In the past , the law held us like prisoners , but our old selves died , and we were made free from the law . So now we serve God in a new way with the Spirit , and not in the old way with written rules .
45007007	You might think I am saying that sin and the law are the same thing . That is not true . But the law was the only way I could learn what sin meant . I would never have known what it means to want to take something belonging to someone else if the law had not said , “ You must not want to take your neighbor’s things . ”
45007008	And sin found a way to use that command and cause me to want all kinds of things I should not want . But without the law , sin has no power .
45007009	I was alive before I knew the law . But when the law’s command came to me , then sin began to live ,
45007010	and I died . The command was meant to bring life , but for me it brought death .
45007011	Sin found a way to fool me by using the command to make me die .
45007012	So the law is holy , and the command is holy and right and good .
45007013	Does this mean that something that is good brought death to me ? No ! Sin used something that is good to bring death to me . This happened so that I could see what sin is really like ; the command was used to show that sin is very evil .
45007014	We know that the law is spiritual , but I am not spiritual since sin rules me as if I were its slave .
45007015	I do not understand the things I do . I do not do what I want to do , and I do the things I hate .
45007016	And if I do not want to do the hated things I do , that means I agree that the law is good .
45007017	But I am not really the one who is doing these hated things ; it is sin living in me that does them .
45007018	Yes , I know that nothing good lives in me — I mean nothing good lives in the part of me that is earthly and sinful . I want to do the things that are good , but I do not do them .
45007019	I do not do the good things I want to do , but I do the bad things I do not want to do .
45007020	So if I do things I do not want to do , then I am not the one doing them . It is sin living in me that does those things .
45007021	So I have learned this rule : When I want to do good , evil is there with me .
45007022	In my mind , I am happy with God’s law .
45007023	But I see another law working in my body , which makes war against the law that my mind accepts . That other law working in my body is the law of sin , and it makes me its prisoner .
45007024	What a miserable man I am ! Who will save me from this body that brings me death ?
45007025	I thank God for saving me through Jesus Christ our Lord ! So in my mind I am a slave to God’s law , but in my sinful self I am a slave to the law of sin .
45008001	So now , those who are in Christ Jesus are not judged guilty .
45008002	Through Christ Jesus the law of the Spirit that brings life made you free from the law that brings sin and death .
45008003	The law was without power , because the law was made weak by our sinful selves . But God did what the law could not do . He sent his own Son to earth with the same human life that others use for sin . By sending his Son to be an offering for sin , God used a human life to destroy sin .
45008004	He did this so that we could be the kind of people the law correctly wants us to be . Now we do not live following our sinful selves , but we live following the Spirit .
45008005	Those who live following their sinful selves think only about things that their sinful selves want . But those who live following the Spirit are thinking about the things the Spirit wants them to do .
45008006	If people’s thinking is controlled by the sinful self , there is death . But if their thinking is controlled by the Spirit , there is life and peace .
45008007	When people’s thinking is controlled by the sinful self , they are against God , because they refuse to obey God’s law and really are not even able to obey God’s law .
45008008	Those people who are ruled by their sinful selves cannot please God .
45008009	But you are not ruled by your sinful selves . You are ruled by the Spirit , if that Spirit of God really lives in you . But the person who does not have the Spirit of Christ does not belong to Christ .
45008010	Your body will always be dead because of sin . But if Christ is in you , then the Spirit gives you life , because Christ made you right with God .
45008011	God raised Jesus from the dead , and if God’s Spirit is living in you , he will also give life to your bodies that die . God is the One who raised Christ from the dead , and he will give life through his Spirit that lives in you .
45008012	So , my brothers and sisters , we must not be ruled by our sinful selves or live the way our sinful selves want .
45008013	If you use your lives to do the wrong things your sinful selves want , you will die spiritually . But if you use the Spirit’s help to stop doing the wrong things you do with your body , you will have true life .
45008014	The true children of God are those who let God’s Spirit lead them .
45008015	The Spirit we received does not make us slaves again to fear ; it makes us children of God . With that Spirit we cry out , “ Father . ”
45008016	And the Spirit himself joins with our spirits to say we are God’s children .
45008017	If we are God’s children , we will receive blessings from God together with Christ . But we must suffer as Christ suffered so that we will have glory as Christ has glory .
45008018	The sufferings we have now are nothing compared to the great glory that will be shown to us .
45008019	Everything God made is waiting with excitement for God to show his children’s glory completely .
45008020	Everything God made was changed to become useless , not by its own wish but because God wanted it and because all along there was this hope :
45008021	that everything God made would be set free from ruin to have the freedom and glory that belong to God’s children .
45008022	We know that everything God made has been waiting until now in pain , like a woman ready to give birth .
45008023	Not only the world , but we also have been waiting with pain inside us . We have the Spirit as the first part of God’s promise . So we are waiting for God to finish making us his own children , which means our bodies will be made free .
45008024	We were saved , and we have this hope . If we see what we are waiting for , that is not really hope . People do not hope for something they already have .
45008025	But we are hoping for something we do not have yet , and we are waiting for it patiently .
45008026	Also , the Spirit helps us with our weakness . We do not know how to pray as we should . But the Spirit himself speaks to God for us , even begs God for us with deep feelings that words cannot explain .
45008027	God can see what is in people’s hearts . And he knows what is in the mind of the Spirit , because the Spirit speaks to God for his people in the way God wants .
45008028	We know that in everything God works for the good of those who love him . They are the people he called , because that was his plan .
45008029	God knew them before he made the world , and he chose them to be like his Son so that Jesus would be the firstborn of many brothers and sisters .
45008030	God planned for them to be like his Son ; and those he planned to be like his Son , he also called ; and those he called , he also made right with him ; and those he made right , he also glorified .
45008031	So what should we say about this ? If God is for us , no one can defeat us .
45008032	He did not spare his own Son but gave him for us all . So with Jesus , God will surely give us all things .
45008033	Who can accuse the people God has chosen ? No one , because God is the One who makes them right .
45008034	Who can say God’s people are guilty ? No one , because Christ Jesus died , but he was also raised from the dead , and now he is on God’s right side , appealing to God for us .
45008035	Can anything separate us from the love Christ has for us ? Can troubles or problems or sufferings or hunger or nakedness or danger or violent death ?
45008036	As it is written in the Scriptures : “ For you we are in danger of death all the time . People think we are worth no more than sheep to be killed . ”
45008037	But in all these things we are completely victorious through God who showed his love for us .
45008038	Yes , I am sure that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor ruling spirits , nothing now , nothing in the future , no powers ,
45008039	nothing above us , nothing below us , nor anything else in the whole world will ever be able to separate us from the love of God that is in Christ Jesus our Lord .
45009001	I am in Christ , and I am telling you the truth ; I do not lie . My conscience is ruled by the Holy Spirit , and it tells me I am not lying .
45009002	I have great sorrow and always feel much sadness .
45009003	I wish I could help my Jewish brothers and sisters , my people . I would even wish that I were cursed and cut off from Christ if that would help them .
45009004	They are the people of Israel , God’s chosen children . They have seen the glory of God , and they have the agreements that God made between himself and his people . God gave them the law of Moses and the right way of worship and his promises .
45009005	They are the descendants of our great ancestors , and they are the earthly family into which Christ was born , who is God over all . Praise him forever ! Amen .
45009006	It is not that God failed to keep his promise to them . But only some of the people of Israel are truly God’s people ,
45009007	and only some of Abraham’s descendants are true children of Abraham . But God said to Abraham : “ The descendants I promised you will be from Isaac . ”
45009008	This means that not all of Abraham’s descendants are God’s true children . Abraham’s true children are those who become God’s children because of the promise God made to Abraham .
45009009	God’s promise to Abraham was this : “ At the right time I will return , and Sarah will have a son . ”
45009010	And that is not all . Rebekah’s sons had the same father , our father Isaac .
45009013	As the Scripture says , “ I loved Jacob , but I hated Esau . ”
45009014	So what should we say about this ? Is God unfair ? In no way .
45009015	God said to Moses , “ I will show kindness to anyone to whom I want to show kindness , and I will show mercy to anyone to whom I want to show mercy . ”
45009016	So God will choose the one to whom he decides to show mercy ; his choice does not depend on what people want or try to do .
45009017	The Scripture says to the king of Egypt : “ I made you king for this reason : to show my power in you so that my name will be talked about in all the earth . ”
45009018	So God shows mercy where he wants to show mercy , and he makes stubborn the people he wants to make stubborn .
45009019	So one of you will ask me : “ Then why does God blame us for our sins ? Who can fight his will ? ”
45009020	You are only human , and human beings have no right to question God . An object should not ask the person who made it , “ Why did you make me like this ? ”
45009021	The potter can make anything he wants to make . He can use the same clay to make one thing for special use and another thing for daily use .
45009022	It is the same way with God . He wanted to show his anger and to let people see his power . But he patiently stayed with those people he was angry with — people who were made ready to be destroyed .
45009023	He waited with patience so that he could make known his rich glory to the people who receive his mercy . He has prepared these people to have his glory ,
45009024	and we are those people whom God called . He called us not from the Jews only but also from those who are not Jews .
45009025	As the Scripture says in Hosea : “ I will say , ‘ You are my people ’ to those I had called ‘ not my people . ’ And I will show my love to those people I did not love . ”
45009026	“ They were called , ‘ You are not my people , ’ but later they will be called ‘ children of the living God . ’ ”
45009027	And Isaiah cries out about Israel : “ The people of Israel are many , like the grains of sand by the sea . But only a few of them will be saved ,
45009028	because the Lord will quickly and completely punish the people on the earth . ”
45009029	It is as Isaiah said : “ The Lord All-Powerful allowed a few of our descendants to live . Otherwise we would have been completely destroyed like the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah . ”
45009030	So what does all this mean ? Those who are not Jews were not trying to make themselves right with God , but they were made right with God because of their faith .
45009031	The people of Israel tried to follow a law to make themselves right with God . But they did not succeed ,
45009032	because they tried to make themselves right by the things they did instead of trusting in God to make them right . They stumbled over the stone that causes people to stumble .
45009033	As it is written in the Scripture : “ I will put in Jerusalem a stone that causes people to stumble , a rock that makes them fall . Anyone who trusts in him will never be disappointed . ”
45010001	Brothers and sisters , the thing I want most is for all the Jews to be saved . That is my prayer to God .
45010002	I can say this about them : They really try to follow God , but they do not know the right way .
45010003	Because they did not know the way that God makes people right with him , they tried to make themselves right in their own way . So they did not accept God’s way of making people right .
45010004	Christ ended the law so that everyone who believes in him may be right with God .
45010005	Moses writes about being made right by following the law . He says , “ A person who obeys these things will live because of them . ”
45010006	But this is what the Scripture says about being made right through faith : “ Don’t say to yourself , ‘ Who will go up into heaven ? ’ ” ( That means , “ Who will go up to heaven and bring Christ down to earth ? ” )
45010007	“ And do not say , ‘ Who will go down into the world below ? ’ ” ( That means , “ Who will go down and bring Christ up from the dead ? ” )
45010008	This is what the Scripture says : “ The word is near you ; it is in your mouth and in your heart . ” That is the teaching of faith that we are telling .
45010009	If you declare with your mouth , “ Jesus is Lord , ” and if you believe in your heart that God raised Jesus from the dead , you will be saved .
45010010	We believe with our hearts , and so we are made right with God . And we declare with our mouths that we believe , and so we are saved .
45010011	As the Scripture says , “ Anyone who trusts in him will never be disappointed . ”
45010012	That Scripture says “ anyone ” because there is no difference between those who are Jews and those who are not . The same Lord is the Lord of all and gives many blessings to all who trust in him ,
45010013	as the Scripture says , “ Anyone who calls on the Lord will be saved . ”
45010014	But before people can ask the Lord for help , they must believe in him ; and before they can believe in him , they must hear about him ; and for them to hear about the Lord , someone must tell them ;
45010015	and before someone can go and tell them , that person must be sent . It is written , “ How beautiful is the person who comes to bring good news . ”
45010016	But not all the Jews accepted the good news . Isaiah said , “ Lord , who believed what we told them ? ”
45010017	So faith comes from hearing the Good News , and people hear the Good News when someone tells them about Christ .
45010018	But I ask : Didn’t people hear the Good News ? Yes , they heard — as the Scripture says : “ Their message went out through all the world ; their words go everywhere on earth . ”
45010019	Again I ask : Didn’t the people of Israel understand ? Yes , they did understand . First , Moses says : “ I will use those who are not a nation to make you jealous . I will use a nation that does not understand to make you angry . ”
45010020	Then Isaiah is bold enough to say : “ I was found by those who were not asking me for help . I made myself known to people who were not looking for me . ”
45010021	But about Israel God says , “ All day long I stood ready to accept people who disobey and are stubborn . ”
45011001	So I ask : Did God throw out his people ? No ! I myself am an Israelite from the family of Abraham , from the tribe of Benjamin .
45011002	God chose the Israelites to be his people before they were born , and he has not thrown his people out . Surely you know what the Scripture says about Elijah , how he prayed to God against the people of Israel .
45011003	“ Lord , ” he said , “ they have killed your prophets , and they have destroyed your altars . I am the only prophet left , and now they are trying to kill me , too . ”
45011004	But what answer did God give Elijah ? He said , “ But I have left seven thousand people in Israel who have never bowed down before Baal . ”
45011005	It is the same now . There are a few people that God has chosen by his grace .
45011006	And if he chose them by grace , it is not for the things they have done . If they could be made God’s people by what they did , God’s gift of grace would not really be a gift .
45011007	So this is what has happened : Although the Israelites tried to be right with God , they did not succeed , but the ones God chose did become right with him . The others were made stubborn and refused to listen to God .
45011008	As it is written in the Scriptures : “ God gave the people a dull mind so they could not understand . ” “ He closed their eyes so they could not see and their ears so they could not hear . This continues until today . ”
45011009	And David says : “ Let their own feasts trap them and cause their ruin ; let their feasts cause them to stumble and be paid back .
45011010	Let their eyes be closed so they cannot see and their backs be forever weak from troubles . ”
45011011	So I ask : When the Jews fell , did that fall destroy them ? No ! But their failure brought salvation to those who are not Jews , in order to make the Jews jealous .
45011012	The Jews’ failure brought rich blessings for the world , and the Jews’ loss brought rich blessings for the non-Jewish people . So surely the world will receive much richer blessings when enough Jews become the kind of people God wants .
45011013	Now I am speaking to you who are not Jews . I am an apostle to those who are not Jews , and since I have that work , I will make the most of it .
45011014	I hope I can make my own people jealous and , in that way , help some of them to be saved .
45011015	When God turned away from the Jews , he became friends with other people in the world . So when God accepts the Jews , surely that will bring them life after death .
45011016	If the first piece of bread is offered to God , then the whole loaf is made holy . If the roots of a tree are holy , then the tree’s branches are holy too .
45011017	It is as if some of the branches from an olive tree have been broken off . You non-Jewish people are like the branch of a wild olive tree that has been joined to that first tree . You now share the strength and life of the first tree , the Jews .
45011018	So do not brag about those branches that were broken off . If you brag , remember that you do not support the root , but the root supports you .
45011019	You will say , “ Branches were broken off so that I could be joined to their tree . ”
45011020	That is true . But those branches were broken off because they did not believe , and you continue to be part of the tree only because you believe . Do not be proud , but be afraid .
45011021	If God did not let the natural branches of that tree stay , then he will not let you stay if you don’t believe .
45011022	So you see that God is kind and also very strict . He punishes those who stop following him . But God is kind to you , if you continue following in his kindness . If you do not , you will be cut off from the tree .
45011023	And if the Jews will believe in God again , he will accept them back . God is able to put them back where they were .
45011024	It is not natural for a wild branch to be part of a good tree . And you who are not Jews are like a branch cut from a wild olive tree and joined to a good olive tree . But since those Jews are like a branch that grew from the good tree , surely they can be joined to their own tree again .
45011025	I want you to understand this secret , brothers and sisters , so you will understand that you do not know everything : Part of Israel has been made stubborn , but that will change when many who are not Jews have come to God .
45011026	And that is how all Israel will be saved . It is written in the Scriptures : “ The Savior will come from Jerusalem ; he will take away all evil from the family of Jacob .
45011027	And I will make this agreement with those people when I take away their sins . ”
45011028	The Jews refuse to accept the Good News , so they are God’s enemies . This has happened to help you who are not Jews . But the Jews are still God’s chosen people , and he loves them very much because of the promises he made to their ancestors .
45011029	God never changes his mind about the people he calls and the things he gives them .
45011030	At one time you refused to obey God . But now you have received mercy , because those people refused to obey .
45011031	And now the Jews refuse to obey , because God showed mercy to you . But this happened so that they also can receive mercy from him .
45011032	God has given all people over to their stubborn ways so that he can show mercy to all .
45011033	Yes , God’s riches are very great , and his wisdom and knowledge have no end ! No one can explain the things God decides or understand his ways .
45011034	As the Scripture says , “ Who has known the mind of the Lord , or who has been able to give him advice ? ”
45011035	“ No one has ever given God anything that he must pay back . ”
45011036	Yes , God made all things , and everything continues through him and for him . To him be the glory forever ! Amen .
45012001	So brothers and sisters , since God has shown us great mercy , I beg you to offer your lives as a living sacrifice to him . Your offering must be only for God and pleasing to him , which is the spiritual way for you to worship .
45012002	Do not be shaped by this world ; instead be changed within by a new way of thinking . Then you will be able to decide what God wants for you ; you will know what is good and pleasing to him and what is perfect .
45012003	Because God has given me a special gift , I have something to say to everyone among you . Do not think you are better than you are . You must decide what you really are by the amount of faith God has given you .
45012004	Each one of us has a body with many parts , and these parts all have different uses .
45012005	In the same way , we are many , but in Christ we are all one body . Each one is a part of that body , and each part belongs to all the other parts .
45012006	We all have different gifts , each of which came because of the grace God gave us . The person who has the gift of prophecy should use that gift in agreement with the faith .
45012007	Anyone who has the gift of serving should serve . Anyone who has the gift of teaching should teach .
45012008	Whoever has the gift of encouraging others should encourage . Whoever has the gift of giving to others should give freely . Anyone who has the gift of being a leader should try hard when he leads . Whoever has the gift of showing mercy to others should do so with joy .
45012009	Your love must be real . Hate what is evil , and hold on to what is good .
45012010	Love each other like brothers and sisters . Give each other more honor than you want for yourselves .
45012011	Do not be lazy but work hard , serving the Lord with all your heart .
45012012	Be joyful because you have hope . Be patient when trouble comes , and pray at all times .
45012013	Share with God’s people who need help . Bring strangers in need into your homes .
45012014	Wish good for those who harm you ; wish them well and do not curse them .
45012015	Be happy with those who are happy , and be sad with those who are sad .
45012016	Live in peace with each other . Do not be proud , but make friends with those who seem unimportant . Do not think how smart you are .
45012017	If someone does wrong to you , do not pay him back by doing wrong to him . Try to do what everyone thinks is right .
45012018	Do your best to live in peace with everyone .
45012019	My friends , do not try to punish others when they wrong you , but wait for God to punish them with his anger . It is written : “ I will punish those who do wrong ; I will repay them , ” says the Lord .
45012020	But you should do this : “ If your enemy is hungry , feed him ; if he is thirsty , give him a drink . Doing this will be like pouring burning coals on his head . ”
45012021	Do not let evil defeat you , but defeat evil by doing good .
45013001	All of you must yield to the government rulers . No one rules unless God has given him the power to rule , and no one rules now without that power from God .
45013002	So those who are against the government are really against what God has commanded . And they will bring punishment on themselves .
45013003	Those who do right do not have to fear the rulers ; only those who do wrong fear them . Do you want to be unafraid of the rulers ? Then do what is right , and they will praise you .
45013004	The ruler is God’s servant to help you . But if you do wrong , then be afraid . He has the power to punish ; he is God’s servant to punish those who do wrong .
45013005	So you must yield to the government , not only because you might be punished , but because you know it is right .
45013006	This is also why you pay taxes . Rulers are working for God and give their time to their work .
45013007	Pay everyone , then , what you owe . If you owe any kind of tax , pay it . Show respect and honor to them all .
45013008	Do not owe people anything , except always owe love to each other , because the person who loves others has obeyed all the law .
45013009	The law says , “ You must not be guilty of adultery . You must not murder anyone . You must not steal . You must not want to take your neighbor’s things . ” All these commands and all others are really only one rule : “ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ”
45013010	Love never hurts a neighbor , so loving is obeying all the law .
45013011	Do this because we live in an important time . It is now time for you to wake up from your sleep , because our salvation is nearer now than when we first believed .
45013012	The “ night ” is almost finished , and the “ day ” is almost here . So we should stop doing things that belong to darkness and take up the weapons used for fighting in the light .
45013013	Let us live in a right way , like people who belong to the day . We should not have wild parties or get drunk . There should be no sexual sins of any kind , no fighting or jealousy .
45013014	But clothe yourselves with the Lord Jesus Christ and forget about satisfying your sinful self .
45014001	Accept into your group someone who is weak in faith , and do not argue about opinions .
45014002	One person believes it is right to eat all kinds of food . But another , who is weak , believes it is right to eat only vegetables .
45014003	The one who knows that it is right to eat any kind of food must not reject the one who eats only vegetables . And the person who eats only vegetables must not think that the one who eats all foods is wrong , because God has accepted that person .
45014004	You cannot judge another person’s servant . The master decides if the servant is doing well or not . And the Lord’s servant will do well because the Lord helps him do well .
45014005	Some think that one day is more important than another , and others think that every day is the same . Let all be sure in their own mind .
45014006	Those who think one day is more important than other days are doing that for the Lord . And those who eat all kinds of food are doing that for the Lord , and they give thanks to God . Others who refuse to eat some foods do that for the Lord , and they give thanks to God .
45014007	We do not live or die for ourselves .
45014008	If we live , we are living for the Lord , and if we die , we are dying for the Lord . So living or dying , we belong to the Lord .
45014009	The reason Christ died and rose from the dead to live again was so he would be Lord over both the dead and the living .
45014010	So why do you judge your brothers or sisters in Christ ? And why do you think you are better than they are ? We will all stand before God to be judged ,
45014011	because it is written in the Scriptures : “ ‘ As surely as I live , ’ says the Lord , ‘ Everyone will bow before me ; everyone will say that I am God . ’ ”
45014012	So each of us will have to answer to God .
45014013	For that reason we should stop judging each other . We must make up our minds not to do anything that will make another Christian sin .
45014014	I am in the Lord Jesus , and I know that there is no food that is wrong to eat . But if a person believes something is wrong , that thing is wrong for him .
45014015	If you hurt your brother’s or sister’s faith because of something you eat , you are not really following the way of love . Do not destroy someone’s faith by eating food he thinks is wrong , because Christ died for him .
45014016	Do not allow what you think is good to become what others say is evil .
45014017	In the kingdom of God , eating and drinking are not important . The important things are living right with God , peace , and joy in the Holy Spirit .
45014018	Anyone who serves Christ by living this way is pleasing God and will be accepted by other people .
45014019	So let us try to do what makes peace and helps one another .
45014020	Do not let the eating of food destroy the work of God . All foods are all right to eat , but it is wrong to eat food that causes someone else to sin .
45014021	It is better not to eat meat or drink wine or do anything that will cause your brother or sister to sin .
45014022	Your beliefs about these things should be kept secret between you and God . People are happy if they can do what they think is right without feeling guilty .
45014023	But those who eat something without being sure it is right are wrong because they did not believe it was right . Anything that is done without believing it is right is a sin .
45015001	We who are strong in faith should help the weak with their weaknesses , and not please only ourselves .
45015002	Let each of us please our neighbors for their good , to help them be stronger in faith .
45015003	Even Christ did not live to please himself . It was as the Scriptures said : “ When people insult you , it hurts me . ”
45015004	Everything that was written in the past was written to teach us . The Scriptures give us patience and encouragement so that we can have hope .
45015005	May the patience and encouragement that come from God allow you to live in harmony with each other the way Christ Jesus wants .
45015006	Then you will all be joined together , and you will give glory to God the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
45015007	Christ accepted you , so you should accept each other , which will bring glory to God .
45015008	I tell you that Christ became a servant of the Jews to show that God’s promises to the Jewish ancestors are true .
45015009	And he also did this so that those who are not Jews could give glory to God for the mercy he gives to them . It is written in the Scriptures : “ So I will praise you among the non-Jewish people . I will sing praises to your name . ”
45015010	The Scripture also says , “ Be happy , you who are not Jews , together with his people . ”
45015011	Again the Scripture says , “ All you who are not Jews , praise the Lord . All you people , sing praises to him . ”
45015012	And Isaiah says , “ A new king will come from the family of Jesse . He will come to rule over the non-Jewish people , and they will have hope because of him . ”
45015013	I pray that the God who gives hope will fill you with much joy and peace while you trust in him . Then your hope will overflow by the power of the Holy Spirit .
45015014	My brothers and sisters , I am sure that you are full of goodness . I know that you have all the knowledge you need and that you are able to teach each other .
45015015	But I have written to you very openly about some things I wanted you to remember . I did this because God gave me this special gift :
45015016	to be a minister of Christ Jesus to those who are not Jews . I served God by teaching his Good News , so that the non-Jewish people could be an offering that God would accept — an offering made holy by the Holy Spirit .
45015017	So I am proud of what I have done for God in Christ Jesus .
45015018	I will not talk about anything except what Christ has done through me in leading those who are not Jews to obey God . They have obeyed God because of what I have said and done ,
45015019	because of the power of miracles and the great things they saw , and because of the power of the Holy Spirit . I preached the Good News from Jerusalem all the way around to Illyricum , and so I have finished that part of my work .
45015020	I always want to preach the Good News in places where people have never heard of Christ , because I do not want to build on the work someone else has already started .
45015021	But it is written in the Scriptures : “ Those who were not told about him will see , and those who have not heard about him will understand . ”
45015022	This is the reason I was stopped many times from coming to you .
45015023	Now I have finished my work here . Since for many years I have wanted to come to you ,
45015024	I hope to visit you on my way to Spain . After I enjoy being with you for a while , I hope you can help me on my trip .
45015025	Now I am going to Jerusalem to help God’s people .
45015026	The believers in Macedonia and Southern Greece were happy to give their money to help the poor among God’s people at Jerusalem .
45015027	They were happy to do this , and really they owe it to them . These who are not Jews have shared in the Jews’ spiritual blessings , so they should use their material possessions to help the Jews .
45015028	After I am sure the poor in Jerusalem get the money that has been given for them , I will leave for Spain and stop and visit you .
45015029	I know that when I come to you I will bring Christ’s full blessing .
45015030	Brothers and sisters , I beg you to help me in my work by praying to God for me . Do this because of our Lord Jesus and the love that the Holy Spirit gives us .
45015031	Pray that I will be saved from the nonbelievers in Judea and that this help I bring to Jerusalem will please God’s people there .
45015032	Then , if God wants me to , I will come to you with joy , and together you and I will have a time of rest .
45015033	The God who gives peace be with you all . Amen .
45016001	I recommend to you our sister Phoebe , who is a helper in the church in Cenchrea .
45016002	I ask you to accept her in the Lord in the way God’s people should . Help her with anything she needs , because she has helped me and many other people also .
45016003	Give my greetings to Priscilla and Aquila , who work together with me in Christ Jesus
45016004	and who risked their own lives to save my life . I am thankful to them , and all the non-Jewish churches are thankful as well .
45016005	Also , greet for me the church that meets at their house . Greetings to my dear friend Epenetus , who was the first person in Asia to follow Christ .
45016006	Greetings to Mary , who worked very hard for you .
45016007	Greetings to Andronicus and Junia , my relatives , who were in prison with me . They are very important apostles . They were believers in Christ before I was .
45016008	Greetings to Ampliatus , my dear friend in the Lord .
45016009	Greetings to Urbanus , a worker together with me for Christ . And greetings to my dear friend Stachys .
45016010	Greetings to Apelles , who was tested and proved that he truly loves Christ . Greetings to all those who are in the family of Aristobulus .
45016011	Greetings to Herodion , my fellow citizen . Greetings to all those in the family of Narcissus who belong to the Lord .
45016012	Greetings to Tryphena and Tryphosa , women who work very hard for the Lord . Greetings to my dear friend Persis , who also has worked very hard for the Lord .
45016013	Greetings to Rufus , who is a special person in the Lord , and to his mother , who has been like a mother to me also .
45016014	Greetings to Asyncritus , Phlegon , Hermes , Patrobas , Hermas , and all the brothers and sisters who are with them .
45016015	Greetings to Philologus and Julia , Nereus and his sister , and Olympas , and to all God’s people with them .
45016016	Greet each other with a holy kiss . All of Christ’s churches send greetings to you .
45016017	Brothers and sisters , I ask you to look out for those who cause people to be against each other and who upset other people’s faith . They are against the true teaching you learned , so stay away from them .
45016018	Such people are not serving our Lord Christ but are only doing what pleases themselves . They use fancy talk and fine words to fool the minds of those who do not know about evil .
45016019	All the believers have heard that you obey , so I am very happy because of you . But I want you to be wise in what is good and innocent in what is evil .
45016020	The God who brings peace will soon defeat Satan and give you power over him . The grace of our Lord Jesus be with you .
45016021	Timothy , a worker together with me , sends greetings , as well as Lucius , Jason , and Sosipater , my relatives .
45016022	I am Tertius , and I am writing this letter from Paul . I send greetings to you in the Lord .
45016023	Gaius is letting me and the whole church here use his home . He also sends greetings to you , as do Erastus , the city treasurer , and our brother Quartus . [
45016024	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with all of you . Amen . ]
45016025	Glory to God who can make you strong in faith by the Good News that I tell people and by the message about Jesus Christ . The message about Christ is the secret that was hidden for long ages past but is now made known .
45016026	It has been made clear through the writings of the prophets . And by the command of the eternal God it is made known to all nations that they might believe and obey .
45016027	To the only wise God be glory forever through Jesus Christ ! Amen .
46001001	From Paul . God called me to be an apostle of Christ Jesus because that is what God wanted . Also from Sosthenes , our brother in Christ .
46001002	To the church of God in Corinth , to you who have been made holy in Christ Jesus . You were called to be God’s holy people with all people everywhere who pray in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ — their Lord and ours :
46001003	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
46001004	I always thank my God for you because of the grace God has given you in Christ Jesus .
46001005	I thank God because in Christ you have been made rich in every way , in all your speaking and in all your knowledge .
46001006	Just as our witness about Christ has been guaranteed to you ,
46001007	so you have every gift from God while you wait for our Lord Jesus Christ to come again .
46001008	Jesus will keep you strong until the end so that there will be no wrong in you on the day our Lord Jesus Christ comes again .
46001009	God , who has called you into fellowship with his Son , Jesus Christ our Lord , is faithful .
46001010	I beg you , brothers and sisters , by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ that all of you agree with each other and not be split into groups . I beg that you be completely joined together by having the same kind of thinking and the same purpose .
46001011	My brothers and sisters , some people from Chloe’s family have told me quite plainly that there are quarrels among you .
46001012	This is what I mean : One of you says , “ I follow Paul ” ; another says , “ I follow Apollos ” ; another says , “ I follow Peter ” ; and another says , “ I follow Christ . ”
46001013	Christ has been divided up into different groups ! Did Paul die on the cross for you ? No ! Were you baptized in the name of Paul ? No !
46001014	I thank God I did not baptize any of you except Crispus and Gaius
46001015	so that now no one can say you were baptized in my name .
46001016	( I also baptized the family of Stephanas , but I do not remember that I baptized anyone else . )
46001017	Christ did not send me to baptize people but to preach the Good News . And he sent me to preach the Good News without using words of human wisdom so that the cross of Christ would not lose its power .
46001018	The teaching about the cross is foolishness to those who are being lost , but to us who are being saved it is the power of God .
46001019	It is written in the Scriptures : “ I will cause the wise to lose their wisdom ; I will make the wise unable to understand . ”
46001020	Where is the wise person ? Where is the educated person ? Where is the skilled talker of this world ? God has made the wisdom of the world foolish .
46001021	In the wisdom of God the world did not know God through its own wisdom . So God chose to use the message that sounds foolish to save those who believe .
46001022	The Jews ask for miracles , and the Greeks want wisdom .
46001023	But we preach a crucified Christ . This causes the Jews to stumble and is foolishness to non-Jews .
46001024	But Christ is the power of God and the wisdom of God to those people God has called — Jews and Greeks .
46001025	Even the foolishness of God is wiser than human wisdom , and the weakness of God is stronger than human strength .
46001026	Brothers and sisters , look at what you were when God called you . Not many of you were wise in the way the world judges wisdom . Not many of you had great influence . Not many of you came from important families .
46001027	But God chose the foolish things of the world to shame the wise , and he chose the weak things of the world to shame the strong .
46001028	He chose what the world thinks is unimportant and what the world looks down on and thinks is nothing in order to destroy what the world thinks is important .
46001029	God did this so that no one can brag in his presence .
46001030	Because of God you are in Christ Jesus , who has become for us wisdom from God . In Christ we are put right with God , and have been made holy , and have been set free from sin .
46001031	So , as the Scripture says , “ If people want to brag , they should brag only about the Lord . ”
46002001	Dear brothers and sisters , when I came to you , I did not come preaching God’s secret with fancy words or a show of human wisdom .
46002002	I decided that while I was with you I would forget about everything except Jesus Christ and his death on the cross .
46002003	So when I came to you , I was weak and fearful and trembling .
46002004	My teaching and preaching were not with words of human wisdom that persuade people but with proof of the power that the Spirit gives .
46002005	This was so that your faith would be in God’s power and not in human wisdom .
46002006	However , I speak a wisdom to those who are mature . But this wisdom is not from this world or from the rulers of this world , who are losing their power .
46002007	I speak God’s secret wisdom , which he has kept hidden . Before the world began , God planned this wisdom for our glory .
46002008	None of the rulers of this world understood it . If they had , they would not have crucified the Lord of glory .
46002009	But as it is written in the Scriptures : “ No one has ever seen this , and no one has ever heard about it . No one has ever imagined what God has prepared for those who love him . ”
46002010	But God has shown us these things through the Spirit . The Spirit searches out all things , even the deep secrets of God .
46002011	Who knows the thoughts that another person has ? Only a person’s spirit that lives within him knows his thoughts . It is the same with God . No one knows the thoughts of God except the Spirit of God .
46002012	Now we did not receive the spirit of the world , but we received the Spirit that is from God so that we can know all that God has given us .
46002013	And we speak about these things , not with words taught us by human wisdom but with words taught us by the Spirit . And so we explain spiritual truths to spiritual people .
46002014	A person who does not have the Spirit does not accept the truths that come from the Spirit of God . That person thinks they are foolish and cannot understand them , because they can only be judged to be true by the Spirit .
46002015	The spiritual person is able to judge all things , but no one can judge him . The Scripture says :
46002016	“ Who has known the mind of the Lord ? Who has been able to teach him ? ” But we have the mind of Christ .
46003001	Brothers and sisters , in the past I could not talk to you as I talk to spiritual people . I had to talk to you as I would to people without the Spirit — babies in Christ .
46003002	The teaching I gave you was like milk , not solid food , because you were not able to take solid food . And even now you are not ready .
46003003	You are still not spiritual , because there is jealousy and quarreling among you , and this shows that you are not spiritual . You are acting like people of the world .
46003004	One of you says , “ I belong to Paul , ” and another says , “ I belong to Apollos . ” When you say things like this , you are acting like people of the world .
46003005	Is Apollos important ? No ! Is Paul important ? No ! We are only servants of God who helped you believe . Each one of us did the work God gave us to do .
46003006	I planted the seed , and Apollos watered it . But God is the One who made it grow .
46003007	So the one who plants is not important , and the one who waters is not important . Only God , who makes things grow , is important .
46003008	The one who plants and the one who waters have the same purpose , and each will be rewarded for his own work .
46003009	We are God’s workers , working together ; you are like God’s farm , God’s house .
46003010	Using the gift God gave me , I laid the foundation of that house like an expert builder . Others are building on that foundation , but all people should be careful how they build on it .
46003011	The foundation that has already been laid is Jesus Christ , and no one can lay down any other foundation .
46003012	But if people build on that foundation , using gold , silver , jewels , wood , grass , or straw ,
46003013	their work will be clearly seen , because the Day of Judgment will make it visible . That Day will appear with fire , and the fire will test everyone’s work to show what sort of work it was .
46003014	If the building that has been put on the foundation still stands , the builder will get a reward .
46003015	But if the building is burned up , the builder will suffer loss . The builder will be saved , but it will be as one who escaped from a fire .
46003016	Don’t you know that you are God’s temple and that God’s Spirit lives in you ?
46003017	If anyone destroys God’s temple , God will destroy that person , because God’s temple is holy and you are that temple .
46003018	Do not fool yourselves . If you think you are wise in this world , you should become a fool so that you can become truly wise ,
46003019	because the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God . It is written in the Scriptures , “ He catches those who are wise in their own clever traps . ”
46003020	It is also written in the Scriptures , “ The Lord knows what wise people think . He knows their thoughts are just a puff of wind . ”
46003021	So you should not brag about human leaders . All things belong to you :
46003022	Paul , Apollos , and Peter ; the world , life , death , the present , and the future — all these belong to you .
46003023	And you belong to Christ , and Christ belongs to God .
46004001	People should think of us as servants of Christ , the ones God has trusted with his secrets .
46004002	Now in this way those who are trusted with something valuable must show they are worthy of that trust .
46004003	As for myself , I do not care if I am judged by you or by any human court . I do not even judge myself .
46004004	I know of no wrong I have done , but this does not make me right before the Lord . The Lord is the One who judges me .
46004005	So do not judge before the right time ; wait until the Lord comes . He will bring to light things that are now hidden in darkness , and will make known the secret purposes of people’s hearts . Then God will praise each one of them .
46004006	Brothers and sisters , I have used Apollos and myself as examples so you could learn through us the meaning of the saying , “ Follow only what is written in the Scriptures . ” Then you will not be more proud of one person than another .
46004007	Who says you are better than others ? What do you have that was not given to you ? And if it was given to you , why do you brag as if you did not receive it as a gift ?
46004008	You think you already have everything you need . You think you are rich . You think you have become kings without us . I wish you really were kings so we could be kings together with you .
46004009	But it seems to me that God has put us apostles in last place , like those sentenced to die . We are like a show for the whole world to see — angels and people .
46004010	We are fools for Christ’s sake , but you are very wise in Christ . We are weak , but you are strong . You receive honor , but we are shamed .
46004011	Even to this very hour we do not have enough to eat or drink or to wear . We are often beaten , and we have no homes in which to live .
46004012	We work hard with our own hands for our food . When people curse us , we bless them . When they hurt us , we put up with it .
46004013	When they tell evil lies about us , we speak nice words about them . Even today , we are treated as though we were the garbage of the world — the filth of the earth .
46004014	I am not trying to make you feel ashamed . I am writing this to give you a warning as my own dear children .
46004015	For though you may have ten thousand teachers in Christ , you do not have many fathers . Through the Good News I became your father in Christ Jesus ,
46004016	so I beg you , please follow my example .
46004017	That is why I am sending to you Timothy , my son in the Lord . I love Timothy , and he is faithful . He will help you remember my way of life in Christ Jesus , just as I teach it in all the churches everywhere .
46004018	Some of you have become proud , thinking that I will not come to you again .
46004019	But I will come to you very soon if the Lord wishes . Then I will know what the proud ones do , not what they say ,
46004020	because the kingdom of God is present not in talk but in power .
46004021	Which do you want : that I come to you with punishment or with love and gentleness ?
46005001	It is actually being said that there is sexual sin among you . And it is a kind that does not happen even among people who do not know God . A man there has his father’s wife .
46005002	And you are proud ! You should have been filled with sadness so that the man who did this should be put out of your group .
46005003	I am not there with you in person , but I am with you in spirit . And I have already judged the man who did that sin as if I were really there .
46005004	When you meet together in the name of our Lord Jesus , and I meet with you in spirit with the power of our Lord Jesus ,
46005005	then hand this man over to Satan . So his sinful self will be destroyed , and his spirit will be saved on the day of the Lord .
46005006	Your bragging is not good . You know the saying , “ Just a little yeast makes the whole batch of dough rise . ”
46005007	Take out all the old yeast so that you will be a new batch of dough without yeast , which you really are . For Christ , our Passover lamb , has been sacrificed .
46005008	So let us celebrate this feast , but not with the bread that has the old yeast — the yeast of sin and wickedness . Let us celebrate this feast with the bread that has no yeast — the bread of goodness and truth .
46005009	I wrote you in my earlier letter not to associate with those who sin sexually .
46005010	But I did not mean you should not associate with those of this world who sin sexually , or with the greedy , or robbers , or those who worship idols . To get away from them you would have to leave this world .
46005011	I am writing to tell you that you must not associate with those who call themselves believers in Christ but who sin sexually , or are greedy , or worship idols , or abuse others with words , or get drunk , or cheat people . Do not even eat with people like that .
46006001	When you have something against another Christian , how can you bring yourself to go before judges who are not right with God ? Why do you not let God’s people decide who is right ?
46006002	Surely you know that God’s people will judge the world . So if you are to judge the world , are you not able to judge small cases as well ?
46006003	You know that in the future we will judge angels , so surely we can judge the ordinary things of this life .
46006004	If you have ordinary cases that must be judged , are you going to appoint people as judges who mean nothing to the church ?
46006005	I say this to shame you . Surely there is someone among you wise enough to judge a complaint between believers .
46006006	But now one believer goes to court against another believer — and you do this in front of unbelievers !
46006007	The fact that you have lawsuits against each other shows that you are already defeated . Why not let yourselves be wronged ? Why not let yourselves be cheated ?
46006008	But you yourselves do wrong and cheat , and you do this to other believers !
46006011	In the past , some of you were like that , but you were washed clean . You were made holy , and you were made right with God in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ and in the Spirit of our God .
46006012	“ I am allowed to do all things , ” but not all things are good for me to do . “ I am allowed to do all things , ” but I will not let anything make me its slave .
46006013	“ Food is for the stomach , and the stomach for food , ” but God will destroy them both . The body is not for sexual sin but for the Lord , and the Lord is for the body .
46006014	By his power God has raised the Lord from the dead and will also raise us from the dead .
46006015	Surely you know that your bodies are parts of Christ himself . So I must never take the parts of Christ and join them to a prostitute !
46006016	It is written in the Scriptures , “ The two will become one body . ” So you should know that anyone who joins with a prostitute becomes one body with the prostitute .
46006017	But the one who joins with the Lord is one spirit with the Lord .
46006018	So run away from sexual sin . Every other sin people do is outside their bodies , but those who sin sexually sin against their own bodies .
46006019	You should know that your body is a temple for the Holy Spirit who is in you . You have received the Holy Spirit from God . So you do not belong to yourselves ,
46006020	because you were bought by God for a price . So honor God with your bodies .
46007001	Now I will discuss the things you wrote me about . It is good for a man not to have sexual relations with a woman .
46007002	But because sexual sin is a danger , each man should have his own wife , and each woman should have her own husband .
46007003	The husband should give his wife all that he owes her as his wife . And the wife should give her husband all that she owes him as her husband .
46007004	The wife does not have full rights over her own body ; her husband shares them . And the husband does not have full rights over his own body ; his wife shares them .
46007005	Do not refuse to give your bodies to each other , unless you both agree to stay away from sexual relations for a time so you can give your time to prayer . Then come together again so Satan cannot tempt you because of a lack of self-control .
46007006	I say this to give you permission to stay away from sexual relations for a time . It is not a command to do so .
46007007	I wish that everyone were like me , but each person has his own gift from God . One has one gift , another has another gift .
46007008	Now for those who are not married and for the widows I say this : It is good for them to stay unmarried as I am .
46007009	But if they cannot control themselves , they should marry . It is better to marry than to burn with sexual desire .
46007010	Now I give this command for the married people . ( The command is not from me ; it is from the Lord . ) A wife should not leave her husband .
46007011	But if she does leave , she must not marry again , or she should make up with her husband . Also the husband should not divorce his wife .
46007012	For all the others I say this ( I am saying this , not the Lord ) : If a Christian man has a wife who is not a believer , and she is happy to live with him , he must not divorce her .
46007013	And if a Christian woman has a husband who is not a believer , and he is happy to live with her , she must not divorce him .
46007014	The husband who is not a believer is made holy through his believing wife . And the wife who is not a believer is made holy through her believing husband . If this were not true , your children would not be clean , but now your children are holy .
46007015	But if those who are not believers decide to leave , let them leave . When this happens , the Christian man or woman is free . But God called us to live in peace .
46007016	Wife , you don’t know ; maybe you will save your husband . And husband , you don’t know ; maybe you will save your wife .
46007017	But in any case each one of you should continue to live the way God has given you to live — the way you were when God called you . This is a rule I make in all the churches .
46007018	If a man was already circumcised when he was called , he should not undo his circumcision . If a man was without circumcision when he was called , he should not be circumcised .
46007019	It is not important if a man is circumcised or not . The important thing is obeying God’s commands .
46007020	Each one of you should stay the way you were when God called you .
46007021	If you were a slave when God called you , do not let that bother you . But if you can be free , then make good use of your freedom .
46007022	Those who were slaves when the Lord called them are free persons who belong to the Lord . In the same way , those who were free when they were called are now Christ’s slaves .
46007023	You all were bought at a great price , so do not become slaves of people .
46007024	Brothers and sisters , each of you should stay as you were when you were called , and stay there with God .
46007025	Now I write about people who are not married . I have no command from the Lord about this ; I give my opinion . But I can be trusted , because the Lord has shown me mercy .
46007026	The present time is a time of trouble , so I think it is good for you to stay the way you are .
46007027	If you have a wife , do not try to become free from her . If you are not married , do not try to find a wife .
46007028	But if you decide to marry , you have not sinned . And if a girl who has never married decides to marry , she has not sinned . But those who marry will have trouble in this life , and I want you to be free from trouble .
46007029	Brothers and sisters , this is what I mean : We do not have much time left . So starting now , those who have wives should live as if they had no wives .
46007030	Those who are crying should live as if they were not crying . Those who are happy should live as if they were not happy . Those who buy things should live as if they own nothing .
46007031	Those who use the things of the world should live as if they were not using them , because this world in its present form will soon be gone .
46007032	I want you to be free from worry . A man who is not married is busy with the Lord’s work , trying to please the Lord .
46007033	But a man who is married is busy with things of the world , trying to please his wife .
46007034	He must think about two things — pleasing his wife and pleasing the Lord . A woman who is not married or a girl who has never married is busy with the Lord’s work . She wants to be holy in body and spirit . But a married woman is busy with things of the world , as to how she can please her husband .
46007035	I am saying this to help you , not to limit you . But I want you to live in the right way , to give yourselves fully to the Lord without concern for other things .
46007036	If a man thinks he is not doing the right thing with the girl he is engaged to , if she is almost past the best age to marry and he feels he should marry her , he should do what he wants . They should get married . It is no sin .
46007037	But if a man is sure in his mind that there is no need for marriage , and has his own desires under control , and has decided not to marry the one to whom he is engaged , he is doing the right thing .
46007038	So the man who marries his girl does right , but the man who does not marry will do better .
46007039	A woman must stay with her husband as long as he lives . But if her husband dies , she is free to marry any man she wants , but she must marry another believer .
46007040	The woman is happier if she does not marry again . This is my opinion , but I believe I also have God’s Spirit .
46008001	Now I will write about meat that is sacrificed to idols . We know that “ we all have knowledge . ” Knowledge puffs you up with pride , but love builds up .
46008002	If you think you know something , you do not yet know anything as you should .
46008003	But if any person loves God , that person is known by God .
46008004	So this is what I say about eating meat sacrificed to idols : We know that an idol is really nothing in the world , and we know there is only one God .
46008005	Even though there are things called gods , in heaven or on earth ( and there are many “ gods ” and “ lords ” ) ,
46008006	for us there is only one God — our Father . All things came from him , and we live for him . And there is only one Lord — Jesus Christ . All things were made through him , and we also were made through him .
46008007	But not all people know this . Some people are still so used to idols that when they eat meat , they still think of it as being sacrificed to an idol . Because their conscience is weak , when they eat it , they feel guilty .
46008008	But food will not bring us closer to God . Refusing to eat does not make us less pleasing to God , and eating does not make us better in God’s sight .
46008009	But be careful that your freedom does not cause those who are weak in faith to fall into sin .
46008010	Suppose one of you who has knowledge eats in an idol’s temple . Someone who is weak in faith might see you eating there and be encouraged to eat meat sacrificed to idols while thinking it is wrong to do so .
46008011	This weak believer for whom Christ died is ruined because of your “ knowledge . ”
46008012	When you sin against your brothers and sisters in Christ like this and cause them to do what they feel is wrong , you are also sinning against Christ .
46008013	So if the food I eat causes them to fall into sin , I will never eat meat again so that I will not cause any of them to sin .
46009001	I am a free man . I am an apostle . I have seen Jesus our Lord . You people are all an example of my work in the Lord .
46009002	If others do not accept me as an apostle , surely you do , because you are proof that I am an apostle in the Lord .
46009003	This is the answer I give people who want to judge me :
46009004	Do we not have the right to eat and drink ?
46009005	Do we not have the right to bring a believing wife with us when we travel as do the other apostles and the Lord’s brothers and Peter ?
46009006	Are Barnabas and I the only ones who must work to earn our living ?
46009007	No soldier ever serves in the army and pays his own salary . No one ever plants a vineyard without eating some of the grapes . No person takes care of a flock without drinking some of the milk .
46009008	I do not say this by human authority ; God’s law also says the same thing .
46009009	It is written in the law of Moses : “ When an ox is working in the grain , do not cover its mouth to keep it from eating . ” When God said this , was he thinking only about oxen ? No .
46009010	He was really talking about us . Yes , that Scripture was written for us , because it goes on to say : “ The one who plows and the one who works in the grain should hope to get some of the grain for their work . ”
46009011	Since we planted spiritual seed among you , is it too much if we should harvest material things ?
46009012	If others have the right to get something from you , surely we have this right , too . But we do not use it . No , we put up with everything ourselves so that we will not keep anyone from believing the Good News of Christ .
46009013	Surely you know that those who work at the Temple get their food from the Temple , and those who serve at the altar get part of what is offered at the altar .
46009014	In the same way , the Lord has commanded that those who tell the Good News should get their living from this work .
46009015	But I have not used any of these rights . And I am not writing this now to get anything from you . I would rather die than to have my reason for bragging taken away .
46009016	Telling the Good News does not give me any reason for bragging . Telling the Good News is my duty — something I must do . And how terrible it will be for me if I do not tell the Good News .
46009017	If I preach because it is my own choice , I have a reward . But if I preach and it is not my choice to do so , I am only doing the duty that was given to me .
46009018	So what reward do I get ? This is my reward : that when I tell the Good News I can offer it freely . I do not use my full rights in my work of preaching the Good News .
46009019	I am free and belong to no one . But I make myself a slave to all people to win as many as I can .
