46009020	To the Jews I became like a Jew to win the Jews . I myself am not ruled by the law . But to those who are ruled by the law I became like a person who is ruled by the law . I did this to win those who are ruled by the law .
46009021	To those who are without the law I became like a person who is without the law . I did this to win those people who are without the law . ( But really , I am not without God’s law — I am ruled by Christ’s law . )
46009022	To those who are weak , I became weak so I could win the weak . I have become all things to all people so I could save some of them in any way possible .
46009023	I do all this because of the Good News and so I can share in its blessings .
46009024	You know that in a race all the runners run , but only one gets the prize . So run to win !
46009025	All those who compete in the games use self-control so they can win a crown . That crown is an earthly thing that lasts only a short time , but our crown will never be destroyed .
46009026	So I do not run without a goal . I fight like a boxer who is hitting something — not just the air .
46009027	I treat my body hard and make it my slave so that I myself will not be disqualified after I have preached to others .
46010001	Brothers and sisters , I want you to know what happened to our ancestors who followed Moses . They were all under the cloud and all went through the sea .
46010002	They were all baptized as followers of Moses in the cloud and in the sea .
46010003	They all ate the same spiritual food ,
46010004	and all drank the same spiritual drink . They drank from that spiritual rock that followed them , and that rock was Christ .
46010005	But God was not pleased with most of them , so they died in the desert .
46010006	And these things happened as examples for us , to stop us from wanting evil things as those people did .
46010007	Do not worship idols , as some of them did . Just as it is written in the Scriptures : “ They sat down to eat and drink , and then they got up and sinned sexually . ”
46010008	We must not take part in sexual sins , as some of them did . In one day twenty-three thousand of them died because of their sins .
46010009	We must not test Christ as some of them did ; they were killed by snakes .
46010010	Do not complain as some of them did ; they were killed by the angel that destroys .
46010011	The things that happened to those people are examples . They were written down to teach us , because we live in a time when all these things of the past have reached their goal .
46010012	If you think you are strong , you should be careful not to fall .
46010013	The only temptation that has come to you is that which everyone has . But you can trust God , who will not permit you to be tempted more than you can stand . But when you are tempted , he will also give you a way to escape so that you will be able to stand it .
46010014	So , my dear friends , run away from the worship of idols .
46010015	I am speaking to you as to reasonable people ; judge for yourselves what I say .
46010016	We give thanks for the cup of blessing , which is a sharing in the blood of Christ . And the bread that we break is a sharing in the body of Christ .
46010017	Because there is one loaf of bread , we who are many are one body , because we all share that one loaf .
46010018	Think about the Israelites : Do not those who eat the sacrifices share in the altar ?
46010019	I do not mean that the food sacrificed to an idol is important . I do not mean that an idol is anything at all .
46010020	But I say that what is sacrificed to idols is offered to demons , not to God . And I do not want you to share anything with demons .
46010021	You cannot drink the cup of the Lord and the cup of demons also . You cannot share in the Lord’s table and the table of demons .
46010022	Are we trying to make the Lord jealous ? We are not stronger than he is , are we ?
46010023	“ We are allowed to do all things , ” but not all things are good for us to do . “ We are allowed to do all things , ” but not all things help others grow stronger .
46010024	Do not look out only for yourselves . Look out for the good of others also .
46010025	Eat any meat that is sold in the meat market . Do not ask questions about it .
46010026	You may eat it , “ because the earth belongs to the Lord , and everything in it . ”
46010027	Those who are not believers may invite you to eat with them . If you want to go , eat anything that is put before you . Do not ask questions about it .
46010028	But if anyone says to you , “ That food was offered to idols , ” do not eat it . Do not eat it because of that person who told you and because eating it might be thought to be wrong .
46010029	I don’t mean you think it is wrong , but the other person might . But why , you ask , should my freedom be judged by someone else’s conscience ?
46010030	If I eat the meal with thankfulness , why am I criticized because of something for which I thank God ?
46010031	The answer is , if you eat or drink , or if you do anything , do it all for the glory of God .
46010032	Never do anything that might hurt others — Jews , Greeks , or God’s church —
46010033	just as I , also , try to please everybody in every way . I am not trying to do what is good for me but what is good for most people so they can be saved .
46011001	Follow my example , as I follow the example of Christ .
46011002	I praise you because you remember me in everything , and you follow closely the teachings just as I gave them to you .
46011003	But I want you to understand this : The head of every man is Christ , the head of a woman is the man , and the head of Christ is God .
46011004	Every man who prays or prophesies with his head covered brings shame to his head .
46011005	But every woman who prays or prophesies with her head uncovered brings shame to her head . She is the same as a woman who has her head shaved .
46011006	If a woman does not cover her head , she should have her hair cut off . But since it is shameful for a woman to cut off her hair or to shave her head , she should cover her head .
46011007	But a man should not cover his head , because he is the likeness and glory of God . But woman is man’s glory .
46011008	Man did not come from woman , but woman came from man .
46011009	And man was not made for woman , but woman was made for man .
46011010	So that is why a woman should have a symbol of authority on her head , because of the angels .
46011011	But in the Lord women are not independent of men , and men are not independent of women .
46011012	This is true because woman came from man , but also man is born from woman . But everything comes from God .
46011013	Decide this for yourselves : Is it right for a woman to pray to God with her head uncovered ?
46011014	Even nature itself teaches you that wearing long hair is shameful for a man .
46011015	But long hair is a woman’s glory . Long hair is given to her as a covering .
46011016	Some people may still want to argue about this , but I would add that neither we nor the churches of God have any other practice .
46011017	In the things I tell you now I do not praise you , because when you come together you do more harm than good .
46011018	First , I hear that when you meet together as a church you are divided , and I believe some of this .
46011019	( It is necessary to have differences among you so that it may be clear which of you really have God’s approval . )
46011020	When you come together , you are not really eating the Lord’s Supper .
46011021	This is because when you eat , each person eats without waiting for the others . Some people do not get enough to eat , while others have too much to drink .
46011022	You can eat and drink in your own homes ! You seem to think God’s church is not important , and you embarrass those who are poor . What should I tell you ? Should I praise you ? I do not praise you for doing this .
46011023	The teaching I gave you is the same teaching I received from the Lord : On the night when the Lord Jesus was handed over to be killed , he took bread
46011024	and gave thanks for it . Then he broke the bread and said , “ This is my body ; it is for you . Do this to remember me . ”
46011025	In the same way , after they ate , Jesus took the cup . He said , “ This cup is the new agreement that is sealed with the blood of my death . When you drink this , do it to remember me . ”
46011026	Every time you eat this bread and drink this cup you are telling others about the Lord’s death until he comes .
46011027	So a person who eats the bread or drinks the cup of the Lord in a way that is not worthy of it will be guilty of sinning against the body and the blood of the Lord .
46011028	Look into your own hearts before you eat the bread and drink the cup ,
46011029	because all who eat the bread and drink the cup without recognizing the body eat and drink judgment against themselves .
46011030	That is why many in your group are sick and weak , and some of you have died .
46011031	But if we judged ourselves in the right way , God would not judge us .
46011032	But when the Lord judges us , he disciplines us so that we will not be destroyed along with the world .
46011033	So my brothers and sisters , when you come together to eat , wait for each other .
46011034	Anyone who is too hungry should eat at home so that in meeting together you will not bring God’s judgment on yourselves . I will tell you what to do about the other things when I come .
46012001	Now , brothers and sisters , I want you to understand about spiritual gifts .
46012002	You know the way you lived before you were believers . You let yourselves be influenced and led away to worship idols — things that could not speak .
46012003	So I want you to understand that no one who is speaking with the help of God’s Spirit says , “ Jesus be cursed . ” And no one can say , “ Jesus is Lord , ” without the help of the Holy Spirit .
46012004	There are different kinds of gifts , but they are all from the same Spirit .
46012005	There are different ways to serve but the same Lord to serve .
46012006	And there are different ways that God works through people but the same God . God works in all of us in everything we do .
46012007	Something from the Spirit can be seen in each person , for the common good .
46012008	The Spirit gives one person the ability to speak with wisdom , and the same Spirit gives another the ability to speak with knowledge .
46012009	The same Spirit gives faith to one person . And , to another , that one Spirit gives gifts of healing .
46012010	The Spirit gives to another person the power to do miracles , to another the ability to prophesy . And he gives to another the ability to know the difference between good and evil spirits . The Spirit gives one person the ability to speak in different kinds of languages and to another the ability to interpret those languages .
46012011	One Spirit , the same Spirit , does all these things , and the Spirit decides what to give each person .
46012012	A person’s body is one thing , but it has many parts . Though there are many parts to a body , all those parts make only one body . Christ is like that also .
46012013	Some of us are Jews , and some are Greeks . Some of us are slaves , and some are free . But we were all baptized into one body through one Spirit . And we were all made to share in the one Spirit .
46012014	The human body has many parts .
46012015	The foot might say , “ Because I am not a hand , I am not part of the body . ” But saying this would not stop the foot from being a part of the body .
46012016	The ear might say , “ Because I am not an eye , I am not part of the body . ” But saying this would not stop the ear from being a part of the body .
46012017	If the whole body were an eye , it would not be able to hear . If the whole body were an ear , it would not be able to smell .
46012020	So then there are many parts , but only one body .
46012021	The eye cannot say to the hand , “ I don’t need you ! ” And the head cannot say to the foot , “ I don’t need you ! ”
46012022	No ! Those parts of the body that seem to be the weaker are really necessary .
46012023	And the parts of the body we think are less deserving are the parts to which we give the most honor . We give special respect to the parts we want to hide .
46012024	The more respectable parts of our body need no special care . But God put the body together and gave more honor to the parts that need it
46012025	so our body would not be divided . God wanted the different parts to care the same for each other .
46012026	If one part of the body suffers , all the other parts suffer with it . Or if one part of our body is honored , all the other parts share its honor .
46012027	Together you are the body of Christ , and each one of you is a part of that body .
46012028	In the church God has given a place first to apostles , second to prophets , and third to teachers . Then God has given a place to those who do miracles , those who have gifts of healing , those who can help others , those who are able to govern , and those who can speak in different languages .
46012029	Not all are apostles . Not all are prophets . Not all are teachers . Not all do miracles .
46012030	Not all have gifts of healing . Not all speak in different languages . Not all interpret those languages .
46012031	But you should truly want to have the greater gifts . And now I will show you the best way of all .
46013001	I may speak in different languages of people or even angels . But if I do not have love , I am only a noisy bell or a crashing cymbal .
46013002	I may have the gift of prophecy . I may understand all the secret things of God and have all knowledge , and I may have faith so great I can move mountains . But even with all these things , if I do not have love , then I am nothing .
46013003	I may give away everything I have , and I may even give my body as an offering to be burned . But I gain nothing if I do not have love .
46013004	Love is patient and kind . Love is not jealous , it does not brag , and it is not proud .
46013005	Love is not rude , is not selfish , and does not get upset with others . Love does not count up wrongs that have been done .
46013006	Love takes no pleasure in evil but rejoices over the truth .
46013007	Love patiently accepts all things . It always trusts , always hopes , and always endures .
46013008	Love never ends . There are gifts of prophecy , but they will be ended . There are gifts of speaking in different languages , but those gifts will stop . There is the gift of knowledge , but it will come to an end .
46013009	The reason is that our knowledge and our ability to prophesy are not perfect .
46013010	But when perfection comes , the things that are not perfect will end .
46013011	When I was a child , I talked like a child , I thought like a child , I reasoned like a child . When I became a man , I stopped those childish ways .
46013012	It is the same with us . Now we see a dim reflection , as if we were looking into a mirror , but then we shall see clearly . Now I know only a part , but then I will know fully , as God has known me .
46013013	So these three things continue forever : faith , hope , and love . And the greatest of these is love .
46014001	You should seek after love , and you should truly want to have the spiritual gifts , especially the gift of prophecy .
46014002	I will explain why . Those who have the gift of speaking in different languages are not speaking to people ; they are speaking to God . No one understands them ; they are speaking secret things through the Spirit .
46014003	But those who prophesy are speaking to people to give them strength , encouragement , and comfort .
46014004	The ones who speak in different languages are helping only themselves , but those who prophesy are helping the whole church .
46014005	I wish all of you had the gift of speaking in different kinds of languages , but more , I wish you would prophesy . Those who prophesy are greater than those who can only speak in different languages — unless someone is there who can explain what is said so that the whole church can be helped .
46014006	Brothers and sisters , will it help you if I come to you speaking in different languages ? No ! It will help you only if I bring you a new truth or some new knowledge , or prophecy , or teaching .
46014007	It is the same as with lifeless things that make sounds — like a flute or a harp . If they do not make clear musical notes , you will not know what is being played .
46014008	And in a war , if the trumpet does not give a clear sound , who will prepare for battle ?
46014009	It is the same with you . Unless you speak clearly with your tongue , no one can understand what you are saying . You will be talking into the air !
46014010	It may be true that there are all kinds of sounds in the world , and none is without meaning .
46014011	But unless I understand the meaning of what someone says to me , we will be like foreigners to each other .
46014012	It is the same with you . Since you want spiritual gifts very much , seek most of all to have the gifts that help the church grow stronger .
46014013	The one who has the gift of speaking in a different language should pray for the gift to interpret what is spoken .
46014014	If I pray in a different language , my spirit is praying , but my mind does nothing .
46014015	So what should I do ? I will pray with my spirit , but I will also pray with my mind . I will sing with my spirit , but I will also sing with my mind .
46014016	If you praise God with your spirit , those persons there without understanding cannot say amen to your prayer of thanks , because they do not know what you are saying .
46014017	You may be thanking God in a good way , but the other person is not helped .
46014018	I thank God that I speak in different kinds of languages more than all of you .
46014019	But in the church meetings I would rather speak five words I understand in order to teach others than thousands of words in a different language .
46014020	Brothers and sisters , do not think like children . In evil things be like babies , but in your thinking you should be like adults .
46014021	It is written in the Scriptures : “ With people who use strange words and foreign languages I will speak to these people . But even then they will not listen to me , ” says the Lord .
46014022	So the gift of speaking in different kinds of languages is a sign for those who do not believe , not for those who do believe . And prophecy is for people who believe , not for those who do not believe .
46014023	Suppose the whole church meets together and everyone speaks in different languages . If some people come in who do not understand or do not believe , they will say you are crazy .
46014024	But suppose everyone is prophesying and some people come in who do not believe or do not understand . If everyone is prophesying , their sin will be shown to them , and they will be judged by all that they hear .
46014025	The secret things in their hearts will be made known . So they will bow down and worship God saying , “ Truly , God is with you . ”
46014026	So , brothers and sisters , what should you do ? When you meet together , one person has a song , and another has a teaching . Another has a new truth from God . Another speaks in a different language , and another person interprets that language . The purpose of all these things should be to help the church grow strong .
46014027	When you meet together , if anyone speaks in a different language , it should be only two , or not more than three , who speak . They should speak one after the other , and someone should interpret .
46014028	But if there is no interpreter , then those who speak in a different language should be quiet in the church meeting . They should speak only to themselves and to God .
46014029	Only two or three prophets should speak , and the others should judge what they say .
46014030	If a message from God comes to another person who is sitting , the first speaker should stop .
46014031	You can all prophesy one after the other . In this way all the people can be taught and encouraged .
46014032	The spirits of prophets are under the control of the prophets themselves .
46014033	God is not a God of confusion but a God of peace . As is true in all the churches of God’s people ,
46014034	women should keep quiet in the church meetings . They are not allowed to speak , but they must yield to this rule as the law says .
46014035	If they want to learn something , they should ask their own husbands at home . It is shameful for a woman to speak in the church meeting .
46014036	Did God’s teaching come from you ? Or are you the only ones to whom it has come ?
46014037	Those who think they are prophets or spiritual persons should understand that what I am writing to you is the Lord’s command .
46014038	Those who ignore this will be ignored by God .
46014039	So my brothers and sisters , you should truly want to prophesy . But do not stop people from using the gift of speaking in different kinds of languages .
46014040	But let everything be done in a right and orderly way .
46015001	Now , brothers and sisters , I want you to remember the Good News I brought to you . You received this Good News and continue strong in it .
46015002	And you are being saved by it if you continue believing what I told you . If you do not , then you believed for nothing .
46015003	I passed on to you what I received , of which this was most important : that Christ died for our sins , as the Scriptures say ;
46015004	that he was buried and was raised to life on the third day as the Scriptures say ;
46015005	and that he was seen by Peter and then by the twelve apostles .
46015006	After that , Jesus was seen by more than five hundred of the believers at the same time . Most of them are still living today , but some have died .
46015007	Then he was seen by James and later by all the apostles .
46015008	Last of all he was seen by me — as by a person not born at the normal time .
46015009	All the other apostles are greater than I am . I am not even good enough to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
46015010	But God’s grace has made me what I am , and his grace to me was not wasted . I worked harder than all the other apostles . ( But it was not I really ; it was God’s grace that was with me . )
46015011	So if I preached to you or the other apostles preached to you , we all preach the same thing , and this is what you believed .
46015012	Now since we preached that Christ was raised from the dead , why do some of you say that people will not be raised from the dead ?
46015013	If no one is ever raised from the dead , then Christ has not been raised .
46015014	And if Christ has not been raised , then our preaching is worth nothing , and your faith is worth nothing .
46015015	And also , we are guilty of lying about God , because we testified of him that he raised Christ from the dead . But if people are not raised from the dead , then God never raised Christ .
46015016	If the dead are not raised , Christ has not been raised either .
46015017	And if Christ has not been raised , then your faith has nothing to it ; you are still guilty of your sins .
46015018	And those in Christ who have already died are lost .
46015019	If our hope in Christ is for this life only , we should be pitied more than anyone else in the world .
46015020	But Christ has truly been raised from the dead — the first one and proof that those who sleep in death will also be raised .
46015021	Death has come because of what one man did , but the rising from death also comes because of one man .
46015022	In Adam all of us die . In the same way , in Christ all of us will be made alive again .
46015023	But everyone will be raised to life in the right order . Christ was first to be raised . When Christ comes again , those who belong to him will be raised to life ,
46015024	and then the end will come . At that time Christ will destroy all rulers , authorities , and powers , and he will hand over the kingdom to God the Father .
46015025	Christ must rule until he puts all enemies under his control .
46015026	The last enemy to be destroyed will be death .
46015027	The Scripture says that God put all things under his control . When it says “ all things ” are under him , it is clear this does not include God himself . God is the One who put everything under his control .
46015028	After everything has been put under the Son , then he will put himself under God , who had put all things under him . Then God will be the complete ruler over everything .
46015029	If the dead are never raised , what will people do who are being baptized for the dead ? If the dead are not raised at all , why are people being baptized for them ?
46015030	And what about us ? Why do we put ourselves in danger every hour ?
46015031	I die every day . That is true , brothers and sisters , just as it is true that I brag about you in Christ Jesus our Lord .
46015032	If I fought wild animals in Ephesus only with human hopes , I have gained nothing . If the dead are not raised , “ Let us eat and drink , because tomorrow we will die . ”
46015033	Do not be fooled : “ Bad friends will ruin good habits . ”
46015034	Come back to your right way of thinking and stop sinning . Some of you do not know God — I say this to shame you .
46015035	But someone may ask , “ How are the dead raised ? What kind of body will they have ? ”
46015036	Foolish person ! When you sow a seed , it must die in the ground before it can live and grow .
46015037	And when you sow it , it does not have the same “ body ” it will have later . What you sow is only a bare seed , maybe wheat or something else .
46015038	But God gives it a body that he has planned for it , and God gives each kind of seed its own body .
46015039	All things made of flesh are not the same : People have one kind of flesh , animals have another , birds have another , and fish have another .
46015040	Also there are heavenly bodies and earthly bodies . But the beauty of the heavenly bodies is one kind , and the beauty of the earthly bodies is another .
46015041	The sun has one kind of beauty , the moon has another beauty , and the stars have another . And each star is different in its beauty .
46015042	It is the same with the dead who are raised to life . The body that is “ planted ” will ruin and decay , but it is raised to a life that cannot be destroyed .
46015043	When the body is “ planted , ” it is without honor , but it is raised in glory . When the body is “ planted , ” it is weak , but when it is raised , it is powerful .
46015044	The body that is “ planted ” is a physical body . When it is raised , it is a spiritual body . There is a physical body , and there is also a spiritual body .
46015045	It is written in the Scriptures : “ The first man , Adam , became a living person . ” But the last Adam became a spirit that gives life .
46015046	The spiritual did not come first , but the physical and then the spiritual .
46015047	The first man came from the dust of the earth . The second man came from heaven .
46015048	People who belong to the earth are like the first man of earth . But those people who belong to heaven are like the man of heaven .
46015049	Just as we were made like the man of earth , so we will also be made like the man of heaven .
46015050	I tell you this , brothers and sisters : Flesh and blood cannot have a part in the kingdom of God . Something that will ruin cannot have a part in something that never ruins .
46015051	But look ! I tell you this secret : We will not all sleep in death , but we will all be changed .
46015052	It will take only a second — as quickly as an eye blinks — when the last trumpet sounds . The trumpet will sound , and those who have died will be raised to live forever , and we will all be changed .
46015053	This body that can be destroyed must clothe itself with something that can never be destroyed . And this body that dies must clothe itself with something that can never die .
46015054	So this body that can be destroyed will clothe itself with that which can never be destroyed , and this body that dies will clothe itself with that which can never die . When this happens , this Scripture will be made true : “ Death is destroyed forever in victory . ”
46015055	“ Death , where is your victory ? Death , where is your pain ? ”
46015056	Death’s power to hurt is sin , and the power of sin is the law .
46015057	But we thank God ! He gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
46015058	So my dear brothers and sisters , stand strong . Do not let anything move you . Always give yourselves fully to the work of the Lord , because you know that your work in the Lord is never wasted .
46016001	Now I will write about the collection of money for God’s people . Do the same thing I told the Galatian churches to do :
46016002	On the first day of every week , each one of you should put aside money as you have been blessed . Save it up so you will not have to collect money after I come .
46016003	When I arrive , I will send whomever you approve to take your gift to Jerusalem . I will send them with letters of introduction ,
46016004	and if it seems good for me to go also , they will go along with me .
46016005	I plan to go through Macedonia , so I will come to you after I go through there .
46016006	Perhaps I will stay with you for a time or even all winter . Then you can help me on my trip , wherever I go .
46016007	I do not want to see you now just in passing . I hope to stay a longer time with you if the Lord allows it .
46016008	But I will stay at Ephesus until Pentecost ,
46016009	because a good opportunity for a great and growing work has been given to me now . And there are many people working against me .
46016010	If Timothy comes to you , see to it that he has nothing to fear with you , because he is working for the Lord just as I am .
46016011	So none of you should treat Timothy as unimportant , but help him on his trip in peace so that he can come back to me . I am expecting him to come with the brothers .
46016012	Now about our brother Apollos : I strongly encouraged him to visit you with the other brothers . He did not at all want to come now ; he will come when he has the opportunity .
46016013	Be alert . Continue strong in the faith . Have courage , and be strong .
46016014	Do everything in love .
46016015	You know that the family of Stephanas were the first believers in Southern Greece and that they have given themselves to the service of God’s people . I ask you , brothers and sisters ,
46016016	to follow the leading of people like these and anyone else who works and serves with them .
46016017	I am happy that Stephanas , Fortunatus , and Achaicus have come . You are not here , but they have filled your place .
46016018	They have refreshed my spirit and yours . You should recognize the value of people like these .
46016019	The churches in Asia send greetings to you . Aquila and Priscilla greet you in the Lord , as does the church that meets in their house .
46016020	All the brothers and sisters here send greetings . Give each other a holy kiss when you meet .
46016021	I , Paul , am writing this greeting with my own hand .
46016022	If anyone does not love the Lord , let him be separated from God — lost forever ! Come , O Lord !
46016023	The grace of the Lord Jesus be with you .
46016024	My love be with all of you in Christ Jesus .
47001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus . I am an apostle because that is what God wanted . Also from Timothy our brother in Christ . To the church of God in Corinth , and to all of God’s people everywhere in Southern Greece :
47001002	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
47001003	Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ . God is the Father who is full of mercy and all comfort .
47001004	He comforts us every time we have trouble , so when others have trouble , we can comfort them with the same comfort God gives us .
47001005	We share in the many sufferings of Christ . In the same way , much comfort comes to us through Christ .
47001006	If we have troubles , it is for your comfort and salvation , and if we have comfort , you also have comfort . This helps you to accept patiently the same sufferings we have .
47001007	Our hope for you is strong , knowing that you share in our sufferings and also in the comfort we receive .
47001008	Brothers and sisters , we want you to know about the trouble we suffered in Asia . We had great burdens there that were beyond our own strength . We even gave up hope of living .
47001009	Truly , in our own hearts we believed we would die . But this happened so we would not trust in ourselves but in God , who raises people from the dead .
47001010	God saved us from these great dangers of death , and he will continue to save us . We have put our hope in him , and he will save us again .
47001011	And you can help us with your prayers . Then many people will give thanks for us — that God blessed us because of their many prayers .
47001012	This is what we are proud of , and I can say it with a clear conscience : In everything we have done in the world , and especially with you , we have had an honest and sincere heart from God . We did this by God’s grace , not by the kind of wisdom the world has .
47001015	I was so sure of all this that I made plans to visit you first so you could be blessed twice .
47001016	I planned to visit you on my way to Macedonia and again on my way back . I wanted to get help from you for my trip to Judea .
47001017	Do you think that I made these plans without really meaning it ? Or maybe you think I make plans as the world does , so that I say yes , yes and at the same time no , no .
47001018	But since you can believe God , you can believe that what we tell you is never both yes and no .
47001019	The Son of God , Jesus Christ , that Silas and Timothy and I preached to you , was not yes and no . In Christ it has always been yes .
47001020	The yes to all of God’s promises is in Christ , and through Christ we say yes to the glory of God .
47001021	Remember , God is the One who makes you and us strong in Christ . God made us his chosen people .
47001022	He put his mark on us to show that we are his , and he put his Spirit in our hearts to be a guarantee for all he has promised .
47001023	I tell you this , and I ask God to be my witness that this is true : The reason I did not come back to Corinth was to keep you from being punished or hurt .
47001024	We are not trying to control your faith . You are strong in faith . But we are workers with you for your own joy .
47002001	So I decided that my next visit to you would not be another one to make you sad .
47002002	If I make you sad , who will make me glad ? Only you can make me glad — particularly the person whom I made sad .
47002003	I wrote you a letter for this reason : that when I came to you I would not be made sad by the people who should make me happy . I felt sure of all of you , that you would share my joy .
47002004	When I wrote to you before , I was very troubled and unhappy in my heart , and I wrote with many tears . I did not write to make you sad , but to let you know how much I love you .
47002005	Someone there among you has caused sadness , not to me , but to all of you . I mean he caused sadness to all in some way . ( I do not want to make it sound worse than it really is . )
47002006	The punishment that most of you gave him is enough for him .
47002007	But now you should forgive him and comfort him to keep him from having too much sadness and giving up completely .
47002008	So I beg you to show that you love him .
47002009	I wrote you to test you and to see if you obey in everything .
47002010	If you forgive someone , I also forgive him . And what I have forgiven — if I had anything to forgive — I forgave it for you , as if Christ were with me .
47002011	I did this so that Satan would not win anything from us , because we know very well what Satan’s plans are .
47002012	When I came to Troas to preach the Good News of Christ , the Lord gave me a good opportunity there .
47002013	But I had no peace , because I did not find my brother Titus . So I said good-bye to them at Troas and went to Macedonia .
47002014	But thanks be to God , who always leads us as captives in Christ’s victory parade . God uses us to spread his knowledge everywhere like a sweet-smelling perfume .
47002015	Our offering to God is this : We are the sweet smell of Christ among those who are being saved and among those who are being lost .
47002016	To those who are lost , we are the smell of death that brings death , but to those who are being saved , we are the smell of life that brings life . So who is able to do this work ?
47002017	We do not sell the word of God for a profit as many other people do . But in Christ we speak the truth before God , as messengers of God .
47003001	Are we starting to brag about ourselves again ? Do we need letters of introduction to you or from you , like some other people ?
47003002	You yourselves are our letter , written on our hearts , known and read by everyone .
47003003	You show that you are a letter from Christ sent through us . This letter is not written with ink but with the Spirit of the living God . It is not written on stone tablets but on human hearts .
47003004	We can say this , because through Christ we feel certain before God .
47003005	We are not saying that we can do this work ourselves . It is God who makes us able to do all that we do .
47003006	He made us able to be servants of a new agreement from himself to his people . This new agreement is not a written law , but it is of the Spirit . The written law brings death , but the Spirit gives life .
47003007	The law that brought death was written in words on stone . It came with God’s glory , which made Moses’ face so bright that the Israelites could not continue to look at it . But that glory later disappeared .
47003008	So surely the new way that brings the Spirit has even more glory .
47003009	If the law that judged people guilty of sin had glory , surely the new way that makes people right with God has much greater glory .
47003010	That old law had glory , but it really loses its glory when it is compared to the much greater glory of this new way .
47003011	If that law which disappeared came with glory , then this new way which continues forever has much greater glory .
47003012	We have this hope , so we are very bold .
47003013	We are not like Moses , who put a covering over his face so the Israelites would not see it . The glory was disappearing , and Moses did not want them to see it end .
47003014	But their minds were closed , and even today that same covering hides the meaning when they read the old agreement . That covering is taken away only through Christ .
47003015	Even today , when they read the law of Moses , there is a covering over their minds .
47003016	But when a person changes and follows the Lord , that covering is taken away .
47003017	The Lord is the Spirit , and where the Spirit of the Lord is , there is freedom .
47003018	Our faces , then , are not covered . We all show the Lord’s glory , and we are being changed to be like him . This change in us brings ever greater glory , which comes from the Lord , who is the Spirit .
47004001	God , with his mercy , gave us this work to do , so we don’t give up .
47004002	But we have turned away from secret and shameful ways . We use no trickery , and we do not change the teaching of God . We teach the truth plainly , showing everyone who we are . Then they can know in their hearts what kind of people we are in God’s sight .
47004003	If the Good News that we preach is hidden , it is hidden only to those who are lost .
47004004	The devil who rules this world has blinded the minds of those who do not believe . They cannot see the light of the Good News — the Good News about the glory of Christ , who is exactly like God .
47004005	We do not preach about ourselves , but we preach that Jesus Christ is Lord and that we are your servants for Jesus .
47004006	God once said , “ Let the light shine out of the darkness ! ” This is the same God who made his light shine in our hearts by letting us know the glory of God that is in the face of Christ .
47004007	We have this treasure from God , but we are like clay jars that hold the treasure . This shows that the great power is from God , not from us .
47004008	We have troubles all around us , but we are not defeated . We do not know what to do , but we do not give up the hope of living .
47004009	We are persecuted , but God does not leave us . We are hurt sometimes , but we are not destroyed .
47004010	We carry the death of Jesus in our own bodies so that the life of Jesus can also be seen in our bodies .
47004011	We are alive , but for Jesus we are always in danger of death so that the life of Jesus can be seen in our bodies that die .
47004012	So death is working in us , but life is working in you .
47004013	It is written in the Scriptures , “ I believed , so I spoke . ” Our faith is like this , too . We believe , and so we speak .
47004014	God raised the Lord Jesus from the dead , and we know that God will also raise us with Jesus . God will bring us together with you , and we will stand before him .
47004015	All these things are for you . And so the grace of God that is being given to more and more people will bring increasing thanks to God for his glory .
47004016	So we do not give up . Our physical body is becoming older and weaker , but our spirit inside us is made new every day .
47004017	We have small troubles for a while now , but they are helping us gain an eternal glory that is much greater than the troubles .
47004018	We set our eyes not on what we see but on what we cannot see . What we see will last only a short time , but what we cannot see will last forever .
47005001	We know that our body — the tent we live in here on earth — will be destroyed . But when that happens , God will have a house for us . It will not be a house made by human hands ; instead , it will be a home in heaven that will last forever .
47005002	But now we groan in this tent . We want God to give us our heavenly home ,
47005003	because it will clothe us so we will not be naked .
47005004	While we live in this body , we have burdens , and we groan . We do not want to be naked , but we want to be clothed with our heavenly home . Then this body that dies will be fully covered with life .
47005005	This is what God made us for , and he has given us the Spirit to be a guarantee for this new life .
47005006	So we always have courage . We know that while we live in this body , we are away from the Lord .
47005007	We live by what we believe , not by what we can see .
47005008	So I say that we have courage . We really want to be away from this body and be at home with the Lord .
47005009	Our only goal is to please God whether we live here or there ,
47005010	because we must all stand before Christ to be judged . Each of us will receive what we should get — good or bad — for the things we did in the earthly body .
47005011	Since we know what it means to fear the Lord , we try to help people accept the truth about us . God knows what we really are , and I hope that in your hearts you know , too .
47005012	We are not trying to prove ourselves to you again , but we are telling you about ourselves so you will be proud of us . Then you will have an answer for those who are proud about things that can be seen rather than what is in the heart .
47005013	If we are out of our minds , it is for God . If we have our right minds , it is for you .
47005014	The love of Christ controls us , because we know that One died for all , so all have died .
47005015	Christ died for all so that those who live would not continue to live for themselves . He died for them and was raised from the dead so that they would live for him .
47005016	From this time on we do not think of anyone as the world does . In the past we thought of Christ as the world thinks , but we no longer think of him in that way .
47005017	If anyone belongs to Christ , there is a new creation . The old things have gone ; everything is made new !
47005018	All this is from God . Through Christ , God made peace between us and himself , and God gave us the work of telling everyone about the peace we can have with him .
47005019	God was in Christ , making peace between the world and himself . In Christ , God did not hold the world guilty of its sins . And he gave us this message of peace .
47005020	So we have been sent to speak for Christ . It is as if God is calling to you through us . We speak for Christ when we beg you to be at peace with God .
47005021	Christ had no sin , but God made him become sin so that in Christ we could become right with God .
47006001	We are workers together with God , so we beg you : Do not let the grace that you received from God be for nothing .
47006002	God says , “ At the right time I heard your prayers . On the day of salvation I helped you . ” I tell you that the “ right time ” is now , and the “ day of salvation ” is now .
47006003	We do not want anyone to find fault with our work , so nothing we do will be a problem for anyone .
47006004	But in every way we show we are servants of God : in accepting many hard things , in troubles , in difficulties , and in great problems .
47006005	We are beaten and thrown into prison . We meet those who become upset with us and start riots . We work hard , and sometimes we get no sleep or food .
47006006	We show we are servants of God by our pure lives , our understanding , patience , and kindness , by the Holy Spirit , by true love ,
47006007	by speaking the truth , and by God’s power . We use our right living to defend ourselves against everything .
47006008	Some people honor us , but others blame us . Some people say evil things about us , but others say good things . Some people say we are liars , but we speak the truth .
47006009	We are not known , but we are well known . We seem to be dying , but we continue to live . We are punished , but we are not killed .
47006010	We have much sadness , but we are always rejoicing . We are poor , but we are making many people rich in faith . We have nothing , but really we have everything .
47006011	We have spoken freely to you in Corinth and have opened our hearts to you .
47006012	Our feelings of love for you have not stopped , but you have stopped your feelings of love for us .
47006013	I speak to you as if you were my children . Do to us as we have done — open your hearts to us .
47006014	You are not the same as those who do not believe . So do not join yourselves to them . Good and bad do not belong together . Light and darkness cannot share together .
47006015	How can Christ and Belial , the devil , have any agreement ? What can a believer have together with a nonbeliever ?
47006016	The temple of God cannot have any agreement with idols , and we are the temple of the living God . As God said : “ I will live with them and walk with them . And I will be their God , and they will be my people . ”
47006017	“ Leave those people , and be separate , says the Lord . Touch nothing that is unclean , and I will accept you . ”
47006018	“ I will be your father , and you will be my sons and daughters , says the Lord Almighty . ”
47007001	Dear friends , we have these promises from God , so we should make ourselves pure — free from anything that makes body or soul unclean . We should try to become holy in the way we live , because we respect God .
47007002	Open your hearts to us . We have not done wrong to anyone , we have not ruined the faith of anyone , and we have not cheated anyone .
47007003	I do not say this to blame you . I told you before that we love you so much we would live or die with you .
47007004	I feel very sure of you and am very proud of you . You give me much comfort , and in all of our troubles I have great joy .
47007005	When we came into Macedonia , we had no rest . We found trouble all around us . We had fighting on the outside and fear on the inside .
47007006	But God , who comforts those who are troubled , comforted us when Titus came .
47007007	We were comforted , not only by his coming but also by the comfort you gave him . Titus told us about your wish to see me and that you are very sorry for what you did . He also told me about your great care for me , and when I heard this , I was much happier .
47007008	Even if my letter made you sad , I am not sorry I wrote it . At first I was sorry , because it made you sad , but you were sad only for a short time .
47007009	Now I am happy , not because you were made sad , but because your sorrow made you change your lives . You became sad in the way God wanted you to , so you were not hurt by us in any way .
47007010	The kind of sorrow God wants makes people change their hearts and lives . This leads to salvation , and you cannot be sorry for that . But the kind of sorrow the world has brings death .
47007011	See what this sorrow — the sorrow God wanted you to have — has done to you : It has made you very serious . It made you want to restore yourselves . It made you angry and afraid . It made you want to see me . It made you care . It made you want to do the right thing . In every way you have regained your innocence .
47007012	I wrote that letter , not because of the one who did the wrong or because of the person who was hurt . I wrote the letter so you could see , before God , the great care you have for us .
47007013	That is why we were comforted . Not only were we very comforted , we were even happier to see that Titus was so happy . All of you made him feel much better .
47007014	I bragged to Titus about you , and you showed that I was right . Everything we said to you was true , and you have proved that what we bragged about to Titus is true .
47007015	And his love for you is stronger when he remembers that you were all ready to obey . You welcomed him with respect and fear .
47007016	I am very happy that I can trust you fully .
47008001	And now , brothers and sisters , we want you to know about the grace God gave the churches in Macedonia .
47008002	They have been tested by great troubles , and they are very poor . But they gave much because of their great joy .
47008003	I can tell you that they gave as much as they were able and even more than they could afford . No one told them to do it .
47008004	But they begged and pleaded with us to let them share in this service for God’s people .
47008005	And they gave in a way we did not expect : They first gave themselves to the Lord and to us . This is what God wants .
47008006	So we asked Titus to help you finish this special work of grace since he is the one who started it .
47008007	You are rich in everything — in faith , in speaking , in knowledge , in truly wanting to help , and in the love you learned from us . In the same way , be strong also in the grace of giving .
47008008	I am not commanding you to give . But I want to see if your love is true by comparing you with others that really want to help .
47008009	You know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ . You know that Christ was rich , but for you he became poor so that by his becoming poor you might become rich .
47008010	This is what I think you should do : Last year you were the first to want to give , and you were the first who gave .
47008011	So now finish the work you started . Then your “ doing ” will be equal to your “ wanting to do . ” Give from what you have .
47008012	If you want to give , your gift will be accepted . It will be judged by what you have , not by what you do not have .
47008013	We do not want you to have troubles while other people are at ease , but we want everything to be equal .
47008014	At this time you have plenty . What you have can help others who are in need . Then later , when they have plenty , they can help you when you are in need , and all will be equal .
47008015	As it is written in the Scriptures , “ The person who gathered more did not have too much , nor did the person who gathered less have too little . ”
47008016	I thank God because he gave Titus the same love for you that I have .
47008017	Titus accepted what we asked him to do . He wanted very much to go to you , and this was his own idea .
47008018	We are sending with him the brother who is praised by all the churches because of his service in preaching the Good News .
47008019	Also , this brother was chosen by the churches to go with us when we deliver this gift of money . We are doing this service to bring glory to the Lord and to show that we really want to help .
47008020	We are being careful so that no one will criticize us for the way we are handling this large gift .
47008021	We are trying hard to do what the Lord accepts as right and also what people think is right .
47008022	Also , we are sending with them our brother , who is always ready to help . He has proved this to us in many ways , and he wants to help even more now , because he has much faith in you .
47008023	Now about Titus — he is my partner who is working with me to help you . And about the other brothers — they are sent from the churches , and they bring glory to Christ .
47008024	So show these men the proof of your love and the reason we are proud of you . Then all the churches can see it .
47009001	I really do not need to write you about this help for God’s people .
47009002	I know you want to help . I have been bragging about this to the people in Macedonia , telling them that you in Southern Greece have been ready to give since last year . And your desire to give has made most of them ready to give also .
47009003	But I am sending the brothers to you so that our bragging about you in this will not be empty words . I want you to be ready , as I said you would be .
47009004	If any of the people from Macedonia come with me and find that you are not ready , we will be ashamed that we were so sure of you . ( And you will be ashamed , too ! )
47009005	So I thought I should ask these brothers to go to you before we do . They will finish getting in order the generous gift you promised so it will be ready when we come . And it will be a generous gift — not one that you did not want to give .
47009006	Remember this : The person who plants a little will have a small harvest , but the person who plants a lot will have a big harvest .
47009007	Each of you should give as you have decided in your heart to give . You should not be sad when you give , and you should not give because you feel forced to give . God loves the person who gives happily .
47009008	And God can give you more blessings than you need . Then you will always have plenty of everything — enough to give to every good work .
47009009	It is written in the Scriptures : “ He gives freely to the poor . The things he does are right and will continue forever . ”
47009010	God is the One who gives seed to the farmer and bread for food . He will give you all the seed you need and make it grow so there will be a great harvest from your goodness .
47009011	He will make you rich in every way so that you can always give freely . And your giving through us will cause many to give thanks to God .
47009012	This service you do not only helps the needs of God’s people , it also brings many more thanks to God .
47009013	It is a proof of your faith . Many people will praise God because you obey the Good News of Christ — the gospel you say you believe — and because you freely share with them and with all others .
47009014	And when they pray , they will wish they could be with you because of the great grace that God has given you .
47009015	Thanks be to God for his gift that is too wonderful for words .
47010001	I , Paul , am begging you with the gentleness and the kindness of Christ . Some people say that I am easy on you when I am with you and bold when I am away .
47010002	They think we live in a worldly way , and I plan to be very bold with them when I come . I beg you that when I come I will not need to use that same boldness with you .
47010003	We do live in the world , but we do not fight in the same way the world fights .
47010004	We fight with weapons that are different from those the world uses . Our weapons have power from God that can destroy the enemy’s strong places . We destroy people’s arguments
47010005	and every proud thing that raises itself against the knowledge of God . We capture every thought and make it give up and obey Christ .
47010006	We are ready to punish anyone there who does not obey , but first we want you to obey fully .
47010007	You must look at the facts before you . If you feel sure that you belong to Christ , you must remember that we belong to Christ just as you do .
47010008	It is true that we brag freely about the authority the Lord gave us . But this authority is to build you up , not to tear you down . So I will not be ashamed .
47010009	I do not want you to think I am trying to scare you with my letters .
47010010	Some people say , “ Paul’s letters are powerful and sound important , but when he is with us , he is weak . And his speaking is nothing . ”
47010011	They should know this : We are not there with you now , so we say these things in letters . But when we are there with you , we will show the same authority that we show in our letters .
47010012	We do not dare to compare ourselves with those who think they are very important . They use themselves to measure themselves , and they judge themselves by what they themselves are . This shows that they know nothing .
47010013	But we will not brag about things outside the work that was given us to do . We will limit our bragging to the work that God gave us , and this includes our work with you .
47010014	We are not bragging too much , as we would be if we had not already come to you . But we have come to you with the Good News of Christ .
47010015	We limit our bragging to the work that is ours , not what others have done . We hope that as your faith continues to grow , you will help our work to grow much larger .
47010016	We want to tell the Good News in the areas beyond your city . We do not want to brag about work that has already been done in another person’s area .
47010017	But , “ If people want to brag , they should brag only about the Lord . ”
47010018	It is not those who say they are good who are accepted but those the Lord thinks are good .
47011001	I wish you would be patient with me even when I am a little foolish , but you are already doing that .
47011002	I am jealous over you with a jealousy that comes from God . I promised to give you to Christ , as your only husband . I want to give you as his pure bride .
47011003	But I am afraid that your minds will be led away from your true and pure following of Christ just as Eve was tricked by the snake with his evil ways .
47011004	You are very patient with anyone who comes to you and preaches a different Jesus from the one we preached . You are very willing to accept a spirit or gospel that is different from the Spirit and Good News you received from us .
47011005	I do not think that those “ great apostles ” are any better than I am .
47011006	I may not be a trained speaker , but I do have knowledge . We have shown this to you clearly in every way .
47011007	I preached God’s Good News to you without pay . I made myself unimportant to make you important . Do you think that was wrong ?
47011008	I accepted pay from other churches , taking their money so I could serve you .
47011009	If I needed something when I was with you , I did not trouble any of you . The brothers who came from Macedonia gave me all that I needed . I did not allow myself to depend on you in any way , and I will never depend on you .
47011010	No one in Southern Greece will stop me from bragging about that . I say this with the truth of Christ in me .
47011011	And why do I not depend on you ? Do you think it is because I do not love you ? God knows that I love you .
47011012	And I will continue doing what I am doing now , because I want to stop those people from having a reason to brag . They would like to say that the work they brag about is the same as ours .
47011013	Such men are not true apostles but are workers who lie . They change themselves to look like apostles of Christ .
47011014	This does not surprise us . Even Satan changes himself to look like an angel of light .
47011015	So it does not surprise us if Satan’s servants also make themselves look like servants who work for what is right . But in the end they will be punished for what they do .
47011016	I tell you again : No one should think I am a fool . But if you think so , accept me as you would accept a fool . Then I can brag a little , too .
47011017	When I brag because I feel sure of myself , I am not talking as the Lord would talk but as a fool .
47011018	Many people are bragging about their lives in the world . So I will brag too .
47011019	You are wise , so you will gladly be patient with fools !
47011020	You are even patient with those who order you around , or use you , or trick you , or think they are better than you , or hit you in the face .
47011021	It is shameful to me to say this , but we were too “ weak ” to do those things to you ! But if anyone else is brave enough to brag , then I also will be brave and brag . ( I am talking as a fool . )
47011022	Are they Hebrews ? So am I . Are they Israelites ? So am I . Are they from Abraham’s family ? So am I .
47011023	Are they serving Christ ? I am serving him more . ( I am crazy to talk like this . ) I have worked much harder than they . I have been in prison more often . I have been hurt more in beatings . I have been near death many times .
47011024	Five times the Jews have given me their punishment of thirty-nine lashes with a whip .
47011025	Three different times I was beaten with rods . One time I was almost stoned to death . Three times I was in ships that wrecked , and one of those times I spent a night and a day in the sea .
47011026	I have gone on many travels and have been in danger from rivers , thieves , my own people , the Jews , and those who are not Jews . I have been in danger in cities , in places where no one lives , and on the sea . And I have been in danger with false Christians .
47011027	I have done hard and tiring work , and many times I did not sleep . I have been hungry and thirsty , and many times I have been without food . I have been cold and without clothes .
47011028	Besides all this , there is on me every day the load of my concern for all the churches .
47011029	I feel weak every time someone is weak , and I feel upset every time someone is led into sin .
47011030	If I must brag , I will brag about the things that show I am weak .
47011031	God knows I am not lying . He is the God and Father of the Lord Jesus Christ , and he is to be praised forever .
47011032	When I was in Damascus , the governor under King Aretas wanted to arrest me , so he put guards around the city .
47011033	But my friends lowered me in a basket through a hole in the city wall . So I escaped from the governor .
47012001	I must continue to brag . It will do no good , but I will talk now about visions and revelations from the Lord .
47012002	I know a man in Christ who was taken up to the third heaven fourteen years ago . I do not know whether the man was in his body or out of his body , but God knows .
47012005	I will brag about a man like that , but I will not brag about myself , except about my weaknesses .
47012006	But if I wanted to brag about myself , I would not be a fool , because I would be telling the truth . But I will not brag about myself . I do not want people to think more of me than what they see me do or hear me say .
47012007	So that I would not become too proud of the wonderful things that were shown to me , a painful physical problem was given to me . This problem was a messenger from Satan , sent to beat me and keep me from being too proud .
47012008	I begged the Lord three times to take this problem away from me .
47012009	But he said to me , “ My grace is enough for you . When you are weak , my power is made perfect in you . ” So I am very happy to brag about my weaknesses . Then Christ’s power can live in me .
47012010	For this reason I am happy when I have weaknesses , insults , hard times , sufferings , and all kinds of troubles for Christ . Because when I am weak , then I am truly strong .
47012011	I have been talking like a fool , but you made me do it . You are the ones who should say good things about me . I am worth nothing , but those “ great apostles ” are not worth any more than I am !
47012012	When I was with you , I patiently did the things that prove I am an apostle — signs , wonders , and miracles .
47012013	So you received everything that the other churches have received . Only one thing was different : I was not a burden to you . Forgive me for this !
47012014	I am now ready to visit you the third time , and I will not be a burden to you . I want nothing from you , except you . Children should not have to save up to give to their parents . Parents should save to give to their children .
47012015	So I am happy to give everything I have for you , even myself . If I love you more , will you love me less ?
47012016	It is clear I was not a burden to you , but you think I was tricky and lied to catch you .
47012017	Did I cheat you by using any of the messengers I sent to you ? No , you know I did not .
47012018	I asked Titus to go to you , and I sent our brother with him . Titus did not cheat you , did he ? No , you know that Titus and I did the same thing and with the same spirit .
47012019	Do you think we have been defending ourselves to you all this time ? We have been speaking in Christ and before God . You are our dear friends , and everything we do is to make you stronger .
47012020	I am afraid that when I come , you will not be what I want you to be , and I will not be what you want me to be . I am afraid that among you there may be arguing , jealousy , anger , selfish fighting , evil talk , gossip , pride , and confusion .
47012021	I am afraid that when I come to you again , my God will make me ashamed before you . I may be saddened by many of those who have sinned because they have not changed their hearts or turned from their sexual sins and the shameful things they have done .
47013001	I will come to you for the third time . “ Every case must be proved by two or three witnesses . ”
47013002	When I was with you the second time , I gave a warning to those who had sinned . Now I am away from you , and I give a warning to all the others . When I come to you again , I will not be easy with them .
47013003	You want proof that Christ is speaking through me . My proof is that he is not weak among you , but he is powerful .
47013004	It is true that he was weak when he was killed on the cross , but he lives now by God’s power . It is true that we are weak in Christ , but for you we will be alive in Christ by God’s power .
47013005	Look closely at yourselves . Test yourselves to see if you are living in the faith . You know that Jesus Christ is in you — unless you fail the test .
47013006	But I hope you will see that we ourselves have not failed the test .
47013007	We pray to God that you will not do anything wrong . It is not important to see that we have passed the test , but it is important that you do what is right , even if it seems we have failed .
47013008	We cannot do anything against the truth , but only for the truth .
47013009	We are happy to be weak , if you are strong , and we pray that you will become complete .
47013010	I am writing this while I am away from you so that when I come I will not have to be harsh in my use of authority . The Lord gave me this authority to build you up , not to tear you down .
47013011	Now , brothers and sisters , I say good-bye . Live in harmony . Do what I have asked you to do . Agree with each other , and live in peace . Then the God of love and peace will be with you .
47013012	Greet each other with a holy kiss .
47013013	All of God’s holy people send greetings to you .
47013014	The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ , the love of God , and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you all .
48001001	From Paul , an apostle . I was not chosen to be an apostle by human beings , nor was I sent from human beings . I was made an apostle through Jesus Christ and God the Father who raised Jesus from the dead .
48001002	This letter is also from all those of God’s family who are with me . To the churches in Galatia :
48001003	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
48001004	Jesus gave himself for our sins to free us from this evil world we live in , as God the Father planned .
48001005	The glory belongs to God forever and ever . Amen .
48001006	God , by his grace through Christ , called you to become his people . So I am amazed that you are turning away so quickly and believing something different than the Good News .
48001007	Really , there is no other Good News . But some people are confusing you ; they want to change the Good News of Christ .
48001008	We preached to you the Good News . So if we ourselves , or even an angel from heaven , should preach to you something different , we should be judged guilty !
48001009	I said this before , and now I say it again : You have already accepted the Good News . If anyone is preaching something different to you , let that person be judged guilty !
48001010	Do you think I am trying to make people accept me ? No , God is the One I am trying to please . Am I trying to please people ? If I still wanted to please people , I would not be a servant of Christ .
48001011	Brothers and sisters , I want you to know that the Good News I preached to you was not made up by human beings .
48001012	I did not get it from humans , nor did anyone teach it to me , but Jesus Christ showed it to me .
48001013	You have heard about my past life in the Jewish religion . I attacked the church of God and tried to destroy it .
48001014	I was becoming a leader in the Jewish religion , doing better than most other Jews of my age . I tried harder than anyone else to follow the teachings handed down by our ancestors .
48001015	But God had special plans for me and set me apart for his work even before I was born . He called me through his grace
48001016	and showed his son to me so that I might tell the Good News about him to those who are not Jewish . When God called me , I did not get advice or help from any person .
48001017	I did not go to Jerusalem to see those who were apostles before I was . But , without waiting , I went away to Arabia and later went back to Damascus .
48001018	After three years I went to Jerusalem to meet Peter and stayed with him for fifteen days .
48001019	I met no other apostles , except James , the brother of the Lord .
48001020	God knows that these things I write are not lies .
48001021	Later , I went to the areas of Syria and Cilicia .
48001022	In Judea the churches in Christ had never met me .
48001023	They had only heard it said , “ This man who was attacking us is now preaching the same faith that he once tried to destroy . ”
48001024	And these believers praised God because of me .
48002001	After fourteen years I went to Jerusalem again , this time with Barnabas . I also took Titus with me .
48002002	I went because God showed me I should go . I met with the believers there , and in private I told their leaders the Good News that I preach to the non-Jewish people . I did not want my past work and the work I am now doing to be wasted .
48002003	Titus was with me , but he was not forced to be circumcised , even though he was a Greek .
48002004	We talked about this problem because some false believers had come into our group secretly . They came in like spies to overturn the freedom we have in Christ Jesus . They wanted to make us slaves .
48002005	But we did not give in to those false believers for a minute . We wanted the truth of the Good News to continue for you .
48002006	Those leaders who seemed to be important did not change the Good News that I preach . ( It doesn’t matter to me if they were “ important ” or not . To God everyone is the same . )
48002007	But these leaders saw that I had been given the work of telling the Good News to those who are not Jewish , just as Peter had the work of telling the Jews .
48002008	God gave Peter the power to work as an apostle for the Jewish people . But he also gave me the power to work as an apostle for those who are not Jews .
48002009	James , Peter , and John , who seemed to be the leaders , understood that God had given me this special grace , so they accepted Barnabas and me . They agreed that they would go to the Jewish people and that we should go to those who are not Jewish .
48002010	The only thing they asked us was to remember to help the poor — something I really wanted to do .
48002011	When Peter came to Antioch , I challenged him to his face , because he was wrong .
48002012	Peter ate with the non-Jewish people until some Jewish people sent from James came to Antioch . When they arrived , Peter stopped eating with those who weren’t Jewish , and he separated himself from them . He was afraid of the Jews .
48002013	So Peter was a hypocrite , as were the other Jewish believers who joined with him . Even Barnabas was influenced by what these Jewish believers did .
48002014	When I saw they were not following the truth of the Good News , I spoke to Peter in front of them all . I said , “ Peter , you are a Jew , but you are not living like a Jew . You are living like those who are not Jewish . So why do you now try to force those who are not Jewish to live like Jews ? ”
48002015	We were not born as non-Jewish “ sinners , ” but as Jews .
48002016	Yet we know that a person is made right with God not by following the law , but by trusting in Jesus Christ . So we , too , have put our faith in Christ Jesus , that we might be made right with God because we trusted in Christ . It is not because we followed the law , because no one can be made right with God by following the law .
48002017	We Jews came to Christ , trying to be made right with God , and it became clear that we are sinners , too . Does this mean that Christ encourages sin ? No !
48002018	But I would really be wrong to begin teaching again those things that I gave up .
48002019	It was the law that put me to death , and I died to the law so that I can now live for God .
48002020	I was put to death on the cross with Christ , and I do not live anymore — it is Christ who lives in me . I still live in my body , but I live by faith in the Son of God who loved me and gave himself to save me .
48002021	By saying these things I am not going against God’s grace . Just the opposite , if the law could make us right with God , then Christ’s death would be useless .
48003001	You people in Galatia were told very clearly about the death of Jesus Christ on the cross . But you were foolish ; you let someone trick you .
48003002	Tell me this one thing : How did you receive the Holy Spirit ? Did you receive the Spirit by following the law ? No , you received the Spirit because you heard the Good News and believed it .
48003003	You began your life in Christ by the Spirit . Now are you trying to make it complete by your own power ? That is foolish .
48003004	Were all your experiences wasted ? I hope not !
48003005	Does God give you the Spirit and work miracles among you because you follow the law ? No , he does these things because you heard the Good News and believed it .
48003006	The Scriptures say the same thing about Abraham : “ Abraham believed God , and God accepted Abraham’s faith , and that faith made him right with God . ”
48003007	So you should know that the true children of Abraham are those who have faith .
48003008	The Scriptures , telling what would happen in the future , said that God would make the non-Jewish people right through their faith . This Good News was told to Abraham beforehand , as the Scripture says : “ All nations will be blessed through you . ”
48003009	So all who believe as Abraham believed are blessed just as Abraham was .
48003010	But those who depend on following the law to make them right are under a curse , because the Scriptures say , “ Anyone will be cursed who does not always obey what is written in the Book of the Law . ”
48003011	Now it is clear that no one can be made right with God by the law , because the Scriptures say , “ Those who are right with God will live by faith . ”
48003012	The law is not based on faith . It says , “ A person who obeys these things will live because of them . ”
48003013	Christ took away the curse the law put on us . He changed places with us and put himself under that curse . It is written in the Scriptures , “ Anyone whose body is displayed on a tree is cursed . ”
48003014	Christ did this so that God’s blessing promised to Abraham might come through Jesus Christ to those who are not Jews . Jesus died so that by our believing we could receive the Spirit that God promised .
48003015	Brothers and sisters , let us think in human terms : Even an agreement made between two persons is firm . After that agreement is accepted by both people , no one can stop it or add anything to it .
48003016	God made promises both to Abraham and to his descendant . God did not say , “ and to your descendants . ” That would mean many people . But God said , “ and to your descendant . ” That means only one person ; that person is Christ .
48003017	This is what I mean : God had an agreement with Abraham and promised to keep it . The law , which came four hundred thirty years later , cannot change that agreement and so destroy God’s promise to Abraham .
48003018	If the law could give us Abraham’s blessing , then the promise would not be necessary . But that is not possible , because God freely gave his blessings to Abraham through the promise he had made .
48003019	So what was the law for ? It was given to show that the wrong things people do are against God’s will . And it continued until the special descendant , who had been promised , came . The law was given through angels who used Moses for a mediator to give the law to people .
48003020	But a mediator is not needed when there is only one side , and God is only one .
48003021	Does this mean that the law is against God’s promises ? Never ! That would be true only if the law could make us right with God . But God did not give a law that can bring life .
48003022	Instead , the Scriptures showed that the whole world is bound by sin . This was so the promise would be given through faith to people who believe in Jesus Christ .
48003023	Before this faith came , we were all held prisoners by the law . We had no freedom until God showed us the way of faith that was coming .
48003024	In other words , the law was our guardian leading us to Christ so that we could be made right with God through faith .
48003025	Now the way of faith has come , and we no longer live under a guardian .
48003028	In Christ , there is no difference between Jew and Greek , slave and free person , male and female . You are all the same in Christ Jesus .
48003029	You belong to Christ , so you are Abraham’s descendants . You will inherit all of God’s blessings because of the promise God made to Abraham .
48004001	I want to tell you this : While those who will inherit their fathers’ property are still children , they are no different from slaves . It does not matter that the children own everything .
