48004002	While they are children , they must obey those who are chosen to care for them . But when the children reach the age set by their fathers , they are free .
48004003	It is the same for us . We were once like children , slaves to the useless rules of this world .
48004004	But when the right time came , God sent his Son who was born of a woman and lived under the law .
48004005	God did this so he could buy freedom for those who were under the law and so we could become his children .
48004006	Since you are God’s children , God sent the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , and the Spirit cries out , “ Father . ”
48004007	So now you are not a slave ; you are God’s child , and God will give you the blessing he promised , because you are his child .
48004008	In the past you did not know God . You were slaves to gods that were not real .
48004009	But now you know the true God . Really , it is God who knows you . So why do you turn back to those weak and useless rules you followed before ? Do you want to be slaves to those things again ?
48004010	You still follow teachings about special days , months , seasons , and years .
48004011	I am afraid for you , that my work for you has been wasted .
48004012	Brothers and sisters , I became like you , so I beg you to become like me . You were very good to me before .
48004013	You remember that it was because of an illness that I came to you the first time , preaching the Good News .
48004014	Though my sickness was a trouble for you , you did not hate me or make me leave . But you welcomed me as an angel from God , as if I were Jesus Christ himself !
48004015	You were very happy then , but where is that joy now ? I am ready to testify that you would have taken out your eyes and given them to me if that were possible .
48004016	Now am I your enemy because I tell you the truth ?
48004017	Those people are working hard to persuade you , but this is not good for you . They want to persuade you to turn against us and follow only them .
48004018	It is good for people to show interest in you , but only if their purpose is good . This is always true , not just when I am with you .
48004019	My little children , again I feel the pain of childbirth for you until you truly become like Christ .
48004020	I wish I could be with you now and could change the way I am talking to you , because I do not know what to think about you .
48004021	Some of you still want to be under the law . Tell me , do you know what the law says ?
48004022	The Scriptures say that Abraham had two sons . The mother of one son was a slave woman , and the mother of the other son was a free woman .
48004023	Abraham’s son from the slave woman was born in the normal human way . But the son from the free woman was born because of the promise God made to Abraham .
48004024	This story teaches something else : The two women are like the two agreements between God and his people . One agreement is the law that God made on Mount Sinai , and the people who are under this agreement are like slaves . The mother named Hagar is like that agreement .
48004025	She is like Mount Sinai in Arabia and is a picture of the earthly city of Jerusalem . This city and its people are slaves to the law .
48004026	But the heavenly Jerusalem , which is above , is like the free woman . She is our mother .
48004027	It is written in the Scriptures : “ Be happy , Jerusalem . You are like a woman who never gave birth to children . Start singing and shout for joy . You never felt the pain of giving birth , but you will have more children than the woman who has a husband . ”
48004028	My brothers and sisters , you are God’s children because of his promise , as Isaac was then .
48004029	The son who was born in the normal way treated the other son badly . It is the same today .
48004030	But what does the Scripture say ? “ Throw out the slave woman and her son . The son of the slave woman should not inherit anything . The son of the free woman should receive it all . ”
48004031	So , my brothers and sisters , we are not children of the slave woman , but of the free woman .
48005001	We have freedom now , because Christ made us free . So stand strong . Do not change and go back into the slavery of the law .
48005002	Listen , I Paul tell you that if you go back to the law by being circumcised , Christ does you no good .
48005003	Again , I warn every man : If you allow yourselves to be circumcised , you must follow all the law .
48005004	If you try to be made right with God through the law , your life with Christ is over — you have left God’s grace .
48005005	But we have the true hope that comes from being made right with God , and by the Spirit we wait eagerly for this hope .
48005006	When we are in Christ Jesus , it is not important if we are circumcised or not . The important thing is faith — the kind of faith that works through love .
48005007	You were running a good race . Who stopped you from following the true way ?
48005008	This change did not come from the One who chose you .
48005009	Be careful ! “ Just a little yeast makes the whole batch of dough rise . ”
48005010	But I trust in the Lord that you will not believe those different ideas . Whoever is confusing you with such ideas will be punished .
48005011	My brothers and sisters , I do not teach that a man must be circumcised . If I teach circumcision , why am I still being attacked ? If I still taught circumcision , my preaching about the cross would not be a problem .
48005012	I wish the people who are bothering you would castrate themselves !
48005013	My brothers and sisters , God called you to be free , but do not use your freedom as an excuse to do what pleases your sinful self . Serve each other with love .
48005014	The whole law is made complete in this one command : “ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ”
48005015	If you go on hurting each other and tearing each other apart , be careful , or you will completely destroy each other .
48005016	So I tell you : Live by following the Spirit . Then you will not do what your sinful selves want .
48005017	Our sinful selves want what is against the Spirit , and the Spirit wants what is against our sinful selves . The two are against each other , so you cannot do just what you please .
48005018	But if the Spirit is leading you , you are not under the law .
48005019	The wrong things the sinful self does are clear : being sexually unfaithful , not being pure , taking part in sexual sins ,
48005020	worshiping gods , doing witchcraft , hating , making trouble , being jealous , being angry , being selfish , making people angry with each other , causing divisions among people ,
48005021	feeling envy , being drunk , having wild and wasteful parties , and doing other things like these . I warn you now as I warned you before : Those who do these things will not inherit God’s kingdom .
48005022	But the Spirit produces the fruit of love , joy , peace , patience , kindness , goodness , faithfulness ,
48005023	gentleness , self-control . There is no law that says these things are wrong .
48005024	Those who belong to Christ Jesus have crucified their own sinful selves . They have given up their old selfish feelings and the evil things they wanted to do .
48005025	We get our new life from the Spirit , so we should follow the Spirit .
48005026	We must not be proud or make trouble with each other or be jealous of each other .
48006001	Brothers and sisters , if someone in your group does something wrong , you who are spiritual should go to that person and gently help make him right again . But be careful , because you might be tempted to sin , too .
48006002	By helping each other with your troubles , you truly obey the law of Christ .
48006003	If anyone thinks he is important when he really is not , he is only fooling himself .
48006004	Each person should judge his own actions and not compare himself with others . Then he can be proud for what he himself has done .
48006005	Each person must be responsible for himself .
48006006	Anyone who is learning the teaching of God should share all the good things he has with his teacher .
48006007	Do not be fooled : You cannot cheat God . People harvest only what they plant .
48006008	If they plant to satisfy their sinful selves , their sinful selves will bring them ruin . But if they plant to please the Spirit , they will receive eternal life from the Spirit .
48006009	We must not become tired of doing good . We will receive our harvest of eternal life at the right time if we do not give up .
48006010	When we have the opportunity to help anyone , we should do it . But we should give special attention to those who are in the family of believers .
48006011	See what large letters I use to write this myself .
48006012	Some people are trying to force you to be circumcised so the Jews will accept them . They are afraid they will be attacked if they follow only the cross of Christ .
48006013	Those who are circumcised do not obey the law themselves , but they want you to be circumcised so they can brag about what they forced you to do .
48006014	I hope I will never brag about things like that . The cross of our Lord Jesus Christ is my only reason for bragging . Through the cross of Jesus my world was crucified , and I died to the world .
48006015	It is not important if a man is circumcised or uncircumcised . The important thing is being the new people God has made .
48006016	Peace and mercy to those who follow this rule — and to all of God’s people .
48006017	So do not give me any more trouble . I have scars on my body that show I belong to Christ Jesus .
48006018	My brothers and sisters , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
49001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus . I am an apostle because that is what God wanted . To God’s holy people living in Ephesus , believers in Christ Jesus :
49001002	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
49001003	Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ . In Christ , God has given us every spiritual blessing in the heavenly world .
49001004	That is , in Christ , he chose us before the world was made so that we would be his holy people — people without blame before him .
49001005	Because of his love , God had already decided to make us his own children through Jesus Christ . That was what he wanted and what pleased him ,
49001006	and it brings praise to God because of his wonderful grace . God gave that grace to us freely , in Christ , the One he loves .
49001007	In Christ we are set free by the blood of his death , and so we have forgiveness of sins . How rich is God’s grace ,
49001008	which he has given to us so fully and freely . God , with full wisdom and understanding ,
49001009	let us know his secret purpose . This was what God wanted , and he planned to do it through Christ .
49001010	His goal was to carry out his plan , when the right time came , that all things in heaven and on earth would be joined together in Christ as the head .
49001011	In Christ we were chosen to be God’s people , because from the very beginning God had decided this in keeping with his plan . And he is the One who makes everything agree with what he decides and wants .
49001012	We are the first people who hoped in Christ , and we were chosen so that we would bring praise to God’s glory .
49001013	So it is with you . When you heard the true teaching — the Good News about your salvation — you believed in Christ . And in Christ , God put his special mark of ownership on you by giving you the Holy Spirit that he had promised .
49001014	That Holy Spirit is the guarantee that we will receive what God promised for his people until God gives full freedom to those who are his — to bring praise to God’s glory .
49001015	That is why since I heard about your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for all God’s people ,
49001016	I have not stopped giving thanks to God for you . I always remember you in my prayers ,
49001017	asking the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the glorious Father , to give you a spirit of wisdom and revelation so that you will know him better .
49001018	I pray also that you will have greater understanding in your heart so you will know the hope to which he has called us and that you will know how rich and glorious are the blessings God has promised his holy people .
49001019	And you will know that God’s power is very great for us who believe . That power is the same as the great strength
49001020	God used to raise Christ from the dead and put him at his right side in the heavenly world .
49001021	God has put Christ over all rulers , authorities , powers , and kings , not only in this world but also in the next .
49001022	God put everything under his power and made him the head over everything for the church ,
49001023	which is Christ’s body . The church is filled with Christ , and Christ fills everything in every way .
49002001	In the past you were spiritually dead because of your sins and the things you did against God .
49002002	Yes , in the past you lived the way the world lives , following the ruler of the evil powers that are above the earth . That same spirit is now working in those who refuse to obey God .
49002003	In the past all of us lived like them , trying to please our sinful selves and doing all the things our bodies and minds wanted . We should have suffered God’s anger because we were sinful by nature . We were the same as all other people .
49002004	But God’s mercy is great , and he loved us very much .
49002005	Though we were spiritually dead because of the things we did against God , he gave us new life with Christ . You have been saved by God’s grace .
49002006	And he raised us up with Christ and gave us a seat with him in the heavens . He did this for those in Christ Jesus
49002007	so that for all future time he could show the very great riches of his grace by being kind to us in Christ Jesus .
49002008	I mean that you have been saved by grace through believing . You did not save yourselves ; it was a gift from God .
49002009	It was not the result of your own efforts , so you cannot brag about it .
49002010	God has made us what we are . In Christ Jesus , God made us to do good works , which God planned in advance for us to live our lives doing .
49002011	You were not born Jewish . You are the people the Jews call “ uncircumcised . ” Those who call you “ uncircumcised ” call themselves “ circumcised . ” ( Their circumcision is only something they themselves do on their bodies . )
49002012	Remember that in the past you were without Christ . You were not citizens of Israel , and you had no part in the agreements with the promise that God made to his people . You had no hope , and you did not know God .
49002013	But now in Christ Jesus , you who were far away from God are brought near through the blood of Christ’s death .
49002014	Christ himself is our peace . He made both Jewish people and those who are not Jews one people . They were separated as if there were a wall between them , but Christ broke down that wall of hate by giving his own body .
49002015	The Jewish law had many commands and rules , but Christ ended that law . His purpose was to make the two groups of people become one new people in him and in this way make peace .
49002016	It was also Christ’s purpose to end the hatred between the two groups , to make them into one body , and to bring them back to God . Christ did all this with his death on the cross .
49002017	Christ came and preached peace to you who were far away from God , and to those who were near to God .
49002018	Yes , it is through Christ we all have the right to come to the Father in one Spirit .
49002019	Now you who are not Jewish are not foreigners or strangers any longer , but are citizens together with God’s holy people . You belong to God’s family .
49002020	You are like a building that was built on the foundation of the apostles and prophets . Christ Jesus himself is the most important stone in that building ,
49002021	and that whole building is joined together in Christ . He makes it grow and become a holy temple in the Lord .
49002022	And in Christ you , too , are being built together with the Jews into a place where God lives through the Spirit .
49003001	So I , Paul , am a prisoner of Christ Jesus for you who are not Jews .
49003002	Surely you have heard that God gave me this work to tell you about his grace .
49003003	He let me know his secret by showing it to me . I have already written a little about this .
49003004	If you read what I wrote then , you can see that I truly understand the secret about the Christ .
49003005	People who lived in other times were not told that secret . But now , through the Spirit , God has shown that secret to his holy apostles and prophets .
49003006	This is that secret : that through the Good News those who are not Jews will share with the Jews in God’s blessing . They belong to the same body , and they share together in the promise that God made in Christ Jesus .
49003007	By God’s special gift of grace given to me through his power , I became a servant to tell that Good News .
49003008	I am the least important of all God’s people , but God gave me this gift — to tell those who are not Jews the Good News about the riches of Christ , which are too great to understand fully .
49003009	And God gave me the work of telling all people about the plan for his secret , which has been hidden in him since the beginning of time . He is the One who created everything .
49003010	His purpose was that through the church all the rulers and powers in the heavenly world will now know God’s wisdom , which has so many forms .
49003011	This agrees with the purpose God had since the beginning of time , and he carried out his plan through Christ Jesus our Lord .
49003012	In Christ we can come before God with freedom and without fear . We can do this through faith in Christ .
49003013	So I ask you not to become discouraged because of the sufferings I am having for you . My sufferings are for your glory .
49003014	So I bow in prayer before the Father
49003015	from whom every family in heaven and on earth gets its true name .
49003016	I ask the Father in his great glory to give you the power to be strong inwardly through his Spirit .
49003017	I pray that Christ will live in your hearts by faith and that your life will be strong in love and be built on love .
49003018	And I pray that you and all God’s holy people will have the power to understand the greatness of Christ’s love — how wide and how long and how high and how deep that love is .
49003019	Christ’s love is greater than anyone can ever know , but I pray that you will be able to know that love . Then you can be filled with the fullness of God .
49003020	With God’s power working in us , God can do much , much more than anything we can ask or imagine .
49003021	To him be glory in the church and in Christ Jesus for all time , forever and ever . Amen .
49004001	I am in prison because I belong to the Lord . Therefore I urge you who have been chosen by God to live up to the life to which God called you .
49004002	Always be humble , gentle , and patient , accepting each other in love .
49004003	You are joined together with peace through the Spirit , so make every effort to continue together in this way .
49004004	There is one body and one Spirit , and God called you to have one hope .
49004005	There is one Lord , one faith , and one baptism .
49004006	There is one God and Father of everything . He rules everything and is everywhere and is in everything .
49004007	Christ gave each one of us the special gift of grace , showing how generous he is .
49004008	That is why it says in the Scriptures , “ When he went up to the heights , he led a parade of captives , and he gave gifts to people . ”
49004009	When it says , “ He went up , ” what does it mean ? It means that he first came down to the earth .
49004010	So Jesus came down , and he is the same One who went up above all the heaven . Christ did that to fill everything with his presence .
49004011	And Christ gave gifts to people — he made some to be apostles , some to be prophets , some to go and tell the Good News , and some to have the work of caring for and teaching God’s people .
49004012	Christ gave those gifts to prepare God’s holy people for the work of serving , to make the body of Christ stronger .
49004013	This work must continue until we are all joined together in the same faith and in the same knowledge of the Son of God . We must become like a mature person , growing until we become like Christ and have his perfection .
49004014	Then we will no longer be babies . We will not be tossed about like a ship that the waves carry one way and then another . We will not be influenced by every new teaching we hear from people who are trying to fool us . They make plans and try any kind of trick to fool people into following the wrong path .
49004015	No ! Speaking the truth with love , we will grow up in every way into Christ , who is the head .
49004016	The whole body depends on Christ , and all the parts of the body are joined and held together . Each part does its own work to make the whole body grow and be strong with love .
49004017	In the Lord’s name , I tell you this . Do not continue living like those who do not believe . Their thoughts are worth nothing .
49004018	They do not understand , and they know nothing , because they refuse to listen . So they cannot have the life that God gives .
49004019	They have lost all feeling of shame , and they use their lives for doing evil . They continually want to do all kinds of evil .
49004020	But what you learned in Christ was not like this .
49004021	I know that you heard about him , and you are in him , so you were taught the truth that is in Jesus .
49004022	You were taught to leave your old self — to stop living the evil way you lived before . That old self becomes worse , because people are fooled by the evil things they want to do .
49004023	But you were taught to be made new in your hearts ,
49004024	to become a new person . That new person is made to be like God — made to be truly good and holy .
49004025	So you must stop telling lies . Tell each other the truth , because we all belong to each other in the same body .
49004026	When you are angry , do not sin , and be sure to stop being angry before the end of the day .
49004027	Do not give the devil a way to defeat you .
49004028	Those who are stealing must stop stealing and start working . They should earn an honest living for themselves . Then they will have something to share with those who are poor .
49004029	When you talk , do not say harmful things , but say what people need — words that will help others become stronger . Then what you say will do good to those who listen to you .
49004030	And do not make the Holy Spirit sad . The Spirit is God’s proof that you belong to him . God gave you the Spirit to show that God will make you free when the final day comes .
49004031	Do not be bitter or angry or mad . Never shout angrily or say things to hurt others . Never do anything evil .
49004032	Be kind and loving to each other , and forgive each other just as God forgave you in Christ .
49005001	You are God’s children whom he loves , so try to be like him .
49005002	Live a life of love just as Christ loved us and gave himself for us as a sweet-smelling offering and sacrifice to God .
49005003	But there must be no sexual sin among you , or any kind of evil or greed . Those things are not right for God’s holy people .
49005004	Also , there must be no evil talk among you , and you must not speak foolishly or tell evil jokes . These things are not right for you . Instead , you should be giving thanks to God .
49005005	You can be sure of this : No one will have a place in the kingdom of Christ and of God who sins sexually , or does evil things , or is greedy . Anyone who is greedy is serving a false god .
49005006	Do not let anyone fool you by telling you things that are not true , because these things will bring God’s anger on those who do not obey him .
49005007	So have nothing to do with them .
49005008	In the past you were full of darkness , but now you are full of light in the Lord . So live like children who belong to the light .
49005009	Light brings every kind of goodness , right living , and truth .
49005010	Try to learn what pleases the Lord .
49005011	Have nothing to do with the things done in darkness , which are not worth anything . But show that they are wrong .
49005012	It is shameful even to talk about what those people do in secret .
49005013	But the light makes all things easy to see ,
49005014	and everything that is made easy to see can become light . This is why it is said : “ Wake up , sleeper ! Rise from death , and Christ will shine on you . ”
49005015	So be very careful how you live . Do not live like those who are not wise , but live wisely .
49005016	Use every chance you have for doing good , because these are evil times .
49005017	So do not be foolish but learn what the Lord wants you to do .
49005018	Do not be drunk with wine , which will ruin you , but be filled with the Spirit .
49005019	Speak to each other with psalms , hymns , and spiritual songs , singing and making music in your hearts to the Lord .
49005020	Always give thanks to God the Father for everything , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ .
49005021	Yield to obey each other as you would to Christ .
49005022	Wives , yield to your husbands , as you do to the Lord ,
49005023	because the husband is the head of the wife , as Christ is the head of the church . And he is the Savior of the body , which is the church .
49005024	As the church yields to Christ , so you wives should yield to your husbands in everything .
49005025	Husbands , love your wives as Christ loved the church and gave himself for it
49005026	to make it belong to God . Christ used the word to make the church clean by washing it with water .
49005027	He died so that he could give the church to himself like a bride in all her beauty . He died so that the church could be pure and without fault , with no evil or sin or any other wrong thing in it .
49005028	In the same way , husbands should love their wives as they love their own bodies . The man who loves his wife loves himself .
49005029	No one ever hates his own body , but feeds and takes care of it . And that is what Christ does for the church ,
49005030	because we are parts of his body .
49005031	The Scripture says , “ So a man will leave his father and mother and be united with his wife , and the two will become one body . ”
49005032	That secret is very important — I am talking about Christ and the church .
49005033	But each one of you must love his wife as he loves himself , and a wife must respect her husband .
49006001	Children , obey your parents as the Lord wants , because this is the right thing to do .
49006002	The command says , “ Honor your father and mother . ” This is the first command that has a promise with it —
49006003	“ Then everything will be well with you , and you will have a long life on the earth . ”
49006004	Fathers , do not make your children angry , but raise them with the training and teaching of the Lord .
49006005	Slaves , obey your masters here on earth with fear and respect and from a sincere heart , just as you obey Christ .
49006006	You must do this not only while they are watching you , to please them . With all your heart you must do what God wants as people who are obeying Christ .
49006007	Do your work with enthusiasm . Work as if you were serving the Lord , not as if you were serving only men and women .
49006008	Remember that the Lord will give a reward to everyone , slave or free , for doing good .
49006009	Masters , in the same way , be good to your slaves . Do not threaten them . Remember that the One who is your Master and their Master is in heaven , and he treats everyone alike .
49006010	Finally , be strong in the Lord and in his great power .
49006011	Put on the full armor of God so that you can fight against the devil’s evil tricks .
49006012	Our fight is not against people on earth but against the rulers and authorities and the powers of this world’s darkness , against the spiritual powers of evil in the heavenly world .
49006013	That is why you need to put on God’s full armor . Then on the day of evil you will be able to stand strong . And when you have finished the whole fight , you will still be standing .
49006014	So stand strong , with the belt of truth tied around your waist and the protection of right living on your chest .
49006015	On your feet wear the Good News of peace to help you stand strong .
49006016	And also use the shield of faith with which you can stop all the burning arrows of the Evil One .
49006017	Accept God’s salvation as your helmet , and take the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God .
49006018	Pray in the Spirit at all times with all kinds of prayers , asking for everything you need . To do this you must always be ready and never give up . Always pray for all God’s people .
49006019	Also pray for me that when I speak , God will give me words so that I can tell the secret of the Good News without fear .
49006020	I have been sent to preach this Good News , and I am doing that now , here in prison . Pray that when I preach the Good News I will speak without fear , as I should .
49006021	I am sending to you Tychicus , our brother whom we love and a faithful servant of the Lord’s work . He will tell you everything that is happening with me . Then you will know how I am and what I am doing .
49006022	I am sending him to you for this reason — so that you will know how we are , and he can encourage you .
49006023	Peace and love with faith to you brothers and sisters from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
49006024	Grace to all of you who love our Lord Jesus Christ with love that never ends .
50001001	From Paul and Timothy , servants of Christ Jesus . To all of God’s holy people in Christ Jesus who live in Philippi , including your overseers and deacons :
50001002	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
50001003	I thank my God every time I remember you ,
50001004	always praying with joy for all of you .
50001005	I thank God for the help you gave me while I preached the Good News — help you gave from the first day you believed until now .
50001006	God began doing a good work in you , and I am sure he will continue it until it is finished when Jesus Christ comes again .
50001007	And I know that I am right to think like this about all of you , because I have you in my heart . All of you share in God’s grace with me while I am in prison and while I am defending and proving the truth of the Good News .
50001008	God knows that I want to see you very much , because I love all of you with the love of Christ Jesus .
50001009	This is my prayer for you : that your love will grow more and more ; that you will have knowledge and understanding with your love ;
50001010	that you will see the difference between good and bad and will choose the good ; that you will be pure and without wrong for the coming of Christ ;
50001011	that you will be filled with the good things produced in your life by Christ to bring glory and praise to God .
50001012	I want you brothers and sisters to know that what has happened to me has helped to spread the Good News .
50001013	All the palace guards and everyone else knows that I am in prison because I am a believer in Christ .
50001014	Because I am in prison , most of the believers have become more bold in Christ and are not afraid to speak the word of God .
50001015	It is true that some preach about Christ because they are jealous and ambitious , but others preach about Christ because they want to help .
50001016	They preach because they have love , and they know that God gave me the work of defending the Good News .
50001017	But the others preach about Christ for selfish and wrong reasons , wanting to make trouble for me in prison .
50001018	But it doesn’t matter . The important thing is that in every way , whether for right or wrong reasons , they are preaching about Christ . So I am happy , and I will continue to be happy .
50001019	Because you are praying for me and the Spirit of Jesus Christ is helping me , I know this trouble will bring my freedom .
50001020	I expect and hope that I will not fail Christ in anything but that I will have the courage now , as always , to show the greatness of Christ in my life here on earth , whether I live or die .
50001021	To me the only important thing about living is Christ , and dying would be profit for me .
50001022	If I continue living in my body , I will be able to work for the Lord . I do not know what to choose — living or dying .
50001023	It is hard to choose between the two . I want to leave this life and be with Christ , which is much better ,
50001024	but you need me here in my body .
50001025	Since I am sure of this , I know I will stay with you to help you grow and have joy in your faith .
50001026	You will be very happy in Christ Jesus when I am with you again .
50001027	Only one thing concerns me : Be sure that you live in a way that brings honor to the Good News of Christ . Then whether I come and visit you or am away from you , I will hear that you are standing strong with one purpose , that you work together as one for the faith of the Good News ,
50001028	and that you are not afraid of those who are against you . All of this is proof that your enemies will be destroyed but that you will be saved by God .
50001029	God gave you the honor not only of believing in Christ but also of suffering for him , both of which bring glory to Christ .
50001030	When I was with you , you saw the struggles I had , and you hear about the struggles I am having now . You yourselves are having the same kind of struggles .
50002001	Does your life in Christ give you strength ? Does his love comfort you ? Do we share together in the spirit ? Do you have mercy and kindness ?
50002002	If so , make me very happy by having the same thoughts , sharing the same love , and having one mind and purpose .
50002003	When you do things , do not let selfishness or pride be your guide . Instead , be humble and give more honor to others than to yourselves .
50002004	Do not be interested only in your own life , but be interested in the lives of others .
50002005	In your lives you must think and act like Christ Jesus .
50002006	Christ himself was like God in everything . But he did not think that being equal with God was something to be used for his own benefit .
50002007	But he gave up his place with God and made himself nothing . He was born as a man and became like a servant .
50002008	And when he was living as a man , he humbled himself and was fully obedient to God , even when that caused his death — death on a cross .
50002009	So God raised him to the highest place . God made his name greater than every other name
50002010	so that every knee will bow to the name of Jesus — everyone in heaven , on earth , and under the earth .
50002011	And everyone will confess that Jesus Christ is Lord and bring glory to God the Father .
50002012	My dear friends , you have always obeyed God when I was with you . It is even more important that you obey now while I am away from you . Keep on working to complete your salvation with fear and trembling ,
50002013	because God is working in you to help you want to do and be able to do what pleases him .
50002014	Do everything without complaining or arguing .
50002015	Then you will be innocent and without any wrong . You will be God’s children without fault . But you are living with crooked and mean people all around you , among whom you shine like stars in the dark world .
50002016	You offer the teaching that gives life . So when Christ comes again , I can be happy because my work was not wasted . I ran the race and won .
50002017	Your faith makes you offer your lives as a sacrifice in serving God . If I have to offer my own blood with your sacrifice , I will be happy and full of joy with all of you .
50002018	You also should be happy and full of joy with me .
50002019	I hope in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy to you soon . I will be happy to learn how you are .
50002020	I have no one else like Timothy , who truly cares for you .
50002021	Other people are interested only in their own lives , not in the work of Jesus Christ .
50002022	You know the kind of person Timothy is . You know he has served with me in telling the Good News , as a son serves his father .
50002023	I plan to send him to you quickly when I know what will happen to me .
50002024	I am sure that the Lord will help me to come to you soon .
50002025	Epaphroditus , my brother in Christ , works and serves with me in the army of Christ . When I needed help , you sent him to me . I think now that I must send him back to you ,
50002026	because he wants very much to see all of you . He is worried because you heard that he was sick .
50002027	Yes , he was sick , and nearly died , but God had mercy on him and me too so that I would not have more sadness .
50002028	I want very much to send him to you so that when you see him you can be happy , and I can stop worrying about you .
50002029	Welcome him in the Lord with much joy . Give honor to people like him ,
50002030	because he almost died for the work of Christ . He risked his life to give me the help you could not give in your service to me .
50003001	My brothers and sisters , be full of joy in the Lord . It is no trouble for me to write the same things to you again , and it will help you to be more ready .
50003002	Watch out for those who do evil , who are like dogs , who demand to cut the body .
50003003	We are the ones who are truly circumcised . We worship God through his Spirit , and our pride is in Christ Jesus . We do not put trust in ourselves or anything we can do ,
50003004	although I might be able to put trust in myself . If anyone thinks he has a reason to trust in himself , he should know that I have greater reason for trusting in myself .
50003005	I was circumcised eight days after my birth . I am from the people of Israel and the tribe of Benjamin . I am a Hebrew , and my parents were Hebrews . I had a strict view of the law , which is why I became a Pharisee .
50003006	I was so enthusiastic I tried to hurt the church . No one could find fault with the way I obeyed the law of Moses .
50003007	Those things were important to me , but now I think they are worth nothing because of Christ .
50003008	Not only those things , but I think that all things are worth nothing compared with the greatness of knowing Christ Jesus my Lord . Because of him , I have lost all those things , and now I know they are worthless trash . This allows me to have Christ
50003009	and to belong to him . Now I am right with God , not because I followed the law , but because I believed in Christ . God uses my faith to make me right with him .
50003010	I want to know Christ and the power that raised him from the dead . I want to share in his sufferings and become like him in his death .
50003011	Then I have hope that I myself will be raised from the dead .
50003012	I do not mean that I am already as God wants me to be . I have not yet reached that goal , but I continue trying to reach it and to make it mine . Christ wants me to do that , which is the reason he made me his .
50003013	Brothers and sisters , I know that I have not yet reached that goal , but there is one thing I always do . Forgetting the past and straining toward what is ahead ,
50003014	I keep trying to reach the goal and get the prize for which God called me through Christ to the life above .
50003015	All of us who are spiritually mature should think this way , too . And if there are things you do not agree with , God will make them clear to you .
50003016	But we should continue following the truth we already have .
50003017	Brothers and sisters , all of you should try to follow my example and to copy those who live the way we showed you .
50003018	Many people live like enemies of the cross of Christ . I have often told you about them , and it makes me cry to tell you about them now .
50003019	In the end , they will be destroyed . They do whatever their bodies want , they are proud of their shameful acts , and they think only about earthly things .
50003020	But our homeland is in heaven , and we are waiting for our Savior , the Lord Jesus Christ , to come from heaven .
50003021	By his power to rule all things , he will change our humble bodies and make them like his own glorious body .
50004001	My dear brothers and sisters , I love you and want to see you . You bring me joy and make me proud of you , so stand strong in the Lord as I have told you .
50004002	I ask Euodia and Syntyche to agree in the Lord .
50004003	And I ask you , my faithful friend , to help these women . They served with me in telling the Good News , together with Clement and others who worked with me , whose names are written in the book of life .
50004004	Be full of joy in the Lord always . I will say again , be full of joy .
50004005	Let everyone see that you are gentle and kind . The Lord is coming soon .
50004006	Do not worry about anything , but pray and ask God for everything you need , always giving thanks .
50004007	And God’s peace , which is so great we cannot understand it , will keep your hearts and minds in Christ Jesus .
50004008	Brothers and sisters , think about the things that are good and worthy of praise . Think about the things that are true and honorable and right and pure and beautiful and respected .
50004009	Do what you learned and received from me , what I told you , and what you saw me do . And the God who gives peace will be with you .
50004010	I am very happy in the Lord that you have shown your care for me again . You continued to care about me , but there was no way for you to show it .
50004011	I am not telling you this because I need anything . I have learned to be satisfied with the things I have and with everything that happens .
50004012	I know how to live when I am poor , and I know how to live when I have plenty . I have learned the secret of being happy at any time in everything that happens , when I have enough to eat and when I go hungry , when I have more than I need and when I do not have enough .
50004013	I can do all things through Christ , because he gives me strength .
50004014	But it was good that you helped me when I needed it .
50004015	You Philippians remember when I first preached the Good News there . When I left Macedonia , you were the only church that gave me help .
50004016	Several times you sent me things I needed when I was in Thessalonica .
50004017	Really , it is not that I want to receive gifts from you , but I want you to have the good that comes from giving .
50004018	And now I have everything , and more . I have all I need , because Epaphroditus brought your gift to me . It is like a sweet-smelling sacrifice offered to God , who accepts that sacrifice and is pleased with it .
50004019	My God will use his wonderful riches in Christ Jesus to give you everything you need .
50004020	Glory to our God and Father forever and ever ! Amen .
50004021	Greet each of God’s people in Christ Jesus . Those who are with me send greetings to you .
50004022	All of God’s people greet you , particularly those from the palace of Caesar .
50004023	The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with you all .
51001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus . I am an apostle because that is what God wanted . Also from Timothy , our brother .
51001002	To the holy and faithful brothers and sisters in Christ that live in Colossae : Grace and peace to you from God our Father .
51001003	In our prayers for you we always thank God , the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
51001004	because we have heard about the faith you have in Christ Jesus and the love you have for all of God’s people .
51001005	You have this faith and love because of your hope , and what you hope for is kept safe for you in heaven . You learned about this hope when you heard the message about the truth , the Good News
51001006	that was told to you . Everywhere in the world that Good News is bringing blessings and is growing . This has happened with you , too , since you heard the Good News and understood the truth about the grace of God .
51001007	You learned about God’s grace from Epaphras , whom we love . He works together with us and is a faithful servant of Christ for us .
51001008	He also told us about the love you have from the Holy Spirit .
51001009	Because of this , since the day we heard about you , we have continued praying for you , asking God that you will know fully what he wants . We pray that you will also have great wisdom and understanding in spiritual things
51001010	so that you will live the kind of life that honors and pleases the Lord in every way . You will produce fruit in every good work and grow in the knowledge of God .
51001011	God will strengthen you with his own great power so that you will not give up when troubles come , but you will be patient .
51001012	And you will joyfully give thanks to the Father who has made you able to have a share in all that he has prepared for his people in the kingdom of light .
51001013	God has freed us from the power of darkness , and he brought us into the kingdom of his dear Son .
51001014	The Son paid for our sins , and in him we have forgiveness .
51001015	No one can see God , but Jesus Christ is exactly like him . He ranks higher than everything that has been made .
51001016	Through his power all things were made — things in heaven and on earth , things seen and unseen , all powers , authorities , lords , and rulers . All things were made through Christ and for Christ .
51001017	He was there before anything was made , and all things continue because of him .
51001018	He is the head of the body , which is the church . Everything comes from him . He is the first one who was raised from the dead . So in all things Jesus has first place .
51001019	God was pleased for all of himself to live in Christ .
51001020	And through Christ , God has brought all things back to himself again — things on earth and things in heaven . God made peace through the blood of Christ’s death on the cross .
51001021	At one time you were separated from God . You were his enemies in your minds , and the evil things you did were against God .
51001022	But now God has made you his friends again . He did this through Christ’s death in the body so that he might bring you into God’s presence as people who are holy , with no wrong , and with nothing of which God can judge you guilty .
51001023	This will happen if you continue strong and sure in your faith . You must not be moved away from the hope brought to you by the Good News that you heard . That same Good News has been told to everyone in the world , and I , Paul , help in preaching that Good News .
51001024	I am happy in my sufferings for you . There are things that Christ must still suffer through his body , the church . I am accepting , in my body , my part of these things that must be suffered .
51001025	I became a servant of the church because God gave me a special work to do that helps you , and that work is to tell fully the message of God .
51001026	This message is the secret that was hidden from everyone since the beginning of time , but now it is made known to God’s holy people .
51001027	God decided to let his people know this rich and glorious secret which he has for all people . This secret is Christ himself , who is in you . He is our only hope for glory .
51001028	So we continue to preach Christ to each person , using all wisdom to warn and to teach everyone , in order to bring each one into God’s presence as a mature person in Christ .
51001029	To do this , I work and struggle , using Christ’s great strength that works so powerfully in me .
51002001	I want you to know how hard I work for you , those in Laodicea , and others who have never seen me .
51002002	I want them to be strengthened and joined together with love so that they may be rich in their understanding . This leads to their knowing fully God’s secret , that is , Christ himself .
51002003	In him all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge are safely kept .
51002004	I say this so that no one can fool you by arguments that seem good , but are false .
51002005	Though I am absent from you in my body , my heart is with you , and I am happy to see your good lives and your strong faith in Christ .
51002006	As you received Christ Jesus the Lord , so continue to live in him .
51002007	Keep your roots deep in him and have your lives built on him . Be strong in the faith , just as you were taught , and always be thankful .
51002008	Be sure that no one leads you away with false and empty teaching that is only human , which comes from the ruling spirits of this world , and not from Christ .
51002009	All of God lives fully in Christ ( even when Christ was on earth ) ,
51002010	and you have a full and true life in Christ , who is ruler over all rulers and powers .
51002011	Also in Christ you had a different kind of circumcision , a circumcision not done by hands . It was through Christ’s circumcision , that is , his death , that you were made free from the power of your sinful self .
51002012	When you were baptized , you were buried with Christ , and you were raised up with him through your faith in God’s power that was shown when he raised Christ from the dead .
51002013	When you were spiritually dead because of your sins and because you were not free from the power of your sinful self , God made you alive with Christ , and he forgave all our sins .
51002014	He canceled the debt , which listed all the rules we failed to follow . He took away that record with its rules and nailed it to the cross .
51002015	God stripped the spiritual rulers and powers of their authority . With the cross , he won the victory and showed the world that they were powerless .
51002016	So do not let anyone make rules for you about eating and drinking or about a religious feast , a New Moon Festival , or a Sabbath day .
51002017	These things were like a shadow of what was to come . But what is true and real has come and is found in Christ .
51002018	Do not let anyone disqualify you by making you humiliate yourself and worship angels . Such people enter into visions , which fill them with foolish pride because of their human way of thinking .
51002019	They do not hold tightly to Christ , the head . It is from him that all the parts of the body are cared for and held together . So it grows in the way God wants it to grow .
51002020	Since you died with Christ and were made free from the ruling spirits of the world , why do you act as if you still belong to this world by following rules like these :
51002021	“ Don’t handle this , ” “ Don’t taste that , ” “ Don’t even touch that thing ” ?
51002022	These rules refer to earthly things that are gone as soon as they are used . They are only human commands and teachings .
51002023	They seem to be wise , but they are only part of a human religion . They make people pretend not to be proud and make them punish their bodies , but they do not really control the evil desires of the sinful self .
51003001	Since you were raised from the dead with Christ , aim at what is in heaven , where Christ is sitting at the right hand of God .
51003002	Think only about the things in heaven , not the things on earth .
51003003	Your old sinful self has died , and your new life is kept with Christ in God .
51003004	Christ is your life , and when he comes again , you will share in his glory .
51003005	So put all evil things out of your life : sexual sinning , doing evil , letting evil thoughts control you , wanting things that are evil , and greed . This is really serving a false god .
51003006	These things make God angry .
51003007	In your past , evil life you also did these things .
51003008	But now also put these things out of your life : anger , bad temper , doing or saying things to hurt others , and using evil words when you talk .
51003009	Do not lie to each other . You have left your old sinful life and the things you did before .
51003010	You have begun to live the new life , in which you are being made new and are becoming like the One who made you . This new life brings you the true knowledge of God .
51003011	In the new life there is no difference between Greeks and Jews , those who are circumcised and those who are not circumcised , or people who are foreigners , or Scythians . There is no difference between slaves and free people . But Christ is in all believers , and Christ is all that is important .
51003012	God has chosen you and made you his holy people . He loves you . So you should always clothe yourselves with mercy , kindness , humility , gentleness , and patience .
51003013	Bear with each other , and forgive each other . If someone does wrong to you , forgive that person because the Lord forgave you .
51003014	Even more than all this , clothe yourself in love . Love is what holds you all together in perfect unity .
51003015	Let the peace that Christ gives control your thinking , because you were all called together in one body to have peace . Always be thankful .
51003016	Let the teaching of Christ live in you richly . Use all wisdom to teach and instruct each other by singing psalms , hymns , and spiritual songs with thankfulness in your hearts to God .
51003017	Everything you do or say should be done to obey Jesus your Lord . And in all you do , give thanks to God the Father through Jesus .
51003018	Wives , yield to the authority of your husbands , because this is the right thing to do in the Lord .
51003019	Husbands , love your wives and be gentle with them .
51003020	Children , obey your parents in all things , because this pleases the Lord .
51003021	Fathers , do not nag your children . If you are too hard to please , they may want to stop trying .
51003022	Slaves , obey your masters in all things . Do not obey just when they are watching you , to gain their favor , but serve them honestly , because you respect the Lord .
51003023	In all the work you are doing , work the best you can . Work as if you were doing it for the Lord , not for people .
51003024	Remember that you will receive your reward from the Lord , which he promised to his people . You are serving the Lord Christ .
51003025	But remember that anyone who does wrong will be punished for that wrong , and the Lord treats everyone the same .
51004001	Masters , give what is good and fair to your slaves . Remember that you have a Master in heaven .
51004002	Continue praying , keeping alert , and always thanking God .
51004003	Also pray for us that God will give us an opportunity to tell people his message . Pray that we can preach the secret that God has made known about Christ . This is why I am in prison .
51004004	Pray that I can speak in a way that will make it clear , as I should .
51004005	Be wise in the way you act with people who are not believers , making the most of every opportunity .
51004006	When you talk , you should always be kind and pleasant so you will be able to answer everyone in the way you should .
51004007	Tychicus is my dear brother in Christ and a faithful minister and servant with me in the Lord . He will tell you all the things that are happening to me .
51004008	This is why I am sending him : so you may know how we are and he may encourage you .
51004009	I send him with Onesimus , a faithful and dear brother in Christ , and one of your group . They will tell you all that has happened here .
51004010	Aristarchus , a prisoner with me , and Mark , the cousin of Barnabas , greet you . ( I have already told you what to do about Mark . If he comes , welcome him . )
51004011	Jesus , who is called Justus , also greets you . These are the only Jewish believers who work with me for the kingdom of God , and they have been a comfort to me .
51004012	Epaphras , a servant of Jesus Christ , from your group , also greets you . He always prays for you that you will grow to be spiritually mature and have everything God wants for you .
51004013	I know he has worked hard for you and the people in Laodicea and in Hierapolis .
51004014	Demas and our dear friend Luke , the doctor , greet you .
51004015	Greet the brothers and sisters in Laodicea . And greet Nympha and the church that meets in her house .
51004016	After this letter is read to you , be sure it is also read to the church in Laodicea . And you read the letter that I wrote to Laodicea .
51004017	Tell Archippus , “ Be sure to finish the work the Lord gave you . ”
51004018	I , Paul , greet you and write this with my own hand . Remember me in prison . Grace be with you .
52001001	From Paul , Silas , and Timothy . To the church in Thessalonica , the church in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ : Grace and peace to you .
52001002	We always thank God for all of you and mention you when we pray .
52001003	We continually recall before God our Father the things you have done because of your faith and the work you have done because of your love . And we thank him that you continue to be strong because of your hope in our Lord Jesus Christ .
52001004	Brothers and sisters , God loves you , and we know he has chosen you ,
52001005	because the Good News we brought to you came not only with words , but with power , with the Holy Spirit , and with sure knowledge that it is true . Also you know how we lived when we were with you in order to help you .
52001006	And you became like us and like the Lord . You suffered much , but still you accepted the teaching with the joy that comes from the Holy Spirit .
52001007	So you became an example to all the believers in Macedonia and Southern Greece .
52001008	And the Lord’s teaching spread from you not only into Macedonia and Southern Greece , but now your faith in God has become known everywhere . So we do not need to say anything about it .
52001009	People everywhere are telling about the way you accepted us when we were there with you . They tell how you stopped worshiping idols and began serving the living and true God .
52001010	And you wait for God’s Son , whom God raised from the dead , to come from heaven . He is Jesus , who saves us from God’s angry judgment that is sure to come .
52002001	Brothers and sisters , you know our visit to you was not a failure .
52002002	Before we came to you , we suffered in Philippi . People there insulted us , as you know , and many people were against us . But our God helped us to be brave and to tell you his Good News .
52002003	Our appeal does not come from lies or wrong reasons , nor were we trying to trick you .
52002004	But we speak the Good News because God tested us and trusted us to do it . When we speak , we are not trying to please people , but God , who tests our hearts .
52002005	You know that we never tried to influence you by saying nice things about you . We were not trying to get your money ; we had no selfishness to hide from you . God knows that this is true .
52002006	We were not looking for human praise , from you or anyone else ,
52002007	even though as apostles of Christ we could have used our authority over you . But we were very gentle with you , like a mother caring for her little children .
52002008	Because we loved you , we were happy to share not only God’s Good News with you , but even our own lives . You had become so dear to us !
52002009	Brothers and sisters , I know you remember our hard work and difficulties . We worked night and day so we would not burden any of you while we preached God’s Good News to you .
52002010	When we were with you , we lived in a holy and honest way , without fault . You know this is true , and so does God .
52002011	You know that we treated each of you as a father treats his own children .
52002012	We encouraged you , we urged you , and we insisted that you live good lives for God , who calls you to his glorious kingdom .
52002013	Also , we always thank God because when you heard his message from us , you accepted it as the word of God , not the words of humans . And it really is God’s message which works in you who believe .
52002014	Brothers and sisters , your experiences have been like those of God’s churches in Christ that are in Judea . You suffered from the people of your own country , as they suffered from the Jews
52002015	who killed both the Lord Jesus and the prophets and forced us to leave that country . They do not please God and are against all people .
52002016	They try to stop us from teaching those who are not Jews so they may be saved . By doing this , they are increasing their sins to the limit . The anger of God has come to them at last .
52002017	Brothers and sisters , though we were separated from you for a short time , our thoughts were still with you . We wanted very much to see you and tried hard to do so .
52002018	We wanted to come to you . I , Paul , tried to come more than once , but Satan stopped us .
52002019	You are our hope , our joy , and the crown we will take pride in when our Lord Jesus Christ comes .
52002020	Truly you are our glory and our joy .
52003001	When we could not wait any longer , we decided it was best to stay in Athens alone
52003002	and send Timothy to you . Timothy , our brother , works with us for God and helps us tell people the Good News about Christ . We sent him to strengthen and encourage you in your faith
52003003	so none of you would be upset by these troubles . You yourselves know that we must face these troubles .
52003004	Even when we were with you , we told you we all would have to suffer , and you know it has happened .
52003005	Because of this , when I could wait no longer , I sent Timothy to you so I could learn about your faith . I was afraid the devil had tempted you , and perhaps our hard work would have been wasted .
52003006	But Timothy now has come back to us from you and has brought us good news about your faith and love . He told us that you always remember us in a good way and that you want to see us just as much as we want to see you .
52003007	So , brothers and sisters , while we have much trouble and suffering , we are encouraged about you because of your faith .
52003008	Our life is really full if you stand strong in the Lord .
52003009	We have so much joy before our God because of you . We cannot thank him enough for all the joy we feel .
52003010	Night and day we continue praying with all our heart that we can see you again and give you all the things you need to make your faith strong .
52003011	Now may our God and Father himself and our Lord Jesus prepare the way for us to come to you .
52003012	May the Lord make your love grow more and multiply for each other and for all people so that you will love others as we love you .
52003013	May your hearts be made strong so that you will be holy and without fault before our God and Father when our Lord Jesus comes with all his holy ones .
52004001	Brothers and sisters , we taught you how to live in a way that will please God , and you are living that way . Now we ask and encourage you in the Lord Jesus to live that way even more .
52004002	You know what we told you to do by the authority of the Lord Jesus .
52004003	God wants you to be holy and to stay away from sexual sins .
52004004	He wants each of you to learn to control your own body in a way that is holy and honorable .
52004005	Don’t use your body for sexual sin like the people who do not know God .
52004006	Also , do not wrong or cheat another Christian in this way . The Lord will punish people who do those things as we have already told you and warned you .
52004007	God called us to be holy and does not want us to live in sin .
52004008	So the person who refuses to obey this teaching is disobeying God , not simply a human teaching . And God is the One who gives us his Holy Spirit .
52004009	We do not need to write you about having love for your Christian family , because God has already taught you to love each other .
52004010	And truly you do love the Christians in all of Macedonia . Brothers and sisters , now we encourage you to love them even more .
52004011	Do all you can to live a peaceful life . Take care of your own business , and do your own work as we have already told you .
52004012	If you do , then people who are not believers will respect you , and you will not have to depend on others for what you need .
52004013	Brothers and sisters , we want you to know about those Christians who have died so you will not be sad , as others who have no hope .
52004014	We believe that Jesus died and that he rose again . So , because of him , God will raise with Jesus those who have died .
52004015	What we tell you now is the Lord’s own message . We who are living when the Lord comes again will not go before those who have already died .
52004016	The Lord himself will come down from heaven with a loud command , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trumpet call of God . And those who have died believing in Christ will rise first .
52004017	After that , we who are still alive will be gathered up with them in the clouds to meet the Lord in the air . And we will be with the Lord forever .
52004018	So encourage each other with these words .
52005001	Now , brothers and sisters , we do not need to write you about times and dates .
52005002	You know very well that the day the Lord comes again will be a surprise , like a thief that comes in the night .
52005003	While people are saying , “ We have peace and we are safe , ” they will be destroyed quickly . It is like pains that come quickly to a woman having a baby . Those people will not escape .
52005004	But you , brothers and sisters , are not living in darkness , and so that day will not surprise you like a thief .
52005005	You are all people who belong to the light and to the day . We do not belong to the night or to darkness .
52005006	So we should not be like other people who are sleeping , but we should be alert and have self-control .
52005007	Those who sleep , sleep at night . Those who get drunk , get drunk at night .
52005008	But we belong to the day , so we should control ourselves . We should wear faith and love to protect us , and the hope of salvation should be our helmet .
52005009	God did not choose us to suffer his anger but to have salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ .
52005010	Jesus died for us so that we can live together with him , whether we are alive or dead when he comes .
52005011	So encourage each other and give each other strength , just as you are doing now .
52005012	Now , brothers and sisters , we ask you to appreciate those who work hard among you , who lead you in the Lord and teach you .
52005013	Respect them with a very special love because of the work they do . Live in peace with each other .
52005014	We ask you , brothers and sisters , to warn those who do not work . Encourage the people who are afraid . Help those who are weak . Be patient with everyone .
52005015	Be sure that no one pays back wrong for wrong , but always try to do what is good for each other and for all people .
52005016	Always be joyful .
52005017	Pray continually ,
52005018	and give thanks whatever happens . That is what God wants for you in Christ Jesus .
52005019	Do not hold back the work of the Holy Spirit .
52005020	Do not treat prophecy as if it were unimportant .
52005021	But test everything . Keep what is good ,
52005022	and stay away from everything that is evil .
52005023	Now may God himself , the God of peace , make you pure , belonging only to him . May your whole self — spirit , soul , and body — be kept safe and without fault when our Lord Jesus Christ comes .
52005024	You can trust the One who calls you to do that for you .
52005025	Brothers and sisters , pray for us .
52005026	Give each other a holy kiss when you meet .
52005027	I tell you by the authority of the Lord to read this letter to all the believers .
52005028	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
53001001	From Paul , Silas , and Timothy . To the church in Thessalonica in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
53001002	Grace and peace to you from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53001003	We must always thank God for you , brothers and sisters . This is only right , because your faith is growing more and more , and the love that every one of you has for each other is increasing .
53001004	So we brag about you to the other churches of God . We tell them about the way you continue to be strong and have faith even though you are being treated badly and are suffering many troubles .
53001005	This is proof that God is right in his judgment . He wants you to be counted worthy of his kingdom for which you are suffering .
53001006	God will do what is right . He will give trouble to those who trouble you .
53001007	And he will give rest to you who are troubled and to us also when the Lord Jesus appears with burning fire from heaven with his powerful angels .
53001008	Then he will punish those who do not know God and who do not obey the Good News about our Lord Jesus Christ .
53001009	Those people will be punished with a destruction that continues forever . They will be kept away from the Lord and from his great power .
53001010	This will happen on the day when the Lord Jesus comes to receive glory because of his holy people . And all the people who have believed will be amazed at Jesus . You will be in that group , because you believed what we told you .
53001011	That is why we always pray for you , asking our God to help you live the kind of life he called you to live . We pray that with his power God will help you do the good things you want and perform the works that come from your faith .
53001012	We pray all this so that the name of our Lord Jesus Christ will have glory in you , and you will have glory in him . That glory comes from the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53002001	Brothers and sisters , we have something to say about the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ and the time when we will meet together with him .
53002002	Do not become easily upset in your thinking or afraid if you hear that the day of the Lord has already come . Someone may have said this in a prophecy or in a message or in a letter as if it came from us .
53002003	Do not let anyone fool you in any way . That day of the Lord will not come until the turning away from God happens and the Man of Evil , who is on his way to hell , appears .
53002004	He will be against and put himself above any so-called god or anything that people worship . And that Man of Evil will even go into God’s Temple and sit there and say that he is God .
53002005	I told you when I was with you that all this would happen . Do you not remember ?
53002006	And now you know what is stopping that Man of Evil so he will appear at the right time .
53002007	The secret power of evil is already working in the world , but there is one who is stopping that power . And he will continue to stop it until he is taken out of the way .
53002008	Then that Man of Evil will appear , and the Lord Jesus will kill him with the breath that comes from his mouth and will destroy him with the glory of his coming .
53002009	The Man of Evil will come by the power of Satan . He will have great power , and he will do many different false miracles , signs , and wonders .
53002010	He will use every kind of evil to trick those who are lost . They will die , because they refused to love the truth . ( If they loved the truth , they would be saved . )
53002011	For this reason God sends them something powerful that leads them away from the truth so they will believe a lie .
53002012	So all those will be judged guilty who did not believe the truth , but enjoyed doing evil .
53002013	Brothers and sisters , whom the Lord loves , God chose you from the beginning to be saved . So we must always thank God for you . You are saved by the Spirit that makes you holy and by your faith in the truth .
53002014	God used the Good News that we preached to call you to be saved so you can share in the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
53002015	So , brothers and sisters , stand strong and continue to believe the teachings we gave you in our speaking and in our letter .
53003001	And now , brothers and sisters , pray for us that the Lord’s teaching will continue to spread quickly and that people will give honor to that teaching , just as happened with you .
53003002	And pray that we will be protected from stubborn and evil people , because not all people believe .
53003003	But the Lord is faithful and will give you strength and will protect you from the Evil One .
53003004	The Lord makes us feel sure that you are doing and will continue to do the things we told you .
53003005	May the Lord lead your hearts into God’s love and Christ’s patience .
53003006	Brothers and sisters , by the authority of our Lord Jesus Christ we command you to stay away from any believer who refuses to work and does not follow the teaching we gave you .
53003007	You yourselves know that you should live as we live . We were not lazy when we were with you .
53003008	And when we ate another person’s food , we always paid for it . We worked very hard night and day so we would not be an expense to any of you .
53003009	We had the right to ask you to help us , but we worked to take care of ourselves so we would be an example for you to follow .
53003010	When we were with you , we gave you this rule : “ Anyone who refuses to work should not eat . ”
53003011	We hear that some people in your group refuse to work . They do nothing but busy themselves in other people’s lives .
53003012	We command those people and beg them in the Lord Jesus Christ to work quietly and earn their own food .
53003013	But you , brothers and sisters , never become tired of doing good .
53003014	If some people do not obey what we tell you in this letter , then take note of them . Have nothing to do with them so they will feel ashamed .
53003015	But do not treat them as enemies . Warn them as fellow believers .
53003016	Now may the Lord of peace give you peace at all times and in every way . The Lord be with all of you .
53003017	I , Paul , end this letter now in my own handwriting . All my letters have this to show they are from me . This is the way I write .
53003018	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all .
54001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus , by the command of God our Savior and Christ Jesus our hope .
54001002	To Timothy , a true child to me because you believe : Grace , mercy , and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
54001003	I asked you to stay longer in Ephesus when I went into Macedonia so you could command some people there to stop teaching false things .
54001004	Tell them not to spend their time on stories that are not true and on long lists of names in family histories . These things only bring arguments ; they do not help God’s work , which is done in faith .
54001005	The purpose of this command is for people to have love , a love that comes from a pure heart and a good conscience and a true faith .
54001006	Some people have missed these things and turned to useless talk .
54001007	They want to be teachers of the law , but they do not understand either what they are talking about or what they are sure about .
54001008	But we know that the law is good if someone uses it lawfully .
54001009	We also know that the law is not made for good people but for those who are against the law and for those who refuse to follow it . It is for people who are against God and are sinful , who are unholy and ungodly , who kill their fathers and mothers , who murder ,
54001010	who take part in sexual sins , who have sexual relations with people of the same sex , who sell slaves , who tell lies , who speak falsely , and who do anything against the true teaching of God .
54001011	That teaching is part of the Good News of the blessed God that he gave me to tell .
54001012	I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who gave me strength , because he trusted me and gave me this work of serving him .
54001013	In the past I spoke against Christ and persecuted him and did all kinds of things to hurt him . But God showed me mercy , because I did not know what I was doing . I did not believe .
54001014	But the grace of our Lord was fully given to me , and with that grace came the faith and love that are in Christ Jesus .
54001015	What I say is true , and you should fully accept it : Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners , of whom I am the worst .
54001016	But I was given mercy so that in me , the worst of all sinners , Christ Jesus could show that he has patience without limit . His patience with me made me an example for those who would believe in him and have life forever .
54001017	To the King that rules forever , who will never die , who cannot be seen , the only God , be honor and glory forever and ever . Amen .
54001018	Timothy , my child , I am giving you a command that agrees with the prophecies that were given about you in the past . I tell you this so you can follow them and fight the good fight .
54001019	Continue to have faith and do what you know is right . Some people have rejected this , and their faith has been shipwrecked .
54001020	Hymenaeus and Alexander have done that , and I have given them to Satan so they will learn not to speak against God .
54002001	First , I tell you to pray for all people , asking God for what they need and being thankful to him .
54002002	Pray for rulers and for all who have authority so that we can have quiet and peaceful lives full of worship and respect for God .
54002003	This is good , and it pleases God our Savior ,
54002004	who wants all people to be saved and to know the truth .
54002005	There is one God and one mediator so that human beings can reach God . That way is through Christ Jesus , who is himself human .
54002006	He gave himself as a payment to free all people . He is proof that came at the right time .
54002007	That is why I was chosen to tell the Good News and to be an apostle . ( I am telling the truth ; I am not lying . ) I was chosen to teach those who are not Jews to believe and to know the truth .
54002008	So , I want the men everywhere to pray , lifting up their hands in a holy manner , without anger and arguments .
54002009	Also , women should wear proper clothes that show respect and self-control , not using braided hair or gold or pearls or expensive clothes .
54002010	Instead , they should do good deeds , which is right for women who say they worship God .
54002011	Let a woman learn by listening quietly and being ready to cooperate in everything .
54002012	But I do not allow a woman to teach or to have authority over a man , but to listen quietly ,
54002013	because Adam was formed first and then Eve .
54002014	And Adam was not tricked , but the woman was tricked and became a sinner .
54002015	But she will be saved through having children if she continues in faith , love , and holiness , with self-control .
54003001	What I say is true : Anyone wanting to become an overseer desires a good work .
54003002	An overseer must not give people a reason to criticize him , and he must have only one wife . He must be self-controlled , wise , respected by others , ready to welcome guests , and able to teach .
54003003	He must not drink too much wine or like to fight , but rather be gentle and peaceable , not loving money .
54003004	He must be a good family leader , having children who cooperate with full respect .
54003005	( If someone does not know how to lead the family , how can that person take care of God’s church ? )
