54003006	But an elder must not be a new believer , or he might be too proud of himself and be judged guilty just as the devil was .
54003007	An elder must also have the respect of people who are not in the church so he will not be criticized by others and caught in the devil’s trap .
54003008	In the same way , deacons must be respected by others , not saying things they do not mean . They must not drink too much wine or try to get rich by cheating others .
54003009	With a clear conscience they must follow the secret of the faith that God made known to us .
54003010	Test them first . Then let them serve as deacons if you find nothing wrong in them .
54003011	In the same way , women must be respected by others . They must not speak evil of others . They must be self-controlled and trustworthy in everything .
54003012	Deacons must have only one wife and be good leaders of their children and their own families .
54003013	Those who serve well as deacons are making an honorable place for themselves , and they will be very bold in their faith in Christ Jesus .
54003014	Although I hope I can come to you soon , I am writing these things to you now .
54003015	Then , even if I am delayed , you will know how to live in the family of God . That family is the church of the living God , the support and foundation of the truth .
54003016	Without doubt , the secret of our life of worship is great : He was shown to us in a human body , proved right in spirit , and seen by angels . He was proclaimed to the nations , believed in by the world , and taken up in glory .
54004001	Now the Holy Spirit clearly says that in the later times some people will stop believing the faith . They will follow spirits that lie and teachings of demons .
54004002	Such teachings come from the false words of liars whose consciences are destroyed as if by a hot iron .
54004003	They forbid people to marry and tell them not to eat certain foods which God created to be eaten with thanks by people who believe and know the truth .
54004004	Everything God made is good , and nothing should be refused if it is accepted with thanks ,
54004005	because it is made holy by what God has said and by prayer .
54004006	By telling these things to the brothers and sisters , you will be a good servant of Christ Jesus . You will be made strong by the words of the faith and the good teaching which you have been following .
54004007	But do not follow foolish stories that disagree with God’s truth , but train yourself to serve God .
54004008	Training your body helps you in some ways , but serving God helps you in every way by bringing you blessings in this life and in the future life , too .
54004009	What I say is true , and you should fully accept it .
54004010	This is why we work and struggle : We hope in the living God who is the Savior of all people , especially of those who believe .
54004011	Command and teach these things .
54004012	Do not let anyone treat you as if you are unimportant because you are young . Instead , be an example to the believers with your words , your actions , your love , your faith , and your pure life .
54004013	Until I come , continue to read the Scriptures to the people , strengthen them , and teach them .
54004014	Use the gift you have , which was given to you through prophecy when the group of elders laid their hands on you .
54004015	Continue to do those things ; give your life to doing them so your progress may be seen by everyone .
54004016	Be careful in your life and in your teaching . If you continue to live and teach rightly , you will save both yourself and those who listen to you .
54005001	Do not speak angrily to an older man , but plead with him as if he were your father . Treat younger men like brothers ,
54005002	older women like mothers , and younger women like sisters . Always treat them in a pure way .
54005003	Take care of widows who are truly widows .
54005004	But if a widow has children or grandchildren , let them first learn to do their duty to their own family and to repay their parents or grandparents . That pleases God .
54005005	The true widow , who is all alone , puts her hope in God and continues to pray night and day for God’s help .
54005006	But the widow who uses her life to please herself is really dead while she is alive .
54005007	Tell the believers to do these things so that no one can criticize them .
54005008	Whoever does not care for his own relatives , especially his own family members , has turned against the faith and is worse than someone who does not believe in God .
54005009	To be on the list of widows , a woman must be at least sixty years old . She must have been faithful to her husband .
54005010	She must be known for her good works — works such as raising her children , welcoming strangers , washing the feet of God’s people , helping those in trouble , and giving her life to do all kinds of good deeds .
54005011	But do not put younger widows on that list . After they give themselves to Christ , they are pulled away from him by their physical desires , and then they want to marry again .
54005012	They will be judged for not doing what they first promised to do .
54005013	Besides that , they learn to waste their time , going from house to house . And they not only waste their time but also begin to gossip and busy themselves with other people’s lives , saying things they should not say .
54005014	So I want the younger widows to marry , have children , and manage their homes . Then no enemy will have any reason to criticize them .
54005015	But some have already turned away to follow Satan .
54005016	If any woman who is a believer has widows in her family , she should care for them herself . The church should not have to care for them . Then it will be able to take care of those who are truly widows .
54005017	The elders who lead the church well should receive double honor , especially those who work hard by speaking and teaching ,
54005018	because the Scripture says : “ When an ox is working in the grain , do not cover its mouth to keep it from eating , ” and “ A worker should be given his pay . ”
54005019	Do not listen to someone who accuses an elder , without two or three witnesses .
54005020	Tell those who continue sinning that they are wrong . Do this in front of the whole church so that the others will have a warning .
54005021	Before God and Christ Jesus and the chosen angels , I command you to do these things without showing favor of any kind to anyone .
54005022	Think carefully before you lay your hands on anyone , and don’t share in the sins of others . Keep yourself pure .
54005023	Stop drinking only water , but drink a little wine to help your stomach and your frequent sicknesses .
54005024	The sins of some people are easy to see even before they are judged , but the sins of others are seen only later .
54005025	So also good deeds are easy to see , but even those that are not easily seen cannot stay hidden .
54006001	All who are slaves under a yoke should show full respect to their masters so no one will speak against God’s name and our teaching .
54006002	The slaves whose masters are believers should not show their masters any less respect because they are believers . They should serve their masters even better , because they are helping believers they love . You must teach and preach these things .
54006003	Anyone who has a different teaching does not agree with the true teaching of our Lord Jesus Christ and the teaching that shows the true way to serve God .
54006004	This person is full of pride and understands nothing , but is sick with a love for arguing and fighting about words . This brings jealousy , fighting , speaking against others , evil mistrust ,
54006005	and constant quarrels from those who have evil minds and have lost the truth . They think that serving God is a way to get rich .
54006006	Serving God does make us very rich , if we are satisfied with what we have .
54006007	We brought nothing into the world , so we can take nothing out .
54006008	But , if we have food and clothes , we will be satisfied with that .
54006009	Those who want to become rich bring temptation to themselves and are caught in a trap . They want many foolish and harmful things that ruin and destroy people .
54006010	The love of money causes all kinds of evil . Some people have left the faith , because they wanted to get more money , but they have caused themselves much sorrow .
54006011	But you , man of God , run away from all those things . Instead , live in the right way , serve God , have faith , love , patience , and gentleness .
54006012	Fight the good fight of faith , grabbing hold of the life that continues forever . You were called to have that life when you confessed the good confession before many witnesses .
54006013	In the sight of God , who gives life to everything , and of Christ Jesus , I give you a command . Christ Jesus made the good confession when he stood before Pontius Pilate .
54006014	Do what you were commanded to do without wrong or blame until our Lord Jesus Christ comes again .
54006015	God will make that happen at the right time . He is the blessed and only Ruler , the King of all kings and the Lord of all lords .
54006016	He is the only One who never dies . He lives in light so bright no one can go near it . No one has ever seen God , or can see him . May honor and power belong to God forever . Amen .
54006017	Command those who are rich with things of this world not to be proud . Tell them to hope in God , not in their uncertain riches . God richly gives us everything to enjoy .
54006018	Tell the rich people to do good , to be rich in doing good deeds , to be generous and ready to share .
54006019	By doing that , they will be saving a treasure for themselves as a strong foundation for the future . Then they will be able to have the life that is true life .
54006020	Timothy , guard what God has trusted to you . Stay away from foolish , useless talk and from the arguments of what is falsely called “ knowledge . ”
54006021	By saying they have that “ knowledge , ” some have missed the true faith . Grace be with you .
55001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God . God sent me to tell about the promise of life that is in Christ Jesus .
55001002	To Timothy , a dear child to me : Grace , mercy , and peace to you from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
55001003	I thank God as I always mention you in my prayers , day and night . I serve him , doing what I know is right as my ancestors did .
55001004	Remembering that you cried for me , I want very much to see you so I can be filled with joy .
55001005	I remember your true faith . That faith first lived in your grandmother Lois and in your mother Eunice , and I know you now have that same faith .
55001006	This is why I remind you to keep using the gift God gave you when I laid my hands on you . Now let it grow , as a small flame grows into a fire .
55001007	God did not give us a spirit that makes us afraid but a spirit of power and love and self-control .
55001008	So do not be ashamed to tell people about our Lord Jesus , and do not be ashamed of me , in prison for the Lord . But suffer with me for the Good News . God , who gives us the strength to do that ,
55001009	saved us and made us his holy people . That was not because of anything we did ourselves but because of God’s purpose and grace . That grace was given to us through Christ Jesus before time began ,
55001010	but it is now shown to us by the coming of our Savior Christ Jesus . He destroyed death , and through the Good News he showed us the way to have life that cannot be destroyed .
55001011	I was chosen to tell that Good News and to be an apostle and a teacher .
55001012	I am suffering now because I tell the Good News , but I am not ashamed , because I know Jesus , the One in whom I have believed . And I am sure he is able to protect what he has trusted me with until that day .
55001013	Follow the pattern of true teachings that you heard from me in faith and love , which are in Christ Jesus .
55001014	Protect the truth that you were given ; protect it with the help of the Holy Spirit who lives in us .
55001015	You know that everyone in Asia has left me , even Phygelus and Hermogenes .
55001016	May the Lord show mercy to the family of Onesiphorus , who has often helped me and was not ashamed that I was in prison .
55001017	When he came to Rome , he looked eagerly for me until he found me .
55001018	May the Lord allow him to find mercy from the Lord on that day . You know how many ways he helped me in Ephesus .
55002001	You then , Timothy , my child , be strong in the grace we have in Christ Jesus .
55002002	You should teach people whom you can trust the things you and many others have heard me say . Then they will be able to teach others .
55002003	Share in the troubles we have like a good soldier of Christ Jesus .
55002004	A soldier wants to please the enlisting officer , so no one serving in the army wastes time with everyday matters .
55002005	Also an athlete who takes part in a contest must obey all the rules in order to win .
55002006	The farmer who works hard should be the first person to get some of the food that was grown .
55002007	Think about what I am saying , because the Lord will give you the ability to understand everything .
55002008	Remember Jesus Christ , who was raised from the dead , who is from the family of David . This is the Good News I preach ,
55002009	and I am suffering because of it to the point of being bound with chains like a criminal . But God’s teaching is not in chains .
55002010	So I patiently accept all these troubles so that those whom God has chosen can have the salvation that is in Christ Jesus . With that salvation comes glory that never ends .
55002011	This teaching is true : If we died with him , we will also live with him .
55002012	If we accept suffering , we will also rule with him . If we say we don’t know him , he will say he doesn’t know us .
55002013	If we are not faithful , he will still be faithful , because he must be true to who he is .
55002014	Continue teaching these things , warning people in God’s presence not to argue about words . It does not help anyone , and it ruins those who listen .
55002015	Make every effort to give yourself to God as the kind of person he will approve . Be a worker who is not ashamed and who uses the true teaching in the right way .
55002016	Stay away from foolish , useless talk , because that will lead people further away from God .
55002017	Their evil teaching will spread like a sickness inside the body . Hymenaeus and Philetus are like that .
55002018	They have left the true teaching , saying that the rising from the dead has already taken place , and so they are destroying the faith of some people .
55002019	But God’s strong foundation continues to stand . These words are written on the seal : “ The Lord knows those who belong to him , ” and “ Everyone who wants to belong to the Lord must stop doing wrong . ”
55002020	In a large house there are not only things made of gold and silver , but also things made of wood and clay . Some things are used for special purposes , and others are made for ordinary jobs .
55002021	All who make themselves clean from evil will be used for special purposes . They will be made holy , useful to the Master , ready to do any good work .
55002022	But run away from the evil desires of youth . Try hard to live right and to have faith , love , and peace , together with those who trust in the Lord from pure hearts .
55002023	Stay away from foolish and stupid arguments , because you know they grow into quarrels .
55002024	And a servant of the Lord must not quarrel but must be kind to everyone , a good teacher , and patient .
55002025	The Lord’s servant must gently teach those who disagree . Then maybe God will let them change their minds so they can accept the truth .
55002026	And they may wake up and escape from the trap of the devil , who catches them to do what he wants .
55003001	Remember this ! In the last days there will be many troubles ,
55003002	because people will love themselves , love money , brag , and be proud . They will say evil things against others and will not obey their parents or be thankful or be the kind of people God wants .
55003003	They will not love others , will refuse to forgive , will gossip , and will not control themselves . They will be cruel , will hate what is good ,
55003004	will turn against their friends , and will do foolish things without thinking . They will be conceited , will love pleasure instead of God ,
55003005	and will act as if they serve God but will not have his power . Stay away from those people .
55003006	Some of them go into homes and get control of silly women who are full of sin and are led by many evil desires .
55003007	These women are always learning new teachings , but they are never able to understand the truth fully .
55003008	Just as Jannes and Jambres were against Moses , these people are against the truth . Their thinking has been ruined , and they have failed in trying to follow the faith .
55003009	But they will not be successful in what they do , because as with Jannes and Jambres , everyone will see that they are foolish .
55003010	But you have followed what I teach , the way I live , my goal , faith , patience , and love . You know I never give up .
55003011	You know how I have been hurt and have suffered , as in Antioch , Iconium , and Lystra . I have suffered , but the Lord saved me from all those troubles .
55003012	Everyone who wants to live as God desires , in Christ Jesus , will be persecuted .
55003013	But people who are evil and cheat others will go from bad to worse . They will fool others , but they will also be fooling themselves .
55003014	But you should continue following the teachings you learned . You know they are true , because you trust those who taught you .
55003015	Since you were a child you have known the Holy Scriptures which are able to make you wise . And that wisdom leads to salvation through faith in Christ Jesus .
55003016	All Scripture is inspired by God and is useful for teaching , for showing people what is wrong in their lives , for correcting faults , and for teaching how to live right .
55003017	Using the Scriptures , the person who serves God will be capable , having all that is needed to do every good work .
55004001	I give you a command in the presence of God and Christ Jesus , the One who will judge the living and the dead , and by his coming and his kingdom :
55004002	Preach the Good News . Be ready at all times , and tell people what they need to do . Tell them when they are wrong . Encourage them with great patience and careful teaching ,
55004003	because the time will come when people will not listen to the true teaching but will find many more teachers who please them by saying the things they want to hear .
55004004	They will stop listening to the truth and will begin to follow false stories .
55004005	But you should control yourself at all times , accept troubles , do the work of telling the Good News , and complete all the duties of a servant of God .
55004006	My life is being given as an offering to God , and the time has come for me to leave this life .
55004007	I have fought the good fight , I have finished the race , I have kept the faith .
55004008	Now , a crown is being held for me — a crown for being right with God . The Lord , the judge who judges rightly , will give the crown to me on that day — not only to me but to all those who have waited with love for him to come again .
55004009	Do your best to come to me as soon as you can ,
55004010	because Demas , who loved this world , left me and went to Thessalonica . Crescens went to Galatia , and Titus went to Dalmatia .
55004011	Luke is the only one still with me . Get Mark and bring him with you when you come , because he can help me in my work here .
55004012	I sent Tychicus to Ephesus .
55004013	When I was in Troas , I left my coat there with Carpus . So when you come , bring it to me , along with my books , particularly the ones written on parchment .
55004014	Alexander the metalworker did many harmful things against me . The Lord will punish him for what he did .
55004015	You also should be careful that he does not hurt you , because he fought strongly against our teaching .
55004016	The first time I defended myself , no one helped me ; everyone left me . May they be forgiven .
55004017	But the Lord stayed with me and gave me strength so I could fully tell the Good News to all those who are not Jews . So I was saved from the lion’s mouth .
55004018	The Lord will save me when anyone tries to hurt me , and he will bring me safely to his heavenly kingdom . Glory forever and ever be the Lord’s . Amen .
55004019	Greet Priscilla and Aquila and the family of Onesiphorus .
55004020	Erastus stayed in Corinth , and I left Trophimus sick in Miletus .
55004021	Try as hard as you can to come to me before winter . Eubulus sends greetings to you . Also Pudens , Linus , Claudia , and all the brothers and sisters in Christ greet you .
55004022	The Lord be with your spirit . Grace be with you .
56001001	From Paul , a servant of God and an apostle of Jesus Christ . I was sent to help the faith of God’s chosen people and to help them know the truth that shows people how to serve God .
56001002	That faith and that knowledge come from the hope for life forever , which God promised to us before time began . And God cannot lie .
56001003	At the right time God let the world know about that life through preaching . He trusted me with that work , and I preached by the command of God our Savior .
56001004	To Titus , my true child in the faith we share : Grace and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Savior .
56001005	I left you in Crete so you could finish doing the things that still needed to be done and so you could appoint elders in every town , as I directed you .
56001006	An elder must not be guilty of doing wrong , must have only one wife , and must have believing children . They must not be known as children who are wild and do not cooperate .
56001007	As God’s managers , overseers must not be guilty of doing wrong , being selfish , or becoming angry quickly . They must not drink too much wine , like to fight , or try to get rich by cheating others .
56001008	Overseers must be ready to welcome guests , love what is good , be wise , live right , and be holy and self-controlled .
56001009	By holding on to the trustworthy word just as we teach it , overseers can help people by using true teaching , and they can show those who are against the true teaching that they are wrong .
56001010	There are many people who refuse to cooperate , who talk about worthless things and lead others into the wrong way — mainly those who insist on circumcision to be saved .
56001011	These people must be stopped , because they are upsetting whole families by teaching things they should not teach , which they do to get rich by cheating people .
56001012	Even one of their own prophets said , “ Cretans are always liars , evil animals , and lazy people who do nothing but eat . ”
56001013	The words that prophet said are true . So firmly tell those people they are wrong so they may become strong in the faith ,
56001014	not accepting Jewish false stories and the commands of people who reject the truth .
56001015	To those who are pure , all things are pure , but to those who are full of sin and do not believe , nothing is pure . Both their minds and their consciences have been ruined .
56001016	They say they know God , but their actions show they do not accept him . They are hateful people , they refuse to obey , and they are useless for doing anything good .
56002001	But you must tell everyone what to do to follow the true teaching .
56002002	Teach older men to be self-controlled , serious , wise , strong in faith , in love , and in patience .
56002003	In the same way , teach older women to be holy in their behavior , not speaking against others or enslaved to too much wine , but teaching what is good .
56002004	Then they can teach the young women to love their husbands , to love their children ,
56002005	to be wise and pure , to be good workers at home , to be kind , and to yield to their husbands . Then no one will be able to criticize the teaching God gave us .
56002006	In the same way , encourage young men to be wise .
56002007	In every way be an example of doing good deeds . When you teach , do it with honesty and seriousness .
56002008	Speak the truth so that you cannot be criticized . Then those who are against you will be ashamed because there is nothing bad to say about us .
56002009	Slaves should yield to their own masters at all times , trying to please them and not arguing with them .
56002010	They should not steal from them but should show their masters they can be fully trusted so that in everything they do they will make the teaching of God our Savior attractive .
56002011	That is the way we should live , because God’s grace that can save everyone has come .
56002012	It teaches us not to live against God nor to do the evil things the world wants to do . Instead , that grace teaches us to live in the present age in a wise and right way and in a way that shows we serve God .
56002013	We should live like that while we wait for our great hope and the coming of the glory of our great God and Savior Jesus Christ .
56002014	He gave himself for us so he might pay the price to free us from all evil and to make us pure people who belong only to him — people who are always wanting to do good deeds .
56002015	Say these things and encourage the people and tell them what is wrong in their lives , with all authority . Do not let anyone treat you as if you were unimportant .
56003001	Remind the believers to yield to the authority of rulers and government leaders , to obey them , to be ready to do good ,
56003002	to speak no evil about anyone , to live in peace , and to be gentle and polite to all people .
56003003	In the past we also were foolish . We did not obey , we were wrong , and we were slaves to many things our bodies wanted and enjoyed . We spent our lives doing evil and being jealous . People hated us , and we hated each other .
56003004	But when the kindness and love of God our Savior was shown ,
56003005	he saved us because of his mercy . It was not because of good deeds we did to be right with him . He saved us through the washing that made us new people through the Holy Spirit .
56003006	God poured out richly upon us that Holy Spirit through Jesus Christ our Savior .
56003007	Being made right with God by his grace , we could have the hope of receiving the life that never ends .
56003008	This teaching is true , and I want you to be sure the people understand these things . Then those who believe in God will be careful to use their lives for doing good . These things are good and will help everyone .
56003009	But stay away from those who have foolish arguments and talk about useless family histories and argue and quarrel about the law . Those things are worth nothing and will not help anyone .
56003010	After a first and second warning , avoid someone who causes arguments .
56003011	You can know that such people are evil and sinful ; their own sins prove them wrong .
56003012	When I send Artemas or Tychicus to you , make every effort to come to me at Nicopolis , because I have decided to stay there this winter .
56003013	Do all you can to help Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey so that they have everything they need .
56003014	Our people must learn to use their lives for doing good deeds to provide what is necessary so that their lives will not be useless .
56003015	All who are with me greet you . Greet those who love us in the faith . Grace be with you all .
57001001	From Paul , a prisoner of Christ Jesus , and from Timothy , our brother . To Philemon , our dear friend and worker with us ;
57001002	to Apphia , our sister ; to Archippus , a worker with us ; and to the church that meets in your home :
57001003	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
57001004	I always thank my God when I mention you in my prayers ,
57001005	because I hear about the love you have for all God’s holy people and the faith you have in the Lord Jesus .
57001006	I pray that the faith you share may make you understand every blessing we have in Christ .
57001007	I have great joy and comfort , my brother , because the love you have shown to God’s people has refreshed them .
57001008	So , in Christ , I could be bold and order you to do what is right .
57001009	But because I love you , I am pleading with you instead . I , Paul , an old man now and also a prisoner for Christ Jesus ,
57001010	am pleading with you for my child Onesimus , who became my child while I was in prison .
57001011	In the past he was useless to you , but now he has become useful for both you and me .
57001012	I am sending him back to you , and with him I am sending my own heart .
57001013	I wanted to keep him with me so that in your place he might help me while I am in prison for the Good News .
57001014	But I did not want to do anything without asking you first so that any good you do for me will be because you want to do it , not because I forced you .
57001015	Maybe Onesimus was separated from you for a short time so you could have him back forever —
57001016	no longer as a slave , but better than a slave , as a loved brother . I love him very much , but you will love him even more , both as a person and as a believer in the Lord .
57001017	So if you consider me your partner , welcome Onesimus as you would welcome me .
57001018	If he has done anything wrong to you or if he owes you anything , charge that to me .
57001019	I , Paul , am writing this with my own hand . I will pay it back , and I will say nothing about what you owe me for your own life .
57001020	So , my brother , I ask that you do this for me in the Lord : Refresh my heart in Christ .
57001021	I write this letter , knowing that you will do what I ask you and even more .
57001022	One more thing — prepare a room for me in which to stay , because I hope God will answer your prayers and I will be able to come to you .
57001023	Epaphras , a prisoner with me for Christ Jesus , sends greetings to you .
57001024	And also Mark , Aristarchus , Demas , and Luke , workers together with me , send greetings .
57001025	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit .
58001001	In the past God spoke to our ancestors through the prophets many times and in many different ways .
58001002	But now in these last days God has spoken to us through his Son . God has chosen his Son to own all things , and through him he made the world .
58001003	The Son reflects the glory of God and shows exactly what God is like . He holds everything together with his powerful word . When the Son made people clean from their sins , he sat down at the right side of God , the Great One in heaven .
58001004	The Son became much greater than the angels , and God gave him a name that is much greater than theirs .
58001005	This is because God never said to any of the angels , “ You are my Son . Today I have become your Father . ” Nor did God say of any angel , “ I will be his Father , and he will be my Son . ”
58001006	And when God brings his firstborn Son into the world , he says , “ Let all God’s angels worship him . ”
58001007	This is what God said about the angels : “ God makes his angels become like winds . He makes his servants become like flames of fire . ”
58001008	But God said this about his Son : “ God , your throne will last forever and ever . You will rule your kingdom with fairness .
58001009	You love right and hate evil , so God has chosen you from among your friends ; he has set you apart with much joy . ”
58001010	God also says , “ Lord , in the beginning you made the earth , and your hands made the skies .
58001011	They will be destroyed , but you will remain . They will all wear out like clothes .
58001012	You will fold them like a coat . And , like clothes , you will change them . But you never change , and your life will never end . ”
58001013	And God never said this to an angel : “ Sit by me at my right side until I put your enemies under your control . ”
58001014	All the angels are spirits who serve God and are sent to help those who will receive salvation .
58002001	So we must be more careful to follow what we were taught . Then we will not stray away from the truth .
58002002	The teaching God spoke through angels was shown to be true , and anyone who did not follow it or obey it received the punishment that was earned .
58002003	So surely we also will be punished if we ignore this great salvation . The Lord himself first told about this salvation , and those who heard him testified it was true .
58002004	God also testified to the truth of the message by using wonders , great signs , many kinds of miracles , and by giving people gifts through the Holy Spirit , just as he wanted .
58002005	God did not choose angels to be the rulers of the new world that was coming , which is what we have been talking about .
58002006	It is written in the Scriptures , “ Why are people even important to you ? Why do you take care of human beings ?
58002007	You made them a little lower than the angels and crowned them with glory and honor .
58002008	You put all things under their control . ” When God put everything under their control , there was nothing left that they did not rule . Still , we do not yet see them ruling over everything .
58002009	But we see Jesus , who for a short time was made lower than the angels . And now he is wearing a crown of glory and honor because he suffered and died . And by God’s grace , he died for everyone .
58002010	God is the One who made all things , and all things are for his glory . He wanted to have many children share his glory , so he made the One who leads people to salvation perfect through suffering .
58002011	Jesus , who makes people holy , and those who are made holy are from the same family . So he is not ashamed to call them his brothers and sisters .
58002012	He says , “ Then , I will tell my brothers and sisters about you ; I will praise you in the public meeting . ”
58002013	He also says , “ I will trust in God . ” And he also says , “ I am here , and with me are the children God has given me . ”
58002014	Since these children are people with physical bodies , Jesus himself became like them . He did this so that , by dying , he could destroy the one who has the power of death — the devil —
58002015	and free those who were like slaves all their lives because of their fear of death .
58002016	Clearly , it is not angels that Jesus helps , but the people who are from Abraham .
58002017	For this reason Jesus had to be made like his brothers and sisters in every way so he could be their merciful and faithful high priest in service to God . Then Jesus could die in their place to take away their sins .
58002018	And now he can help those who are tempted , because he himself suffered and was tempted .
58003001	So all of you holy brothers and sisters , who were called by God , think about Jesus , who was sent to us and is the high priest of our faith .
58003002	Jesus was faithful to God as Moses was in God’s family .
58003003	Jesus has more honor than Moses , just as the builder of a house has more honor than the house itself .
58003004	Every house is built by someone , but the builder of everything is God himself .
58003005	Moses was faithful in God’s family as a servant , and he told what God would say in the future .
58003006	But Christ is faithful as a Son over God’s house . And we are God’s house if we confidently maintain our hope .
58003007	So it is as the Holy Spirit says : “ Today listen to what he says .
58003008	Do not be stubborn as in the past when you turned against God , when you tested God in the desert .
58003009	There your ancestors tried me and tested me and saw the things I did for forty years .
58003010	I was angry with them . I said , ‘ They are not loyal to me and have not understood my ways . ’
58003011	I was angry and made a promise , ‘ They will never enter my rest . ’ ”
58003012	So brothers and sisters , be careful that none of you has an evil , unbelieving heart that will turn you away from the living God .
58003013	But encourage each other every day while it is “ today . ” Help each other so none of you will become hardened because sin has tricked you .
58003014	We all share in Christ if we keep till the end the sure faith we had in the beginning .
58003015	This is what the Scripture says : “ Today listen to what he says . Do not be stubborn as in the past when you turned against God . ”
58003016	Who heard God’s voice and was against him ? It was all those people Moses led out of Egypt .
58003017	And with whom was God angry for forty years ? He was angry with those who sinned , who died in the desert .
58003018	And to whom was God talking when he promised that they would never enter his rest ? He was talking to those who did not obey him .
58003019	So we see they were not allowed to enter and have God’s rest , because they did not believe .
58004001	Now , since God has left us the promise that we may enter his rest , let us be very careful so none of you will fail to enter .
58004002	The Good News was preached to us just as it was to them . But the teaching they heard did not help them , because they heard it but did not accept it with faith .
58004003	We who have believed are able to enter and have God’s rest . As God has said , “ I was angry and made a promise , ‘ They will never enter my rest . ’ ” But God’s work was finished from the time he made the world .
58004004	In the Scriptures he talked about the seventh day of the week : “ And on the seventh day God rested from all his works . ”
58004005	And again in the Scripture God said , “ They will never enter my rest . ”
58004006	It is still true that some people will enter God’s rest , but those who first heard the way to be saved did not enter , because they did not obey .
58004007	So God planned another day , called “ today . ” He spoke about that day through David a long time later in the same Scripture used before : “ Today listen to what he says . Do not be stubborn . ”
58004008	We know that Joshua did not lead the people into that rest , because God spoke later about another day .
58004009	This shows that the rest for God’s people is still coming .
58004010	Anyone who enters God’s rest will rest from his work as God did .
58004011	Let us try as hard as we can to enter God’s rest so that no one will fail by following the example of those who refused to obey .
58004012	God’s word is alive and working and is sharper than a double-edged sword . It cuts all the way into us , where the soul and the spirit are joined , to the center of our joints and bones . And it judges the thoughts and feelings in our hearts .
58004013	Nothing in all the world can be hidden from God . Everything is clear and lies open before him , and to him we must explain the way we have lived .
58004014	Since we have a great high priest , Jesus the Son of God , who has gone into heaven , let us hold on to the faith we have .
58004015	For our high priest is able to understand our weaknesses . He was tempted in every way that we are , but he did not sin .
58004016	Let us , then , feel very sure that we can come before God’s throne where there is grace . There we can receive mercy and grace to help us when we need it .
58005001	Every high priest is chosen from among other people . He is given the work of going before God for them to offer gifts and sacrifices for sins .
58005002	Since he himself is weak , he is able to be gentle with those who do not understand and who are doing wrong things .
58005003	Because he is weak , the high priest must offer sacrifices for his own sins and also for the sins of the people .
58005004	To be a high priest is an honor , but no one chooses himself for this work . He must be called by God as Aaron was .
58005005	So also Christ did not choose himself to have the honor of being a high priest , but God chose him . God said to him , “ You are my Son . Today I have become your Father . ”
58005006	And in another Scripture God says , “ You are a priest forever , a priest like Melchizedek . ”
58005007	While Jesus lived on earth , he prayed to God and asked God for help . He prayed with loud cries and tears to the One who could save him from death , and his prayer was heard because he trusted God .
58005008	Even though Jesus was the Son of God , he learned obedience by what he suffered .
58005009	And because his obedience was perfect , he was able to give eternal salvation to all who obey him .
58005010	In this way God made Jesus a high priest , a priest like Melchizedek .
58005011	We have much to say about this , but it is hard to explain because you are so slow to understand .
58005012	By now you should be teachers , but you need someone to teach you again the first lessons of God’s message . You still need the teaching that is like milk . You are not ready for solid food .
58005013	Anyone who lives on milk is still a baby and knows nothing about right teaching .
58005014	But solid food is for those who are grown up . They are mature enough to know the difference between good and evil .
58006001	So let us go on to grown-up teaching . Let us not go back over the beginning lessons we learned about Christ . We should not again start teaching about faith in God and about turning away from those acts that lead to death .
58006002	We should not return to the teaching about baptisms , about laying on of hands , about the raising of the dead and eternal judgment .
58006003	And we will go on to grown-up teaching if God allows .
58006004	Some people cannot be brought back again to a changed life . They were once in God’s light , and enjoyed heaven’s gift , and shared in the Holy Spirit .
58006005	They found out how good God’s word is , and they received the powers of his new world .
58006006	But they fell away from Christ . It is impossible to bring them back to a changed life again , because they are nailing the Son of God to a cross again and are shaming him in front of others .
58006007	Some people are like land that gets plenty of rain . The land produces a good crop for those who work it , and it receives God’s blessings .
58006008	Other people are like land that grows thorns and weeds and is worthless . It is about to be cursed by God and will be destroyed by fire .
58006009	Dear friends , we are saying this to you , but we really expect better things from you that will lead to your salvation .
58006010	God is fair ; he will not forget the work you did and the love you showed for him by helping his people . And he will remember that you are still helping them .
58006011	We want each of you to go on with the same hard work all your lives so you will surely get what you hope for .
58006012	We do not want you to become lazy . Be like those who through faith and patience will receive what God has promised .
58006013	God made a promise to Abraham . And as there is no one greater than God , he used himself when he swore to Abraham ,
58006014	saying , “ I will surely bless you and give you many descendants . ”
58006015	Abraham waited patiently for this to happen , and he received what God promised .
58006016	People always use the name of someone greater than themselves when they swear . The oath proves that what they say is true , and this ends all arguing .
58006017	God wanted to prove that his promise was true to those who would get what he promised . And he wanted them to understand clearly that his purposes never change , so he made an oath .
58006018	These two things cannot change : God cannot lie when he makes a promise , and he cannot lie when he makes an oath . These things encourage us who came to God for safety . They give us strength to hold on to the hope we have been given .
58006019	We have this hope as an anchor for the soul , sure and strong . It enters behind the curtain in the Most Holy Place in heaven ,
58006020	where Jesus has gone ahead of us and for us . He has become the high priest forever , a priest like Melchizedek .
58007001	Melchizedek was the king of Salem and a priest for God Most High . He met Abraham when Abraham was coming back after defeating the kings . When they met , Melchizedek blessed Abraham ,
58007002	and Abraham gave him a tenth of everything he had brought back from the battle . First , Melchizedek’s name means “ king of goodness , ” and he is king of Salem , which means “ king of peace . ”
58007003	No one knows who Melchizedek’s father or mother was , where he came from , when he was born , or when he died . Melchizedek is like the Son of God ; he continues being a priest forever .
58007004	You can see how great Melchizedek was . Abraham , the great father , gave him a tenth of everything that he won in battle .
58007005	Now the law says that those in the tribe of Levi who become priests must collect a tenth from the people — their own people — even though the priests and the people are from the family of Abraham .
58007006	Melchizedek was not from the tribe of Levi , but he collected a tenth from Abraham . And he blessed Abraham , the man who had God’s promises .
58007007	Now everyone knows that the more important person blesses the less important person .
58007008	Priests receive a tenth , even though they are only men who live and then die . But Melchizedek , who received a tenth from Abraham , continues living , as the Scripture says .
58007009	We might even say that Levi , who receives a tenth , also paid it when Abraham paid Melchizedek a tenth .
58007010	Levi was not yet born , but he was in the body of his ancestor when Melchizedek met Abraham .
58007011	The people were given the law concerning the system of priests from the tribe of Levi , but they could not be made perfect through that system . So there was a need for another priest to come , a priest like Melchizedek , not Aaron .
58007012	And when a different kind of priest comes , the law must be changed , too .
58007013	We are saying these things about Christ , who belonged to a different tribe . No one from that tribe ever served as a priest at the altar .
58007014	It is clear that our Lord came from the tribe of Judah , and Moses said nothing about priests belonging to that tribe .
58007015	And this becomes even more clear when we see that another priest comes who is like Melchizedek .
58007016	He was not made a priest by human rules and laws but through the power of his life , which continues forever .
58007017	It is said about him , “ You are a priest forever , a priest like Melchizedek . ”
58007018	The old rule is now set aside , because it was weak and useless .
58007019	The law of Moses could not make anything perfect . But now a better hope has been given to us , and with this hope we can come near to God .
58007020	It is important that God did this with an oath . Others became priests without an oath ,
58007021	but Christ became a priest with God’s oath . God said : “ The Lord has made a promise and will not change his mind . ‘ You are a priest forever . ’ ”
58007022	This means that Jesus is the guarantee of a better agreement from God to his people .
58007023	When one of the other priests died , he could not continue being a priest . So there were many priests .
58007024	But because Jesus lives forever , he will never stop serving as priest .
58007025	So he is able always to save those who come to God through him because he always lives , asking God to help them .
58007026	Jesus is the kind of high priest we need . He is holy , sinless , pure , not influenced by sinners , and he is raised above the heavens .
58007027	He is not like the other priests who had to offer sacrifices every day , first for their own sins , and then for the sins of the people . Christ offered his sacrifice only once and for all time when he offered himself .
58007028	The law chooses high priests who are people with weaknesses , but the word of God’s oath came later than the law . It made God’s Son to be the high priest , and that Son has been made perfect forever .
58008001	Here is the point of what we are saying : We have a high priest who sits on the right side of God’s throne in heaven .
58008002	Our high priest serves in the Most Holy Place , the true place of worship that was made by God , not by humans .
58008003	Every high priest has the work of offering gifts and sacrifices to God . So our high priest must also offer something to God .
58008004	If our high priest were now living on earth , he would not be a priest , because there are already priests here who follow the law by offering gifts to God .
58008005	The work they do as priests is only a copy and a shadow of what is in heaven . This is why God warned Moses when he was ready to build the Holy Tent : “ Be very careful to make everything by the plan I showed you on the mountain . ”
58008006	But the priestly work that has been given to Jesus is much greater than the work that was given to the other priests . In the same way , the new agreement that Jesus brought from God to his people is much greater than the old one . And the new agreement is based on promises of better things .
58008007	If there had been nothing wrong with the first agreement , there would have been no need for a second agreement .
58008008	But God found something wrong with his people . He says : “ Look , the time is coming , says the Lord , when I will make a new agreement with the people of Israel and the people of Judah .
58008009	It will not be like the agreement I made with their ancestors when I took them by the hand to bring them out of Egypt . But they broke that agreement , and I turned away from them , says the Lord .
58008010	This is the agreement I will make with the people of Israel at that time , says the Lord . I will put my teachings in their minds and write them on their hearts . I will be their God , and they will be my people .
58008011	People will no longer have to teach their neighbors and relatives to know the Lord , because all people will know me , from the least to the most important .
58008012	I will forgive them for the wicked things they did , and I will not remember their sins anymore . ”
58008013	God called this a new agreement , so he has made the first agreement old . And anything that is old and worn out is ready to disappear .
58009001	The first agreement had rules for worship and a place on earth for worship .
58009002	The Holy Tent was set up for this . The first area in the Tent was called the Holy Place . In it were the lamp and the table with the bread that was made holy for God .
58009003	Behind the second curtain was a room called the Most Holy Place .
58009004	In it was a golden altar for burning incense and the Ark covered with gold that held the old agreement . Inside this Ark was a golden jar of manna , Aaron’s rod that once grew leaves , and the stone tablets of the old agreement .
58009005	Above the Ark were the creatures that showed God’s glory , whose wings reached over the lid . But we cannot tell everything about these things now .
58009006	When everything in the Tent was made ready in this way , the priests went into the first room every day to worship .
58009007	But only the high priest could go into the second room , and he did that only once a year . He could never enter the inner room without taking blood with him , which he offered to God for himself and for sins the people did without knowing they did them .
58009008	The Holy Spirit uses this to show that the way into the Most Holy Place was not open while the system of the old Holy Tent was still being used .
58009009	This is an example for the present time . It shows that the gifts and sacrifices offered cannot make the conscience of the worshiper perfect .
58009010	These gifts and sacrifices were only about food and drink and special washings . They were rules for the body , to be followed until the time of God’s new way .
58009011	But when Christ came as the high priest of the good things we now have , he entered the greater and more perfect tent . It is not made by humans and does not belong to this world .
58009012	Christ entered the Most Holy Place only once — and for all time . He did not take with him the blood of goats and calves . His sacrifice was his own blood , and by it he set us free from sin forever .
58009013	The blood of goats and bulls and the ashes of a cow are sprinkled on the people who are unclean , and this makes their bodies clean again .
58009014	How much more is done by the blood of Christ . He offered himself through the eternal Spirit as a perfect sacrifice to God . His blood will make our consciences pure from useless acts so we may serve the living God .
58009015	For this reason Christ brings a new agreement from God to his people . Those who are called by God can now receive the blessings he has promised , blessings that will last forever . They can have those things because Christ died so that the people who lived under the first agreement could be set free from sin .
58009016	When there is a will , it must be proven that the one who wrote that will is dead .
58009017	A will means nothing while the person is alive ; it can be used only after the person dies .
58009018	This is why even the first agreement could not begin without blood to show death .
58009019	First , Moses told all the people every command in the law . Next he took the blood of calves and mixed it with water . Then he used red wool and a branch of the hyssop plant to sprinkle it on the book of the law and on all the people .
58009020	He said , “ This is the blood that begins the Agreement that God commanded you to obey . ”
58009021	In the same way , Moses sprinkled the blood on the Holy Tent and over all the things used in worship .
58009022	The law says that almost everything must be made clean by blood , and sins cannot be forgiven without blood to show death .
58009023	So the copies of the real things in heaven had to be made clean by animal sacrifices . But the real things in heaven need much better sacrifices .
58009024	Christ did not go into the Most Holy Place made by humans , which is only a copy of the real one . He went into heaven itself and is there now before God to help us .
58009025	The high priest enters the Most Holy Place once every year with blood that is not his own . But Christ did not offer himself many times .
58009026	Then he would have had to suffer many times since the world was made . But Christ came only once and for all time at just the right time to take away all sin by sacrificing himself .
58009027	Just as everyone must die once and then be judged ,
58009028	so Christ was offered as a sacrifice one time to take away the sins of many people . And he will come a second time , not to offer himself for sin , but to bring salvation to those who are waiting for him .
58010001	The law is only an unclear picture of the good things coming in the future ; it is not the real thing . The people under the law offer the same sacrifices every year , but these sacrifices can never make perfect those who come near to worship God .
58010002	If the law could make them perfect , the sacrifices would have already stopped . The worshipers would be made clean , and they would no longer have a sense of sin .
58010003	But these sacrifices remind them of their sins every year ,
58010004	because it is impossible for the blood of bulls and goats to take away sins .
58010005	So when Christ came into the world , he said : “ You do not want sacrifices and offerings , but you have prepared a body for me .
58010006	You do not ask for burnt offerings and offerings to take away sins .
58010007	Then I said , ‘ Look , I have come . It is written about me in the book . God , I have come to do what you want . ’ ”
58010008	In this Scripture he first said , “ You do not want sacrifices and offerings . You do not ask for burnt offerings and offerings to take away sins . ” ( These are all sacrifices that the law commands . )
58010009	Then he said , “ Look , I have come to do what you want . ” God ends the first system of sacrifices so he can set up the new system .
58010010	And because of this , we are made holy through the sacrifice Christ made in his body once and for all time .
58010011	Every day the priests stand and do their religious service , often offering the same sacrifices . Those sacrifices can never take away sins .
58010012	But after Christ offered one sacrifice for sins , forever , he sat down at the right side of God .
58010013	And now Christ waits there for his enemies to be put under his power .
58010014	With one sacrifice he made perfect forever those who are being made holy .
58010015	The Holy Spirit also tells us about this . First he says :
58010016	“ This is the agreement I will make with them at that time , says the Lord . I will put my teachings in their hearts and write them on their minds . ”
58010017	Then he says : “ Their sins and the evil things they do — I will not remember anymore . ”
58010018	Now when these have been forgiven , there is no more need for a sacrifice for sins .
58010019	So , brothers and sisters , we are completely free to enter the Most Holy Place without fear because of the blood of Jesus’ death .
58010020	We can enter through a new and living way that Jesus opened for us . It leads through the curtain — Christ’s body .
58010021	And since we have a great priest over God’s house ,
58010022	let us come near to God with a sincere heart and a sure faith , because we have been made free from a guilty conscience , and our bodies have been washed with pure water .
58010023	Let us hold firmly to the hope that we have confessed , because we can trust God to do what he promised .
58010024	Let us think about each other and help each other to show love and do good deeds .
58010025	You should not stay away from the church meetings , as some are doing , but you should meet together and encourage each other . Do this even more as you see the day coming .
58010026	If we decide to go on sinning after we have learned the truth , there is no longer any sacrifice for sins .
58010027	There is nothing but fear in waiting for the judgment and the terrible fire that will destroy all those who live against God .
58010028	Anyone who refused to obey the law of Moses was found guilty from the proof given by two or three witnesses . He was put to death without mercy .
58010029	So what do you think should be done to those who do not respect the Son of God , who look at the blood of the agreement that made them holy as no different from others’ blood , who insult the Spirit of God’s grace ? Surely they should have a much worse punishment .
58010030	We know that God said , “ I will punish those who do wrong ; I will repay them . ” And he also said , “ The Lord will judge his people . ”
58010031	It is a terrible thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
58010032	Remember those days in the past when you first learned the truth . You had a hard struggle with many sufferings , but you continued strong .
58010033	Sometimes you were hurt and attacked before crowds of people , and sometimes you shared with those who were being treated that way .
58010034	You helped the prisoners . You even had joy when all that you owned was taken from you , because you knew you had something better and more lasting .
58010035	So do not lose the courage you had in the past , which has a great reward .
58010036	You must hold on , so you can do what God wants and receive what he has promised .
58010037	For in a very short time , “ The One who is coming will come and will not be delayed .
58010038	Those who are right with me will live by faith . But if they turn back with fear , I will not be pleased with them . ”
58010039	But we are not those who turn back and are lost . We are people who have faith and are saved .
58011001	Faith means being sure of the things we hope for and knowing that something is real even if we do not see it .
58011002	Faith is the reason we remember great people who lived in the past .
58011003	It is by faith we understand that the whole world was made by God’s command so what we see was made by something that cannot be seen .
58011004	It was by faith that Abel offered God a better sacrifice than Cain did . God said he was pleased with the gifts Abel offered and called Abel a good man because of his faith . Abel died , but through his faith he is still speaking .
58011005	It was by faith that Enoch was taken to heaven so he would not die . He could not be found , because God had taken him away . Before he was taken , the Scripture says that he was a man who truly pleased God .
58011006	Without faith no one can please God . Anyone who comes to God must believe that he is real and that he rewards those who truly want to find him .
58011007	It was by faith that Noah heard God’s warnings about things he could not yet see . He obeyed God and built a large boat to save his family . By his faith , Noah showed that the world was wrong , and he became one of those who are made right with God through faith .
58011008	It was by faith Abraham obeyed God’s call to go to another place God promised to give him . He left his own country , not knowing where he was to go .
58011009	It was by faith that he lived like a foreigner in the country God promised to give him . He lived in tents with Isaac and Jacob , who had received that same promise from God .
58011010	Abraham was waiting for the city that has real foundations — the city planned and built by God .
58011011	He was too old to have children , and Sarah could not have children . It was by faith that Abraham was made able to become a father , because he trusted God to do what he had promised .
58011012	This man was so old he was almost dead , but from him came as many descendants as there are stars in the sky . Like the sand on the seashore , they could not be counted .
58011013	All these great people died in faith . They did not get the things that God promised his people , but they saw them coming far in the future and were glad . They said they were like visitors and strangers on earth .
58011014	When people say such things , they show they are looking for a country that will be their own .
58011015	If they had been thinking about the country they had left , they could have gone back .
58011016	But they were waiting for a better country — a heavenly country . So God is not ashamed to be called their God , because he has prepared a city for them .
58011017	It was by faith that Abraham , when God tested him , offered his son Isaac as a sacrifice . God made the promises to Abraham , but Abraham was ready to offer his own son as a sacrifice .
58011018	God had said , “ The descendants I promised you will be from Isaac . ”
58011019	Abraham believed that God could raise the dead , and really , it was as if Abraham got Isaac back from death .
58011020	It was by faith that Isaac blessed the future of Jacob and Esau .
58011021	It was by faith that Jacob , as he was dying , blessed each one of Joseph’s sons . Then he worshiped as he leaned on the top of his walking stick .
58011022	It was by faith that Joseph , while he was dying , spoke about the Israelites leaving Egypt and gave instructions about what to do with his body .
58011023	It was by faith that Moses’ parents hid him for three months after he was born . They saw that Moses was a beautiful baby , and they were not afraid to disobey the king’s order .
58011024	It was by faith that Moses , when he grew up , refused to be called the son of the king of Egypt’s daughter .
58011025	He chose to suffer with God’s people instead of enjoying sin for a short time .
58011026	He thought it was better to suffer for the Christ than to have all the treasures of Egypt , because he was looking for God’s reward .
58011027	It was by faith that Moses left Egypt and was not afraid of the king’s anger . Moses continued strong as if he could see the God that no one can see .
58011028	It was by faith that Moses prepared the Passover and spread the blood on the doors so the one who brings death would not kill the firstborn sons of Israel .
58011029	It was by faith that the people crossed the Red Sea as if it were dry land . But when the Egyptians tried it , they were drowned .
58011030	It was by faith that the walls of Jericho fell after the people had marched around them for seven days .
58011031	It was by faith that Rahab , the prostitute , welcomed the spies and was not killed with those who refused to obey God .
58011032	Do I need to give more examples ? I do not have time to tell you about Gideon , Barak , Samson , Jephthah , David , Samuel , and the prophets .
58011033	Through their faith they defeated kingdoms . They did what was right , received God’s promises , and shut the mouths of lions .
58011034	They stopped great fires and were saved from being killed with swords . They were weak , and yet were made strong . They were powerful in battle and defeated other armies .
58011035	Women received their dead relatives raised back to life . Others were tortured and refused to accept their freedom so they could be raised from the dead to a better life .
58011036	Some were laughed at and beaten . Others were put in chains and thrown into prison .
58011037	They were stoned to death , they were cut in half , and they were killed with swords . Some wore the skins of sheep and goats . They were poor , abused , and treated badly .
58011038	The world was not good enough for them ! They wandered in deserts and mountains , living in caves and holes in the earth .
58011039	All these people are known for their faith , but none of them received what God had promised .
58011040	God planned to give us something better so that they would be made perfect , but only together with us .
58012001	We are surrounded by a great cloud of people whose lives tell us what faith means . So let us run the race that is before us and never give up . We should remove from our lives anything that would get in the way and the sin that so easily holds us back .
58012002	Let us look only to Jesus , the One who began our faith and who makes it perfect . He suffered death on the cross . But he accepted the shame as if it were nothing because of the joy that God put before him . And now he is sitting at the right side of God’s throne .
58012003	Think about Jesus’ example . He held on while wicked people were doing evil things to him . So do not get tired and stop trying .
58012004	You are struggling against sin , but your struggles have not yet caused you to be killed .
58012005	You have forgotten the encouraging words that call you his children : “ My child , don’t think the Lord’s discipline is worth nothing , and don’t stop trying when he corrects you .
58012006	The Lord disciplines those he loves , and he punishes everyone he accepts as his child . ”
58012007	So hold on through your sufferings , because they are like a father’s discipline . God is treating you as children . All children are disciplined by their fathers .
58012008	If you are never disciplined ( and every child must be disciplined ) , you are not true children .
58012009	We have all had fathers here on earth who disciplined us , and we respected them . So it is even more important that we accept discipline from the Father of our spirits so we will have life .
58012010	Our fathers on earth disciplined us for a short time in the way they thought was best . But God disciplines us to help us , so we can become holy as he is .
58012011	We do not enjoy being disciplined . It is painful at the time , but later , after we have learned from it , we have peace , because we start living in the right way .
58012012	You have become weak , so make yourselves strong again .
58012013	Keep on the right path , so the weak will not stumble but rather be strengthened .
58012014	Try to live in peace with all people , and try to live free from sin . Anyone whose life is not holy will never see the Lord .
58012015	Be careful that no one fails to receive God’s grace and begins to cause trouble among you . A person like that can ruin many of you .
58012016	Be careful that no one takes part in sexual sin or is like Esau and never thinks about God . As the oldest son , Esau would have received everything from his father , but he sold all that for a single meal .
58012017	You remember that after Esau did this , he wanted to get his father’s blessing , but his father refused . Esau could find no way to change what he had done , even though he wanted the blessing so much that he cried .
58012018	You have not come to a mountain that can be touched and that is burning with fire . You have not come to darkness , sadness , and storms .
58012019	You have not come to the noise of a trumpet or to the sound of a voice like the one the people of Israel heard and begged not to hear another word .
58012020	They did not want to hear the command : “ If anything , even an animal , touches the mountain , it must be put to death with stones . ”
58012021	What they saw was so terrible that Moses said , “ I am shaking with fear . ”
58012022	But you have come to Mount Zion , to the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem . You have come to thousands of angels gathered together with joy .
58012023	You have come to the meeting of God’s firstborn children whose names are written in heaven . You have come to God , the judge of all people , and to the spirits of good people who have been made perfect .
58012024	You have come to Jesus , the One who brought the new agreement from God to his people , and you have come to the sprinkled blood that has a better message than the blood of Abel .
58012025	So be careful and do not refuse to listen when God speaks . Others refused to listen to him when he warned them on earth , and they did not escape . So it will be worse for us if we refuse to listen to God who warns us from heaven .
58012026	When he spoke before , his voice shook the earth , but now he has promised , “ Once again I will shake not only the earth but also the heavens . ”
58012027	The words “ once again ” clearly show us that everything that was made — things that can be shaken — will be destroyed . Only the things that cannot be shaken will remain .
58012028	So let us be thankful , because we have a kingdom that cannot be shaken . We should worship God in a way that pleases him with respect and fear ,
58012029	because our God is like a fire that burns things up .
58013001	Keep on loving each other as brothers and sisters .
58013002	Remember to welcome strangers , because some who have done this have welcomed angels without knowing it .
58013003	Remember those who are in prison as if you were in prison with them . Remember those who are suffering as if you were suffering with them .
58013004	Marriage should be honored by everyone , and husband and wife should keep their marriage pure . God will judge as guilty those who take part in sexual sins .
58013005	Keep your lives free from the love of money , and be satisfied with what you have . God has said , “ I will never leave you ; I will never abandon you . ”
58013006	So we can be sure when we say , “ I will not be afraid , because the Lord is my helper . People can’t do anything to me . ”
58013007	Remember your leaders who taught God’s message to you . Remember how they lived and died , and copy their faith .
58013008	Jesus Christ is the same yesterday , today , and forever .
58013009	Do not let all kinds of strange teachings lead you into the wrong way . Your hearts should be strengthened by God’s grace , not by obeying rules about foods , which do not help those who obey them .
58013010	We have a sacrifice , but the priests who serve in the Holy Tent cannot eat from it .
58013011	The high priest carries the blood of animals into the Most Holy Place where he offers this blood for sins . But the bodies of the animals are burned outside the camp .
58013012	So Jesus also suffered outside the city to make his people holy with his own blood .
58013013	So let us go to Jesus outside the camp , holding on as he did when we are abused .
58013014	Here on earth we do not have a city that lasts forever , but we are looking for the city that we will have in the future .
58013015	So through Jesus let us always offer to God our sacrifice of praise , coming from lips that speak his name .
58013016	Do not forget to do good to others , and share with them , because such sacrifices please God .
58013017	Obey your leaders and act under their authority . They are watching over you , because they are responsible for your souls . Obey them so that they will do this work with joy , not sadness . It will not help you to make their work hard .
58013018	Pray for us . We are sure that we have a clear conscience , because we always want to do the right thing .
58013019	I especially beg you to pray so that God will send me back to you soon .
58013022	My brothers and sisters , I beg you to listen patiently to this message I have written to encourage you , because it is not very long .
58013023	I want you to know that our brother Timothy has been let out of prison . If he arrives soon , we will both come to see you .
58013024	Greet all your leaders and all of God’s people . Those from Italy send greetings to you .
58013025	Grace be with you all .
59001001	From James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ . To all of God’s people who are scattered everywhere in the world : Greetings .
59001002	My brothers and sisters , when you have many kinds of troubles , you should be full of joy ,
59001003	because you know that these troubles test your faith , and this will give you patience .
59001004	Let your patience show itself perfectly in what you do . Then you will be perfect and complete and will have everything you need .
59001005	But if any of you needs wisdom , you should ask God for it . He is generous to everyone and will give you wisdom without criticizing you .
59001006	But when you ask God , you must believe and not doubt . Anyone who doubts is like a wave in the sea , blown up and down by the wind .
59001009	Believers who are poor should take pride that God has made them spiritually rich .
59001010	Those who are rich should take pride that God has shown them that they are spiritually poor . The rich will die like a wild flower in the grass .
59001011	The sun rises with burning heat and dries up the plants . The flower falls off , and its beauty is gone . In the same way the rich will die while they are still taking care of business .
59001012	When people are tempted and still continue strong , they should be happy . After they have proved their faith , God will reward them with life forever . God promised this to all those who love him .
59001013	When people are tempted , they should not say , “ God is tempting me . ” Evil cannot tempt God , and God himself does not tempt anyone .
59001014	But people are tempted when their own evil desire leads them away and traps them .
59001015	This desire leads to sin , and then the sin grows and brings death .
59001016	My dear brothers and sisters , do not be fooled about this .
59001017	Every good action and every perfect gift is from God . These good gifts come down from the Creator of the sun , moon , and stars , who does not change like their shifting shadows .
59001018	God decided to give us life through the word of truth so we might be the most important of all the things he made .
59001019	My dear brothers and sisters , always be willing to listen and slow to speak . Do not become angry easily ,
59001020	because anger will not help you live the right kind of life God wants .
59001021	So put out of your life every evil thing and every kind of wrong . Then in gentleness accept God’s teaching that is planted in your hearts , which can save you .
59001022	Do what God’s teaching says ; when you only listen and do nothing , you are fooling yourselves .
59001023	Those who hear God’s teaching and do nothing are like people who look at themselves in a mirror .
59001024	They see their faces and then go away and quickly forget what they looked like .
59001025	But the truly happy people are those who carefully study God’s perfect law that makes people free , and they continue to study it . They do not forget what they heard , but they obey what God’s teaching says . Those who do this will be made happy .
59001026	People who think they are religious but say things they should not say are just fooling themselves . Their “ religion ” is worth nothing .
59001027	Religion that God accepts as pure and without fault is this : caring for orphans or widows who need help , and keeping yourself free from the world’s evil influence .
59002001	My dear brothers and sisters , as believers in our glorious Lord Jesus Christ , never think some people are more important than others .
59002002	Suppose someone comes into your church meeting wearing nice clothes and a gold ring . At the same time a poor person comes in wearing old , dirty clothes .
59002003	You show special attention to the one wearing nice clothes and say , “ Please , sit here in this good seat . ” But you say to the poor person , “ Stand over there , ” or , “ Sit on the floor by my feet . ”
59002004	What are you doing ? You are making some people more important than others , and with evil thoughts you are deciding that one person is better .
59002005	Listen , my dear brothers and sisters ! God chose the poor in the world to be rich with faith and to receive the kingdom God promised to those who love him .
59002006	But you show no respect to the poor . The rich are always trying to control your lives . They are the ones who take you to court .
59002007	And they are the ones who speak against Jesus , who owns you .
59002008	This royal law is found in the Scriptures : “ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ” If you obey this law , you are doing right .
59002009	But if you treat one person as being more important than another , you are sinning . You are guilty of breaking God’s law .
59002010	A person who follows all of God’s law but fails to obey even one command is guilty of breaking all the commands in that law .
59002011	The same God who said , “ You must not be guilty of adultery , ” also said , “ You must not murder anyone . ” So if you do not take part in adultery but you murder someone , you are guilty of breaking all of God’s law .
59002012	In everything you say and do , remember that you will be judged by the law that makes people free .
59002013	So you must show mercy to others , or God will not show mercy to you when he judges you . But the person who shows mercy can stand without fear at the judgment .
59002014	My brothers and sisters , if people say they have faith , but do nothing , their faith is worth nothing . Can faith like that save them ?
59002015	A brother or sister in Christ might need clothes or food .
59002016	If you say to that person , “ God be with you ! I hope you stay warm and get plenty to eat , ” but you do not give what that person needs , your words are worth nothing .
59002017	In the same way , faith by itself — that does nothing — is dead .
59002018	Someone might say , “ You have faith , but I have deeds . ” Show me your faith without doing anything , and I will show you my faith by what I do .
59002019	You believe there is one God . Good ! But the demons believe that , too , and they tremble with fear .
59002020	You foolish person ! Must you be shown that faith that does nothing is worth nothing ?
