59002021	Abraham , our ancestor , was made right with God by what he did when he offered his son Isaac on the altar .
59002022	So you see that Abraham’s faith and the things he did worked together . His faith was made perfect by what he did .
59002023	This shows the full meaning of the Scripture that says : “ Abraham believed God , and God accepted Abraham’s faith , and that faith made him right with God . ” And Abraham was called God’s friend .
59002024	So you see that people are made right with God by what they do , not by faith only .
59002025	Another example is Rahab , a prostitute , who was made right with God by something she did . She welcomed the spies into her home and helped them escape by a different road .
59002026	Just as a person’s body that does not have a spirit is dead , so faith that does nothing is dead !
59003001	My brothers and sisters , not many of you should become teachers , because you know that we who teach will be judged more strictly .
59003002	We all make many mistakes . If people never said anything wrong , they would be perfect and able to control their entire selves , too .
59003003	When we put bits into the mouths of horses to make them obey us , we can control their whole bodies .
59003004	Also a ship is very big , and it is pushed by strong winds . But a very small rudder controls that big ship , making it go wherever the pilot wants .
59003005	It is the same with the tongue . It is a small part of the body , but it brags about great things . A big forest fire can be started with only a little flame .
59003006	And the tongue is like a fire . It is a whole world of evil among the parts of our bodies . The tongue spreads its evil through the whole body . The tongue is set on fire by hell , and it starts a fire that influences all of life .
59003007	People can tame every kind of wild animal , bird , reptile , and fish , and they have tamed them ,
59003008	but no one can tame the tongue . It is wild and evil and full of deadly poison .
59003009	We use our tongues to praise our Lord and Father , but then we curse people , whom God made like himself .
59003010	Praises and curses come from the same mouth ! My brothers and sisters , this should not happen .
59003011	Do good and bad water flow from the same spring ?
59003012	My brothers and sisters , can a fig tree make olives , or can a grapevine make figs ? No ! And a well full of salty water cannot give good water .
59003013	Are there those among you who are truly wise and understanding ? Then they should show it by living right and doing good things with a gentleness that comes from wisdom .
59003014	But if you are selfish and have bitter jealousy in your hearts , do not brag . Your bragging is a lie that hides the truth .
59003015	That kind of “ wisdom ” does not come from God but from the world . It is not spiritual ; it is from the devil .
59003016	Where jealousy and selfishness are , there will be confusion and every kind of evil .
59003017	But the wisdom that comes from God is first of all pure , then peaceful , gentle , and easy to please . This wisdom is always ready to help those who are troubled and to do good for others . It is always fair and honest .
59003018	People who work for peace in a peaceful way plant a good crop of right-living .
59004001	Do you know where your fights and arguments come from ? They come from the selfish desires that war within you .
59004002	You want things , but you do not have them . So you are ready to kill and are jealous of other people , but you still cannot get what you want . So you argue and fight . You do not get what you want , because you do not ask God .
59004003	Or when you ask , you do not receive because the reason you ask is wrong . You want things so you can use them for your own pleasures .
59004004	So , you are not loyal to God ! You should know that loving the world is the same as hating God . Anyone who wants to be a friend of the world becomes God’s enemy .
59004005	Do you think the Scripture means nothing that says , “ The Spirit that God made to live in us wants us for himself alone ” ?
59004006	But God gives us even more grace , as the Scripture says , “ God is against the proud , but he gives grace to the humble . ”
59004007	So give yourselves completely to God . Stand against the devil , and the devil will run from you .
59004008	Come near to God , and God will come near to you . You sinners , clean sin out of your lives . You who are trying to follow God and the world at the same time , make your thinking pure .
59004009	Be sad , cry , and weep ! Change your laughter into crying and your joy into sadness .
59004010	Humble yourself in the Lord’s presence , and he will honor you .
59004011	Brothers and sisters , do not tell evil lies about each other . If you speak against your fellow believers or judge them , you are judging and speaking against the law they follow . And when you are judging the law , you are no longer a follower of the law . You have become a judge .
59004012	God is the only Lawmaker and Judge . He is the only One who can save and destroy . So it is not right for you to judge your neighbor .
59004013	Some of you say , “ Today or tomorrow we will go to some city . We will stay there a year , do business , and make money . ”
59004014	But you do not know what will happen tomorrow ! Your life is like a mist . You can see it for a short time , but then it goes away .
59004015	So you should say , “ If the Lord wants , we will live and do this or that . ”
59004016	But now you are proud and you brag . All of this bragging is wrong .
59004017	Anyone who knows the right thing to do , but does not do it , is sinning .
59005001	You rich people , listen ! Cry and be very sad because of the troubles that are coming to you .
59005002	Your riches have rotted , and your clothes have been eaten by moths .
59005003	Your gold and silver have rusted , and that rust will be a proof that you were wrong . It will eat your bodies like fire . You saved your treasure for the last days .
59005004	The pay you did not give the workers who mowed your fields cries out against you , and the cries of the workers have been heard by the Lord All-Powerful .
59005005	Your life on earth was full of rich living and pleasing yourselves with everything you wanted . You made yourselves fat , like an animal ready to be killed .
59005006	You have judged guilty and then murdered innocent people , who were not against you .
59005007	Brothers and sisters , be patient until the Lord comes again . A farmer patiently waits for his valuable crop to grow from the earth and for it to receive the autumn and spring rains .
59005008	You , too , must be patient . Do not give up hope , because the Lord is coming soon .
59005009	Brothers and sisters , do not complain against each other or you will be judged guilty . And the Judge is ready to come !
59005010	Brothers and sisters , follow the example of the prophets who spoke for the Lord . They suffered many hard things , but they were patient .
59005011	We say they are happy because they did not give up . You have heard about Job’s patience , and you know the Lord’s purpose for him in the end . You know the Lord is full of mercy and is kind .
59005012	My brothers and sisters , above all , do not use an oath when you make a promise . Don’t use the name of heaven , earth , or anything else to prove what you say . When you mean yes , say only yes , and when you mean no , say only no so you will not be judged guilty .
59005013	Anyone who is having troubles should pray . Anyone who is happy should sing praises .
59005014	Anyone who is sick should call the church’s elders . They should pray for and pour oil on the person in the name of the Lord .
59005015	And the prayer that is said with faith will make the sick person well ; the Lord will heal that person . And if the person has sinned , the sins will be forgiven .
59005016	Confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so God can heal you . When a believing person prays , great things happen .
59005017	Elijah was a human being just like us . He prayed that it would not rain , and it did not rain on the land for three and a half years !
59005018	Then Elijah prayed again , and the rain came down from the sky , and the land produced crops again .
59005019	My brothers and sisters , if one of you wanders away from the truth , and someone helps that person come back ,
59005020	remember this : Anyone who brings a sinner back from the wrong way will save that sinner’s soul from death and will cause many sins to be forgiven .
60001001	From Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ . To God’s chosen people who are away from their homes and are scattered all around Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia .
60001002	God planned long ago to choose you by making you his holy people , which is the Spirit’s work . God wanted you to obey him and to be made clean by the blood of the death of Jesus Christ . Grace and peace be yours more and more .
60001003	Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ . In God’s great mercy he has caused us to be born again into a living hope , because Jesus Christ rose from the dead .
60001004	Now we hope for the blessings God has for his children . These blessings , which cannot be destroyed or be spoiled or lose their beauty , are kept in heaven for you .
60001005	God’s power protects you through your faith until salvation is shown to you at the end of time .
60001006	This makes you very happy , even though now for a short time different kinds of troubles may make you sad .
60001007	These troubles come to prove that your faith is pure . This purity of faith is worth more than gold , which can be proved to be pure by fire but will ruin . But the purity of your faith will bring you praise and glory and honor when Jesus Christ is shown to you .
60001008	You have not seen Christ , but still you love him . You cannot see him now , but you believe in him . So you are filled with a joy that cannot be explained , a joy full of glory .
60001009	And you are receiving the goal of your faith — the salvation of your souls .
60001010	The prophets searched carefully and tried to learn about this salvation . They prophesied about the grace that was coming to you .
60001011	The Spirit of Christ was in the prophets , telling in advance about the sufferings of Christ and about the glory that would follow those sufferings . The prophets tried to learn about what the Spirit was showing them , when those things would happen , and what the world would be like at that time .
60001012	It was shown them that their service was not for themselves but for you , when they told about the truths you have now heard . Those who preached the Good News to you told you those things with the help of the Holy Spirit who was sent from heaven — things into which angels desire to look .
60001013	So prepare your minds for service and have self-control . All your hope should be for the gift of grace that will be yours when Jesus Christ is shown to you .
60001014	Now that you are obedient children of God do not live as you did in the past . You did not understand , so you did the evil things you wanted .
60001015	But be holy in all you do , just as God , the One who called you , is holy .
60001016	It is written in the Scriptures : “ You must be holy , because I am holy . ”
60001017	You pray to God and call him Father , and he judges each person’s work equally . So while you are here on earth , you should live with respect for God .
60001018	You know that in the past you were living in a worthless way , a way passed down from the people who lived before you . But you were saved from that useless life . You were bought , not with something that ruins like gold or silver ,
60001019	but with the precious blood of Christ , who was like a pure and perfect lamb .
60001020	Christ was chosen before the world was made , but he was shown to the world in these last times for your sake .
60001021	Through Christ you believe in God , who raised Christ from the dead and gave him glory . So your faith and your hope are in God .
60001022	Now that your obedience to the truth has purified your souls , you can have true love for your Christian brothers and sisters . So love each other deeply with all your heart .
60001023	You have been born again , and this new life did not come from something that dies , but from something that cannot die . You were born again through God’s living message that continues forever .
60001024	The Scripture says , “ All people are like the grass , and all their glory is like the flowers of the field . The grass dies and the flowers fall ,
60001025	but the word of the Lord will live forever . ” And this is the word that was preached to you .
60002001	So then , rid yourselves of all evil , all lying , hypocrisy , jealousy , and evil speech .
60002002	As newborn babies want milk , you should want the pure and simple teaching . By it you can mature in your salvation ,
60002003	because you have already examined and seen how good the Lord is .
60002004	Come to the Lord Jesus , the “ stone ” that lives . The people of the world did not want this stone , but he was the stone God chose , and he was precious .
60002005	You also are like living stones , so let yourselves be used to build a spiritual temple — to be holy priests who offer spiritual sacrifices to God . He will accept those sacrifices through Jesus Christ .
60002006	The Scripture says : “ I will put a stone in the ground in Jerusalem . Everything will be built on this important and precious rock . Anyone who trusts in him will never be disappointed . ”
60002007	This stone is worth much to you who believe . But to the people who do not believe , “ the stone that the builders rejected has become the cornerstone . ”
60002008	Also , he is “ a stone that causes people to stumble , a rock that makes them fall . ” They stumble because they do not obey what God says , which is what God planned to happen to them .
60002009	But you are a chosen people , royal priests , a holy nation , a people for God’s own possession . You were chosen to tell about the wonderful acts of God , who called you out of darkness into his wonderful light .
60002010	At one time you were not a people , but now you are God’s people . In the past you had never received mercy , but now you have received God’s mercy .
60002011	Dear friends , you are like foreigners and strangers in this world . I beg you to avoid the evil things your bodies want to do that fight against your soul .
60002012	People who do not believe are living all around you and might say that you are doing wrong . Live such good lives that they will see the good things you do and will give glory to God on the day when Christ comes again .
60002013	For the Lord’s sake , yield to the people who have authority in this world : the king , who is the highest authority ,
60002014	and the leaders who are sent by him to punish those who do wrong and to praise those who do right .
60002015	It is God’s desire that by doing good you should stop foolish people from saying stupid things about you .
60002016	Live as free people , but do not use your freedom as an excuse to do evil . Live as servants of God .
60002017	Show respect for all people : Love the brothers and sisters of God’s family , respect God , honor the king .
60002018	Slaves , yield to the authority of your masters with all respect , not only those who are good and kind , but also those who are dishonest .
60002019	A person might have to suffer even when it is unfair , but if he thinks of God and can stand the pain , God is pleased .
60002020	If you are beaten for doing wrong , there is no reason to praise you for being patient in your punishment . But if you suffer for doing good , and you are patient , then God is pleased .
60002021	This is what you were called to do , because Christ suffered for you and gave you an example to follow . So you should do as he did .
60002022	“ He had never sinned , and he had never lied . ”
60002023	People insulted Christ , but he did not insult them in return . Christ suffered , but he did not threaten . He let God , the One who judges rightly , take care of him .
60002024	Christ carried our sins in his body on the cross so we would stop living for sin and start living for what is right . And you are healed because of his wounds .
60002025	You were like sheep that wandered away , but now you have come back to the Shepherd and Overseer of your souls .
60003001	In the same way , you wives should yield to your husbands . Then , if some husbands do not obey God’s teaching , they will be persuaded to believe without anyone’s saying a word to them . They will be persuaded by the way their wives live .
60003002	Your husbands will see the pure lives you live with your respect for God .
60003003	It is not fancy hair , gold jewelry , or fine clothes that should make you beautiful .
60003004	No , your beauty should come from within you — the beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit that will never be destroyed and is very precious to God .
60003005	In this same way the holy women who lived long ago and followed God made themselves beautiful , yielding to their own husbands .
60003006	Sarah obeyed Abraham , her husband , and called him her master . And you women are true children of Sarah if you always do what is right and are not afraid .
60003007	In the same way , you husbands should live with your wives in an understanding way , since they are weaker than you . But show them respect , because God gives them the same blessing he gives you — the grace that gives true life . Do this so that nothing will stop your prayers .
60003008	Finally , all of you should be in agreement , understanding each other , loving each other as family , being kind and humble .
60003009	Do not do wrong to repay a wrong , and do not insult to repay an insult . But repay with a blessing , because you yourselves were called to do this so that you might receive a blessing .
60003010	The Scripture says , “ A person must do these things to enjoy life and have many happy days . He must not say evil things , and he must not tell lies .
60003011	He must stop doing evil and do good . He must look for peace and work for it .
60003012	The Lord sees the good people and listens to their prayers . But the Lord is against those who do evil . ”
60003013	If you are trying hard to do good , no one can really hurt you .
60003014	But even if you suffer for doing right , you are blessed . “ Don’t be afraid of what they fear ; do not dread those things . ”
60003015	But respect Christ as the holy Lord in your hearts . Always be ready to answer everyone who asks you to explain about the hope you have ,
60003016	but answer in a gentle way and with respect . Keep a clear conscience so that those who speak evil of your good life in Christ will be made ashamed .
60003017	It is better to suffer for doing good than for doing wrong if that is what God wants .
60003018	Christ himself suffered for sins once . He was not guilty , but he suffered for those who are guilty to bring you to God . His body was killed , but he was made alive in the spirit .
60003019	And in the spirit he went and preached to the spirits in prison
60003020	who refused to obey God long ago in the time of Noah . God was waiting patiently for them while Noah was building the boat . Only a few people — eight in all — were saved by water .
60003021	And that water is like baptism that now saves you — not the washing of dirt from the body , but the promise made to God from a good conscience . And this is because Jesus Christ was raised from the dead .
60003022	Now Jesus has gone into heaven and is at God’s right side ruling over angels , authorities , and powers .
60004001	Since Christ suffered while he was in his body , strengthen yourselves with the same way of thinking Christ had . The person who has suffered in the body is finished with sin .
60004002	Strengthen yourselves so that you will live here on earth doing what God wants , not the evil things people want .
60004003	In the past you wasted too much time doing what nonbelievers enjoy . You were guilty of sexual sins , evil desires , drunkenness , wild and drunken parties , and hateful idol worship .
60004004	Nonbelievers think it is strange that you do not do the many wild and wasteful things they do , so they insult you .
60004005	But they will have to explain this to God , who is ready to judge the living and the dead .
60004006	For this reason the Good News was preached to those who are now dead . Even though they were judged like all people , the Good News was preached to them so they could live in the spirit as God lives .
60004007	The time is near when all things will end . So think clearly and control yourselves so you will be able to pray .
60004008	Most importantly , love each other deeply , because love will cause people to forgive each other for many sins .
60004009	Open your homes to each other , without complaining .
60004010	Each of you has received a gift to use to serve others . Be good servants of God’s various gifts of grace .
60004011	Anyone who speaks should speak words from God . Anyone who serves should serve with the strength God gives so that in everything God will be praised through Jesus Christ . Power and glory belong to him forever and ever . Amen .
60004012	My friends , do not be surprised at the terrible trouble which now comes to test you . Do not think that something strange is happening to you .
60004013	But be happy that you are sharing in Christ’s sufferings so that you will be happy and full of joy when Christ comes again in glory .
60004014	When people insult you because you follow Christ , you are blessed , because the glorious Spirit , the Spirit of God , is with you .
60004015	Do not suffer for murder , theft , or any other crime , nor because you trouble other people .
60004016	But if you suffer because you are a Christian , do not be ashamed . Praise God because you wear that name .
60004017	It is time for judgment to begin with God’s family . And if that judging begins with us , what will happen to those people who do not obey the Good News of God ?
60004018	“ If it is very hard for a good person to be saved , the wicked person and the sinner will surely be lost ! ”
60004019	So those who suffer as God wants should trust their souls to the faithful Creator as they continue to do what is right .
60005001	Now I have something to say to the elders in your group . I also am an elder . I have seen Christ’s sufferings , and I will share in the glory that will be shown to us . I beg you to
60005002	shepherd God’s flock , for whom you are responsible . Watch over them because you want to , not because you are forced . That is how God wants it . Do it because you are happy to serve , not because you want money .
60005003	Do not be like a ruler over people you are responsible for , but be good examples to them .
60005004	Then when Christ , the Chief Shepherd , comes , you will get a glorious crown that will never lose its beauty .
60005005	In the same way , younger people should be willing to be under older people . And all of you should be very humble with each other . “ God is against the proud , but he gives grace to the humble . ”
60005006	Be humble under God’s powerful hand so he will lift you up when the right time comes .
60005007	Give all your worries to him , because he cares about you .
60005008	Control yourselves and be careful ! The devil , your enemy , goes around like a roaring lion looking for someone to eat .
60005009	Refuse to give in to him , by standing strong in your faith . You know that your Christian family all over the world is having the same kinds of suffering .
60005010	And after you suffer for a short time , God , who gives all grace , will make everything right . He will make you strong and support you and keep you from falling . He called you to share in his glory in Christ , a glory that will continue forever .
60005011	All power is his forever and ever . Amen .
60005012	I wrote this short letter with the help of Silas , who I know is a faithful brother in Christ . I wrote to encourage you and to tell you that this is the true grace of God . Stand strong in that grace .
60005013	The church in Babylon , who was chosen like you , sends you greetings . Mark , my son in Christ , also greets you .
60005014	Give each other a kiss of Christian love when you meet . Peace to all of you who are in Christ .
61001001	From Simon Peter , a servant and apostle of Jesus Christ . To you who have received a faith as valuable as ours , because our God and Savior Jesus Christ does what is right .
61001002	Grace and peace be given to you more and more , because you truly know God and Jesus our Lord .
61001003	Jesus has the power of God , by which he has given us everything we need to live and to serve God . We have these things because we know him . Jesus called us by his glory and goodness .
61001004	Through these he gave us the very great and precious promises . With these gifts you can share in God’s nature , and the world will not ruin you with its evil desires .
61001005	Because you have these blessings , do your best to add these things to your lives : to your faith , add goodness ; and to your goodness , add knowledge ;
61001006	and to your knowledge , add self-control ; and to your self-control , add patience ; and to your patience , add service for God ;
61001007	and to your service for God , add kindness for your brothers and sisters in Christ ; and to this kindness , add love .
61001008	If all these things are in you and are growing , they will help you to be useful and productive in your knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
61001009	But anyone who does not have these things cannot see clearly . He is blind and has forgotten that he was made clean from his past sins .
61001010	My brothers and sisters , try hard to be certain that you really are called and chosen by God . If you do all these things , you will never fall .
61001011	And you will be given a very great welcome into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ .
61001012	You know these things , and you are very strong in the truth , but I will always help you remember them .
61001013	I think it is right for me to help you remember as long as I am in this body .
61001014	I know I must soon leave this body , as our Lord Jesus Christ has shown me .
61001015	I will try my best so that you may be able to remember these things even after I am gone .
61001016	When we told you about the powerful coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , we were not telling just clever stories that someone invented . But we saw the greatness of Jesus with our own eyes .
61001017	Jesus heard the voice of God , the Greatest Glory , when he received honor and glory from God the Father . The voice said , “ This is my Son , whom I love , and I am very pleased with him . ”
61001018	We heard that voice from heaven while we were with Jesus on the holy mountain .
61001019	This makes us more sure about the message the prophets gave . It is good for you to follow closely what they said as you would follow a light shining in a dark place , until the day begins and the morning star rises in your hearts .
61001020	Most of all , you must understand this : No prophecy in the Scriptures ever comes from the prophet’s own interpretation .
61001021	No prophecy ever came from what a person wanted to say , but people led by the Holy Spirit spoke words from God .
61002001	There used to be false prophets among God’s people , just as you will have some false teachers in your group . They will secretly teach things that are wrong — teachings that will cause people to be lost . They will even refuse to accept the Master , Jesus , who bought their freedom . So they will bring quick ruin on themselves .
61002002	Many will follow their evil ways and say evil things about the way of truth .
61002003	Those false teachers only want your money , so they will use you by telling you lies . Their judgment spoken against them long ago is still coming , and their ruin is certain .
61002004	When angels sinned , God did not let them go free without punishment . He sent them to hell and put them in caves of darkness where they are being held for judgment .
61002005	And God punished the world long ago when he brought a flood to the world that was full of people who were against him . But God saved Noah , who preached about being right with God , and seven other people with him .
61002006	And God also destroyed the evil cities of Sodom and Gomorrah by burning them until they were ashes . He made those cities an example of what will happen to those who are against God .
61002007	But he saved Lot from those cities . Lot , a good man , was troubled because of the filthy lives of evil people .
61002008	( Lot was a good man , but because he lived with evil people every day , his good heart was hurt by the evil things he saw and heard . )
61002009	So the Lord knows how to save those who serve him when troubles come . He will hold evil people and punish them , while waiting for the Judgment Day .
61002010	That punishment is especially for those who live by doing the evil things their sinful selves want and who hate authority . These false teachers are bold and do anything they want . They are not afraid to speak against the angels .
61002011	But even the angels , who are much stronger and more powerful than false teachers , do not accuse them with insults before the Lord .
61002012	But these people speak against things they do not understand . They are like animals that act without thinking , animals born to be caught and killed . And , like animals , these false teachers will be destroyed .
61002013	They have caused many people to suffer , so they themselves will suffer . That is their pay for what they have done . They take pleasure in openly doing evil , so they are like dirty spots and stains among you . They delight in deceiving you while eating meals with you .
61002014	Every time they look at a woman they want her , and their desire for sin is never satisfied . They lead weak people into the trap of sin , and they have taught their hearts to be greedy . God will punish them !
61002015	These false teachers left the right road and lost their way , following the way Balaam went . Balaam was the son of Beor , who loved being paid for doing wrong .
61002016	But a donkey , which cannot talk , told Balaam he was sinning . It spoke with a man’s voice and stopped the prophet’s crazy thinking .
61002017	Those false teachers are like springs without water and clouds blown by a storm . A place in the blackest darkness has been kept for them .
61002018	They brag with words that mean nothing . By their evil desires they lead people into the trap of sin — people who are just beginning to escape from others who live in error .
61002019	They promise them freedom , but they themselves are not free . They are slaves of things that will be destroyed . For people are slaves of anything that controls them .
61002020	They were made free from the evil in the world by knowing our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . But if they return to evil things and those things control them , then it is worse for them than it was before .
61002021	Yes , it would be better for them to have never known the right way than to know it and to turn away from the holy teaching that was given to them .
61002022	What they did is like this true saying : “ A dog goes back to what it has thrown up , ” and , “ After a pig is washed , it goes back and rolls in the mud . ”
61003001	My friends , this is the second letter I have written you to help your honest minds remember .
61003002	I want you to think about the words the holy prophets spoke in the past , and remember the command our Lord and Savior gave us through your apostles .
61003003	It is most important for you to understand what will happen in the last days . People will laugh at you . They will live doing the evil things they want to do .
61003004	They will say , “ Jesus promised to come again . Where is he ? Our fathers have died , but the world continues the way it has been since it was made . ”
61003005	But they do not want to remember what happened long ago . By the word of God heaven was made , and the earth was made from water and with water .
61003006	Then the world was flooded and destroyed with water .
61003007	And that same word of God is keeping heaven and earth that we now have in order to be destroyed by fire . They are being kept for the Judgment Day and the destruction of all who are against God .
61003008	But do not forget this one thing , dear friends : To the Lord one day is as a thousand years , and a thousand years is as one day .
61003009	The Lord is not slow in doing what he promised — the way some people understand slowness . But God is being patient with you . He does not want anyone to be lost , but he wants all people to change their hearts and lives .
61003010	But the day of the Lord will come like a thief . The skies will disappear with a loud noise . Everything in them will be destroyed by fire , and the earth and everything in it will be exposed .
61003011	In that way everything will be destroyed . So what kind of people should you be ? You should live holy lives and serve God ,
61003012	as you wait for and look forward to the coming of the day of God . When that day comes , the skies will be destroyed with fire , and everything in them will melt with heat .
61003013	But God made a promise to us , and we are waiting for a new heaven and a new earth where goodness lives .
61003014	Dear friends , since you are waiting for this to happen , do your best to be without sin and without fault . Try to be at peace with God .
61003015	Remember that we are saved because our Lord is patient . Our dear brother Paul told you the same thing when he wrote to you with the wisdom that God gave him .
61003016	He writes about this in all his letters . Some things in Paul’s letters are hard to understand , and people who are ignorant and weak in faith explain these things falsely . They also falsely explain the other Scriptures , but they are destroying themselves by doing this .
61003017	Dear friends , since you already know about this , be careful . Do not let those evil people lead you away by the wrong they do . Be careful so you will not fall from your strong faith .
61003018	But grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . Glory be to him now and forever ! Amen .
62001001	We write you now about what has always existed , which we have heard , we have seen with our own eyes , we have looked at , and we have touched with our hands . We write to you about the Word that gives life .
62001002	He who gives life was shown to us . We saw him and can give proof about it . And now we announce to you that he has life that continues forever . He was with God the Father and was shown to us .
62001003	We announce to you what we have seen and heard , because we want you also to have fellowship with us . Our fellowship is with God the Father and with his Son , Jesus Christ .
62001004	We write this to you so we may be full of joy .
62001005	Here is the message we have heard from Christ and now announce to you : God is light , and in him there is no darkness at all .
62001006	So if we say we have fellowship with God , but we continue living in darkness , we are liars and do not follow the truth .
62001007	But if we live in the light , as God is in the light , we can share fellowship with each other . Then the blood of Jesus , God’s Son , cleanses us from every sin .
62001008	If we say we have no sin , we are fooling ourselves , and the truth is not in us .
62001009	But if we confess our sins , he will forgive our sins , because we can trust God to do what is right . He will cleanse us from all the wrongs we have done .
62001010	If we say we have not sinned , we make God a liar , and we do not accept God’s teaching .
62002001	My dear children , I write this letter to you so you will not sin . But if anyone does sin , we have a helper in the presence of the Father — Jesus Christ , the One who does what is right .
62002002	He died in our place to take away our sins , and not only our sins but the sins of all people .
62002003	We can be sure that we know God if we obey his commands .
62002004	Anyone who says , “ I know God , ” but does not obey God’s commands is a liar , and the truth is not in that person .
62002005	But if someone obeys God’s teaching , then in that person God’s love has truly reached its goal . This is how we can be sure we are living in God :
62002006	Whoever says that he lives in God must live as Jesus lived .
62002007	My dear friends , I am not writing a new command to you but an old command you have had from the beginning . It is the teaching you have already heard .
62002008	But also I am writing a new command to you , and you can see its truth in Jesus and in you , because the darkness is passing away , and the true light is already shining .
62002009	Anyone who says , “ I am in the light , ” but hates a brother or sister , is still in the darkness .
62002010	Whoever loves a brother or sister lives in the light and will not cause anyone to stumble in his faith .
62002011	But whoever hates a brother or sister is in darkness , lives in darkness , and does not know where to go , because the darkness has made that person blind .
62002012	I write to you , dear children , because your sins are forgiven through Christ .
62002013	I write to you , fathers , because you know the One who existed from the beginning . I write to you , young people , because you have defeated the Evil One .
62002014	I write to you , children , because you know the Father . I write to you , fathers , because you know the One who existed from the beginning . I write to you , young people , because you are strong ; the teaching of God lives in you , and you have defeated the Evil One .
62002015	Do not love the world or the things in the world . If you love the world , the love of the Father is not in you .
62002016	These are the ways of the world : wanting to please our sinful selves , wanting the sinful things we see , and being too proud of what we have . None of these come from the Father , but all of them come from the world .
62002017	The world and everything that people want in it are passing away , but the person who does what God wants lives forever .
62002018	My dear children , these are the last days . You have heard that the enemy of Christ is coming , and now many enemies of Christ are already here . This is how we know that these are the last days .
62002019	These enemies of Christ were in our fellowship , but they left us . They never really belonged to us ; if they had been a part of us , they would have stayed with us . But they left , and this shows that none of them really belonged to us .
62002020	You have the gift that the Holy One gave you , so you all know the truth .
62002021	I do not write to you because you do not know the truth but because you do know the truth . And you know that no lie comes from the truth .
62002022	Who is the liar ? It is the person who does not accept Jesus as the Christ . This is the enemy of Christ : the person who does not accept the Father and his Son .
62002023	Whoever does not accept the Son does not have the Father . But whoever confesses the Son has the Father , too .
62002024	Be sure you continue to follow the teaching you heard from the beginning . If you continue to follow what you heard from the beginning , you will stay in the Son and in the Father .
62002025	And this is what the Son promised to us — life forever .
62002026	I am writing this letter about those people who are trying to lead you the wrong way .
62002027	Christ gave you a special gift that is still in you , so you do not need any other teacher . His gift teaches you about everything , and it is true , not false . So continue to live in Christ , as his gift taught you .
62002028	Yes , my dear children , live in him so that when Christ comes back , we can be without fear and not be ashamed in his presence .
62002029	Since you know that Christ is righteous , you know that all who do right are God’s children .
62003001	The Father has loved us so much that we are called children of God . And we really are his children . The reason the people in the world do not know us is that they have not known him .
62003002	Dear friends , now we are children of God , and we have not yet been shown what we will be in the future . But we know that when Christ comes again , we will be like him , because we will see him as he really is .
62003003	Christ is pure , and all who have this hope in Christ keep themselves pure like Christ .
62003004	The person who sins breaks God’s law . Yes , sin is living against God’s law .
62003005	You know that Christ came to take away sins and that there is no sin in Christ .
62003006	So anyone who lives in Christ does not go on sinning . Anyone who goes on sinning has never really understood Christ and has never known him .
62003007	Dear children , do not let anyone lead you the wrong way . Christ is righteous . So to be like Christ a person must do what is right .
62003008	The devil has been sinning since the beginning , so anyone who continues to sin belongs to the devil . The Son of God came for this purpose : to destroy the devil’s work .
62003009	Those who are God’s children do not continue sinning , because the new life from God remains in them . They are not able to go on sinning , because they have become children of God .
62003010	So we can see who God’s children are and who the devil’s children are : Those who do not do what is right are not God’s children , and those who do not love their brothers and sisters are not God’s children .
62003011	This is the teaching you have heard from the beginning : We must love each other .
62003012	Do not be like Cain who belonged to the Evil One and killed his brother . And why did he kill him ? Because the things Cain did were evil , and the things his brother did were good .
62003013	Brothers and sisters , do not be surprised when the people of the world hate you .
62003014	We know we have left death and have come into life because we love each other . Whoever does not love is still dead .
62003015	Everyone who hates a brother or sister is a murderer , and you know that no murderers have eternal life in them .
62003016	This is how we know what real love is : Jesus gave his life for us . So we should give our lives for our brothers and sisters .
62003017	Suppose someone has enough to live and sees a brother or sister in need , but does not help . Then God’s love is not living in that person .
62003018	My children , we should love people not only with words and talk , but by our actions and true caring .
62003021	My dear friends , if our hearts do not make us feel guilty , we can come without fear into God’s presence .
62003022	And God gives us what we ask for because we obey God’s commands and do what pleases him .
62003023	This is what God commands : that we believe in his Son , Jesus Christ , and that we love each other , just as he commanded .
62003024	The people who obey God’s commands live in God , and God lives in them . We know that God lives in us because of the Spirit God gave us .
62004001	My dear friends , many false prophets have gone out into the world . So do not believe every spirit , but test the spirits to see if they are from God .
62004002	This is how you can know God’s Spirit : Every spirit who confesses that Jesus Christ came to earth as a human is from God .
62004003	And every spirit who refuses to say this about Jesus is not from God . It is the spirit of the enemy of Christ , which you have heard is coming , and now he is already in the world .
62004004	My dear children , you belong to God and have defeated them ; because God’s Spirit , who is in you , is greater than the devil , who is in the world .
62004005	And they belong to the world , so what they say is from the world , and the world listens to them .
62004006	But we belong to God , and those who know God listen to us . But those who are not from God do not listen to us . That is how we know the Spirit that is true and the spirit that is false .
62004007	Dear friends , we should love each other , because love comes from God . Everyone who loves has become God’s child and knows God .
62004008	Whoever does not love does not know God , because God is love .
62004009	This is how God showed his love to us : He sent his one and only Son into the world so that we could have life through him .
62004010	This is what real love is : It is not our love for God ; it is God’s love for us . He sent his Son to die in our place to take away our sins .
62004011	Dear friends , if God loved us that much we also should love each other .
62004012	No one has ever seen God , but if we love each other , God lives in us , and his love is made perfect in us .
62004013	We know that we live in God and he lives in us , because he gave us his Spirit .
62004014	We have seen and can testify that the Father sent his Son to be the Savior of the world .
62004015	Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God has God living inside , and that person lives in God .
62004016	And so we know the love that God has for us , and we trust that love . God is love . Those who live in love live in God , and God lives in them .
62004017	This is how love is made perfect in us : that we can be without fear on the day God judges us , because in this world we are like him .
62004018	Where God’s love is , there is no fear , because God’s perfect love drives out fear . It is punishment that makes a person fear , so love is not made perfect in the person who fears .
62004019	We love because God first loved us .
62004020	If people say , “ I love God , ” but hate their brothers or sisters , they are liars . Those who do not love their brothers and sisters , whom they have seen , cannot love God , whom they have never seen .
62004021	And God gave us this command : Those who love God must also love their brothers and sisters .
62005001	Everyone who believes that Jesus is the Christ is God’s child , and whoever loves the Father also loves the Father’s children .
62005002	This is how we know we love God’s children : when we love God and obey his commands .
62005003	Loving God means obeying his commands . And God’s commands are not too hard for us ,
62005004	because everyone who is a child of God conquers the world . And this is the victory that conquers the world — our faith .
62005005	So the one who conquers the world is the person who believes that Jesus is the Son of God .
62005006	Jesus Christ is the One who came by water and blood . He did not come by water only , but by water and blood . And the Spirit says that this is true , because the Spirit is the truth .
62005007	So there are three witnesses :
62005008	the Spirit , the water , and the blood ; and these three witnesses agree .
62005009	We believe people when they say something is true . But what God says is more important , and he has told us the truth about his own Son .
62005010	Anyone who believes in the Son of God has the truth that God told us . Anyone who does not believe makes God a liar , because that person does not believe what God told us about his Son .
62005011	This is what God told us : God has given us eternal life , and this life is in his Son .
62005012	Whoever has the Son has life , but whoever does not have the Son of God does not have life .
62005013	I write this letter to you who believe in the Son of God so you will know you have eternal life .
62005014	And this is the boldness we have in God’s presence : that if we ask God for anything that agrees with what he wants , he hears us .
62005015	If we know he hears us every time we ask him , we know we have what we ask from him .
62005016	If anyone sees a brother or sister sinning ( sin that does not lead to eternal death ) , that person should pray , and God will give the sinner life . I am talking about people whose sin does not lead to eternal death . There is sin that leads to death . I do not mean that a person should pray about that sin .
62005017	Doing wrong is always sin , but there is sin that does not lead to eternal death .
62005018	We know that those who are God’s children do not continue to sin . The Son of God keeps them safe , and the Evil One cannot touch them .
62005019	We know that we belong to God , but the Evil One controls the whole world .
62005020	We also know that the Son of God has come and has given us understanding so that we can know the True One . And our lives are in the True One and in his Son , Jesus Christ . He is the true God and the eternal life .
62005021	So , dear children , keep yourselves away from false gods .
63001001	From the Elder . To the chosen lady and her children : I love all of you in the truth , and all those who know the truth love you .
63001002	We love you because of the truth that lives in us and will be with us forever .
63001003	Grace , mercy , and peace from God the Father and his Son , Jesus Christ , will be with us in truth and love .
63001004	I was very happy to learn that some of your children are following the way of truth , as the Father commanded us .
63001005	And now , dear lady , this is not a new command but is the same command we have had from the beginning . I ask you that we all love each other .
63001006	And love means living the way God commanded us to live . As you have heard from the beginning , his command is this : Live a life of love .
63001007	Many false teachers are in the world now who do not confess that Jesus Christ came to earth as a human . Anyone who does not confess this is a false teacher and an enemy of Christ .
63001008	Be careful yourselves that you do not lose everything you have worked for , but that you receive your full reward .
63001009	Anyone who goes beyond Christ’s teaching and does not continue to follow only his teaching does not have God . But whoever continues to follow the teaching of Christ has both the Father and the Son .
63001010	If someone comes to you and does not bring this teaching , do not welcome or accept that person into your house .
63001011	If you welcome such a person , you share in the evil work .
63001012	I have many things to write to you , but I do not want to use paper and ink . Instead , I hope to come to you and talk face to face so we can be full of joy .
63001013	The children of your chosen sister greet you .
64001001	From the Elder . To my dear friend Gaius , whom I love in the truth :
64001002	My dear friend , I know your soul is doing fine , and I pray that you are doing well in every way and that your health is good .

65001002	Mercy , peace , and love be yours richly .

65001010	But these people speak against things they do not understand . And what they do know , by feeling , as dumb animals know things , are the very things that destroy them .
65001011	It will be terrible for them . They have followed the way of Cain , and for money they have given themselves to doing the wrong that Balaam did . They have fought against God as Korah did , and like Korah , they surely will be destroyed .
65001012	They are like dirty spots in your special Christian meals you share . They eat with you and have no fear , caring only for themselves . They are clouds without rain , which the wind blows around . They are autumn trees without fruit that are pulled out of the ground . So they are twice dead .
65001013	They are like wild waves of the sea , tossing up their own shameful actions like foam . They are like stars that wander in the sky . A place in the blackest darkness has been kept for them forever .
65001014	Enoch , the seventh descendant from Adam , said about these people : “ Look , the Lord is coming with many thousands of his holy angels to
65001015	judge every person . He is coming to punish all who are against God for all the evil they have done against him . And he will punish the sinners who are against God for all the evil they have said against him . ”
65001016	These people complain and blame others , doing the evil things they want to do . They brag about themselves , and they flatter others to get what they want .
65001017	Dear friends , remember what the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ said before .

65001023	Take others out of the fire , and save them . Show mercy mixed with fear to others , hating even their clothes which are dirty from sin .

66006017	The great day for their anger has come , and who can stand against it ? ”

66007006	from the tribe of Asher twelve thousand , from the tribe of Naphtali twelve thousand , from the tribe of Manasseh twelve thousand ,

66007012	saying , “ Amen ! Praise , glory , wisdom , thanks , honor , power , and strength belong to our God forever and ever . Amen ! ”
66007013	Then one of the elders asked me , “ Who are these people dressed in white robes ? Where did they come from ? ”
66007014	I answered , “ You know , sir . ” And the elder said to me , “ These are the people who have come out of the great distress . They have washed their robes and made them white in the blood of the Lamb .
66007015	Because of this , they are before the throne of God . They worship him day and night in his temple . And the One who sits on the throne will be present with them .
66007016	Those people will never be hungry again , and they will never be thirsty again . The sun will not hurt them , and no heat will burn them ,
66007017	because the Lamb at the center of the throne will be their shepherd . He will lead them to springs of water that give life . And God will wipe away every tear from their eyes . ”
66008001	When the Lamb opened the seventh seal , there was silence in heaven for about half an hour .
66008002	And I saw the seven angels who stand before God and to whom were given seven trumpets .
66008003	Another angel came and stood at the altar , holding a golden pan for incense . He was given much incense to offer with the prayers of all God’s holy people . The angel put this offering on the golden altar before the throne .
66008004	The smoke from the incense went up from the angel’s hand to God with the prayers of God’s people .
66008005	Then the angel filled the incense pan with fire from the altar and threw it on the earth , and there were flashes of lightning , thunder and loud noises , and an earthquake .
66008006	Then the seven angels who had the seven trumpets prepared to blow them .
66008007	The first angel blew his trumpet , and hail and fire mixed with blood were poured down on the earth . And a third of the earth , and all the green grass , and a third of the trees were burned up .
66008008	Then the second angel blew his trumpet , and something that looked like a big mountain , burning with fire , was thrown into the sea . And a third of the sea became blood ,
66008009	a third of the living things in the sea died , and a third of the ships were destroyed .
66008010	Then the third angel blew his trumpet , and a large star , burning like a torch , fell from the sky . It fell on a third of the rivers and on the springs of water .
66008011	The name of the star is Wormwood . And a third of all the water became bitter , and many people died from drinking the water that was bitter .
66008012	Then the fourth angel blew his trumpet , and a third of the sun , and a third of the moon , and a third of the stars were struck . So a third of them became dark , and a third of the day was without light , and also the night .
66008013	While I watched , I heard an eagle that was flying high in the air cry out in a loud voice , “ Trouble ! Trouble ! Trouble for those who live on the earth because of the remaining sounds of the trumpets that the other three angels are about to blow ! ”
66009001	Then the fifth angel blew his trumpet , and I saw a star fall from the sky to the earth . The star was given the key to the deep hole that leads to the bottomless pit .
66009002	Then it opened up the hole that leads to the bottomless pit , and smoke came up from the hole like smoke from a big furnace . Then the sun and sky became dark because of the smoke from the hole .
66009003	Then locusts came down to the earth out of the smoke , and they were given the power to sting like scorpions .
66009004	They were told not to harm the grass on the earth or any plant or tree . They could harm only the people who did not have the sign of God on their foreheads .
66009005	These locusts were not given the power to kill anyone , but to cause pain to the people for five months . And the pain they felt was like the pain a scorpion gives when it stings someone .
66009006	During those days people will look for a way to die , but they will not find it . They will want to die , but death will run away from them .
66009007	The locusts looked like horses prepared for battle . On their heads they wore what looked like crowns of gold , and their faces looked like human faces .
66009008	Their hair was like women’s hair , and their teeth were like lions’ teeth .
66009009	Their chests looked like iron breastplates , and the sound of their wings was like the noise of many horses and chariots hurrying into battle .
66009010	The locusts had tails with stingers like scorpions , and in their tails was their power to hurt people for five months .
66009011	The locusts had a king who was the angel of the bottomless pit . His name in the Hebrew language is Abaddon and in the Greek language is Apollyon .
66009012	The first trouble is past ; there are still two other troubles that will come .
66009013	Then the sixth angel blew his trumpet , and I heard a voice coming from the horns on the golden altar that is before God .
66009014	The voice said to the sixth angel who had the trumpet , “ Free the four angels who are tied at the great river Euphrates . ”
66009015	And they let loose the four angels who had been kept ready for this hour and day and month and year so they could kill a third of all people on the earth .
66009016	I heard how many troops on horses were in their army — two hundred million .
66009017	The horses and their riders I saw in the vision looked like this : They had breastplates that were fiery red , dark blue , and yellow like sulfur . The heads of the horses looked like heads of lions , with fire , smoke , and sulfur coming out of their mouths .
66009018	A third of all the people on earth were killed by these three terrible disasters coming out of the horses’ mouths : the fire , the smoke , and the sulfur .
66009019	The horses’ power was in their mouths and in their tails ; their tails were like snakes with heads , and with them they hurt people .
66009020	The other people who were not killed by these terrible disasters still did not change their hearts and turn away from what they had made with their own hands . They did not stop worshiping demons and idols made of gold , silver , bronze , stone , and wood — things that cannot see or hear or walk .
66009021	These people did not change their hearts and turn away from murder or evil magic , from their sexual sins or stealing .
66010001	Then I saw another powerful angel coming down from heaven dressed in a cloud with a rainbow over his head . His face was like the sun , and his legs were like pillars of fire .
66010002	The angel was holding a small scroll open in his hand . He put his right foot on the sea and his left foot on the land .
66010003	Then he shouted loudly like the roaring of a lion . And when he shouted , the voices of seven thunders spoke .
66010004	When the seven thunders spoke , I started to write . But I heard a voice from heaven say , “ Keep hidden what the seven thunders said , and do not write them down . ”
66010005	Then the angel I saw standing on the sea and on the land raised his right hand to heaven ,
66010006	and he made a promise by the power of the One who lives forever and ever . He is the One who made the skies and all that is in them , the earth and all that is in it , and the sea and all that is in it . The angel promised , “ There will be no more waiting !
66010007	In the days when the seventh angel is ready to blow his trumpet , God’s secret will be finished . This secret is the Good News God told to his servants , the prophets . ”
66010008	Then I heard the same voice from heaven again , saying to me : “ Go and take the open scroll that is in the hand of the angel that is standing on the sea and on the land . ”
66010009	So I went to the angel and told him to give me the small scroll . And he said to me , “ Take the scroll and eat it . It will be sour in your stomach , but in your mouth it will be sweet as honey . ”
66010010	So I took the small scroll from the angel’s hand and ate it . In my mouth it tasted sweet as honey , but after I ate it , it was sour in my stomach .
66010011	Then I was told , “ You must prophesy again about many peoples , nations , languages , and kings . ”

66011003	And I will give power to my two witnesses to prophesy for one thousand two hundred sixty days , and they will be dressed in rough cloth to show their sadness . ”
66011004	These two witnesses are the two olive trees and the two lampstands that stand before the Lord of the earth .
66011005	And if anyone tries to hurt them , fire comes from their mouths and kills their enemies . And if anyone tries to hurt them in whatever way , in that same way that person will die .
66011006	These witnesses have the power to stop the sky from raining during the time they are prophesying . And they have power to make the waters become blood , and they have power to send every kind of trouble to the earth as many times as they want .
66011007	When the two witnesses have finished telling their message , the beast that comes up from the bottomless pit will fight a war against them . He will defeat them and kill them .
66011008	The bodies of the two witnesses will lie in the street of the great city where the Lord was killed . This city is named Sodom and Egypt , which has a spiritual meaning .
66011009	Those from every race of people , tribe , language , and nation will look at the bodies of the two witnesses for three and one-half days , and they will refuse to bury them .
66011010	People who live on the earth will rejoice and be happy because these two are dead . They will send each other gifts , because these two prophets brought much suffering to those who live on the earth .
66011011	But after three and one-half days , God put the breath of life into the two prophets again . They stood on their feet , and everyone who saw them became very afraid .
66011012	Then the two prophets heard a loud voice from heaven saying , “ Come up here ! ” And they went up into heaven in a cloud as their enemies watched .
66011013	In the same hour there was a great earthquake , and a tenth of the city was destroyed . Seven thousand people were killed in the earthquake , and those who did not die were very afraid and gave glory to the God of heaven .
66011014	The second trouble is finished . Pay attention : The third trouble is coming soon .
66011015	Then the seventh angel blew his trumpet . And there were loud voices in heaven , saying : “ The power to rule the world now belongs to our Lord and his Christ , and he will rule forever and ever . ”
66011016	Then the twenty-four elders , who sit on their thrones before God , bowed down on their faces and worshiped God .

66011018	The people of the world were angry , but your anger has come . The time has come to judge the dead , and to reward your servants the prophets and your holy people , all who respect you , great and small . The time has come to destroy those who destroy the earth ! ”

66016001	Then I heard a loud voice from the temple saying to the seven angels , “ Go and pour out the seven bowls of God’s anger on the earth . ”

66017001	Then one of the seven angels who had the seven bowls came and spoke to me . He said , “ Come , and I will show you the punishment that will be given to the great prostitute , the one sitting over many waters .

66017009	“ You need a wise mind to understand this . The seven heads on the beast are seven mountains where the woman sits .

66018001	After the vision of these things , I saw another angel coming down from heaven . This angel had great power , and his glory made the earth bright .

66018016	and say : “ Terrible ! How terrible for the great city ! She was dressed in fine linen , purple and red cloth , and she was shining with gold , precious jewels , and pearls !
66018017	All these riches have been destroyed in one hour ! ” Every sea captain , every passenger , the sailors , and all those who earn their living from the sea stood far away from Babylon .

66018019	And they threw dust on their heads and cried out , weeping and being sad . They said : “ Terrible ! How terrible for the great city ! All the people who had ships on the sea became rich because of her wealth ! But she has been destroyed in one hour !
66018020	Be happy because of this , heaven ! Be happy , God’s holy people and apostles and prophets ! God has punished her because of what she did to you . ”
66018021	Then a powerful angel picked up a large stone , like one used for grinding grain , and threw it into the sea . He said : “ In the same way , the great city of Babylon will be thrown down , and it will never be found again .
66018022	The music of people playing harps and other instruments , flutes , and trumpets , will never be heard in you again . No workman doing any job will ever be found in you again . The sound of grinding grain will never be heard in you again .
66018023	The light of a lamp will never shine in you again , and the voices of a bridegroom and bride will never be heard in you again . Your merchants were the world’s great people , and all the nations were tricked by your magic .
66018024	You are guilty of the death of the prophets and God’s holy people and all who have been killed on earth . ”
66019001	After this vision and announcement I heard what sounded like a great many people in heaven saying : “ Hallelujah ! Salvation , glory , and power belong to our God ,
66019002	because his judgments are true and right . He has punished the prostitute who made the earth evil with her sexual sin . He has paid her back for the death of his servants . ”
66019003	Again they said : “ Hallelujah ! She is burning , and her smoke will rise forever and ever . ”
66019004	Then the twenty-four elders and the four living creatures bowed down and worshiped God , who sits on the throne . They said : “ Amen , Hallelujah ! ”
66019005	Then a voice came from the throne , saying : “ Praise our God , all you who serve him and all you who honor him , both small and great ! ”
66019006	Then I heard what sounded like a great many people , like the noise of flooding water , and like the noise of loud thunder . The people were saying : “ Hallelujah ! Our Lord God , the Almighty , rules .
66019007	Let us rejoice and be happy and give God glory , because the wedding of the Lamb has come , and the Lamb’s bride has made herself ready .
66019008	Fine linen , bright and clean , was given to her to wear . ” ( The fine linen means the good things done by God’s holy people . )
66019009	And the angel said to me , “ Write this : Blessed are those who have been invited to the wedding meal of the Lamb ! ” And the angel said , “ These are the true words of God . ”
66019010	Then I bowed down at the angel’s feet to worship him , but he said to me , “ Do not worship me ! I am a servant like you and your brothers and sisters who have the message of Jesus . Worship God , because the message about Jesus is the spirit that gives all prophecy . ”
66019011	Then I saw heaven opened , and there before me was a white horse . The rider on the horse is called Faithful and True , and he is right when he judges and makes war .
66019012	His eyes are like burning fire , and on his head are many crowns . He has a name written on him , which no one but himself knows .
66019013	He is dressed in a robe dipped in blood , and his name is the Word of God .
66019014	The armies of heaven , dressed in fine linen , white and clean , were following him on white horses .
66019015	Out of the rider’s mouth comes a sharp sword that he will use to defeat the nations , and he will rule them with a rod of iron . He will crush out the wine in the winepress of the terrible anger of God the Almighty .
66019016	On his robe and on his upper leg was written this name : king of kings and lord of lords .
66019017	Then I saw an angel standing in the sun , and he called with a loud voice to all the birds flying in the sky : “ Come and gather together for the great feast of God
66019018	so that you can eat the bodies of kings , generals , mighty people , horses and their riders , and the bodies of all people — free , slave , small , and great . ”
66019019	Then I saw the beast and the kings of the earth . Their armies were gathered together to make war against the rider on the horse and his army .
66019020	But the beast was captured and with him the false prophet who did the miracles for the beast . The false prophet had used these miracles to trick those who had the mark of the beast and worshiped his idol . The false prophet and the beast were thrown alive into the lake of fire that burns with sulfur .
66019021	And their armies were killed with the sword that came out of the mouth of the rider on the horse , and all the birds ate the bodies until they were full .
66020001	I saw an angel coming down from heaven . He had the key to the bottomless pit and a large chain in his hand .
66020002	The angel grabbed the dragon , that old snake who is the devil and Satan , and tied him up for a thousand years .
66020003	Then he threw him into the bottomless pit , closed it , and locked it over him . The angel did this so he could not trick the people of the earth anymore until the thousand years were ended . After a thousand years he must be set free for a short time .
66020004	Then I saw some thrones and people sitting on them who had been given the power to judge . And I saw the souls of those who had been killed because they were faithful to the message of Jesus and the message from God . They had not worshiped the beast or his idol , and they had not received the mark of the beast on their foreheads or on their hands . They came back to life and ruled with Christ for a thousand years .
66020005	( The others that were dead did not live again until the thousand years were ended . ) This is the first raising of the dead .
66020006	Blessed and holy are those who share in this first raising of the dead . The second death has no power over them . They will be priests for God and for Christ and will rule with him for a thousand years .
66020007	When the thousand years are over , Satan will be set free from his prison .
66020008	Then he will go out to trick the nations in all the earth — Gog and Magog — to gather them for battle . There are so many people they will be like sand on the seashore .
66020009	And Satan’s army marched across the earth and gathered around the camp of God’s people and the city God loves . But fire came down from heaven and burned them up .
66020010	And Satan , who tricked them , was thrown into the lake of burning sulfur with the beast and the false prophet . There they will be punished day and night forever and ever .
66020011	Then I saw a great white throne and the One who was sitting on it . Earth and sky ran away from him and disappeared .
66020012	And I saw the dead , great and small , standing before the throne . Then books were opened , and the book of life was opened . The dead were judged by what they had done , which was written in the books .
66020013	The sea gave up the dead who were in it , and Death and Hades gave up the dead who were in them . Each person was judged by what he had done .
66020014	And Death and Hades were thrown into the lake of fire . The lake of fire is the second death .
66020015	And anyone whose name was not found written in the book of life was thrown into the lake of fire .
66021001	Then I saw a new heaven and a new earth . The first heaven and the first earth had disappeared , and there was no sea anymore .
66021002	And I saw the holy city , the new Jerusalem , coming down out of heaven from God . It was prepared like a bride dressed for her husband .
66021003	And I heard a loud voice from the throne , saying , “ Now God’s presence is with people , and he will live with them , and they will be his people . God himself will be with them and will be their God .
66021004	He will wipe away every tear from their eyes , and there will be no more death , sadness , crying , or pain , because all the old ways are gone . ”
66021005	The One who was sitting on the throne said , “ Look ! I am making everything new ! ” Then he said , “ Write this , because these words are true and can be trusted . ”
66021006	The One on the throne said to me , “ It is finished . I am the Alpha and the Omega , the Beginning and the End . I will give free water from the spring of the water of life to anyone who is thirsty .
66021007	Those who win the victory will receive this , and I will be their God , and they will be my children .
66021008	But cowards , those who refuse to believe , who do evil things , who kill , who sin sexually , who do evil magic , who worship idols , and who tell lies — all these will have a place in the lake of burning sulfur . This is the second death . ”
66021009	Then one of the seven angels who had the seven bowls full of the seven last troubles came to me , saying , “ Come with me , and I will show you the bride , the wife of the Lamb . ”
66021010	And the angel carried me away by the Spirit to a very large and high mountain . He showed me the holy city , Jerusalem , coming down out of heaven from God .
66021011	It was shining with the glory of God and was bright like a very expensive jewel , like a jasper , clear as crystal .
66021012	The city had a great high wall with twelve gates with twelve angels at the gates , and on each gate was written the name of one of the twelve tribes of Israel .
66021013	There were three gates on the east , three on the north , three on the south , and three on the west .
66021014	The walls of the city were built on twelve foundation stones , and on the stones were written the names of the twelve apostles of the Lamb .
66021015	The angel who talked with me had a measuring rod made of gold to measure the city , its gates , and its wall .
66021016	The city was built in a square , and its length was equal to its width . The angel measured the city with the rod . The city was 1,500 miles long , 1,500 miles wide , and 1,500 miles high .
66021017	The angel also measured the wall . It was 216 feet high , by human measurements , which the angel was using .
66021018	The wall was made of jasper , and the city was made of pure gold , as pure as glass .
66021019	The foundation stones of the city walls were decorated with every kind of jewel . The first foundation was jasper , the second was sapphire , the third was chalcedony , the fourth was emerald ,
66021020	the fifth was onyx , the sixth was carnelian , the seventh was chrysolite , the eighth was beryl , the ninth was topaz , the tenth was chrysoprase , the eleventh was jacinth , and the twelfth was amethyst .
66021021	The twelve gates were twelve pearls , each gate having been made from a single pearl . And the street of the city was made of pure gold as clear as glass .
66021022	I did not see a temple in the city , because the Lord God Almighty and the Lamb are the city’s temple .
66021023	The city does not need the sun or the moon to shine on it , because the glory of God is its light , and the Lamb is the city’s lamp .
66021024	By its light the people of the world will walk , and the kings of the earth will bring their glory into it .
66021025	The city’s gates will never be shut on any day , because there is no night there .
66021026	The glory and the honor of the nations will be brought into it .
66021027	Nothing unclean and no one who does shameful things or tells lies will ever go into it . Only those whose names are written in the Lamb’s book of life will enter the city .
66022001	Then the angel showed me the river of the water of life . It was shining like crystal and was flowing from the throne of God and of the Lamb
66022002	down the middle of the street of the city . The tree of life was on each side of the river . It produces fruit twelve times a year , once each month . The leaves of the tree are for the healing of all the nations .
66022003	Nothing that God judges guilty will be in that city . The throne of God and of the Lamb will be there , and God’s servants will worship him .
66022004	They will see his face , and his name will be written on their foreheads .
66022005	There will never be night again . They will not need the light of a lamp or the light of the sun , because the Lord God will give them light . And they will rule as kings forever and ever .
66022006	The angel said to me , “ These words can be trusted and are true . ” The Lord , the God of the spirits of the prophets , sent his angel to show his servants the things that must happen soon .
66022007	“ Listen ! I am coming soon ! Blessed is the one who obeys the words of prophecy in this book . ”
66022008	I , John , am the one who heard and saw these things . When I heard and saw them , I bowed down to worship at the feet of the angel who showed these things to me .
66022009	But the angel said to me , “ Do not worship me ! I am a servant like you , your brothers the prophets , and all those who obey the words in this book . Worship God ! ”
66022010	Then the angel told me , “ Do not keep secret the words of prophecy in this book , because the time is near for all this to happen .
66022011	Let whoever is doing evil continue to do evil . Let whoever is unclean continue to be unclean . Let whoever is doing right continue to do right . Let whoever is holy continue to be holy . ”
66022012	“ Listen ! I am coming soon ! I will bring my reward with me , and I will repay each one of you for what you have done .
66022013	I am the Alpha and the Omega , the First and the Last , the Beginning and the End .
66022014	“ Blessed are those who wash their robes so that they will receive the right to eat the fruit from the tree of life and may go through the gates into the city .
66022015	Outside the city are the evil people , those who do evil magic , who sin sexually , who murder , who worship idols , and who love lies and tell lies .
66022016	“ I , Jesus , have sent my angel to tell you these things for the churches . I am the descendant from the family of David , and I am the bright morning star . ”
66022017	The Spirit and the bride say , “ Come ! ” Let the one who hears this say , “ Come ! ” Let whoever is thirsty come ; whoever wishes may have the water of life as a free gift .
66022018	I warn everyone who hears the words of the prophecy of this book : If anyone adds anything to these words , God will add to that person the disasters written about in this book .
66022019	And if anyone takes away from the words of this book of prophecy , God will take away that one’s share of the tree of life and of the holy city , which are written about in this book .
66022020	Jesus , the One who says these things are true , says , “ Yes , I am coming soon . ” Amen . Come , Lord Jesus !
66022021	The grace of the Lord Jesus be with all . Amen .
